         6         REMARKS.                                                                                                         
         7        *************************************************************                                                     
         8        *** THE PURPOSE OF ATE01D IS TO EXTRACT RECORDS FROM THE  ***                                                     
         9        *** CIS DATA BASE AND CREATE OUTPUT FLAT SEQUENTIAL       ***                                                     
        10        *** FILES.                                                ***                                                     
        11        ***                                                       ***                                                     
        12        *** THESE FILES ARE TO BE USED AS INPUT TO SUBSEQUENT     ***                                                     
        13        *** PROGRAMS WHICH WILL CREATE WELFARE CHECKS AND MEDICAL ***                                                     
        14        *** ASSISTANCE ID CARDS.                                  ***                                                     
        15        ***                                                       ***                                                     
        16  CC43  ***  TEST1 AND TEST ARE USED TO TEST THIS PROGRAM AS IT IS***                                                     
        17  CC43  ***  TOO BIG TO PUT IN MONITOR.                           ***                                                     
        18        *** MAJOR PROCESSES PERFORMED DURING THE RUN ARE :        ***                                                     
        19        ***       . FUTURE BUDGET ACTIVITY.                       ***                                                     
        20        ***       . CHECK  ISSUANCE.                              ***                                                     
        21        ***       . MAID ISSUANCE.                                ***                                                     
        22        ***       . HISTORY UPDATING.                             ***                                                     
        23        ***                                                       ***                                                     
        24        *** THIS PROGRAM MAY BE RUN ON JUST-1-TEST-CASE-ONLY      ***                                                     
        25        *** ALSO FOR CHECKING OUT PROBLEM CONDITIONS.             ***                                                     
        26        *** TO PERFORM THIS, PLEASE REMOVE COMMENT * FROM         ***                                                     
        27        *** 2000-TEST-ONLY PARA, AND GIVE YR TEST-CASE-NUMBER     ***                                                     
        28        *** IT IS SET UP TO RUN ONLY FOR THAT CASE.               ***                                                     
        29        ***                                                       ***                                                     
        30        *** NOTE : PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE THE 'MCFLAG' SET/RESET    ***                                                     
        31        ***        STATEMENTS. THEY HV BEEN PLACED STRATEGICALLY  ***                                                     
        32        ***        TO PROVIDE OPTIMUM MONITOR INFORMATION.        ***

       543         ENVIRONMENT DIVISION.                                                                                            
       544         CONFIGURATION SECTION.                                                                                           
       545         SOURCE-COMPUTER. UNIVAC-1100-80.                                                                                 
       546         OBJECT-COMPUTER. UNIVAC-1100-80 MEMORY SIZE 3 MODULES.                                                           
       547         SPECIAL-NAMES.                                                                                                   
       548              SWITCH-23 IS SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART                                                                     
       549                              ON IS SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART-ON                                                         
       550              SWITCH-24 IS SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG                                                                            
       551                              ON IS SW-FATAL-ERROR-ON.                                                                    
       552

       554         FILE-CONTROL.                                                                                                    
       555             SELECT ATE10M01  ASSIGN     TO DISC      ATE10M01                                                            
       556                    ORGANIZATION IS INDEXED                                                                               
       557                    ACCESS MODE IS SEQUENTIAL                                                                             
       558                    RECORD KEY IS ATEKEY.

       597  R053       COPY APD003P REPLACING S20MRGPRDM70 BY S20MRGPRDM85.                                                         
COPY   905        /                                                                                                                 
COPY   906        ********** SUBSCHEMA SECTION WITH OVERLAY CLAUSE **********                                                       
COPY   907         SUBSCHEMA SECTION.                                                                                               
COPY   908         INVOKE SUBSCHEMA S20MRGPRDM70                                                                                    
COPY   909             IN FILE SCHEMA$S20                                                                                           
COPY   910             OF SCHEMA S20MRGPRDM                                                                                         
COPY   911             COPYING RECORDS INTO COMMON                                                                                  
COPY   912             COPYING DATA-NAMES INTO COMMON                                                                               
COPY   913             DMCA AND RUN-UNIT-STATISTICS ARE COMMON                                                                      
COPY   914             ERROR RECOVERY IS GENERAL-ERROR-RTN                                                                          
COPY   915             ROLLBACK IS ROLLBACK-ERROR-RTN.

       601

       927  CC43       COPY  DBW020P.                                                                                               
COPY   916  WBCCN********* Change Control Number 00002 BY ESSA3                                                                     
COPY   917        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY   918        * THIS WORKING STORAGE PROC WILL BE USED BY CALLING      *                                                        
COPY   919        * PROGRAMS TO CALL PROGRAM DBPA20/DBPU20.  THE  CALLING  *                                                        
COPY   920        * PROGRAMS WILL SUPPLY THE CASE NUMBER.                  *                                                        
COPY   921        * DBPA20/DBPU20 WILL RETURN THE AREA NAMES FOR THE       *                                                        
COPY   922        * R246, R355, R636, R637, R666, R671 AND R680.           *                                                        
COPY   923        *                                                        *                                                        
COPY   924        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY   925         01  LINK-GET-CASE-AREAS.                                                                                         
COPY   926             05  LINK-NBR-CASE               PIC 9(09).                                                                   
COPY   927             05  LINK-R246-AN.                                                                                            
COPY   928                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(01).                                                                   
COPY   929                 10  LINK-R246-NBR-AREA      PIC 9(03).                                                                   
COPY   930                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(08).                                                                   
COPY   931             05  LINK-R355-AN.                                                                                            
COPY   932                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(01).                                                                   
COPY   933                 10  LINK-R355-NBR-AREA      PIC 9(03).                                                                   
COPY   934                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(08).                                                                   
COPY   935             05  LINK-R636-AN.                                                                                            
COPY   936                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(01).                                                                   
COPY   937                 10  LINK-R636-NBR-AREA      PIC 9(03).                                                                   
COPY   938                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(08).                                                                   
COPY   939             05  LINK-R637-AN.                                                                                            
COPY   940                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(01).                                                                   
COPY   941                 10  LINK-R637-NBR-AREA      PIC 9(03).                                                                   
COPY   942                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(08).                                                                   
COPY   943             05  LINK-R666-AN.                                                                                            
COPY   944                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(01).                                                                   
COPY   945                 10  LINK-R666-NBR-AREA      PIC 9(03).                                                                   
COPY   946                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(08).                                                                   
COPY   947             05  LINK-R671-AN.                                                                                            
COPY   948                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(01).                                                                   
COPY   949                 10  LINK-R671-NBR-AREA      PIC 9(03).                                                                   
COPY   950                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(08).                                                                   
COPY   951             05  LINK-R680-AN.                                                                                            
COPY   952                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(01).                                                                   
COPY   953                 10  LINK-R680-NBR-AREA      PIC 9(03).                                                                   
COPY   954                 10  FILLER                  PIC X(08).                                                                   
COPY   955             05  LINK-CALL-STUS              PIC 9(02).                                                                   
COPY   956             05  LINK-PDY                    PIC 9(01).                                                                   
       928  MD01  ********************************************                                                                      
       929  MD01  *** WS FOR R246 AREA CALCULATION.        ***                                                                      
       930  MD01  ********************************************                                                                      
       931  MD01   COPY CLW246P.                                                                                                    
COPY   957        *                                                                                                                 
COPY   958        * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *                                                                 
COPY   959        *                                                                                                                 
COPY   960        *  THIS PROC CONTAINS THE WORKING STORAGE FOR THE                                                                 
COPY   961        *  CALCULATION OF THE R246 AREA.  IT WILL USE THE                                                                 
COPY   962        *  PAYDAY-NUM RETURNED BY THE PAYDAY SUBPROGRAM.                                                                  
COPY   963        *  IF CALC-R246-CASE IS NUMERIC IT WILL PROVIDE                                                                   
COPY   964        *  THE FULL AREA NAME IN CALC-R246-AREA, OTHERWISE                                                                
COPY   965        *  CALC-R246-AREA WILL BE SPACES.

COPY  1265        *      SPECIAL NOTE :                                                                                             
COPY  1266        *         WHEN USING WS-SML-PARAM-2 OF THE SYSTEMS MESSAGE ROUTINE                                                
COPY  1267        *      ONE MUST FIRST DETERMINE THE FIELD TYPE TO BE MOVED TO THIS                                                
COPY  1268        *      AREA OF WORKING STORAGE.  IF THE FIELD TO BE MOVED IS                                                      
COPY  1269        *      ALPHA-NUMERIC MOVE IT TO WS-SML-PARM-2-X-2. IF THE FIELD                                                   
COPY  1270        *      TO BE MOVED IS NUMERIC MOVE IT TO WS-SML-PARM-2-X-1.

COPY  1353        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY  1354        ** M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND IS DEFINED AS FOLLOWS :      **                                                        
COPY  1355        ** 0 - SUCCESSFUL CONVERSION                            **                                                        
COPY  1356        ** 1 - THE GREGORIAN DATE WAS NOT NUMERIC               **                                                        
COPY  1357        ** 2 - THE GREGORIAN MONTH, DAY, OR YEAR WAS EQUAL TO 0 **                                                        
COPY  1358        **     OR THE GREGORIAN MONTH WAS GREATER THAN 12       **                                                        
COPY  1359        ** 3 - THE GREGORIAN MONTH/DAY WAS 02/29 IN A NON-LEAP  **                                                        
COPY  1360        **     YEAR                                             **                                                        
COPY  1361        ** 4 - THE JULIAN DATE WAS NOT NUMERIC                  **                                                        
COPY  1362        ** 5 - THE JULIAN DAY EXCEEDED THE TOTAL NUMBER OF      **                                                        
COPY  1363        **     DAYS FOR THE YEAR ENTERED (I.E. > 365 OR 366)    **                                                        
COPY  1364        ** 6 - THE GREGORIAN CENTURY IS EQUAL TO 0              **                                                        
COPY  1365        ** 7 - THE JULIAN CENTURY IS EQUAL TO 0                 **                                                        
COPY  1366        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY  1367         01  M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND          PIC  9(001).                                                                
COPY  1368             88  M2K-DATE-CONV-SUCCESSFUL                  VALUE 0.                                                       
COPY  1369             88  M2K-DATE-CONV-UNSUCCESSFUL                VALUE 1 THRU 7.                                                
COPY  1370         01  M2K-MISC.

      2034        *** INDIVS CAN BE ACCOMODATED.               ***

      2047        *** COUNTY-CATEGORY TABLE.                   ***                                                                  
      2048        *** THIS TABLE WILL RECORD :                 ***                                                                  
      2049        ***    . NO OF ACTIVE BUDGETS                ***                                                                  
      2050        ***    . MGA DOLLARS                         ***                                                                  
      2051        *** FOR VARIOUS CATEGORIES IN ALL THE        ***                                                                  
      2052        *** COUNTIES.                                ***                                                                  
      2053        *** TABLE IS REFERENCED BY ITS OWN INDEX     ***                                                                  
      2054        *** POINTERS THAT ARE SET AS FOLLOWS :       ***                                                                  
      2055        ***    . COUNTY BY WSI-CNTY-IDX.             ***                                                                  
      2056        ***    . CAT    BY WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX.         ***                                                                  
      2057        ***    . COUNTY INDEX IS SET ON A CASE LEVEL ***                                                                  
      2058        ***      WHILE CAT INDEX IS SET FOR EACH     ***                                                                  
      2059        ***      INSTANCE OF A R249 REC.             ***                                                                  
      2060        ************************************************

      2292                                                                                                                          
      2293         PROCEDURE DIVISION.                                                                                              
      2294         0000-LOGIC-DRIVER SECTION.                                                                                       
      2295         0000-LOGIC-DRIVER-PARA.                                                                                          
      2296             SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG        OFF.                                                                          
      2297             SET SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART OFF.                                                                          
      2298             PERFORM 1000-HOUSEKEEPING.                                                                                   
      2299  R070       MOVE  ZEROES  TO  WST-AUTO-DISC-TOTALS.                                                                      
      2300  R070       MOVE  ZEROES  TO  WSS-AUTO-SS                                                                                
      2301  R070                         WSS-AUTO-LOAD.                                                                             
      2302  R069       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-R246-EOA.                                                                                 
      2303  TEST1 *    MOVE  'N'  TO  WS-TEST-SW.                                                                                   
      2304  R075A      MOVE  M2K-CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM   TO   M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE.                                                      
      2305  R075A      PERFORM  6520-GRG-TO-JUL.                                                                                    
      2306  R075A      MOVE  M2K-JULIAN-DATE          TO   WSH-TODAYS-DATE.                                                         
      2307  R069       PERFORM 2000-PROCESS UNTIL WSS-R246-EOA  =  'Y'.                                                             
      2308             PERFORM 3000-CLOSING.                                                                                        
      2309                                                                                                                          
      2310                                                                                                                          
      2311        ********************************************************                                                          
      2312        * THE FOLLOWING SECTION SHOULD CONTAIN ALL PRELIMINARY *                                                          
      2313        * DATA FIELD INITIALISATION, TABLE SETUPS, FILE        *                                                          
      2314        * SETUPS, AND DATABASE SETUP ETC.                      *                                                          
      2315        *                                                      *                                                          
      2316        * THIS IS THE MAIN HOUSEKEEPING DRIVER PARA.           *                                                          
      2317        ********************************************************                                                          
      2318         1000-HOUSEKEEPING SECTION.                                                                                       
      2319         1000-INITIALIZE.                                                                                                 
      2320             MOVE 1000                   TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                              
      2321                                                                                                                          
      2322  R069       ACCEPT  WSH-RUN-FLAG  FROM  CARD-READER.                                                                     
      2323  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'  OR  'A86'                                                                        
      2324  R069           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      2325  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2326  R069           DISPLAY 'INVALID RUN FLAG ' WSH-RUN-FLAG UPON PRINTER                                                    
      2327  R069           SET  SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  ON                                                                             
      2328  R069           PERFORM  3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                  
      2329  R070       ACCEPT  WSH-SYS-TIME  FROM  TIME.                                                                            
      2330        ***************************************************                                                               
      2331        *** CALL ASB001 TO GET CYCLED DATE, NBR-PAYDAY, ***                                                               
      2332        *** AND DOUBLE-PAYDAY.                          ***                                                               
      2333        *** CONVERT CYCLE DATE TO JULIAN, AS IT WILL BE ***                                                               
      2334        *** STORED IN MANY DB RECORDS.                  ***                                                               
      2335        ***************************************************                                                               
      2336         1000-GET-CYCLE-DATE.                                                                                             
      2337             CALL 'ASB001' USING WS-CPF-PARAM-LIST.                                                                       
      2338             IF CPF-STATUS-INDCTR1 NOT = ZEROS                                                                            
      2339                SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                            
      2340                DISPLAY 'ERROR IN ASB001. STATUS IS ' CPF-STATUS-INDCTR1                                                  
      2341                        UPON PRINTER                                                                                      
      2342                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      2343                                                                                                                          
      2344  M322       MOVE M2K-CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM TO M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE.                                                           
      2345             PERFORM 6520-GRG-TO-JUL.                                                                                     
      2346  M307       MOVE M2K-JULIAN-DATE        TO  WSH-CPF-CYCLE-JUL.                                                           
      2347                                                                                                                          
      2348        ***************************************************                                                               
      2349        *** REGISTER PROGRAM ON BCF VIA ASB002.         ***                                                               
      2350        ***************************************************                                                               
      2351         1000-WRITE-INIT-REC-TO-BCF.                                                                                      
      2352             MOVE SPACES                 TO  WS-BCF-PARAM-LIST    .                                                       
      2353             MOVE CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM     TO  BCF-CYCLE-DATE       .                                                       
      2354             MOVE 'ATE01D'               TO  BCF-RUN-ID           .                                                       
      2355             MOVE SPACES                 TO  BCF-PROCESSING-DATEX .                                                       
      2356             MOVE SPACES                 TO  BCF-PROCESSING-TIMEX .                                                       
      2357             MOVE 'A'                    TO  BCF-RECORD-TYPE      .                                                       
      2358             MOVE SPACES                 TO  BCF-SECD-KEY         .                                                       
      2359             MOVE 'W'                    TO  BCF-READ-WRITE-FLAG  .                                                       
      2360             MOVE SPACES                 TO  BCF-APND-DATA        .                                                       
      2361                                                                                                                          
      2362             CALL 'ASB002' USING WS-BCF-PARAM-LIST.                                                                       
      2363             IF BCF-STATUS-INDCTR2 > 0                                                                                    
      2364                PERFORM 1820-ASB002-ERROR                                                                                 
      2365                SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                            
      2366                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      2367                                                                                                                          
      2368        ***************************************************                                                               
      2369        *** INITIALIZE THE SUMMARY COUNTY-CAT TABLE.    ***                                                               
      2370        *** THIS TABLE MUST BE  INITIALIZED PRIOR TO    ***                                                               
      2371        *** ALL PROCESSING, BECAUSE IN CASE OF ANY      ***                                                               
      2372        *** NORMAL TERMINATION DURING HOUSEKEEPING, IT  ***                                                               
      2373        *** WUD BUILD THE OUTPUT CONTROL FILE.          ***                                                               
      2374        ***************************************************                                                               
      2375         1000-INIT-CNTY-CAT-TAB.                                                                                          
      2376             PERFORM 1700-INIT-WST-CNTY-CAT-TAB    THRU 1700-EXIT.                                                        
      2377                                                                                                                          
      2378        ***************************************************                                                               
      2379        *** OPEN ALL OUTPUT FILES NOW.                  ***                                                               
      2380        *** ALL OUTPUT FILES MUST BE OPENED BEFORE      ***                                                               
      2381        *** OTHER PROCESSING, BECAUSE IN CASE OF        ***                                                               
      2382        *** SUPPLEMENTAL PAYDAYS, IT WILL BE REQD THAT  ***                                                               
      2383        *** WE CREATE OUTPUT BLANK FILES. (3000 WILL    ***                                                               
      2384        *** DO THE CLOSING.)                            ***                                                               
      2385        ***************************************************                                                               
      2386         1000-OPEN-OUTPUT-FILES-NOW.                                                                                      
      2387             PERFORM 1600-OPEN-OUTPUT-FILES        THRU 1600-EXIT.                                                        
      2388                                                                                                                          
      2389        ***************************************************                                                               
      2390        *** SUPPLEMENTAL PAYDAY PROCESSING.             ***                                                               
      2391        *** NO PROCESS IS DONE FOR SUPPLEMENTAL PAY     ***                                                               
      2392        *** DAYS. HOWEVER DO A NORMAL CLOSE OF ALL      ***                                                               
      2393        *** FILES , OUTPUT BCF COUNTS AND STOP.         ***                                                               
      2394        ***************************************************                                                               
      2395         1000-CHECK-SUPP-PAYDAY.                                                                                          
      2396             IF CPF-PAYDAY-NBR > 20                                                                                       
      2397                PERFORM 3000-CLOSING                                                                                      
      2398                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      2399                                                                                                                          
      2400         1000-DETAIL-SETUP.                                                                                               
      2401             PERFORM 1100-PRO-PAYMENT-INFO         THRU 1100-EXIT.                                                        
      2402  R070       PERFORM 1120-OPEN-TDTE        THRU 1120-EXIT.                                                                
      2403  R070       PERFORM  1150-GET-PCTS    THRU  1150-EXIT.                                                                   
      2404             PERFORM 1200-SETUP-CAT                THRU 1200-EXIT.                                                        
      2405             PERFORM 1400-SETUP-COUNTY             THRU 1400-EXIT.                                                        
      2406  R053       PERFORM 1950-LOAD-ARM61001            THRU 1950-EXIT.                                                        
      2407             PERFORM 1500-SETUP-RUN-TYPE           THRU 1500-EXIT.                                                        
      2408  R067       PERFORM  1510-OPEN-ATE01DR01  THRU  1510-EXIT.                                                               
      2409  MD02       PERFORM 1800-LOAD-TCAT-TABLE          THRU 1800-EXIT.                                                        
      2410  R053       PERFORM 1900-LOAD-TCLK-TABLE          THRU 1900-EXIT.                                                        
      2411  R070       PERFORM  1920-LOAD-TARB    THRU  1920-EXIT.                                                                  
      2412             PERFORM 7000-OPEN-DB-AREAS-SECTION.                                                                          
      2413                                                                                                                          
      2414         1000-EXIT-SECTION.                                                                                               
      2415             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2416                                                                                                                          
      2417        ********************************************************                                                          
      2418        *** THE FOLLOWING SECTION CONTAINS ALL SUBROUTINES/  ***                                                          
      2419        *** DETAIL SUB-PARAS OF THE MAIN HOUSEKEEPING DRIVER ***                                                          
      2420        *** MODULE. SOME OF THEM MAY ALSO BE ACCESSED FROM   ***                                                          
      2421        *** OTHER SECTIONS.                                  ***                                                          
      2422        ********************************************************                                                          
      2423         1100-HOUSEKEEPING-SUBS SECTION.                                                                                  
      2424                                                                                                                          
      2425        ********************************************************                                                          
      2426        *** PROCESS PAYMENT INFO.                            ***                                                          
      2427        *** ALSO CHECK IF THIS IS A DOUBLE PAYMENT DAY:      ***                                                          
      2428        *** IF IT IS, THEN THIS RUN WILL BE SCHEDULED TWICE. ***                                                          
      2429        *** FIRST TIME, IT SHOULD PROCEED AS NORMAL, &       ***                                                          
      2430        *** SECOND TIME IT SHOULD PIKUP 2ND PDY INFO FROM    ***                                                          
      2431        *** ATE20D01 FILE.                                   ***                                                          
      2432        ********************************************************                                                          
      2433         1100-PRO-PAYMENT-INFO.                                                                                           
      2434             OPEN I-O ATE20D01.                                                                                           
      2435             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE20D01-OPEN.                                                            
      2436                                                                                                                          
      2437         1100-READ-ATE20D01.                                                                                              
      2438             READ ATE20D01 AT END                                                                                         
      2439                  SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG          TO ON                                                                  
      2440                  MOVE 'F'               TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      2441                  MOVE 024               TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      2442                  MOVE 'NO PAYDAY'       TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      2443                  MOVE 'ATE20D01 '       TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      2444                  PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                
      2445                  PERFORM 1850-CLOSE-FILES                                                                                
      2446                  PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                  
      2447                  PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                  
      2448                                                                                                                          
      2449         1100-CHECK-PAYDAY.                                                                                               
      2450        *                                                                                                                 
      2451        *                                                                                                                 
      2452  R028       IF ( CPF-PAYDAY-NBR = PAYDAY-NBR                                                                             
      2453  R028                    IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC )  AND                                                            
      2454  R028          ( PROGRAM-IND = '0' OR '1' )                                                                              
      2455  R028              GO TO 1100-SAVE-PAYMENT-DATE.                                                                         
      2456  R028       IF PROGRAM-IND = '2' AND DBL-PAYDAY-IND = '1'                                                                
      2457  R028         IF PAYDAY-NBR IN SECOND-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC =                                                             
      2458  R028            PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC + 1                                                            
      2459  R028              GO TO 1100-SAVE-PAYMENT-DATE.                                                                         
      2460  R028       SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON.                                                                              
      2461  R028       MOVE 'F'                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT.                                                           
      2462  R028       MOVE 075                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                          
      2463  R028       MOVE 'DIFF PAYDAY'          TO WS-SML-PARAM-1.                                                               
      2464  R028       MOVE 'ATE20D01 '            TO WS-SML-PARAM-2.                                                               
      2465  R028       PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                    
      2466  R028       PERFORM 1850-CLOSE-FILES.                                                                                    
      2467  R028       PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG.                                                                                      
      2468  R028       PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                       
      2469                                                                                                                          
      2470         1100-SAVE-PAYMENT-DATE.                                                                                          
      2471  M307       MOVE RECURR-PAY-DATE IN PAYDAY-REC TO WSH-PAYMENT-DATE.                                                      
      2472  M307       MOVE RECURR-PAY-DATE IN PAYDAY-REC TO M2K-JULIAN-DATE.                                                       
      2473  M307       PERFORM 6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                     
      2474  M307       IF M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND NOT = 0                                                                           
      2475  M307          PERFORM 6530-DTE-CONV-ERROR                                                                               
      2476  M307       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2477  M307          MOVE M2K-GRG-Y              TO WSH-PMT-DATE-YY                                                            
      2478  M307          MOVE M2K-GRG-MM             TO WSH-PMT-DATE-MM.                                                           
      2479  R070       MOVE  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE    TO  WSH-PRIOR-END-N                                                              
      2480  R070                                       WSH-BLD-END-PAY-N.                                                           
      2481  R070       MOVE  01              TO  WSH-PRIOR-DD.                                                                      
      2482  R070       MOVE  WSH-PRIOR-END-N    TO  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE.                                                             
      2483  R070       PERFORM  6520-GRG-TO-JUL.                                                                                    
      2484  R070       MOVE  M2K-JULIAN-DATE  TO  WSH-PRIOR-JUL.                                                                    
      2485  R070       ADD  1  TO  WSH-BLD-END-MM.                                                                                  
      2486  R070       MOVE  01    TO  WSH-BLD-END-DD.                                                                              
      2487  R070       IF  WSH-BLD-END-MM  >  12                                                                                    
      2488  R070           MOVE  01  TO  WSH-BLD-END-MM                                                                             
      2489  R070           ADD    1  TO  WSH-BLD-END-YY.                                                                            
      2490  R070       MOVE  WSH-BLD-END-PAY-N    TO  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE.                                                           
      2491  R070       PERFORM  6520-GRG-TO-JUL.                                                                                    
      2492  R070       MOVE  M2K-JULIAN-DATE      TO  M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                                              
      2493  R070       MOVE  01   TO  M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                                  
      2494  R070       MOVE   0   TO  M2K-IN-YR.                                                                                    
      2495  R070       PERFORM  C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                           
      2496  R070       MOVE  M2K-CONV-JUL-DT      TO  WSH-END-PAY-DATE.                                                             
      2497  R070       MOVE  2ND-PAY-DATE  IN  FIRST-PAYDAY  TO  M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                                   
      2498  R070       MOVE  1  TO  M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                                    
      2499  R070       MOVE  0  TO  M2K-IN-YR.                                                                                      
      2500  R070       PERFORM  C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                           
      2501  R070       MOVE  M2K-CONV-JUL-DT  TO  WSH-2ND-PAY-MINUS-1                                                               
      2502  R070                                  M2K-JULIAN-DATE.                                                                  
      2503  R070       PERFORM  6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                    
      2504  R070       MOVE  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE  TO  WSH-2ND-MINUS-1-GREG.                                                          
      2505                                                                                                                          
      2506        ********************************************************                                                          
      2507        *** DOUBLE PAYDAY.                                   ***                                                          
      2508        *** START OF 1ST PASS. PROGRAM-IND HAS BEEN SET TO 0.***                                                          
      2509        *** END   OF 1ST PASS. PROGRAM IND WILL BE SET  TO 2.***                                                          
      2510        *** START OF 2ND PASS. PROGRAM-IND IS NOW 2.         ***                                                          
      2511        *** END   OF 2ND PASS. PROGRAM IND WILL BE SET  TO 1.***                                                          
      2512        ********************************************************                                                          
      2513         1100-CHECK-DBL-PDY-WHICH-RUN.                                                                                    
      2514             IF DBL-PAYDAY-IND = '1' AND                                                                                  
      2515                PROGRAM-IND = '2'                                                                                         
      2516                  MOVE PAYDAY-NBR        IN SECOND-PAYDAY    TO                                                           
      2517                       PAYDAY-NBR        IN FIRST-PAYDAY                                                                  
      2518                  MOVE 2ND-DEADLINE-DATE IN SECOND-PAYDAY    TO                                                           
      2519                       2ND-DEADLINE-DATE IN FIRST-PAYDAY                                                                  
      2520                  MOVE 2ND-PAY-DATE      IN SECOND-PAYDAY    TO                                                           
      2521                       2ND-PAY-DATE      IN FIRST-PAYDAY                                                                  
      2522                  MOVE 3RD-DEADLINE-DATE IN SECOND-PAYDAY    TO                                                           
      2523                       3RD-DEADLINE-DATE IN FIRST-PAYDAY                                                                  
      2524                  MOVE 3RD-PAY-DATE      IN SECOND-PAYDAY    TO                                                           
      2525                       3RD-PAY-DATE      IN FIRST-PAYDAY.                                                                 
      2526                                                                                                                          
      2527         1100-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      2528             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2529                                                                                                                          
      2530  R070   1120-OPEN-TDTE.                                                                                                  
      2531  R070       OPEN  INPUT  TDTE-FILE.                                                                                      
      2532  R070       MOVE  99999999    TO  WSH-TDTE-BEG-DTE.                                                                      
      2533  R070       PERFORM  1125-READ-TDTE-FILE   THRU  1125-EXIT.                                                              
      2534  R070       IF  WSH-TDTE-BEG-DTE  =  99999999                                                                            
      2535  R070           DISPLAY  'NO TDTE FOR ADRS '  UPON  PRINTER                                                              
      2536  R070           SET  SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  ON                                                                             
      2537  R070           MOVE  'F'    TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                      
      2538  R070           MOVE  024    TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                     
      2539  R070           MOVE  'ADRS MISSING'  TO  WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                 
      2540  R070           PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                
      2541  R070           PERFORM  1850-CLOSE-FILES                                                                                
      2542  R070           PERFORM  1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                  
      2543  R070           PERFORM  3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                  
      2544  R070       CLOSE  TDTE-FILE.                                                                                            
      2545  R070   1120-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      2546  R070   1125-READ-TDTE-FILE.                                                                                             
      2547  R070       READ  TDTE-FILE   AT  END                                                                                    
      2548  R070           GO  TO  1125-EXIT.                                                                                       
      2549  R070       IF  TDTE-CODE  =  'ADRS  '                                                                                   
      2550  R070           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      2551  R070       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2552  R070           GO  TO  1125-READ-TDTE-FILE.                                                                             
      2553  R070       MOVE  TDTE-START-DATE  TO  WSH-TDTE-BEG-DTE.                                                                 
      2554  R070   1125-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      2555  R070   1150-GET-PCTS.                                                                                                   
      2556  R070       OPEN  INPUT  ATE01DCD1.                                                                                      
      2557  R070       READ  ATE01DCD1  AT  END                                                                                     
      2558  R070           MOVE  ZEROES  TO  WSH-TOT-PCT                                                                            
      2559  R070                             WSH-CLS-PCT                                                                            
      2560  R070                             WSH-SUS-PCT                                                                            
      2561  R070           CLOSE  ATE01DCD1                                                                                         
      2562  R070           GO  TO  1150-EXIT.                                                                                       
      2563  R070       IF  ATE01DCD1-TOT-PCT  NUMERIC                                                                               
      2564  R070           MOVE  ATE01DCD1-TOT-PCT  TO  WSH-TOT-PCT                                                                 
      2565  R070       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2566  R070           MOVE  ZEROES    TO  WSH-TOT-PCT.                                                                         
      2567  R070       IF  ATE01DCD1-CLS-PCT  NUMERIC                                                                               
      2568  R070           MOVE  ATE01DCD1-CLS-PCT  TO  WSH-CLS-PCT                                                                 
      2569  R070       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2570  R070           MOVE  ZEROES    TO  WSH-CLS-PCT.                                                                         
      2571  R070       IF  ATE01DCD1-SUS-PCT  NUMERIC                                                                               
      2572  R070           MOVE  ATE01DCD1-SUS-PCT  TO  WSH-SUS-PCT                                                                 
      2573  R070       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2574  R070           MOVE  ZEROES    TO  WSH-SUS-PCT.                                                                         
      2575  R070       CLOSE  ATE01DCD1.                                                                                            
      2576  R070   1150-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      2577        ********************************************************                                                          
      2578        *** SETUP CATEGORY TABLE FROM ATE10M01.              ***                                                          
      2579        *** IF BCF COUNT ON ATE10M01 FILE DOES NOT MATCH     ***                                                          
      2580        *** ACTUAL RECORDS READ, AN ERROR CONDITION IS       ***                                                          
      2581        *** FLAGGED OUT.                                     ***                                                          
      2582        ********************************************************                                                          
      2583         1200-SETUP-CAT.                                                                                                  
      2584             OPEN INPUT ATE10M01.                                                                                         
      2585             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE10M01-OPEN.                                                            
      2586                                                                                                                          
      2587         1200-FETCH-BCF-ATE10M01.                                                                                         
      2588             MOVE SPACES                 TO WS-BCF-PARAM-LIST.                                                            
      2589             MOVE 'ATE10M01'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                             
      2590             MOVE CPF-CYCLE-DATE         TO BCF-FILE-CYCLE-DATE.                                                          
      2591             MOVE 'R'                    TO BCF-READ-WRITE-FLAG.                                                          
      2592             CALL 'ASB002' USING WS-BCF-PARAM-LIST.                                                                       
      2593             IF BCF-STATUS-INDCTR2 NOT = 0                                                                                
      2594                PERFORM 1820-ASB002-ERROR                                                                                 
      2595                SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                            
      2596                PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                    
      2597                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      2598                                                                                                                          
      2599         1200-BUILD-WST-CAT-TAB.                                                                                          
      2600             SET WSI-CAT-IDX             TO 1.                                                                            
      2601             SET WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX        TO 1.                                                                            
      2602             PERFORM 1250-BUILD-WST-CAT-TAB        THRU 1250-EXIT                                                         
      2603                     UNTIL WSS-ATE10M01-EOF-ON.                                                                           
      2604                                                                                                                          
      2605         1200-CHECK-REC-CNT.                                                                                              
      2606             IF WSA-ATE10M01-REC-CNT NOT = BCF-GROSS-CT                                                                   
      2607                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      2608                MOVE 018                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      2609                MOVE 'REC CNT ?'         TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      2610                MOVE 'ATE10M01'          TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      2611                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      2612                SET SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART TO ON.                                                                     
      2613                                                                                                                          
      2614         1200-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      2615             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2616                                                                                                                          
      2617        ********************************************************                                                          
      2618        *** DETAIL BUILD OF WST-CAT-TAB.                     ***                                                          
      2619        *** READ & MOVE ATE10M01 REC TO WST. AT EOF, SET     ***                                                          
      2620        *** EOF-SW AND EXIT.                                 ***                                                          
      2621        ***                                                  ***                                                          
      2622        *** IGNORE FOOD-STAMP CATEGORIES.                    ***                                                          
      2623        *** ALSO CONTROL THE BUILD PROCESS OF CATEGORY-ONLY  ***                                                          
      2624        *** TABLE.                                           ***                                                          
      2625        ********************************************************                                                          
      2626         1250-BUILD-WST-CAT-TAB.                                                                                          
      2627             READ ATE10M01 AT END                                                                                         
      2628                  MOVE 1                 TO WSS-ATE10M01-EOF                                                              
      2629                  SET WSI-CAT-IDX        DOWN BY 1                                                                        
      2630                  SET WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX   DOWN BY 1                                                                        
      2631                  SET WSH-CAT-TAB-SIZE   TO WSI-CAT-IDX                                                                   
      2632                  SET WSH-CAT-ONLY-TAB-SIZE TO WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX                                                           
      2633                  GO TO 1250-EXIT.                                                                                        
      2634             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE10M01-REC-CNT.                                                         
      2635  R067       MOVE  0  TO  M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND.                                                                        
      2636  R067       MOVE  M452-DTE-END-EFFV-YY  TO  M2K-GRG-YY.                                                                  
      2637  R067       MOVE  M452-DTE-END-EFFV-MM  TO  M2K-GRG-MM.                                                                  
      2638  R067       MOVE  M452-DTE-END-EFFV-DD  TO  M2K-GRG-DD.                                                                  
      2639  R067       IF  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE  =  ZEROES                                                                            
      2640  R067           MOVE  ZEROES  TO  M2K-JULIAN-DATE                                                                        
      2641  R067       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2642  R067           PERFORM  6520-GRG-TO-JUL.                                                                                
      2643  R067       IF  M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND  >  0                                                                            
      2644  R067           PERFORM  6530-DTE-CONV-ERROR                                                                             
      2645  R067           SET  SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  ON                                                                             
      2646  R067           PERFORM  1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                  
      2647  R067           PERFORM  3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                  
      2648  R067       IF  M2K-JULIAN-DATE  =  ZEROES                                                                               
      2649  R067           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      2650  R067       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2651  R067           IF  (WSH-PAYMENT-DATE  =  M2K-JULIAN-DATE  OR                                                            
      2652  R067                WSH-PAYMENT-DATE  >  M2K-JULIAN-DATE)                                                               
      2653  TEST  *            DISPLAY 'CAT/PGM STAT END DATE = '  ATEKEY                                                           
      2654  TEST  *                    '  '  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE  UPON  PRINTER                                                      
      2655  R067               GO  TO  1250-EXIT.                                                                                   
      2656                                                                                                                          
      2657         1250-IGNORE-FS-CAT.                                                                                              
      2658             IF M452-CDE-CATEGORY = 'FS '                                                                                 
      2659                GO TO 1250-EXIT.                                                                                          
      2660                                                                                                                          
      2661         1250-CHECK-TAB-OVFL.                                                                                             
      2662             IF WSI-CAT-IDX > WSH-CAT-TAB-MAX-SIZE                                                                        
      2663  R043          DISPLAY 'CATEGORY TABLE SIZE EXCEEDED ' UPON PRINTER                                                      
      2664                MOVE 'F'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      2665                MOVE 049                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      2666                MOVE ATEKEY IN ATE10M-RECORD TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                            
      2667                MOVE WSH-CAT-TAB-MAX-SIZE    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                            
      2668                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      2669                PERFORM 1850-CLOSE-FILES                                                                                  
      2670                SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                            
      2671                PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                    
      2672                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      2673                                                                                                                          
      2674         1250-MOVE-REC-TO-TAB.                                                                                            
      2675             MOVE ATEKEY                           TO WST-CAT-PGM                                                         
      2676                                                      (WSI-CAT-IDX).                                                      
      2677             MOVE M452-CDE-ISSNC-CATEGORY          TO WST-CAT-TYPE                                                        
      2678                                                      (WSI-CAT-IDX).                                                      
      2679                                                                                                                          
      2680         1250-CONTROL-BLD-WST-CAT-ONLY.                                                                                   
      2681             IF WSH-SAVE-CAT-CODE NOT = M452-CDE-CATEGORY                                                                 
      2682                MOVE M452-CDE-CATEGORY   TO WSH-SAVE-CAT-CODE                                                             
      2683                PERFORM 1270-BUILD-WST-CAT-ONLY    THRU 1270-EXIT.                                                        
      2684                                                                                                                          
      2685         1250-INC-WSI-CAT-IDX.                                                                                            
      2686             SET WSI-CAT-IDX             UP BY 1.                                                                         
      2687                                                                                                                          
      2688         1250-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      2689             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2690                                                                                                                          
      2691        ********************************************************                                                          
      2692        *** DETAIL BUILD OF WST-CAT-ONLY                     ***                                                          
      2693        *** JUSTY STORE THE CATEGORE CODE.                   ***                                                          
      2694        ********************************************************                                                          
      2695         1270-BUILD-WST-CAT-ONLY.                                                                                         
      2696             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2697                                                                                                                          
      2698         1270-CHECK-OVERFLOW.                                                                                             
      2699             IF WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX > WSH-CAT-ONLY-TAB-MAX-SIZE                                                              
      2700                MOVE 'F'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      2701  R043          DISPLAY 'CATEGORY TABLE SIZE EXCEEDED ' UPON PRINTER                                                      
      2702                MOVE 049                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      2703                MOVE M452-CDE-CATEGORY   TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      2704                MOVE WSH-CAT-ONLY-TAB-MAX-SIZE  TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                         
      2705                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      2706                PERFORM 1850-CLOSE-FILES                                                                                  
      2707                SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                            
      2708                PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                    
      2709                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      2710                                                                                                                          
      2711         1270-DETAIL-MOVE.                                                                                                
      2712             MOVE M452-CDE-CATEGORY      TO WST-CAT-ONLY                                                                  
      2713                                            (WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX).                                                           
      2714                                                                                                                          
      2715         1270-INC-WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX.                                                                                       
      2716             SET WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX        UP BY 1.                                                                         
      2717                                                                                                                          
      2718         1270-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      2719             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2720                                                                                                                          
      2721        ********************************************************                                                          
      2722        *** SETUP COUNTY TABLE FROM ARM60001.                ***                                                          
      2723        *** IF BCF COUNT ON ARM60001 FILE DOES NOT MATCH     ***                                                          
      2724        *** ACTUAL RECORDS READ, AN ERROR CONDITION IS       ***                                                          
      2725        *** FLAGGED OUT.                                     ***                                                          
      2726        ********************************************************                                                          
      2727         1400-SETUP-COUNTY.                                                                                               
      2728             OPEN INPUT ARM60001.                                                                                         
      2729             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ARM60001-OPEN.                                                            
      2730                                                                                                                          
      2731         1400-FETCH-BCF-ARM60001.                                                                                         
      2732             MOVE SPACES                 TO WS-BCF-PARAM-LIST.                                                            
      2733             MOVE 'ARM60001'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                             
      2734             MOVE CPF-CYCLE-DATE         TO BCF-FILE-CYCLE-DATE.                                                          
      2735             MOVE 'R'                    TO BCF-READ-WRITE-FLAG.                                                          
      2736             CALL 'ASB002' USING WS-BCF-PARAM-LIST.                                                                       
      2737             IF BCF-STATUS-INDCTR2 NOT = 0                                                                                
      2738                PERFORM 1820-ASB002-ERROR                                                                                 
      2739                SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                            
      2740                PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                    
      2741                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      2742                                                                                                                          
      2743         1400-BUILD-WST-CNTY-TAB.
