      2744             SET WSI-CNTY-IDX            TO 01                                                                            
      2745             PERFORM 1450-BUILD-WST-CNTY-TAB       THRU 1450-EXIT                                                         
      2746                     UNTIL WSS-ARM60001-EOF-ON.                                                                           
      2747                                                                                                                          
      2748         1400-CHECK-REC-CNT.                                                                                              
      2749             IF WSA-ARM60001-REC-CNT NOT = BCF-GROSS-CT                                                                   
      2750                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      2751                MOVE 018                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      2752                MOVE 'REC CNT ?'         TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      2753                MOVE 'ARM60001'          TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      2754                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      2755                SET SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART TO ON.                                                                     
      2756                                                                                                                          
      2757         1400-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      2758             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2759                                                                                                                          
      2760        ********************************************************                                                          
      2761        *** DETAIL BUILD OF WST-CNTY-TAB.                    ***                                                          
      2762        *** READ & MOVE ARM60001 REC TO WST. AT EOF, SET     ***                                                          
      2763        *** EOF-SW AND EXIT.                                 ***                                                          
      2764        ********************************************************                                                          
      2765         1450-BUILD-WST-CNTY-TAB.                                                                                         
      2766             READ ARM60001 AT END                                                                                         
      2767                  MOVE 1                 TO WSS-ARM60001-EOF                                                              
      2768                  MOVE 0                 TO WSS-ARM60001-OPEN                                                             
      2769                  CLOSE ARM60001                                                                                          
      2770                  SET WSI-CNTY-IDX       DOWN BY 1                                                                        
      2771                  SET WSH-CNTY-TAB-SIZE  TO WSI-CNTY-IDX                                                                  
      2772                  GO TO 1450-EXIT.                                                                                        
      2773             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ARM60001-REC-CNT.                                                         
      2774                                                                                                                          
      2775         1450-SAVE-ONLY-UNIQUE-CODES.                                                                                     
      2776             IF WSH-SAVE-COUNTY-CODE = COUNTY-CODE                                                                        
      2777                GO TO 1450-EXIT.                                                                                          
      2778                                                                                                                          
      2779         1450-CHECK-TAB-OVFL.                                                                                             
      2780             MOVE COUNTY-CODE            TO WSH-SAVE-COUNTY-CODE.                                                         
      2781             IF WSI-CNTY-IDX > WSH-CNTY-TAB-MAX-SIZE                                                                      
      2782                MOVE 'F'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      2783  R043          DISPLAY 'COUNTY CODE TABLE SIZE EXCEEDED '                                                                
      2784  R043                              UPON PRINTER                                                                          
      2785                MOVE 049                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      2786                MOVE COUNTY-CODE IN SYS-REF-DET                                                                           
      2787                                         TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      2788  CHG35         MOVE WSH-CNTY-TAB-MAX-SIZE TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                              
      2789                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      2790                PERFORM 1850-CLOSE-FILES                                                                                  
      2791                SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                            
      2792                PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                    
      2793                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      2794                                                                                                                          
      2795         1450-MOVE-REC-TO-TAB.                                                                                            
      2796             MOVE COUNTY-CODE            TO WST-CNTY-NBR                                                                  
      2797                                            (WSI-CNTY-IDX).                                                               
      2798             MOVE COUNTY-NAME            TO WST-CNTY-NAME                                                                 
      2799                                            (WSI-CNTY-IDX).                                                               
      2800                                                                                                                          
      2801         1450-INC-WSI-CNTY-IDX.                                                                                           
      2802             SET WSI-CNTY-IDX            UP BY 1.                                                                         
      2803                                                                                                                          
      2804         1450-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      2805             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2806                                                                                                                          
      2807        *********************************************************                                                         
      2808        *** DESCRIBE PROCESS DESCRIPTION!!                    ***                                                         
      2809        *********************************************************                                                         
      2810        *********************************************************                                                         
      2811         1500-SETUP-RUN-TYPE.                                                                                             
      2812             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2813                                                                                                                          
      2814         1500-SETUP-PAYMENT-MONTH.                                                                                        
      2815             MOVE RECURR-PAY-DATE IN PAYDAY-REC                                                                           
      2816  M307                                   TO M2K-JULIAN-DATE.                                                              
      2817  M307       PERFORM 6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                     
      2818  M307       IF M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND NOT = 0                                                                           
      2819  M307          PERFORM 6530-DTE-CONV-ERROR                                                                               
      2820  M307       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2821  M307          MOVE M2K-GRG-MM             TO WSH-PAYMENT-MONTH.                                                         
      2822                                                                                                                          
      2823         1500-SETUP-PAYDAY-NBR.                                                                                           
      2824             MOVE PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC                                                                
      2825                                         TO WSH-PAYDAY-NBR.                                                               
      2826  R053                                                                                                                    
      2827  R053       MOVE WSH-PAYDAY-NBR         TO WSH-PREV-PAYDAY.                                                              
      2828  R053       ACCEPT WSH-DATE             FROM DATE.                                                                       
      2829  R053       MOVE   WSH-MM               TO WSH-DEADLINE-MM.                                                              
      2830  R053                                                                                                                    
      2831  R053       IF (PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC > 00) AND                                                       
      2832  R053          (PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC < 11)                                                           
      2833  R053           IF (PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC < 6) AND                                                    
      2834  R053              (WSH-DD > 20)                                                                                         
      2835  R053               MOVE WSH-DEADLINE-MM    TO ARM-MM-SUB                                                                
      2836  R053               ADD     10              TO WSH-PREV-PAYDAY                                                           
      2837  R053               MOVE WSH-PREV-PAYDAY    TO ARM-PAY-SUB                                                               
      2838  R053          ELSE                                                                                                      
      2839  R055              IF (WSH-MM = 01)                                                                                      
      2840  R055                  MOVE 12 TO WSH-DEADLINE-MM                                                                        
      2841  R055                  MOVE WSH-DEADLINE-MM    TO ARM-MM-SUB                                                             
      2842  R055                  ADD     10              TO WSH-PREV-PAYDAY                                                        
      2843  R055                  MOVE WSH-PREV-PAYDAY    TO ARM-PAY-SUB                                                            
      2844  R055              ELSE                                                                                                  
      2845  R055                  SUBTRACT   1            FROM WSH-MM                                                               
      2846  R055                                    GIVING WSH-DEADLINE-MM                                                          
      2847  R055                  MOVE WSH-DEADLINE-MM    TO ARM-MM-SUB                                                             
      2848  R055                  ADD     10              TO WSH-PREV-PAYDAY                                                        
      2849  R055                  MOVE WSH-PREV-PAYDAY    TO ARM-PAY-SUB                                                            
      2850  R053       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2851  R053          IF (PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC > 10) AND                                                    
      2852  R053             (PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC < 21)                                                        
      2853  R053              MOVE WSH-DEADLINE-MM TO ARM-MM-SUB                                                                    
      2854  R053              SUBTRACT 10 FROM                                                                                      
      2855  R053                        PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC                                                    
      2856  R053                GIVING WSH-PREV-PAYDAY                                                                              
      2857  R053              MOVE WSH-PREV-PAYDAY TO ARM-PAY-SUB.                                                                  
      2858  R053                                                                                                                    
      2859  R053       MOVE   20    TO WSH-PREV-DLE-CC.                                                                             
      2860  R053       MOVE PREV-DTE-DEADLINE (ARM-MM-SUB,ARM-PAY-SUB)                                                              
      2861  R053         TO  WSH-PREV-DLE-YYDD.                                                                                     
      2862  R053                                                                                                                    
      2863  R071       MOVE  20    TO  WSH-GA-PREV-CC.                                                                              
      2864  R071       MOVE  WSH-DEADLINE-MM  TO  WSH-PRIOR-MO.                                                                     
      2865  R071       SUBTRACT  1  FROM  WSH-PRIOR-MO.                                                                             
      2866  R071       MOVE  PREV-DTE-DEADLINE (WSH-PRIOR-MO CPF-PAYDAY-NBR)  TO                                                    
      2867  R071               WSH-GA-PREV-YYDDD.                                                                                   
      2868         1500-SETUP-RECUR-PAYDATE.                                                                                        
      2869  R053       MOVE DEADLINE-DATE IN FIRST-PAYDAY                                                                           
      2870  R053                                   TO M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                                              
      2871  R053       MOVE 1                      TO M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                  
      2872  R053       MOVE 0                      TO M2K-IN-YR.                                                                    
      2873  R053       PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                            
      2874  R053       MOVE M2K-CONV-JUL-DT        TO WSH-RECUR-DEADLINE.                                                           
      2875  R053                                                                                                                    
      2876  M307       MOVE RECURR-PAY-DATE IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC                                                           
      2877  M307                                   TO M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                                              
      2878  M307       MOVE 1                      TO M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                  
      2879  M307       MOVE 0                      TO M2K-IN-YR.                                                                    
      2880  M307       PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                            
      2881  M307       MOVE M2K-CONV-JUL-DT        TO WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE.                                                            
      2882  R070       MOVE  1  TO  M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                                    
      2883  R070       MOVE  0  TO  M2K-IN-YR.                                                                                      
      2884  R070       PERFORM  C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                           
      2885  R070       MOVE  M2K-CONV-JUL-DT    TO  WSH-PAY-MINUS-1.                                                                
      2886                                                                                                                          
      2887         1500-SETUP-2-PAYDATE.                                                                                            
      2888  R053       MOVE 2ND-DEADLINE-DATE IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC                                                         
      2889  R053                                   TO M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                                              
      2890  R053       MOVE 1                      TO M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                  
      2891  R053       MOVE 0                      TO M2K-IN-YR.                                                                    
      2892  R053       PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                            
      2893  R053       MOVE M2K-CONV-JUL-DT        TO WSH-2-DEADLINE.                                                               
      2894  R082       DISPLAY  '2ND DEADLINE '  WSH-2-DEADLINE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                     
      2895  R053                                                                                                                    
      2896  M307       MOVE 2ND-PAY-DATE IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC                                                              
      2897  M307                                   TO M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                                              
      2898  M307       MOVE 1                      TO M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                  
      2899  M307       MOVE 0                      TO M2K-IN-YR.                                                                    
      2900  M307       PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                            
      2901  R082       MOVE M2K-CONV-JUL-DT        TO WSH-2-PAYDATE.                                                                
      2902  R082       DISPLAY  '2ND PAYDAY '  WSH-2-PAYDATE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                        
      2903                                                                                                                          
      2904         1500-SETUP-3-PAYDATE.                                                                                            
      2905  R053       MOVE 3RD-DEADLINE-DATE IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC                                                         
      2906  R053                                   TO M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                                              
      2907  R053       MOVE 1                      TO M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                  
      2908  R053       MOVE 0                      TO M2K-IN-YR.                                                                    
      2909  R053       PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                            
      2910  R053       MOVE M2K-CONV-JUL-DT        TO WSH-3-DEADLINE.                                                               
      2911  R082       DISPLAY  '3RD DEADLINE '  WSH-3-DEADLINE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                     
      2912  R053                                                                                                                    
      2913  M307       MOVE 3RD-PAY-DATE IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC                                                              
      2914  M307                                   TO M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                                              
      2915  M307       MOVE 1                      TO M2K-IN-DAYS.                                                                  
      2916  M307       MOVE 0                      TO M2K-IN-YR.                                                                    
      2917  M307       PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                            
      2918  R082       MOVE M2K-CONV-JUL-DT        TO WSH-3-PAYDATE.                                                                
      2919  R082       DISPLAY  '3RD PAYDAY '  WSH-3-PAYDATE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                        
      2920  R053                                                                                                                    
      2921  R053   1500-SETUP-PAYDAY-DIFF.                                                                                          
      2922  R053       MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE      TO HOLD-CALC-CURR-JUL-R                                                          
      2923  R053       MOVE WSH-2-PAYDATE          TO HOLD-CALC-P2-JUL-R                                                            
      2924  R053                                                                                                                    
      2925  R053       IF (CALC-CURR-JUL-YY = CALC-P2-JUL-YY)                                                                       
      2926  R053           SUBTRACT CALC-CURR-JUL-DD FROM CALC-P2-JUL-DD                                                            
      2927  R053             GIVING HOLD-PAYDAY-DIFF.                                                                               
      2928  R053                                                                                                                    
      2929  R053       IF (CALC-CURR-JUL-YY < CALC-P2-JUL-YY)                                                                       
      2930  R053           SUBTRACT CALC-CURR-JUL-DD FROM 365                                                                       
      2931  R053             GIVING HOLD-PAYDAY-DIFF.                                                                               
      2932  R053                                                                                                                    
      2933  R053       DISPLAY '******* PAYDPAY DIFFERANCE *******'                                                                 
      2934  R053                                   UPON PRINTER.                                                                    
      2935  R053       DISPLAY 'WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE  = ' WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE                                                            
      2936  R053                                   UPON PRINTER.                                                                    
      2937  R053       DISPLAY 'WSH-2-PAYDATE      = ' WSH-2-PAYDATE                                                                
      2938  R053                                   UPON PRINTER.                                                                    
      2939  R053       DISPLAY 'HOLD-PAYDAY-DIFF   = ' HOLD-PAYDAY-DIFF                                                             
      2940  R053                                   UPON PRINTER.                                                                    
      2941  R053                                                                                                                    
      2942         1500-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      2943             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      2944                                                                                                                          
      2945  R067   1510-OPEN-ATE01DR01.                                                                                             
      2946  R067       ACCEPT WSH-DATE             FROM DATE.                                                                       
      2947  R067       MOVE WSH-MM                 TO WSH-REP-MM.                                                                   
      2948  R067       MOVE WSH-DD                 TO WSH-REP-DD.                                                                   
      2949  R067       MOVE WSH-YY                 TO WSH-REP-YY.                                                                   
      2950  R067       MOVE WSH-REP-DATE           TO WSR-HD1-REP-DATE-01.                                                          
      2951  R067       IF CPF-PAYDAY-NBR > 20                                                                                       
      2952  R067                MOVE CPF-PAYDAY-NBR TO WSR-HD2-PAY-NBR                                                              
      2953  R067         ELSE   MOVE WSH-PAYDAY-NBR TO WSR-HD2-PAY-NBR.                                                             
      2954  R067       MOVE CPF-CYCLE-DATE         TO WSH-DATE.                                                                     
      2955  R067       MOVE WSH-MM                 TO WSH-REP-MM.                                                                   
      2956  R067       MOVE WSH-DD                 TO WSH-REP-DD.                                                                   
      2957  R067       MOVE WSH-YY                 TO WSH-REP-YY.                                                                   
      2958  R067       MOVE WSH-REP-DATE           TO WSR-HD2-PRO-DATE.                                                             
      2959  R067                                                                                                                    
      2960  R067       ACCEPT WSH-TIME             FROM TIME.                                                                       
      2961  R067       MOVE WSH-HH                 TO WSH-REP-HH.                                                                   
      2962  R067       MOVE WSH-MIN                TO WSH-REP-MIN.                                                                  
      2963  R067       MOVE WSH-SS                 TO WSH-REP-SS.                                                                   
      2964  R067       MOVE WSH-REP-TIME           TO WSR-HD2-REP-TIME.                                                             
      2965  R067       MOVE  WSH-PAYDAY-NBR  TO  WSR-HD5-PAY-NBR.                                                                   
      2966  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      2967  R069           MOVE  'ATE01DR01XST'    TO  WS-NEWFILE-NM                                                                
      2968  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      2969  R069           MOVE  'ATE01DR01FST'    TO  WS-NEWFILE-NM.                                                               
      2970  R067       MOVE  SPACES            TO  WS-OLDFILE-NM.                                                                   
      2971  R067       MOVE  ZEROES            TO  WS-NEW-STATUS                                                                    
      2972  R067                                   WS-OLD-STATUS                                                                    
      2973  R067                                   WS-NEW-STATUS-WORD                                                               
      2974  R067                                   WS-OLD-STATUS-WORD                                                               
      2975  R067                                   WS-OLD-PAGE-CNT.                                                                 
      2976  R067       PERFORM  1870-CALL-ASB004.                                                                                   
      2977  R067       DISPLAY 'FILE CREATED (' WS-NEWFILE-NM ')' UPON PRINTER.                                                     
      2978  R067       OPEN  OUTPUT  ATE01DR01.                                                                                     
      2979  R067       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01DR01-OPEN.                                                           
      2980  R067       IF  WSA-LINE-CNT  >  55                                                                                      
      2981  R067           PERFORM  2280-PRINT-HEADING  THRU  2280-EXIT.                                                            
      2982  R067   1510-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      2983        ********************************************************                                                          
      2984        *** OPEN ALL REQUIRED OUTPUT FILES.                  ***                                                          
      2985        ********************************************************                                                          
      2986         1600-OPEN-OUTPUT-FILES.                                                                                          
      2987             OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D01.                                                                                        
      2988  R069A *    OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D02.                                                                                        
      2989             OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D04.                                                                                        
      2990             OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D05.                                                                                        
      2991  R069A *    OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D06.                                                                                        
      2992  R069A *    OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D07.                                                                                        
      2993             OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D08.                                                                                        
      2994             OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D09.                                                                                        
      2995  R053       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D10.                                                                                        
      2996  R053       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D11.                                                                                        
      2997  R053       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D12.                                                                                        
      2998  R056       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D13.                                                                                        
      2999  R056       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D14.                                                                                        
      3000  R056       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D15.                                                                                        
      3001  R056       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D16.                                                                                        
      3002  R064       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D17.                                                                                        
      3003  CC41B      OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D18.                                                                                        
      3004  R070       OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D20.                                                                                        
      3005  R075A      OPEN OUTPUT ATE01D21.                                                                                        
      3006             OPEN OUTPUT ATE01DCKPT.                                                                                      
      3007                                                                                                                          
      3008         1600-SET-OPEN-SWITCHES.                                                                                          
      3009             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D01-OPEN.                                                            
      3010  R069A *    MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D02-OPEN.                                                            
      3011             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D04-OPEN.                                                            
      3012             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D05-OPEN.                                                            
      3013  R069A *    MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D06-OPEN.                                                            
      3014  R069A *    MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D07-OPEN.                                                            
      3015             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D08-OPEN.                                                            
      3016             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D09-OPEN.                                                            
      3017  R053       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D10-OPEN.                                                            
      3018  R053       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D11-OPEN.                                                            
      3019  R053       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D12-OPEN.                                                            
      3020  R056       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D13-OPEN.                                                            
      3021  R056       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D14-OPEN.                                                            
      3022  R056       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D15-OPEN.                                                            
      3023  R056       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D16-OPEN.                                                            
      3024  R064       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D17-OPEN.                                                            
      3025  CC41B      MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D18-OPEN.                                                            
      3026  R070       MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D20-OPEN.                                                            
      3027  R075A      MOVE 1                      TO WSS-ATE01D21-OPEN.                                                            
      3028                                                                                                                          
      3029         1600-INIT-FILE-RECORDS.                                                                                          
      3030             MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D08-RECORD.                                                              
      3031             MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D09-RECORD.                                                              
      3032  R053       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D10-RECORD.                                                              
      3033  R053       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D11-RECORD.                                                              
      3034  R053       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D12-RECORD.                                                              
      3035  R056       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D13-RECORD.                                                              
      3036  R056       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D14-RECORD.                                                              
      3037  R056       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D15-RECORD.                                                              
      3038  R056       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D16-RECORD.                                                              
      3039  R064       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D17-RECORD.                                                              
      3040  CC41B      MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D18-RECORD.                                                              
      3041  R070       MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D20-RECORD.                                                              
      3042  R075A      MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D21-RECORD.                                                              
      3043         1600-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3044             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3045                                                                                                                          
      3046        ********************************************************                                                          
      3047        *** INITIALIZE WST-CNTY-CAT-TABLE.                   ***                                                          
      3048        ********************************************************                                                          
      3049         1700-INIT-WST-CNTY-CAT-TAB.                                                                                      
      3050             PERFORM 1750-INIT-WST-CNTY-CAT-TAB    THRU 1750-EXIT                                                         
      3051                     VARYING WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX  FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL                                                          
      3052                     WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX > WSH-CNTY-CAT-CNTY-TAB-MAX-SIZE                                                    
      3053                         AFTER WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL                                                          
      3054                         WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX > WSH-CNTY-CAT-CAT-TAB-MAX-SIZE.                                                 
      3055                                                                                                                          
      3056         1700-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3057             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3058                                                                                                                          
      3059        *******************************************************                                                           
      3060        *** DETAIL INITIALIZE.                              ***                                                           
      3061        *******************************************************                                                           
      3062         1750-INIT-WST-CNTY-CAT-TAB.                                                                                      
      3063             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WST-CNTY-CAT-ACT-BDGT-CNT                                                     
      3064                                            (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX                                                             
      3065                                             WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX).                                                            
      3066             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WST-CNTY-CAT-SUS-BDGT-CNT                                                     
      3067                                            (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX                                                             
      3068                                             WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX).                                                            
      3069             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WST-CNTY-CAT-MGA-DOLL                                                         
      3070                                            (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX                                                             
      3071                                             WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX).                                                            
      3072             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WST-CNTY-CAT-MEM-ACT-CNT                                                      
      3073                                            (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX                                                             
      3074                                             WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX).                                                            
      3075                                                                                                                          
      3076         1750-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3077             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3078                                                                                                                          
      3079  MD02   1800-LOAD-TCAT-TABLE.                                                                                            
      3080  MD02                                                                                                                    
      3081  MD02       OPEN INPUT TCAT-FILE.                                                                                        
      3082  MD02       SET TCAT-IDX TO 1.                                                                                           
      3083  MD02                                                                                                                    
      3084  MD02   1800-LOAD-TCAT-TABLE-CONT.                                                                                       
      3085  MD02                                                                                                                    
      3086  MD02       READ TCAT-FILE                                                                                               
      3087  MD02          AT END MOVE 'Y' TO WSS-TCAT-FILE-SW.                                                                      
      3088  MD02       IF END-OF-TCAT-FILE                                                                                          
      3089  MD02          CLOSE TCAT-FILE                                                                                           
      3090  MD02          GO TO 1800-EXIT                                                                                           
      3091  MD02       ELSE                                                                                                         
      3092  MD02           PERFORM 1805-CHECK-JAM-CATE                                                                              
      3093  MD02          MOVE CDE-CATEGORY OF TCAT-DATA TO                                                                         
      3094  MD02               TCAT-CDE-CATEGORY (TCAT-IDX)                                                                         
      3095  MD02          MOVE TCAT-PGM OF TCAT-DATA TO                                                                             
      3096  MD02               TCAT-TCAT-PGM (TCAT-IDX)                                                                             
      3097  MD02          SET TCAT-IDX UP BY 1                                                                                      
      3098  MD02          ADD 1           TO TCAT-OCCURS-COUNT                                                                      
      3099  MD02          IF TCAT-OCCURS-COUNT > TCAT-TABLE-MAX                                                                     
      3100  MD02              CLOSE TCAT-FILE                                                                                       
      3101  MD02              PERFORM 1820-ASB002-ERROR                                                                             
      3102  MD02              SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                        
      3103  MD02              PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                
      3104  MD02              MOVE 49 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                        
      3105  MD02              MOVE 'F' TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                        
      3106  MD02              IF WS-SML-STATUS-INDCTR3 NOT = ZEROS                                                                  
      3107  MD02                  DISPLAY 'TERM - CAO TABLE MAX EXCEEDED'                                                           
      3108  MD02                          UPON PRINTER                                                                              
      3109  MD02                  DISPLAY 'ASB003 ERROR' UPON PRINTER                                                               
      3110  MD02                  PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN                                                                             
      3111  MD02              ELSE                                                                                                  
      3112  MD02                  PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN                                                                             
      3113  MD02          ELSE                                                                                                      
      3114  MD02             GO TO 1800-LOAD-TCAT-TABLE-CONT.                                                                       
      3115  MD02                                                                                                                    
      3116  MD02   1800-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3117  MD02       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3118  MD02                                                                                                                    
      3119  MD02   1805-CHECK-JAM-CATE.                                                                                             
      3120  MD02                                                                                                                    
      3121  MD02       IF CDE-CATEGORY OF TCAT-DATA = 'J  '                                                                         
      3122  MD02                                   OR 'A  '                                                                         
      3123  MD02                                   OR 'M  '                                                                         
      3124  MD02           IF TCAT-PGM OF TCAT-DATA = 'M'                                                                           
      3125  MD02               MOVE 'Y' TO WSS-JAM-MEDI-FLAG                                                                        
      3126  MD02           ELSE                                                                                                     
      3127  MD02           IF TCAT-PGM OF TCAT-DATA = 'C'                                                                           
      3128  MD02               MOVE 'Y' TO WSS-JAM-CASH-FLAG.                                                                       
      3129                                                                                                                          
      3130        ********************************************************                                                          
      3131        *** THIS PARA DISPLAYS A MSG USING ASB003.           ***                                                          
      3132        *** PARAM VALUES COME FROM CALLING PARAS.            ***                                                          
      3133        ********************************************************                                                          
      3134         1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                                
      3135             MOVE CPF-CYCLE-DATE         TO WS-SML-CYCLE-DATE  .                                                          
      3136  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      3137  R069           MOVE  'ATE01D'    TO  WS-SML-RUN-ID                                                                      
      3138  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      3139  R069           MOVE  'ATF01D'    TO  WS-SML-RUN-ID.                                                                     
      3140             CALL 'ASB003' USING SYS-MSG-LIST.                                                                            
      3141             PERFORM 1830-ASB003-ERROR.                                                                                   
      3142             MOVE SPACES                 TO SYS-MSG-LIST       .                                                          
      3143                                                                                                                          
      3144         1810-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3145             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3146                                                                                                                          
      3147        ********************************************************                                                          
      3148        *** THIS PARA DISPLAYS ERROR THAT OCCURED, WHEN      ***                                                          
      3149        *** ASB002 WAS CALLED.                               ***                                                          
      3150        ********************************************************                                                          
      3151         1820-ASB002-ERROR.                                                                                               
      3152             MOVE 'W'                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT .                                                          
      3153             MOVE 005                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                          
      3154             MOVE 'ERROR IN ASB002'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1     .                                                          
      3155             MOVE BCF-STATUS-INDCTR2     TO WS-SML-PARAM-2     .                                                          
      3156             PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                    
      3157             SET SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART TO ON.                                                                        
      3158                                                                                                                          
      3159         1820-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3160             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3161                                                                                                                          
      3162        ********************************************************                                                          
      3163        *** THIS PARA IS INVOKED WHEN THERE IS AN ERROR IN   ***                                                          
      3164        *** DISPLAYING A SYSTEM MESSAGE.                     ***                                                          
      3165        ********************************************************                                                          
      3166         1830-ASB003-ERROR.                                                                                               
      3167             IF WS-SML-BAD                                                                                                
      3168                DISPLAY 'ABNORMAL RETURN FROM SUBROUTINE ASB003'                                                          
      3169                         UPON PRINTER.                                                                                    
      3170                                                                                                                          
      3171         1830-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3172             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3173                                                                                                                          
      3174        ********************************************************                                                          
      3175        *** THIS PARA IS INVOKED JUST BEFORE THE PROGRAM     ***                                                          
      3176        *** WUD TERMINATE, AND CHECKS THE SWITCH VALUES.     ***                                                          
      3177        ********************************************************                                                          
      3178         1840-FINAL-MSG.                                                                                                  
      3179             IF      SW-FATAL-ERROR-ON                                                                                    
      3180                     MOVE 'F'            TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      3181                     MOVE 006            TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      3182             ELSE IF SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART-ON                                                                        
      3183                     MOVE 'W'            TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      3184                     MOVE 006            TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      3185             ELSE                                                                                                         
      3186                     MOVE 'R'            TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      3187                     MOVE 004            TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                          
      3188             PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                    
      3189                                                                                                                          
      3190         1840-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3191             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3192                                                                                                                          
      3193        ********************************************************                                                          
      3194        *** THIS PARA WUD CLOSE ALL OPEN FILES.              ***                                                          
      3195        ********************************************************                                                          
      3196         1850-CLOSE-FILES.                                                                                                
      3197             IF WSS-ARM60001-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3198                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ARM60001-OPEN                                                             
      3199                CLOSE ARM60001.                                                                                           
      3200                                                                                                                          
      3201             IF WSS-ATE10M01-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3202                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE10M01-OPEN                                                             
      3203                CLOSE ATE10M01.                                                                                           
      3204                                                                                                                          
      3205             IF WSS-ATE20D01-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3206                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE20D01-OPEN                                                             
      3207                CLOSE ATE20D01.                                                                                           
      3208             IF WSS-ATE01D01-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3209                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D01-OPEN                                                             
      3210                CLOSE ATE01D01.                                                                                           
      3211                                                                                                                          
      3212  R069A *    IF WSS-ATE01D02-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3213  R069A *       MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D02-OPEN                                                             
      3214  R069A *       CLOSE ATE01D02.                                                                                           
      3215                                                                                                                          
      3216             IF WSS-ATE01D04-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3217                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D04-OPEN                                                             
      3218                CLOSE ATE01D04.                                                                                           
      3219                                                                                                                          
      3220             IF WSS-ATE01D05-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3221                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D05-OPEN                                                             
      3222                CLOSE ATE01D05.                                                                                           
      3223                                                                                                                          
      3224  R069A *    IF WSS-ATE01D06-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3225  R069A *       MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D06-OPEN                                                             
      3226  R069A *       CLOSE ATE01D06.                                                                                           
      3227  R069A *                                                                                                                 
      3228  R069A *    IF WSS-ATE01D07-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3229  R069A *       MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D07-OPEN                                                             
      3230  R069A *       CLOSE ATE01D07.                                                                                           
      3231                                                                                                                          
      3232             IF WSS-ATE01D08-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3233                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D08-OPEN

      3235                                                                                                                          
      3236             IF WSS-ATE01D09-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3237                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D09-OPEN                                                             
      3238                CLOSE ATE01D09.                                                                                           
      3239                                                                                                                          
      3240  R053       IF WSS-ATE01D10-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3241  R053          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D10-OPEN                                                             
      3242  R053          CLOSE ATE01D10.                                                                                           
      3243  R053                                                                                                                    
      3244  R053       IF WSS-ATE01D11-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3245  R053          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D11-OPEN                                                             
      3246  R053          CLOSE ATE01D11.                                                                                           
      3247  R053                                                                                                                    
      3248  R053       IF WSS-ATE01D12-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3249  R053          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D12-OPEN                                                             
      3250  R053          CLOSE ATE01D12.                                                                                           
      3251  R053                                                                                                                    
      3252  R056       IF WSS-ATE01D13-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3253  R056          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D13-OPEN                                                             
      3254  R056          CLOSE ATE01D13.                                                                                           
      3255  R056                                                                                                                    
      3256  R056       IF WSS-ATE01D14-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3257  R056          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D14-OPEN                                                             
      3258  R056          CLOSE ATE01D14.                                                                                           
      3259  R056                                                                                                                    
      3260  R056       IF WSS-ATE01D15-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3261  R056          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D15-OPEN                                                             
      3262  R056          CLOSE ATE01D15.                                                                                           
      3263  R056                                                                                                                    
      3264  R056       IF WSS-ATE01D16-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3265  R056          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D16-OPEN                                                             
      3266  R056          CLOSE ATE01D16.                                                                                           
      3267  R056                                                                                                                    
      3268  R064       IF WSS-ATE01D17-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3269  R064          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D17-OPEN                                                             
      3270  R064          CLOSE ATE01D17.                                                                                           
      3271                                                                                                                          
      3272  CC41B      IF WSS-ATE01D18-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3273  CC41B         MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D18-OPEN                                                             
      3274  CC41B         CLOSE ATE01D18.                                                                                           
      3275  R070       IF WSS-ATE01D20-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3276  R070          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D20-OPEN                                                             
      3277  R070          CLOSE ATE01D20.                                                                                           
      3278  R075A      IF WSS-ATE01D21-OPEN-ON                                                                                      
      3279  R075A         MOVE 0                   TO WSS-ATE01D21-OPEN                                                             
      3280  R075A         CLOSE ATE01D21.                                                                                           
      3281  R067       IF  WSS-ATE01DR01-OPEN-ON                                                                                    
      3282  R067           IF  WSA-CAT-PSC-DROP  =  0                                                                               
      3283  R067               MOVE  '                 ***  NO RECORDS DROPPED'  TO                                                 
      3284  R067                   ATE01DR01-REC                                                                                    
      3285  R067               WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC  AFTER  5.                                                                      
      3286  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      3287  R069           MOVE  'ATE01DR01XST'  TO  WS-OLDFILE-NM                                                                  
      3288  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      3289  R069           MOVE  'ATE01DR01FST'  TO  WS-OLDFILE-NM.                                                                 
      3290  R067       IF  WSS-ATE01DR01-OPEN-ON                                                                                    
      3291  R067           MOVE  0  TO  WSS-ATE01DR01-OPEN                                                                          
      3292  R067           CLOSE  ATE01DR01                                                                                         
      3293  R067           MOVE  SPACES  TO  WS-NEWFILE-NM                                                                          
      3294  R067           MOVE  ZEROES  TO  WS-NEW-STATUS                                                                          
      3295  R067                             WS-OLD-STATUS                                                                          
      3296  R067                             WS-NEW-STATUS-WORD                                                                     
      3297  R067                             WS-OLD-STATUS-WORD                                                                     
      3298  R067           MOVE  WSA-PAGE-CNT  TO  WS-OLD-PAGE-CNT                                                                  
      3299  R067           PERFORM  1870-CALL-ASB004                                                                                
      3300  R067           DISPLAY 'FILE FREED (' WS-OLDFILE-NM  ')' UPON PRINTER.                                                  
      3301                                                                                                                          
      3302             CLOSE ATE01DCKPT.                                                                                            
      3303         1850-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3304             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3305                                                                                                                          
      3306  CC39   1870-CALL-ASB004.                                                                                                
      3307  CC39       CALL 'ASB004' USING WS-PRTCTL-LIST.                                                                          
      3308  CC39       IF NEW-BAD                                                                                                   
      3309  CC39          MOVE 005                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      3310  CC39          MOVE 'ASB004'            TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      3311  CC39          MOVE WS-NEW-STATUS       TO WS-SML-PARM-2-X-2                                                             
      3312  CC39          MOVE 'F'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      3313  CC39          PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      3314  CC39          SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG ON                                                                                
      3315  CC39          PERFORM 1850-CLOSE-FILES THRU 1850-EXIT                                                                   
      3316  CC39          PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG THRU 1840-EXIT                                                                     
      3317  CC39          PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      3318                                                                                                                          
      3319  CC39       IF OLD-BAD                                                                                                   
      3320  CC39          MOVE 005                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      3321  CC39          MOVE 'ASB004'            TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      3322  CC39          MOVE WS-OLD-STATUS       TO WS-SML-PARM-2-X-2                                                             
      3323  CC39          MOVE 'F'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      3324  CC39          PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      3325  CC39          SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG ON                                                                                
      3326  CC39          PERFORM 1850-CLOSE-FILES THRU 1850-EXIT                                                                   
      3327  CC39          PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG THRU 1840-EXIT                                                                     
      3328  CC39          PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      3329                                                                                                                          
      3330  R053   1900-LOAD-TCLK-TABLE.                                                                                            
      3331  R053       OPEN INPUT TCLK-FILE.                                                                                        
      3332  R053                                                                                                                    
      3333  R053       MOVE 'Y'  TO WSS-TCLK-FOUND-SW.                                                                              
      3334  R053       SET TCLK-IDX TO 1.                                                                                           
      3335  R053       PERFORM 1910-READ-TCLK       THRU 1910-EXIT                                                                  
      3336  R053                                   UNTIL TCLK-NOT-FOUND.                                                            
      3337  R053                                                                                                                    
      3338  R053       CLOSE TCLK-FILE.                                                                                             
      3339  R053   1900-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3340  R053       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3341  R053                                                                                                                    
      3342  R053   1910-READ-TCLK.                                                                                                  
      3343  R053       READ TCLK-FILE                                                                                               
      3344  R053          AT END MOVE 'N' TO WSS-TCLK-FOUND-SW GO TO 1910-EXIT.                                                     
      3345  R053
