      3346  R053       MOVE TCLK-KEY         TO TCLK-TBL-KEY         (TCLK-IDX)                                                     
      3347  R053       MOVE TCLK-DESCRIPTION TO TCLK-TBL-DESCRIPTION (TCLK-IDX)                                                     
      3348  R053       MOVE TCLK-PERIOD      TO TCLK-TBL-PERIOD      (TCLK-IDX)                                                     
      3349  R053       SET TCLK-IDX UP BY 1.                                                                                        
      3350  R053   1910-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3351  R053       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3352  R053                                                                                                                    
      3353  R070   1920-LOAD-TARB.                                                                                                  
      3354  R070       OPEN  INPUT  TARB-FILE.                                                                                      
      3355  R070       MOVE  0      TO  WSS-TARB.                                                                                   
      3356  R070       MOVE  SPACES     TO  WST-TARB-TABLE.                                                                         
      3357  R070       MOVE  'N'        TO  WSS-TARB-EOF.                                                                           
      3358  R070       PERFORM  1930-READ-TARB  THRU  1930-EXIT  UNTIL                                                              
      3359  R070           WSS-TARB-EOF  =  'Y'                                                                                     
      3360  R070       MOVE  WSS-TARB   TO  WSS-TARB-LOAD.                                                                          
      3361  R070       CLOSE  TARB-FILE.                                                                                            
      3362  R070   1920-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      3363  R070   1930-READ-TARB.                                                                                                  
      3364  R070       READ  TARB-FILE  AT  END                                                                                     
      3365  R070           MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-TARB-EOF                                                                              
      3366  R070           GO  TO  1930-EXIT.                                                                                       
      3367  R070       ADD  1  TO  WSS-TARB.                                                                                        
      3368  R070       IF  WSS-TARB  >  WSS-TARB-MAX                                                                                
      3369  R070           CLOSE  TARB-FILE                                                                                         
      3370  R070           SET  SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                          
      3371  R070           MOVE  49  TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                        
      3372  R070           MOVE  'F' TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                         
      3373  R070           MOVE  'CSR40MTARB'  TO  WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                   
      3374  R070           MOVE  WSS-TARB-MAX  TO  WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                   
      3375  R070           PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                
      3376  R070           PERFORM  1850-CLOSE-FILES                                                                                
      3377  R070           PERFORM  1840-FINAL-MSG                                                                                  
      3378  R070           PERFORM  3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                  
      3379  R070       MOVE  TARB-COUNTY    TO  WST-TARB-CO (WSS-TARB).                                                             
      3380  R070       MOVE  TARB-DIST      TO  WST-TARB-DIST (WSS-TARB).                                                           
      3381  R070       MOVE  TARB-CDE-IND-BYPASS  TO  WST-TARB-IND (WSS-TARB).                                                      
      3382  R070       MOVE  TARB-DTE-BGN-BYPASS  TO  WST-TARB-BEG-DTE (WSS-TARB).                                                  
      3383  R070       MOVE  TARB-DTE-END-BYPASS  TO  WST-TARB-END-DTE (WSS-TARB).                                                  
      3384  R070   1930-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      3385  R053   1950-LOAD-ARM61001.                                                                                              
      3386  R053       OPEN INPUT ARM61001.                                                                                         
      3387  R053       READ ARM61001                                                                                                
      3388  R053          AT END MOVE 'N' TO WSS-ARM-FOUND-SW GO TO 1950-EXIT.                                                      
      3389  R053                                                                                                                    
      3390  R053       MOVE RR305-RECORD TO PREV-RECORD.                                                                            
      3391  R053       CLOSE ARM61001.                                                                                              
      3392  R053   1950-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3393  R053       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3394  R053                                                                                                                    
      3395        ****************************************************                                                              
      3396        *** THIS SECTION IS PERFORMED UNTIL END OF       ***                                                              
      3397        *** R246 AREA, AND CONTAINS ALL MAJOR PROCESSING ***                                                              
      3398        *** PARAS.                                       ***                                                              
      3399        ***                                              ***                                                              
      3400        *** IT FETCHES A R666 CASE RECORD AND ALL ITS    ***                                                              
      3401        *** ASSOCIATED RECORDS,                          ***                                                              
      3402        *** FETCHES CORRESPONDING R246-CASE RECORD, AND  ***                                                              
      3403        *** PERFORMS PROCESS OF ALL CM BUDGET RECORDS IN ***                                                              
      3404        *** R249.                                        ***                                                              
      3405        ***                                              ***                                                              
      3406        ****************************************************                                                              
      3407                                                                                                                          
      3408        ****************************************************                                                              
      3409        *** ALL DATA BASE FETCHES PARAS WOULD RETURN     ***                                                              
      3410        *** A STATUS CODE IN RESPECTIVE 'WSS-R001-REC'   ***                                                              
      3411        *** SWITCHES.                                    ***                                                              
      3412        ***                                              ***                                                              
      3413        *** THIS SW WILL INDICATE SUCCESS/FAILURE OF     ***                                                              
      3414        *** DB FETCH. (EOS SW WILL BE USED INTERNALLY    ***                                                              
      3415        *** IN THE DB FETCH PARA)                        ***                                                              
      3416        ****************************************************                                                              
      3417         2000-PROCESS SECTION.                                                                                            
      3418         2000-PROCESS-LOGIC-DRIVER.                                                                                       
      3419             MOVE 2000                   TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                              
      3420         2000-INIT-ALL-WS-VARIABLES.                                                                                      
      3421             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-DB-CASE-SWITCHES.                                                         
      3422             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-DB-EOS-SWITCHES .                                                         
      3423             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-DB-REC-SWITCHES .                                                         
      3424             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-BDGT-SWITCHES   .                                                         
      3425             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-TAB-SEARCH-SWITCHES .                                                     
      3426                                                                                                                          
      3427  R069   2000-FETCH-R246.                                                                                                 
      3428  TEST1 *    DISPLAY  '2000-FETCH-R246 '  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                  
      3429  R069       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-R246-FOUND.                                                                               
      3430  R069       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-UPDATE-FLAG.                                                                              
      3431  R070       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-CLOSE-SW.                                                                                 
      3432  R069       PERFORM  7300-FETCH-R246  THRU  7300-EXIT.                                                                   
      3433  R069       IF  WSS-R246-EOA  =  'Y'                                                                                     
      3434  R069           GO  TO  2000-EXIT.                                                                                       
      3435  CC43       MOVE  R246-NBR-CASE  TO  R666-NBR-CASE                                                                       
      3436  CC43                                LINK-NBR-CASE                                                                       
      3437  R069                                WSH-CASE-NUMBER.                                                                    
      3438  PROD       IF WSA-R666-CHKPT-REC-CNT = 2000                                                                             
      3439  TFP   *    IF WSA-R666-CHKPT-REC-CNT = 2000                                                                             
      3440  PRL   *    IF WSA-R666-CHKPT-REC-CNT = 1000                                                                             
      3441  INTG  *    IF WSA-R666-CHKPT-REC-CNT = 1000                                                                             
      3442  UTTT  *    IF WSA-R666-CHKPT-REC-CNT = 1000                                                                             
      3443  R072          PERFORM 2060-PRO-CHKPT  THRU 2060-EXIT.                                                                   
      3444  TEST1 *    DISPLAY  'BEFORE DBPA20 '  LINK-NBR-CASE UPON PRINTER.                                                       
      3445  CC43       CALL  'DBPA20'  USING  LINK-GET-CASE-AREAS.                                                                  
      3446  CC43       IF  LINK-CALL-STUS  NOT  =  0                                                                                
      3447  CC43           MOVE  071    TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                     
      3448  CC43           MOVE  'W'    TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                      
      3449  CC43           MOVE  'R246'  TO  WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                         
      3450  CC43           MOVE  R246-NBR-CASE  TO  WS-SML-PARM-2-X-1                                                               
      3451  CC43           PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                
      3452  CC43           GO  TO  2000-EXIT.                                                                                       
      3453  TEST1 *    IF  LINK-CALL-STUS  NOT  =  0                                                                                
      3454  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  'DBPA20 ERROR '  LINK-NBR-CASE UPON PRINTER                                                     
      3455  TEST1 *        GO  TO  2000-EXIT.                                                                                       
      3456  CC43       IF  LINK-R246-AN  NOT  =  CALCR246-AN                                                                        
      3457  CC43           DISPLAY 'CASE IN WRONG AREA ' R246-NBR-CASE UPON PRINTER                                                 
      3458  CC43           GO  TO  2000-EXIT.                                                                                       
      3459  CC43       MOVE  LINK-R666-AN    TO  CALCR666-AN.                                                                       
      3460  R069       PERFORM  7205-FETCH-R666  THRU  7205-EXIT.                                                                   
      3461  R069       IF  WSS-R666-FOUND  =  'Y'                                                                                   
      3462  R069           ADD  1  TO  WSA-R666-REC-CNT                                                                             
      3463  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      3464  R069           MOVE  011  TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                       
      3465  R069           MOVE  'W'  TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                        
      3466  R069           MOVE  'R666'  TO  WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                         
      3467  R069           MOVE  R666-NBR-CASE  TO  WS-SML-PARM-2-X-1                                                               
      3468  R069           PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                
      3469  R069           GO  TO  2000-EXIT.                                                                                       
      3470                                                                                                                          
      3471         2000-SETUP-ERR-HANDLING.                                                                                         
      3472             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO WSH-CASE-NUMBER.                                                              
      3473             MOVE SPACES                 TO WSH-CDE-CATEGORY.                                                             
      3474             MOVE SPACES                 TO WSH-NBR-GROUP-GRANT.                                                          
      3475                                                                                                                          
      3476        ******************************************************                                                            
      3477        *** WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR IS A GROUP ITEM THAT DEFINES ***                                                            
      3478        *** CNTY NO FOR CNTY TABLE LOOK UP.                ***                                                            
      3479        ******************************************************                                                            
      3480         2000-LOOKUP-COUNTY-TABLE.                                                                                        
      3481             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR.                                                            
      3482             PERFORM 2050-LOOKUP-CNTY-TAB          THRU 2050-EXIT.                                                        
      3483             IF NOT WSS-CNTY-FOUND-ON                                                                                     
      3484                GO TO 2000-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3485                                                                                                                          
      3486  R025       IF R666-CNT-BUDGETS-ACT-CM NOT > 0                                                                           
      3487  R025          GO TO 2000-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3488                                                                                                                          
      3489  R026       IF R666-CDE-STUS-CASE = 'C'                                                                                  
      3490  R026          GO TO 2000-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3491  R053                                                                                                                    
      3492  R053       IF R666-CDE-TYPE-CASE = 'P'                                                                                  
      3493  R053          GO TO 2000-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3494  R056                                                                                                                    
      3495  R056       MOVE  ZEROS                 TO CISMOE-ERR                                                                    
      3496  R056                                      CISMOE-CASE                                                                   
      3497  R056                                      CISMOE-PROG-STAT                                                              
      3498  R056                                      CISMOE-CNT.                                                                   
      3499  R056       MOVE  SPACES                TO CISMOE-WPR-STATUS.                                                            
      3500  R056       MOVE  1                     TO TANIF-WS-SUB.                                                                 
      3501  R056       PERFORM 2333-INITIALIZE-CISMOE THRU 2333-EXIT 20 TIMES.                                                      
      3502  R056       MOVE SPACES TO D13-CISMOE-WPR-STATUS                                                                         
      3503  R056                      D13-CISMOE-CAT                                                                                
      3504  R056                      D13-CISMOE-GG                                                                                 
      3505  R056                      D13-CISMOE-PARENT                                                                             
      3506  R056                      D13-CISMOE-ELIG                                                                               
      3507  R056                      D13-CISMOE-PROJ                                                                               
      3508  R056                      D13-CISMOE-PROJ-B                                                                             
      3509  R061                      D13-CISMOE-SSI-FLAG                                                                           
      3510  R061                      D13-CISMOE-SCHOOL-FLAG                                                                        
      3511  R061                      D13-CISMOE-CHILD-COMMON                                                                       
      3512  R061                      D13-CISMOE-SSI-PAR-1                                                                          
      3513  R061                      D13-CISMOE-SSI-PAR-2                                                                          
      3514  R061                      D13-CISMOE-WPR-RCPT                                                                           
      3515  R075B                     D13-CISMOE-HAVE-EA-JAM                                                                        
      3516  R075B                     D13-CISMOE-HAVE-ETP-22                                                                        
      3517  R075B                     D13-CISMOE-HAVE-ETP-54                                                                        
      3518  R075B                     D13-CISMOE-HAVE-PAR-54                                                                        
      3519  R075B                     D13-CISMOE-HAVE-ELG-SSI-PAR                                                                   
      3520  R056                      ATE02D05-CATEGORY                                                                             
      3521  R056                      ATE02D05-GRANT-GROUP                                                                          
      3522  R056                      ATE02D05-CDE-STUS                                                                             
      3523  R056                      D15-CISMOE-CAT                                                                                
      3524  R056                      D15-CISMOE-GG                                                                                 
      3525  R056                      D15-CISMOE-DIST                                                                               
      3526  R056                      D15-CISMOE-PMT-NAME                                                                           
      3527  R056                      ATE01D16-CDE-CAT                                                                              
      3528  R056                      ATE01D16-NBR-GG                                                                               
      3529  R056                      ATE01D16-NBR-TRANS.                                                                           
      3530  R056       MOVE ZEROS  TO D13-CISMOE-ERR                                                                                
      3531  R056                      D13-CISMOE-CASE                                                                               
      3532  R056                      D13-CISMOE-PROG-STAT                                                                          
      3533  R061                      D13-CISMOE-PAY-DATE                                                                           
      3534  R056                      D13-CISMOE-CNT                                                                                
      3535  R056                      D13-CISMOE-RCPT                                                                               
      3536  R056                      D13-CISMOE-AGE                                                                                
      3537  R056                      D13-CISMOE-ETP                                                                                
      3538  R056                      D13-CISMOE-WK-HRS                                                                             
      3539  R056                      D13-CISMOE-SELF-EMPL                                                                          
      3540  R061                      D13-CISMOE-PROJ-CORE-HRS                                                                      
      3541  R061                      D13-CISMOE-PROJ-NON-HRS                                                                       
      3542  R061                      D13-CISMOE-GOOD-CAUSE                                                                         
      3543  R061                      D13-CISMOE-PARENT-LINE-1                                                                      
      3544  R061                      D13-CISMOE-PARENT-LINE-2                                                                      
      3545  R056                      D13-CISMOE-LINE-NO                                                                            
      3546  R075B                     D13-CISMOE-CITIZEN-CDE                                                                        
      3547  R056                      ATE02D05-RCPT-NBR                                                                             
      3548  R056                      ATE02D05-CASE-NBR-N                                                                           
      3549  R056                      ATE02D05-OLD-PROG-STAT                                                                        
      3550  R056                      ATE02D05-NEW-PROG-STAT                                                                        
      3551  R056                      ATE02D05-TIME-ACTN                                                                            
      3552  R056                      ATE02D05-DTE-CHNG                                                                             
      3553  R056                      ATE02D05-MPD-DATE                                                                             
      3554  R056                      D15-CISMOE-CASE                                                                               
      3555  R056                      D15-CISMOE-PREV-STAT                                                                          
      3556  R056                      D15-CISMOE-PROG-STAT                                                                          
      3557  R056                      D15-CISMOE-CO                                                                                 
      3558  R056                      D15-CISMOE-CSLD                                                                               
      3559  R056                      ATE01D16-RECIPIENT                                                                            
      3560  R056                      ATE01D16-NBR-CASE                                                                             
      3561  R056                      ATE01D16-CTL-DIGIT                                                                            
      3562  R056                      ATE01D16-DTE-BGN-EFFV                                                                         
      3563  R056                      ATE01D16-DTE-END-EFFV                                                                         
      3564  R056                      ATE01D16-DTE-CHNG                                                                             
      3565  R056                      ATE01D16-TIME-ACTN.                                                                           
      3566  R056                                                                                                                    
      3567        *******************************************************                                                           
      3568        *** IF A VALID REC IS NOT FOUND, CONFIRM THAT       ***                                                           
      3569        *** THE CASE WAS NOT CLOSED (THRU CASE-CLOSED-SW    ***                                                           
      3570        *** THAT IS SET IF AT-LEAST 1 R672 WITH 'C' STATUS  ***                                                           
      3571        *** IS FOUND. IF IT WAS CLOSED, BYPASS CASE, ELSE   ***                                                           
      3572        *** MANDATORY REC MISSING !                         ***                                                           
      3573        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      3574        *** IF VALID REC IS FOUND, PROCESS THE CASE ONLY,   ***                                                           
      3575        *** IF IT HAS CM BUDGETS.                           ***                                                           
      3576        *****************************************************                                                             
      3577         2000-FETCH-R672.                                                                                                 
      3578  R067       MOVE  2002    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      3579  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3580  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2000-FETCH-R672 '  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                             
      3581  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      3582             PERFORM 7220-FETCH-R672               THRU 7220-EXIT.                                                        
      3583             IF NOT WSS-R672-REC-ON                                                                                       
      3584                IF WSS-R672-FUTURE-REC-ON                                                                                 
      3585                   GO TO 2000-EXIT                                                                                        
      3586                ELSE                                                                                                      
      3587                   MOVE 'R672'           TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      3588                   PERFORM 7900-MISSING-RECORD     THRU 7900-EXIT                                                         
      3589                   GO TO 2000-EXIT.                                                                                       
      3590                                                                                                                          
      3591         2000-FETCH-R248.                                                                                                 
      3592  R067       MOVE  2003    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      3593  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3594  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2000-FETCH-R248 '  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                             
      3595  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      3596             MOVE WSH-R666-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      3597             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      3598             PERFORM 7260-FETCH-R248               THRU 7260-EXIT.                                                        
      3599             IF NOT WSS-R248-REC-ON                                                                                       
      3600                MOVE 'R248'              TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      3601                PERFORM 7900-MISSING-RECORD        THRU 7900-EXIT.                                                        
      3602  R056       MOVE R248-NAM-PMT           TO D15-CISMOE-PMT-NAME.                                                          
      3603                                                                                                                          
      3604         2000-FETCH-R254.                                                                                                 
      3605  R067       MOVE  2004    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      3606  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3607  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2000-FETCH-R254 '  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                             
      3608  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      3609             MOVE WSH-R666-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      3610             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      3611             PERFORM 7280-FETCH-R254               THRU 7280-EXIT.                                                        
      3612                                                                                                                          
      3613         2000-FETCH-R247.                                                                                                 
      3614  R067       MOVE  2005    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      3615  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3616  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2000-FETCH-R247 '  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                             
      3617  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      3618             MOVE WSH-R666-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      3619             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      3620             PERFORM 7240-FETCH-R247               THRU 7240-EXIT.                                                        
      3621             IF NOT WSS-R247-REC-ON                                                                                       
      3622                MOVE 'R247'              TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      3623                PERFORM 7900-MISSING-RECORD        THRU 7900-EXIT.                                                        
      3624                                                                                                                          
      3625         2000-FETCH-R249.                                                                                                 
      3626  R075A      MOVE 0  TO  WSS-EOS-R249.                                                                                    
      3627  R075A      FIND CURRENT R246-CM-CASE RECORD.                                                                            
      3628  R075A      IF ERROR-NUM = '0000'                                                                                        
      3629  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      3630  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3631  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
      3632  R075A      PERFORM 2111-FETCH-R249-SECTION                                                                              
      3633  R075A        UNTIL EOS-R249.                                                                                            
      3634  R078  *      IF  WSS-UPDATE-FLAG  =  'Y'                                                                                
      3635  R078  *          PERFORM  2065-PROCESS-ASB04B  THRU  2065-EXIT.                                                         
      3636  R075A      FIND CURRENT R246-CM-CASE RECORD.                                                                            
      3637  R075A      IF ERROR-NUM = '0000'                                                                                        
      3638  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      3639  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3640  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
      3641  R056       MOVE 2000                   TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                              
      3642  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3643  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2000-FETCH-R249 '  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                             
      3644  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      3645  TEST1 *    DISPLAY '2000-FETCH-R249 A:' R246-CM-CASE UPON PRINTER.                                                      
      3646  R070       MOVE  ZEROES  TO  WSS-R249-SS                                                                                
      3647  R070                         WSS-R249-LD.                                                                               
      3648  R070       MOVE  SPACES  TO  WST-R249-TABLE.                                                                            
      3649  R069       MOVE  1  TO  WSS-R249-FIRST.                                                                                 
      3650             PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249               THRU 7310-EXIT.                                                        
      3651                                                                                                                          
      3652         2000-PROCESS-ALL-CM-BDGTS.                                                                                       
      3653             PERFORM 2200-PRO-R249-CM-BDGT-SECTION UNTIL                                                                  
      3654                     WSS-R249-EOS-ON.                                                                                     
      3655  R070       IF  WSS-R249-LD  >  0                                                                                        
      3656  R070           PERFORM  2670-MODIFY-R249  THRU  2670-EXIT.                                                              
      3657        *    MOVE 0                      TO MCFLAG.                                                                       
      3658  R065  *    IF  WSS-UPDATE-FLAG  =  'Y'                                                                                  
      3659  R065  *        PERFORM  2065-PROCESS-ASB04B  THRU  2065-EXIT.                                                           
      3660                                                                                                                          
      3661         2000-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3662             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3663  R075A  2111-FETCH-R249-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                 
      3664  R075A  2111-FETCH-R249.                                                                                                 
      3665  R075A      IF NOT WSH-SECOND-HALF                                                                                       
      3666  R075A         MOVE 1      TO WSS-EOS-R249                                                                               
      3667  R075A         GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3668  R075A      FETCH NEXT R249-CASH-MEDICAL-BUDGET                                                                          
      3669  R075A      WITHIN S535-CM-CASE-BDGT SET                                                                                 
      3670  R075A        ON ERROR GO TO 211X-ERROR.                                                                                 
      3671  R075A      IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      3672  R075A         MOVE 1                   TO WSS-EOS-R249                                                                  
      3673  R075A         GO TO 2111-EXIT                                                                                           
      3674  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3675  R075A         IF ERROR-CODE = '00'                                                                                      
      3676  R075A            NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      3677  R075A         ELSE                                                                                                      
      3678  R075A            PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                 
      3679  R075A  211X-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      3680  R075A      IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      3681  R075A         MOVE 1                   TO WSS-EOS-R249                                                                  
      3682  R075A         GO TO 2111-EXIT                                                                                           
      3683  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3684  R075A         IF ERROR-CODE = '00'                                                                                      
      3685  R075A            NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      3686  R075A         ELSE                                                                                                      
      3687  R075A            PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                 
      3688  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3689  R075A      IF R249-CDE-CATEGORY = 'MG '                                                                                 
      3690  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      3691  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3692  R075A         GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3693  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3694  R075A      IF ( R249-CDE-STUS-BUDGET = 'O' OR 'S' )                                                                     
      3695  R075A         GO TO 2111A-GET-R634                                                                                      
      3696  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3697  R075A         MOVE +1 TO WSS-EOS-R249                                                                                   
      3698  R075A         GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3699  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3700  R075A  2111A-GET-R634.                                                                                                  
      3701  R075A      FETCH FIRST R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO                                                                              
      3702  R075A      WITHIN S396-CM-BDGT-INFO SET                                                                                 
      3703  R075A      ON ERROR GO TO 222X-ERROR.                                                                                   
      3704  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3705  R075A  222X-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      3706  R075A      IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      3707  R075A         DISPLAY 'BAD MG :' R246-CM-CASE UPON PRINTER                                                              
      3708  R075A         GO TO 2111-EXIT                                                                                           
      3709  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3710  R075A         IF ERROR-CODE = '00'                                                                                      
      3711  R075A            NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      3712  R075A         ELSE                                                                                                      
      3713  R075A            PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                 
      3714  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3715  R075A      IF R634-DTE-END-EFFV = 0                                                                                     
      3716  R075A         MOVE 9999999  TO R634-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                                       
      3717  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3718  R075A      ACCEPT WSH-TODAYS-DATE FROM DAY YYYYDDD.                                                                     
      3719  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3720  R075A      IF  R634-DTE-END-EFFV < R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV                                                                    
      3721  R075A          GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                         
      3722  R075A      IF  R634-DTE-END-EFFV = R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV                                                                    
      3723  R075A          GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                         
      3724  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3725  R075A      IF  R634-CDE-STUS-PROG = 99                                                                                  
      3726  R075A      AND R634-DTE-END-EFFV > WSH-TODAYS-DATE                                                                      
      3727  R075A          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                            
      3728  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3729  R075A          GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                         
      3730  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3731  R075A      IF R634-DTE-DUE-REDET > WSH-2-PAYDATE                                                                        
      3732  R075A          GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                         
      3733  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3734  R075A      MOVE 'N'    TO  WS-SWT-TCLK-FOUND.                                                                           
      3735  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3736  R075A      SEARCH ALL TCLK-LEVEL                                                                                        
      3737  R075A        AT END                                                                                                     
      3738  R075A          MOVE ZEROS                                                                                               
      3739  R075A            TO HOLD-INCARC-DAYS                                                                                    
      3740  R075A          MOVE 'N' TO WS-SWT-TCLK-FOUND                                                                            
      3741  R075A        WHEN TCLK-TBL-KEY (TCLK-IDX) = 'MARCDV'                                                                    
      3742  R075A          SET TCLK-SUB TO TCLK-IDX                                                                                 
      3743  R075A          MOVE TCLK-TBL-PERIOD (TCLK-SUB)                                                                          
      3744  R075A            TO HOLD-INCARC-DAYS                                                                                    
      3745  R075A          MOVE 'Y' TO WS-SWT-TCLK-FOUND.                                                                           
      3746  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3747  R075A      IF HOLD-INCARC-DAYS = 0                                                                                      
      3748  R075A         MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D05-REC                                                               
      3749  R075A         DISPLAY 'IN 2111C-MG99-CLOSE ' UPON PRINTER                                                               
      3750  R075A         MOVE R634-DTE-DUE-REDET     TO ATE01D05-CLOSE-DATE                                                        
      3751  R075A         MOVE R246-NBR-CASE          TO ATE01D05-NBR-CASE                                                          
      3752  R075A         MOVE R249-CDE-CATEGORY      TO ATE01D05-CDE-CATEGORY                                                      
      3753  R075A         MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT   TO ATE01D05-NBR-GROUP-GRANT                                                   
      3754  R075A         MOVE R634-CDE-STUS-PROG     TO ATE01D05-STAT-CODE                                                         
      3755  R075A         MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D05-CDE-SUFFIX                                                        
      3756  R075A         MOVE 'B'                    TO ATE01D05-TYP-TRANS                                                         
      3757  R075A         MOVE ZEROS                  TO ATE01D05-NBR-RCPT                                                          
      3758  R075A         WRITE ATE01D05-REC                                                                                        
      3759  R075A         MOVE SPACES                  TO ATE01D05-REC                                                              
      3760  R075A         ADD 1                        TO WSA-ATE01D05-REC-CNT                                                      
      3761  R075A         ADD 1                        TO WS-MG99-CLOSURE                                                           
      3762  R075A         GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3763  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3764  R075A  2111D-AUTO-XTNS.                                                                                                 
      3765  R075A      MOVE  R634-DTE-OPENED-BDGT  TO  M2K-JULIAN-DATE.                                                             
      3766  R075A      PERFORM  6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                    
      3767  R075A      IF  M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND  NOT  =  0                                                                       
      3768  R075A          MOVE  ZEROES            TO  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE                                                           
      3769  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3770  R075A          MOVE M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE TO  W634-DTE-OPENED-BDGT.                                                        
      3771  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3772  R076  *    PERFORM 2111G-CALC-EXTN     THRU 2111G-EXIT.                                                                 
      3773  CC47A                                                                                                                   
      3774  R075A      MOVE  R634-DTE-DUE-REDET    TO  M2K-JULIAN-DATE                                                              
      3775  R075A                                      S634-DTE-DUE-REDET.                                                          
      3776  R075A      PERFORM  6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                    
      3777  R075A      IF  M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND  NOT  =  0                                                                       
      3778  R075A          MOVE  ZEROES            TO  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE                                                           
      3779  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3780  R075A          MOVE M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE TO  W634-DTE-DUE-REDET.                                                          
      3781  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3782  R076       PERFORM 2111G-CALC-EXTN     THRU 2111G-EXIT.                                                                 
      3783  CC47A *    COMPUTE WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                                  
      3784  CC47A *          = W634-REDET-GRG-YY - W634-DTE-OPENED-YY.                                                              
      3785  CC47A *    IF WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS < 0                                                                                   
      3786  CC47A *       DISPLAY 'OPEN DT > REAPP DT:' R246-CM-CASE                                                                
      3787  CC47A *          UPON PRINTER                                                                                           
      3788  CC47A *       GO TO 2111-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3789  CC47A *    IF WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS < 2                                                                                   
      3790  CC47A *       MOVE 0 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                             
      3791  CC47A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      3792  CC47A *       COMPUTE WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS = WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS - 1.                                                    
      3793  R076       DISPLAY ' WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS :' WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                         
      3794  R076          UPON PRINTER.                                                                                             
      3795  R075A      IF WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS < HOLD-INCARC-DAYS                                                                    
      3796  R075A         PERFORM 2111E-CLOSE-MG99 THRU 2111E-EXIT                                                                  
      3797  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
      3798  R075A         MOVE R634-DTE-DUE-REDET      TO ATE01D05-CLOSE-DATE                                                       
      3799  R075A         MOVE R246-NBR-CASE           TO ATE01D05-NBR-CASE                                                         
      3800  R075A         MOVE R249-CDE-CATEGORY       TO ATE01D05-CDE-CATEGORY                                                     
      3801  R075A         MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT    TO ATE01D05-NBR-GROUP-GRANT                                                  
      3802  R075A         MOVE R634-CDE-STUS-PROG      TO ATE01D05-STAT-CODE                                                        
      3803  R075A         MOVE SPACES                  TO ATE01D05-CDE-SUFFIX                                                       
      3804  R075A         MOVE 'B'                     TO ATE01D05-TYP-TRANS                                                        
      3805  R075A         MOVE ZEROS                   TO ATE01D05-NBR-RCPT                                                         
      3806  R075A         WRITE ATE01D05-REC                                                                                        
      3807  R075A         MOVE SPACES                  TO ATE01D05-REC                                                              
      3808  R075A         ADD 1                        TO WSA-ATE01D05-REC-CNT                                                      
      3809  R075A         ADD 1                        TO WS-MG99-CLOSURE.                                                          
      3810  R075A                                                                                                                   
      3811  R075A  2111-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3812  R075A      EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3813        *******************************************************                                                           
      3814        *** THIS SECTIONS CONTAINS SUBROUTINES OF 2000      ***                                                           
      3815        *** PROCESS  (CASE LEVEL) SECTION.                  ***                                                           
      3816        *** INDIVIDUAL PARA MODULES ARE EXECUTED.           ***                                                           
      3817        *******************************************************                                                           
      3818         2050-SUBS-OF-2000-SECTION SECTION.                                                                               
      3819        *******************************************************                                                           
      3820        *** THIS PARA WUD SEARCH THE WST-CNTY TABLE FOR A   ***                                                           
      3821        *** MATCH ON COUNTY-CODE AND SET THE CNTY INDEX.    ***                                                           
      3822        *** THIS INDEX WUD BE USED TO MAKE A REF IN CNTY-   ***                                                           
      3823        *** CAT TABLE IN PARA 2380.                         ***                                                           
      3824        *******************************************************                                                           
      3825         2050-LOOKUP-CNTY-TAB.                                                                                            
      3826             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-CNTY-FOUND.                                                               
      3827             SET WSI-CNTY-IDX            TO 1.                                                                            
      3828             SEARCH WST-CNTY-TAB VARYING WSI-CNTY-IDX                                                                     
      3829               WHEN WSI-CNTY-IDX > WSH-CNTY-TAB-SIZE                                                                      
      3830  R073              MOVE 'W'             TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      3831                    MOVE 013             TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      3832                    MOVE 'TBL-CNTY'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      3833                    MOVE R666-NBR-CASE   TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      3834                    PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                              
      3835               WHEN WST-CNTY-NBR (WSI-CNTY-IDX) = WSH-CNTY-NBR                                                            
      3836                    MOVE 1               TO WSS-CNTY-FOUND.                                                               
      3837                                                                                                                          
      3838         2050-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3839             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3840                                                                                                                          
      3841        *******************************************************                                                           
      3842        *** THIS PARA WUD PROCESS CHECKPOINT CODE.          ***                                                           
      3843        *** MATCH ON COUNTY-CODE AND SET THE CNTY INDEX.    ***                                                           
      3844        *** THIS INDEX WUD BE USED TO MAKE A REF IN CNTY-   ***                                                           
      3845        *** CAT TABLE IN PARA 2380.                         ***                                                           
      3846        *******************************************************                                                           
      3847         2060-PRO-CHKPT.                                                                                                  
      3848             MOVE 0                      TO WSA-R666-CHKPT-REC-CNT.                                                       
      3849                                                                                                                          
      3850         2060-DISPLAY-STATUS-AT-BEGIN.                                                                                    
      3851             ACCEPT WSH-DATE             FROM DATE.                                                                       
      3852             MOVE WSH-MM                 TO WSH-REP-MM.                                                                   
      3853             MOVE WSH-DD                 TO WSH-REP-DD.                                                                   
      3854             MOVE WSH-YY                 TO WSH-REP-YY.                                                                   
      3855                                                                                                                          
      3856             ACCEPT WSH-TIME             FROM TIME.                                                                       
      3857             MOVE WSH-HH                 TO WSH-REP-HH.                                                                   
      3858             MOVE WSH-MIN                TO WSH-REP-MIN.                                                                  
      3859             MOVE WSH-SS                 TO WSH-REP-SS.                                                                   
      3860                                                                                                                          
      3861             ADD 1                       TO WSA-CHKPT-CNT.                                                                
      3862             DISPLAY 'CHECKPOINT NBR ' WSA-CHKPT-CNT ' '                                                                  
      3863                     'STARTED AT     ' WSH-REP-DATE  ' '                                                                  
      3864                                       WSH-REP-TIME                                                                       
      3865             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                                
      3866                                                                                                                          
      3867         2060-CLOSE-AND-DEPART.                                                                                           
      3868             PERFORM 7050-DB-DEPART                THRU 7050-EXIT.                                                        
      3869                                                                                                                          
      3870         2060-WRITE-ATE01DCKPT.                                                                                           
      3871             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO ATE01DCKPT-RECORD.                                                            
      3872             PERFORM 8895-DET-WRITE-ATE01DCKPT     THRU 8895-EXIT.                                                        
      3873                                                                                                                          
      3874         2060-IMPART-AND-OPEN-DB-AREAS.                                                                                   
      3875             PERFORM 7000-OPEN-DB-AREAS-SECTION.                                                                          
      3876                                                                                                                          
      3877  R069   2060-REPOSITION-R246.                                                                                            
      3878  R069       MOVE  WSH-CASE-NUMBER  TO  R246-NBR-CASE.                                                                    
      3879  R069       PERFORM  7305-FETCH-R246  THRU  7305-EXIT.                                                                   
      3880                                                                                                                          
      3881         2060-DISPLAY-STATUS-AT-END.                                                                                      
      3882             ACCEPT WSH-DATE             FROM DATE.                                                                       
      3883             MOVE WSH-MM                 TO WSH-REP-MM.                                                                   
      3884             MOVE WSH-DD                 TO WSH-REP-DD.                                                                   
      3885             MOVE WSH-YY                 TO WSH-REP-YY.                                                                   
      3886                                                                                                                          
      3887             ACCEPT WSH-TIME             FROM TIME.                                                                       
      3888             MOVE WSH-HH                 TO WSH-REP-HH.                                                                   
      3889             MOVE WSH-MIN                TO WSH-REP-MIN.                                                                  
      3890             MOVE WSH-SS                 TO WSH-REP-SS.                                                                   
      3891                                                                                                                          
      3892             DISPLAY 'CHECKPOINT NBR ' WSA-CHKPT-CNT ' '                                                                  
      3893                     'FINISHED AT    ' WSH-REP-DATE  ' '                                                                  
      3894                                       WSH-REP-TIME                                                                       
      3895                     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                        
      3896                                                                                                                          
      3897         2060-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      3898             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      3899  R065   2065-PROCESS-ASB04B.                                                                                             
      3900  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3901  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2065-PROCESS-ASB04B'  UPON  PRINTER.                                                           
      3902  CC41B**    MOVE  SPACES                TO  ASB04B-BUFF.                                                                 
      3903  CC41B**    MOVE  R666-NBR-CASE         TO  ASB04B-KEY.                                                                  
      3904  CC41B**    MOVE  'C'                   TO  ASB04B-IND.                                                                  
      3905  CC41B**    MOVE  'E'                   TO  ASB04B-N-E-FLAG.                                                             
      3906  CC41B**    MOVE  'ATE01D '             TO  ASB04B-PROG-ID.                                                              
      3907  CC41B**    PERFORM  2070-CALL-ASB04B.                                                                                   
      3908  CC41B**    IF  ASB04B-ERR-NBR  >  ZEROES                                                                                
      3909  CC41B**        PERFORM  2075-ASB04B-ERROR  THRU  2075-EXIT.                                                             
      3910  CC41B *     MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D18-RECORD.                                                             
      3911  CC41B       MOVE  R666-NBR-CASE        TO  D18-KEY.                                                                     
      3912  CC41B       MOVE  'C'                  TO  D18-TYPE.                                                                    
      3913  CC41B       MOVE  'E'                  TO  D18-EXIST.                                                                   
      3914  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      3915  R069            MOVE  'ATE01D '            TO  D18-PROG-ID                                                              
      3916  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      3917  R069            MOVE  'ATF01D '            TO  D18-PROG-ID.                                                             
      3918  R078  *    MOVE  SPACES               TO  D18-REC-CDE.                                                                  
      3919  R078       MOVE 'X' TO D18-EXP-DIRUPD-FLAG.                                                                             
      3920  CC41B       WRITE ATE01D18-RECORD.                                                                                      
      3921  R069       ADD  1  TO  WSA-ATE01D18-REC-CNT.                                                                            
      3922  R065   2065-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      3923  R065       COPY  APB04PP  REPLACING                                                                                     
      3924  R065               XXXX-CALL-ASB04B  BY  2070-CALL-ASB04B.                                                              
COPY  8991        ********************************************************                                                          
COPY  8992        *  THIS PROC IS THE PROCEDURE DIVISION PROC FOR THE    *                                                          
COPY  8993        *  CALL TO ASB04B.  THE WORKING STORAGE PROC IS APB04BP*                                                          
COPY  8994        *  YOU MUST LOAD THE RECIPIENT NUMBER OR CASE IN THE   *                                                          
COPY  8995        *  ASB04B-KEY FIELD.  YOU WILL LOAD A I FOR RECIPIENT  *                                                          
COPY  8996        *  OR A C FOR CASE IN THE ASB04B-IND FIELD.  IF YOU    *                                                          
COPY  8997        *  SUBMIT A CASE THEN LOAD A E OR N IN THE             *                                                          
COPY  8998        *  ASB04B-N-E-FLAG.  IF AN INDIVIDUAL THEN SPACE IN    *                                                          
COPY  8999        *  ASB04B-N-E-FLAG.  FOR CASE YOU CAN SUBMIT A R635 IN *                                                          
COPY  9000        *  THE ASB04B-SPEC-REC FIELD OR A SPACE.  IF A         *                                                          
COPY  9001        *  RECIPIENT YOU CAN SUBMIT SPACES OR R015 OR R016, OR *                                                          
COPY  9002        *  R063 IN THE ASB04B-SPEC-REC.  SINCE THIS FIELD      *                                                          
COPY  9003        *  OCCURS 10 TIMES YOU CAN SUBMIT SPACE OR ANY         *                                                          
COPY  9004        *  COMBINATION UP TO AND INCLUDING ALL 3 VALUES.       *                                                          
COPY  9005        *  ASB04B WILL RETURN A VALUE OF 00 IF NO ERRORS       *                                                          
COPY  9006        *  ENCOUNTERED.  IF AN ERROR YOU WILL GET AN ERROR     *                                                          
COPY  9007        *  NUMBER.  SEE TABLE BELOW.                           *                                                          
COPY  9008        *    00  =  NO ERROR                                                                                              
COPY  9009        *    01  =  CASE / RECIPIENT NOT NUMERIC               *                                                          
COPY  9010        *    02  =  INDICATOR NOT EQUAL TO C OR I              *                                                          
COPY  9011        *    03  =  ASSIGN CASE FILE ERROR                     *                                                          
COPY  9012        *    04  =  COULD NOT DETERMINE THE FILE 'PAYDAY' CALL  *
