COPY  9013        *    05  =  WRITE CASE RECORD ERROR TO MSAM FILE        *                                                         
COPY  9014        *    06  =  REWRITE CASE RECORD ERROR TO MSAM FILE      *                                                         
COPY  9015        *    07  =  INVALID CASE DATA BASE RECORD NAME         *                                                          
COPY  9016        *    08  =  INVALID N / E FLAG                         *                                                          
COPY  9017        *    10  =  ASSIGN INDIVIDUAL MSAM FILE ERROR         *                                                           
COPY  9018        *    11  =  COULD NOT DETERMINE FILE 'AE0011' CALL    *                                                           
COPY  9019        *    12  =  WRITE INDIVIDUAL RECORD ERROR             *                                                           
COPY  9020        *    13  =  REWRITE INDIVIDUAL RECORD ERROR           *                                                           
COPY  9021        *    14  =  INVALID RECIPIENT DATA BASE RECORD        *                                                           
COPY  9022        **********************************************************                                                        
      9023                                                                                                                          
COPY  9024         XXXX-CALL-ASB04B.                                                                                                
COPY  9025             CALL  'ASB04B'  USING  ASB04B-BUFF.                                                                          
      3925  R069       COPY  APB04FP  REPLACING                                                                                     
      3926  R065               XXXX-ASB04B-ERROR    BY  2075-ASB04B-ERROR                                                           
      3927  R065               XXXX-EXIT            BY  2075-EXIT                                                                   
      3928  R065               0000-STOP-RUN        BY  3000-CLOSING                                                                
      3929  R065               FATAL-ERROR-FLAG     BY  SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG                                                         
      3930  R065               ACCTNG-RETURN-STATUS-IND  BY  ASB04B-KEY                                                             
      3931  R069               XXXXXX               BY  WSH-RUN-NAME.                                                               
COPY  9026  WBCCN********* Change Control Number 00001 BY MAJC2                                                                     
COPY  9027        **************************************************************                                                    
COPY  9028        * THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS ARE EXECUTED WHEN AN ERROR        *                                                    
COPY  9029        * CONDITION IS ENCOUNTERED IN THE ASB04B                     *                                                    
COPY  9030        * SUBROUTINE.                                                *                                                    
COPY  9031        *                                                            *                                                    
COPY  9032        *                                                            *                                                    
COPY  9033        *       --  CASE                                             *                                                    
COPY  9034        *         00  =  NO ERROR                                    *                                                    
COPY  9035        *         01  =  CASE / RECIPIENT NOT NUMERIC                *                                                    
COPY  9036        *         02  =  INDICATOR NOT EQUAL TO C OR I               *                                                    
COPY  9037        *         03  =  ASSIGN CASE FILE ERROR                      *                                                    
COPY  9038        *         04  =  COULD NOT DETERMINE THE FILE 'PAYDAY' CALL  *                                                    
COPY  9039        *         05  =  WRITE CASE RECORD ERROR TO MSAM FILE        *                                                    
COPY  9040        *         06  =  REWRITE CASE RECORD ERROR TO MSAM FILE      *                                                    
COPY  9041        *         07  =  INVALID CASE DATABASE RECORD NAME           *                                                    
COPY  9042        *         08  =  INVALID N / E FLAG                          *                                                    
COPY  9043        *                                                            *                                                    
COPY  9044        *       --  INDIVIDUAL                                       *                                                    
COPY  9045        *         10  =  ASSIGN INDIVIDUAL MSAM FILE ERROR           *                                                    
COPY  9046        *         11  =  COULD NOT DETERMINE FILE 'AE0011' CALL      *                                                    
COPY  9047        *         12  =  WRITE INDIVIDUAL RECORD ERROR               *                                                    
COPY  9048        *         13  =  REWRITE INDIVIDUAL RECORD ERROR             *                                                    
COPY  9049        *         14  =  INVALID FLAG                                *                                                    
COPY  9050        *         20  =  INVALID PROGRAM ID                          *                                                    
COPY  9051        *                                                            *                                                    
COPY  9052        **************************************************************                                                    
COPY  9053         XXXX-ASB04B-ERROR.                                                                                               
COPY  9054             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 00                                                                                       
COPY  9055                GO TO XXXX-EXIT.                                                                                          
      9056                                                                                                                          
COPY  9057             DISPLAY ' '     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9058             DISPLAY '**************************************'                                                             
COPY  9059                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9060             DISPLAY '*   '  UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9061             DISPLAY '     THIS PROGRAM HAS ENCOUNTERED AN ERROR'                                                         
COPY  9062                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9063             DISPLAY '     DURING THE ASB04B SUBROUTINE.'                                                                 
COPY  9064                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9065             DISPLAY '*   '  UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9066             DISPLAY '* RCPT OR CASE     = ' ASB04B-KEY                                                                   
COPY  9067                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9068             DISPLAY '* ASB04B-ERR-NBR = ' ASB04B-ERR-NBR                                                                 
COPY  9069                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9070             DISPLAY '*   '  UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9071             DISPLAY '**************************************'                                                             
COPY  9072                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9073             DISPLAY ' '     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
      9074                                                                                                                          
COPY  9075             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 01                                                                                       
COPY  9076                MOVE 206                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9077             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9078             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 02                                                                                       
COPY  9079                MOVE 207                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9080             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9081             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 03                                                                                       
COPY  9082                MOVE 208                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9083             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9084             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 04                                                                                       
COPY  9085                MOVE 209                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9086             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9087             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 05                                                                                       
COPY  9088                MOVE 210                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9089             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9090             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 06                                                                                       
COPY  9091                MOVE 211                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9092             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9093             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 07                                                                                       
COPY  9094                MOVE 219                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9095             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9096             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 08                                                                                       
COPY  9097                MOVE 220                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9098             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9099             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 10                                                                                       
COPY  9100                MOVE 212                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9101             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9102             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 11                                                                                       
COPY  9103                MOVE 213                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9104             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9105             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 12                                                                                       
COPY  9106                MOVE 214                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9107             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9108             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 13                                                                                       
COPY  9109                MOVE 215                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9110             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9111             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 14                                                                                       
COPY  9112                MOVE 216                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9113             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9114             IF ASB04B-ERR-NBR = 20                                                                                       
COPY  9115                MOVE 218                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                         
COPY  9116             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9117                MOVE 005                   TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                        
      9118                                                                                                                          
COPY  9119             MOVE 'ASB04B'                 TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                              
COPY  9120             MOVE ASB04B-ERR-NBR           TO WS-SML-PARM-2-X-2                                                           
COPY  9121             MOVE CPF-CYCLE-DATE           TO WS-SML-CYCLE-DATE                                                           
COPY  9122             MOVE  XXXXXX                  TO WS-SML-RUN-ID                                                               
COPY  9123             MOVE 'F'                      TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                          
COPY  9124             SET FATAL-ERROR-FLAG ON                                                                                      
COPY  9125             CALL 'ASB003' USING SYS-MSG-LIST.                                                                            
COPY  9126             IF WS-SML-BAD                                                                                                
COPY  9127                DISPLAY '*** ASB003-ERROR ***' UPON PRINTER.                                                              
COPY  9128             PERFORM 0000-STOP-RUN.                                                                                       
      9129                                                                                                                          
COPY  9130         XXXX-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      3932                                                                                                                          
      3933        *******************************************************                                                           
      3934        *** THIS SECTIONS CONTROLS PROCESSING OF A BUDGET,  ***                                                           
      3935        *** AND IS PERFORMED CASE-NO-OF-BUDGET TIMES.       ***                                                           
      3936        ***     . PROCESS BUDGET                            ***                                                           
      3937        ***     . FETCH NEXT BUDGET                         ***                                                           
      3938        ***     . END SECTION.                              ***                                                           
      3939        *** CALLING PARA WILL PERFORM IT AGAIN, UNLESS NO   ***                                                           
      3940        *** MORE BUDGETS EXIST.                             ***                                                           
      3941        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      3942        *** IF ITS A 'FUTURE-ONLY' BUDGET, IT WILL BE       ***                                                           
      3943        *** BYPASSED, WITHOUT ANY ERROR MESAGE.             ***                                                           
      3944        *** ELSE, THERE MUST BE A VALID R634 TO A R249.     ***                                                           
      3945        *******************************************************                                                           
      3946         2200-PRO-R249-CM-BDGT-SECTION SECTION.                                                                           
      3947         2200-CHECK-IF-BDGT-CLOSED.                                                                                       
      3948  R070       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-CLOSE-SW.                                                                                 
      3949             IF R249-CDE-STUS-BUDGET = 'O' OR 'S' OR 'C'                                                                  
      3950                NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      3951             ELSE                                                                                                         
      3952                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      3953                MOVE 106                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      3954                MOVE R249-CDE-STUS-BUDGET TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                               
      3955                MOVE R666-NBR-CASE       TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      3956                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      3957  R056          MOVE 2201                TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                               
      3958                PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249            THRU 7310-EXIT                                                         
      3959                GO TO 2200-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3960                                                                                                                          
      3961             IF R249-CDE-STUS-BUDGET = 'C'                                                                                
      3962  R056          MOVE 2202                TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                               
      3963  TEST  *        DISPLAY  '2202 '  R666-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER                                                           
      3964                PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249            THRU 7310-EXIT                                                         
      3965                GO TO 2200-EXIT.                                                                                          
      3966                                                                                                                          
      3967  MD02       IF R249-CDE-CATEGORY = 'J  '                                                                                 
      3968  MD02                           OR 'A  '                                                                                 
      3969  MD02                           OR 'M  '                                                                                 
      3970  MD02           IF JAM-CASH-CATE                                                                                         
      3971  MD02              ADD 1 TO WSA-JAM-CASH-CNT                                                                             
      3972  R056              MOVE 2203           TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                
      3973  TEST  *        DISPLAY  '2203 '  R666-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER                                                           
      3974  MD02               PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249        THRU 7310-EXIT                                                        
      3975  MD02               GO TO 2200-EXIT                                                                                      
      3976  MD02           ELSE                                                                                                     
      3977  MD02           IF JAM-MEDI-CATE                                                                                         
      3978  MD02               ADD 1 TO WSA-JAM-MEDI-CNT.                                                                           
      3979                                                                                                                          
      3980         2200-INITIALIZE-BDGT-SWITCHES.                                                                                   
      3981             PERFORM 2265-INIT-BDGT-SWITCHES       THRU 2265-EXIT.                                                        
      3982                                                                                                                          
      3983         2200-SETUP-ERR-HANDLING.                                                                                         
      3984  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3985  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2200-SETUP-ERR-HANDLING '  UPON  PRINTER.                                                      
      3986             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO WSH-CASE-NUMBER.                                                              
      3987             MOVE R249-CDE-CATEGORY      TO WSH-CDE-CATEGORY.                                                             
      3988             MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT   TO WSH-NBR-GROUP-GRANT.                                                          
      3989                                                                                                                          
      3990  R067   2200-CHECK-R653.                                                                                                 
      3991  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3992  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2200-CHECK-R653 '  UPON  PRINTER.                                                              
      3993  R067       PERFORM  2610-GET-R637  THRU  2610-EXIT.                                                                     
      3994         2200-FETCH-R634.                                                                                                 
      3995  R067       MOVE  2212    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      3996  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      3997  TEST1 *        DISPLAY '2200-FETCH-R634 '  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                              
      3998  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      3999             PERFORM 7320-FETCH-R634               THRU 7320-EXIT.                                                        
      4000                                                                                                                          
      4001             IF NOT WSS-R634-REC-ON                                                                                       
      4002                IF WSS-R634-FUTURE-REC-ON                                                                                 
      4003  R056              MOVE 2204            TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                               
      4004                    PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249        THRU 7310-EXIT                                                         
      4005                    GO TO 2200-EXIT                                                                                       
      4006                ELSE                                                                                                      
      4007                    MOVE 'R634'          TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      4008                    PERFORM 7900-MISSING-RECORD    THRU 7900-EXIT                                                         
      4009  R056              MOVE 2205            TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                               
      4010                    PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249        THRU 7310-EXIT                                                         
      4011                    GO TO 2200-EXIT.                                                                                      
      4012                                                                                                                          
      4013  R014       IF R249-CDE-STUS-BUDGET = R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT                                                                 
      4014  R014          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      4015  R014       ELSE                                                                                                         
      4016  R014          MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      4017  R014          MOVE 106                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      4018  R014          MOVE 'R249/R634'         TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      4019  R014          MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      4020  R014          PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      4021  R014          DISPLAY '* R249 STUS ' R249-CDE-STUS-BUDGET UPON PRINTER                                                  
      4022  R014          DISPLAY '* R634 STUS ' R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT   UPON PRINTER                                                  
      4023  R056          MOVE 2206                TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                               
      4024  R014          PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249            THRU 7310-EXIT                                                         
      4025  R014          GO TO 2200-EXIT.                                                                                          
      4026                                                                                                                          
      4027  R081       IF  ((R249-CDE-CATEGORY  =  'D  '  AND                                                                       
      4028  R081             R634-CDE-STUS-PROG  =  02)  AND                                                                        
      4029  R081            (R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT  >  WSH-2-DEADLINE  AND                                                           
      4030  R081             R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT  <  WSH-3-DEADLINE))                                                              
      4031  R081           PERFORM  2845-CREATE-976-NOTICE  THRU  2845-EXIT.                                                        
      4032         2200-SPECIAL-EDITS.                                                                                              
      4033             PERFORM 2250-SPECIAL-EDITS            THRU 2250-EXIT.                                                        
      4034                                                                                                                          
      4035         2200-SET-CAT-TABLES-IDXS.                                                                                        
      4036  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4037  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2200-SET-CAT-TABLES-IDXS'                                                                      
      4038  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      4039  R067       MOVE  R634-CDE-STUS-PROG  TO  WSH-HOLD-PS.                                                                   
      4040  R062  *    MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-FIX-PROG-STAT.                                                                            
      4041             PERFORM 2255-SEARCH-WST-CAT           THRU 2255-EXIT.                                                        
      4042  R067       IF  WSS-CAT-FOUND  =  0                                                                                      
      4043  R067           PERFORM  2275-CREATE-ATE01DR01  THRU  2275-EXIT                                                          
      4044  R067           PERFORM  7310-FETCH-R249        THRU  7310-EXIT                                                          
      4045  R067           GO  TO  2200-EXIT.                                                                                       
      4046             PERFORM 2260-SEARCH-WST-CAT-ONLY      THRU 2260-EXIT.                                                        
      4047  R067       IF  NOT  WSS-CAT-ONLY-FOUND-ON                                                                               
      4048  R056          MOVE 2207                TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                               
      4049                PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249            THRU 7310-EXIT                                                         
      4050                GO TO 2200-EXIT.                                                                                          
      4051                                                                                                                          
      4052         2200-FETCH-ALTERNATE-RECORDS.                                                                                    
      4053  R067       MOVE  2209    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      4054  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4055  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2200-FETCH-ALTERNATE-RECORDS '                                                                 
      4056  TEST1 *            WSH-ERR-PARA-NO  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                      
      4057             MOVE WSH-R249-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      4058             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      4059             PERFORM 7360-FETCH-R253               THRU 7360-EXIT.                                                        
      4060                                                                                                                          
      4061  R067       MOVE  2210    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      4062             MOVE WSH-R249-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      4063             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      4064             PERFORM 7350-FETCH-R252               THRU 7350-EXIT.                                                        
      4065                                                                                                                          
      4066  R067       MOVE  2211    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      4067             MOVE WSH-R249-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      4068             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      4069             PERFORM 7380-FETCH-R269               THRU 7380-EXIT.                                                        
      4070                                                                                                                          
      4071         2200-CHECK-BUDGET-STATUS.                                                                                        
      4072             IF R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT = 'O'                                                                                  
      4073                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R-ACT-BDGT-CNT                                                            
      4074             ELSE                                                                                                         
      4075             IF R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT = 'S'                                                                                  
      4076                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R-SUS-BDGT-CNT.                                                           
      4077                                                                                                                          
      4078         2200-CLOSING.                                                                                                    
      4079  R003       IF (R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT = 'O' OR 'S')  AND                                                                    
      4080  M313          R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT > 0000000                                                                            
      4081                     PERFORM 2500-CLOSING-SECTION.                                                                        
      4082  R070       IF  M2K-CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM  =  WSH-TDTE-BEG-DTE  OR                                                          
      4083  R070           M2K-CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM  >  WSH-TDTE-BEG-DTE                                                              
      4084  R070           IF  (R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT  =  'O'  OR  'S')  AND                                                           
      4085  R070                WSS-FUT-CLOS  =  'N'                                                                                
      4086  R070               PERFORM  2620-PROCESS-AUTO-DISC  THRU  2620-EXIT.                                                    
      4087  R070       IF  R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT  =  'C'  OR                                                                           
      4088  R070           WSS-CLOSE-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                     
      4089  R070           GO  TO  2200-FETCH-NEXT-R249-CM-BUDGET.                                                                  
      4090                                                                                                                          
      4091         2200-ISSUANCE.                                                                                                   
      4092  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4093  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2200-CLOSING '  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                 
      4094             PERFORM 2300-ISSUANCE-SECTION.                                                                               
      4095         2200-FETCH-NEXT-R249-CM-BUDGET.                                                                                  
      4096  R056       MOVE 2208                   TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                              
      4097  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4098  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  'WSH-ERR-PARA-NO = '  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                           
      4099  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      4100  R056       IF WSS-R249-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      4101  R056          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      4102  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      4103                PERFORM 7310-FETCH-R249     THRU 7310-EXIT.                                                               
      4104                                                                                                                          
      4105         2200-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4106             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4107                                                                                                                          
      4108        *******************************************************                                                           
      4109        *** THIS SECTIONS CONTAINS SUBROUTINES OF 2200      ***                                                           
      4110        *** BUDGET-PROCESSING SECTION.                      ***                                                           
      4111        *** INDIVIDUAL PARA MODULES ARE EXECUTED.           ***                                                           
      4112        *******************************************************                                                           
      4113         2250-SUBS-OF-2200-SECTION SECTION.                                                                               
      4114                                                                                                                          
      4115        *******************************************************                                                           
      4116        *** IF THE BUDGET IS OPEN , THERE MUST BE ACTIVE    ***                                                           
      4117        *** MEMBERS IN IT.                                  ***                                                           
      4118        *******************************************************                                                           
      4119         2250-SPECIAL-EDITS.                                                                                              
      4120             IF R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT = 'O' AND                                                                              
      4121                R634-CNT-MEM-ACT < 1                                                                                      
      4122                   MOVE 'W'              TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      4123                   MOVE 111              TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      4124                   MOVE R634-CNT-MEM-ACT TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      4125                   MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      4126                   PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                              
      4127                                                                                                                          
      4128         2250-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4129             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4130        *******************************************************                                                           
      4131        *** THIS PARA WUD SEARCH THE WST-CAT TABLE FOR A    ***                                                           
      4132        *** MATCH ON CATEGORY CODE & PROGRAM-STATUS.        ***                                                           
      4133        *******************************************************                                                           
      4134         2255-SEARCH-WST-CAT.                                                                                             
      4135             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-CAT-FOUND.                                                                
      4136             SET WSI-CAT-IDX             TO 1.                                                                            
      4137             SEARCH WST-CAT-TAB VARYING WSI-CAT-IDX                                                                       
      4138               WHEN WSI-CAT-IDX > WSH-CAT-TAB-SIZE                                                                        
      4139  R073              MOVE 'W'             TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      4140  R067              MOVE 013             TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      4141  R067              MOVE 'TBL-CAT'       TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      4142  R067              MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                               
      4143  R067              PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                              
      4144               WHEN WST-CAT-CODE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = R249-CDE-CATEGORY   AND                                                  
      4145  R067              WST-CAT-PGM-STATUS (WSI-CAT-IDX) = WSH-HOLD-PS                                                        
      4146                    MOVE 1               TO WSS-CAT-FOUND                                                                 
      4147  R067               GO  TO  2255-EXIT.                                                                                   
      4148         2255-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4149             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4150                                                                                                                          
      4151        *******************************************************                                                           
      4152        *** THIS PARA WUD SEARCH THE WST-CAT-ONLY TABLE FOR ***                                                           
      4153        *** A MATCH ON CATEGORY CODE.                       ***                                                           
      4154        *** WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX THUS SET WUD BE USED TO MAKE   ***                                                           
      4155        *** A REF INTO CNTY-CAT TABLE IN PARA 2380.         ***                                                           
      4156        *******************************************************                                                           
      4157         2260-SEARCH-WST-CAT-ONLY.                                                                                        
      4158             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-CAT-ONLY-FOUND.                                                           
      4159             SET WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX        TO 1.                                                                            
      4160             SEARCH WST-CAT-ONLY-TAB VARYING WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX                                                             
      4161               WHEN WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX > WSH-CAT-ONLY-TAB-SIZE                                                              
      4162  R073              MOVE 'W'             TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      4163                    MOVE 013             TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      4164                    MOVE 'TBL-CAT-ONLY'  TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      4165                    MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                               
      4166                    PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                              
      4167               WHEN R249-CDE-CATEGORY = WST-CAT-ONLY (WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX)                                                   
      4168                    MOVE 1               TO WSS-CAT-ONLY-FOUND.                                                           
      4169                                                                                                                          
      4170         2260-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4171             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4172                                                                                                                          
      4173        ***********************************************                                                                   
      4174        *** INITIALIZE BUDGET LEVEL SWITCHES. THEY  ***                                                                   
      4175        *** WUD BE INITIALIZED FOR EVERY BUDGET.    ***                                                                   
      4176        ***********************************************                                                                   
      4177         2265-INIT-BDGT-SWITCHES.                                                                                         
      4178             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R246-EP-SWITCHES.                                                         
      4179             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R637-EP-SWITCHES.                                                         
      4180             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R270-EP-SWITCHES.                                                         
      4181             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R249-EP-REC-SWITCHES.                                                     
      4182             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R637-EP-REC-SWITCHES.                                                     
      4183             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R270-EP-REC-SWITCHES.                                                     
      4184             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R256-SWITCHES.                                                            
      4185             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-BDGT-SWITCHES.                                                            
      4186                                                                                                                          
      4187         2265-INIT-WST-NBR-INDIV-TAB.                                                                                     
      4188             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSH-NBR-TAB-SIZE.                                                             
      4189                                                                                                                          
      4190         2265-INIT-S105-TAB.                                                                                              
      4191             PERFORM 2270-INIT-WST-S105-DET-TAB    THRU 2270-EXIT                                                         
      4192                     VARYING WSI-S105-REC-IDX  FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL                                                          
      4193                     WSI-S105-REC-IDX > 6.                                                                                
      4194                                                                                                                          
      4195         2265-INIT-R256-TABLES.                                                                                           
      4196             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WST-R256-GRP-ALLOWS-SPL-TABLE.                                                
      4197             MOVE LOW-VALUES             TO WST-R256-DBK-TABLE.                                                           
      4198             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSH-R256-DBK-TAB-SIZE.                                                        
      4199                                                                                                                          
      4200         2265-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4201             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4202                                                                                                                          
      4203        ****************************************************                                                              
      4204        *** INIT WST-S105-REC-DETAILS-TAB.               ***                                                              
      4205        *** THE TWO OCCURENCES ARE INITED EXPLICITLY     ***                                                              
      4206        *** TO SAVE ON A NESTED LOOP.                    ***                                                              
      4207        ****************************************************                                                              
      4208         2270-INIT-WST-S105-DET-TAB.                                                                                      
      4209             MOVE 0                      TO WST-REC-SW                                                                    
      4210                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   1).                                                       
      4211             MOVE 0                      TO WST-REC-DBK                                                                   
      4212                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   1).                                                       
      4213  M313       MOVE 0000000                TO WST-REC-DTE-BGN                                                               
      4214                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   1).                                                       
      4215                                                                                                                          
      4216             MOVE 0                      TO WST-REC-SW                                                                    
      4217                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   2).                                                       
      4218             MOVE 0                      TO WST-REC-DBK                                                                   
      4219                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   2).                                                       
      4220  M313       MOVE 0000000                TO WST-REC-DTE-BGN                                                               
      4221                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   2).                                                       
      4222                                                                                                                          
      4223         2270-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4224             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4225  R067   2275-CREATE-ATE01DR01.                                                                                           
      4226  R067       IF  WSA-LINE-CNT  >  55                                                                                      
      4227  R067           PERFORM  2280-PRINT-HEADING  THRU  2280-EXIT.                                                            
      4228  R067       ADD  1  TO  WSA-CAT-PSC-DROP.                                                                                
      4229  R067       MOVE  R666-NBR-CASE      TO  WSR-DE1-01-CASE.                                                                
      4230  R067       MOVE  R249-CDE-CATEGORY  TO  WSR-DE1-01-CAT.                                                                 
      4231  R067       MOVE  R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT  TO  WSR-DE1-01-GG.                                                               
      4232  R067       MOVE  R634-CDE-STUS-PROG    TO  WSR-DE1-01-PSC.                                                              
      4233  R067       WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC  FROM  WSR-DE1-01  AFTER  1.                                                            
      4234  R067       ADD  1  TO  WSA-LINE-CNT.                                                                                    
      4235  R067   2275-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      4236  R067   2280-PRINT-HEADING.                                                                                              
      4237  R067       ADD  1  TO  WSA-PAGE-CNT.                                                                                    
      4238  R067       MOVE  WSA-PAGE-CNT  TO  WSR-HD3-PAGE-NO-01.                                                                  
      4239  R067       IF  WSA-PAGE-CNT  =  1                                                                                       
      4240  R067           WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC  FROM  WSR-HD1-01                                                                   
      4241  R067       ELSE                                                                                                         
      4242  R067           WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC    FROM  WSR-HD1-01  AFTER  PAGE.                                                   
      4243  R067       WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC    FROM  WSR-HD2  AFTER  1.                                                             
      4244  R067       WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC    FROM  WSR-HD3-01  AFTER  1.                                                          
      4245  R067       WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC    FROM  WSR-HD4  AFTER  1.                                                             
      4246  R067       WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC    FROM  WSR-HD5  AFTER  1.                                                             
      4247  R067       WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC    FROM  WSR-HD6-01  AFTER  2.                                                          
      4248  R067       MOVE  SPACES  TO  ATE01DR01-REC.                                                                             
      4249  R067       WRITE  ATE01DR01-REC  AFTER  1.                                                                              
      4250  R067       MOVE  8    TO  WSA-LINE-CNT.                                                                                 
      4251  R067   2280-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      4252                                                                                                                          
      4253        ****************************************************                                                              
      4254        *** THIS SECTION CONTAINS THE DRIVER CODE FOR    ***                                                              
      4255        *** BOTH CHECK & MAID ISSUANCE PARAS. FOLLOWING  ***                                                              
      4256        *** THIS SECION WILL BE ITS SUBROUTINES/SUB-     ***                                                              
      4257        *** PARAS SECTION.                               ***                                                              
      4258        *** CAT-TYPE OF THE BUDGET DECIDES IF THE        ***                                                              
      4259        *** BUDGET IS BOTH CASH AND MEDICAL OR IT IS     ***                                                              
      4260        *** MEDICAL ONLY.                                ***                                                              
      4261        ***                                              ***                                                              
      4262        *** FOR CASH BUDGETS, ALSO CHECK IF ANY          ***                                                              
      4263        *** OVERRIDE REC EXISTS. IF IT DOES, THAT AMT    ***                                                              
      4264        *** WUD BE USED, AND WUD OVERRIDE REGULAR        ***                                                              
      4265        *** BENEFIT AMT.                                 ***                                                              
      4266        ***                                              ***                                                              
      4267        *** ALL S105 SET MEMBERS ARE FETCHED IN          ***                                                              
      4268        *** AN OPTIMISED WAY AND NOT RECORD-BY-RECORD.   ***                                                              
      4269        ****************************************************                                                              
      4270                                                                                                                          
      4271        *******************************************************                                                           
      4272        *** WST-INDIV-TABLE.                                ***                                                           
      4273        ***   IF ITS A SUSPENDED, CLOSED, MONTHLY-OR-QRTRLY-***                                                           
      4274        ***   IN-WRONG-PAYDAY-PERIOD, MAID ISSNC IS NOT DONE***                                                           
      4275        ***   & WST-R268-NBR-TAB WILL NOT BE BUILT.         ***                                                           
      4276        ***   SO WST IS TO BE BUILT EXCLUSIVELY FOR MAID-   ***                                                           
      4277        ***   BYPASSED CASES TOO.                           ***                                                           
      4278        *******************************************************                                                           
      4279         2300-ISSUANCE-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                   
      4280         2300-ISSUANCE-EXTRACT.                                                                                           
      4281  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4282  TEST1 *    DISPLAY  '2300-ISSUANCE-EXTRACT '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                       
      4283  TEST1 *       R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                             
      4284  R064       MOVE  'N'    TO  WSH-R255-OTI.                                                                               
      4285  R013       IF (WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = 0 ) OR                                                                      
      4286  R013          ( WSH-FIRST-HALF AND                                                                                      
      4287  R069          (WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = 2 OR 3))                                                                    
      4288  R056          MOVE  'N'      TO WS-TANIF-WS-REC                                                                         
      4289                PERFORM 2310-CASH-ISSUANCE-DRIVER  THRU 2310-EXIT.                                                        
      4290                                                                                                                          
      4291             PERFORM 2360-MAID-ISSUANCE-DETAIL     THRU 2360-EXIT.                                                        
      4292  R035       PERFORM 2320-WRITE-BUILD-INDIV-TABLE  THRU 2320-EXIT.                                                        
      4293  R080 ******* IF  R249-CDE-STUS-BUDGET  =  'S'                                                                           
      4294  R080 *******     NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                         
      4295  R080 ******* ELSE                                                                                                       
      4296  R080 *******     IF  WSH-R255-OTI  =  'Y'  AND                                                                          
      4297  R080 *******         WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD = 0                                                                     
      4298  R080 *******         PERFORM  8610-WRITE-ATE01D17  THRU  8610-EXIT.                                                     
      4299                                                                                                                          
      4300             PERFORM 2390-FUTURE-CLOSE-INDIVS      THRU 2390-EXIT.                                                        
      4301  R069       IF  WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX)  =  1                                                                         
      4302  R069           PERFORM  8518-OPEN-BUDGET-COUNTS  THRU  8518-EXIT.                                                       
      4303                                                                                                                          
      4304         2300-EXIT-SECTION.                                                                                               
      4305             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4306                                                                                                                          
      4307        *******************************************************                                                           
      4308        *** THIS SECTIONS CONTAINS SUBROUTINES OF 2300      ***                                                           
      4309        *** ISSUANCE SECTION.                               ***                                                           
      4310        *** INDIVIDUAL PARA MODULES ARE EXECUTED.           ***                                                           
      4311        *******************************************************                                                           
      4312         2310-SUBS-OF-2300-SECTION SECTION.                                                                               
      4313        *******************************************************                                                           
      4314        *** CASH ISSUANCE DRIVER.                           ***                                                           
      4315        *** GET R255 MANDATORY RECORD AND CHECK FOR PRESENCE***                                                           
      4316        *** OF ANY OVERRIDE RECORD TOO.                     ***                                                           
      4317        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      4318        *** IF THE BUDGET IS TO BE CLOSED BEFORE THE NEXT   ***                                                           
      4319        *** PAYMENT DAY, PRO-RATE THE AMOUNT.               ***                                                           
      4320        *******************************************************                                                           
      4321         2310-CASH-ISSUANCE-DRIVER.                                                                                       
      4322             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4323                                                                                                                          
      4324         2310-FETCH-R255.                                                                                                 
      4325  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4326  TEST1 *    DISPLAY  '2310-FETCH-R255 '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                             
      4327  TEST1 *       R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                             
      4328             MOVE WSH-R249-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      4329  R067       MOVE  2310    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      4330  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4331  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  'WSH-ERR-PARA-NO = '  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                           
      4332  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      4333             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      4334             PERFORM 7370-FETCH-R255               THRU 7370-EXIT.                                                        
      4335                                                                                                                          
      4336  R069       IF  R249-CDE-CATEGORY  =  'SC '

      4338  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      4339                IF NOT WSS-R255-REC-ON

      4341                   MOVE 'R255'           TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      4342                   PERFORM 7900-MISSING-RECORD     THRU 7900-EXIT

      4344  R064       MOVE  R255-CASH-GRANT  TO  WSH-R255-REC.

      4365         2310-CALC-PRO-RATE-PAY.                                                                                          
      4366  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'

      4368             IF WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON

      4372                   )

      4374  R056                                                                                                                    
      4375  R067       MOVE  2312    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      4376  R066       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-R654-FOUND.                                                                               
      4377  R067       MOVE  0  TO  WSS-R653-REC  WSS-R637-REC.                                                                     
      4378  R066       PERFORM  7600-FETCH-R637  THRU  7600-EXIT.                                                                   
      4379  R066       IF  WSS-R637-REC  =  1                                                                                       
      4380  R067           MOVE  2313    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                        
      4381  R067           PERFORM  7625-FET-DET-R653  THRU  7625-EXIT.                                                             
      4382  R066       IF  WSS-R653-REC  =  1                                                                                       
      4383  R067           MOVE  2314    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                        
      4384  R066           PERFORM  7645-FET-DET-R654  THRU  7645-EXIT.                                                             
      4385  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4386  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  'PAYDAY = '                                                                                     
      4387  TEST1 *        PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC

      4390  TEST1 *            ' R249-CDE-CATEGORY = '  R249-CDE-CATEGORY                                                           
      4391  TEST1 *                UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                   
      4392  CC43       IF (PAYDAY-NBR IN FIRST-PAYDAY IN PAYDAY-REC > 10)                                                           
      4393  R056           NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                            
      4394  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      4395  R056          IF (R249-CDE-STUS-BUDGET = 'S')                                                                           
      4396  R056              NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                         
      4397  R056          ELSE                                                                                                      
      4398  R056             IF (R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH  >  010.00)                                                                    
      4399  R056                IF (R249-CDE-CATEGORY = 'C' OR 'U')                                                                 
      4400  R056                    MOVE ZEROS          TO TANIF-WS-SUB                                                             
      4401  R056                                           CISMOE-CNT                                                               
      4402  R056                                           TANIF-BGN-R634                                                           
      4403  R056                                           TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG

      4405  R056                    MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT TO CISMOE-GG                                                          
      4406  R056                    MOVE R634-CDE-STUS-PROG   TO CISMOE-PROG-STAT                                                   
      4407  R056                    PERFORM 2332-PROCESS-CISMOE THRU 2332-EXIT.                                                     
      4408                                                                                                                          
      4409         2310-CHECK-ISSUANCE-DETAIL.                                                                                      
      4410  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'

      4427  R038       MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-REC.                                                                 
      4428  R038       MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-EOS.                                                                 
      4429  R064       MOVE  ZEROES  TO  WSH-R268-FIRST-RCPT.                                                                       
      4430  R067       MOVE  2320    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      4431             PERFORM 7450-FETCH-R268      THRU 7450-EXIT                                                                  
      4432                     UNTIL WSS-R268-REC-ON OR                                                                             
      4433                           WSS-R268-EOS-ON.                                                                               
      4434                                                                                                                          
      4435             SET WSI-NBR-IDX        TO 1.                                                                                 
      4436  R039       MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-EOS.                                                                 
      4437  R053       MOVE  'N'                   TO WSS-CLOCK-INDIV-SW                                                            
      4438  R053                                      WSS-ALERT-NOTICE-SW                                                           
      4439  R077                                      WSS-ALERT-NOTICE-SW-D                                                         
      4440  R077                                      WSS-ALERT-NOTICE-SW-PD

      4442  R077                                      WSS-CLOSE-CLOCK-SW-D

      4448             SET WSI-NBR-IDX             DOWN BY 1.                                                                       
      4449             SET WSH-NBR-TAB-SIZE        TO WSI-NBR-IDX.                                                                  
      4450                                                                                                                          
      4451  R077  *    IF (YES-ALERT-NOTICE)                                                                                        
      4452  R077  *       IF (YES-CLOSE-CLOCK)
