      4869  R053       IF (CIS014-DV-CLOCKS > HOLD-GA-DAYS)                                                                         
      4870  R053           DISPLAY 'EXCEEDED MAX DAYS = ' CIS014-DV-CLOCKS                                                          
      4871  R053                                          UPON PRINTER                                                              
      4872  R053           MOVE HOLD-GA-DAYS TO CIS014-DV-CLOCKS.                                                                   
      4873  R053***    ELSE                                                                                                         
      4874  R053***        ADD HOLD-PAYDAY-DIFF      TO CIS014-DV-CLOCKS.                                                           
      4875  R053                                                                                                                    
      4876  R053       SUBTRACT CIS014-DV-CLOCKS FROM HOLD-GA-DAYS                                                                  
      4877  R053         GIVING HOLD-GA-DAYS-LEFT.                                                                                  
      4878  R053                                                                                                                    
      4879  R053       MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE      TO HOLD-RECUR-PAYDATE.                                                           
      4880  R053       ADD HOLD-GA-DAYS-LEFT       TO HOLD-RECUR-PAYDATE.                                                           
      4881  R053       MOVE HOLD-RECUR-PAYDATE     TO HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE.                                                             
      4882  R053                                                                                                                    
      4883  R053       MOVE HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE       TO HOLD-CALC-JUL-R.                                                              
      4884  R053       PERFORM 2329-CHECK-JUL-DATE THRU 2329-EXIT.                                                                  
      4885  R053       MOVE HOLD-CALC-JUL-R        TO HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE.                                                             
      4886  R053                                                                                                                    
      4887  R053                                                                                                                    
      4888  R053       IF (HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE < WSH-2-PAYDATE)                                                                        
      4889  R053           MOVE WSH-2-PAYDATE      TO WSH-CLCK-CLS-JUL                                                              
      4890  R053           MOVE WSH-CLCK-CLS-JUL   TO R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT                                                          
      4891  R077  *        MOVE  'N'               TO WSS-ALERT-NOTICE-SW                                                           
      4892  R077           MOVE  'N'               TO WSS-ALERT-NOTICE-SW-D                                                         
      4893  R053           MOVE  'N'               TO WSS-CLOCK-INDIV-SW                                                            
      4894  R053           MOVE  'Y'               TO WSS-CLOSE-CLOCK-SW                                                            
      4895  R053                                      WSS-CLOSE-CLOCK-SW-D                                                          
      4896  R053           MOVE 'N' TO WSS-DA-DV-SW                                                                                 
      4897  R053           GO TO 2327-EXIT.                                                                                         
      4898  R053                                                                                                                    
      4899  R053       IF (HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE > WSH-3-PAYDATE)                                                                        
      4900  R053           MOVE 'N' TO WSS-DA-DV-SW                                                                                 
      4901  R053           GO TO 2327-EXIT.                                                                                         
      4902  R053                                                                                                                    
      4903  R053       MOVE 'Y' TO WSS-DA-DV-SW.                                                                                    
      4904  R062       MOVE  HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE  TO  WSH-GA-EXP-DATE.                                                                 
      4905  R053   2327-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4906  R053       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4907  R053                                                                                                                    
      4908  R053   2328-DV-MEDICAL-CALC.                                                                                            
      4909  R053       IF (CIS014-DV-CLOCKS = ZEROS)                                                                                
      4910  R053           GO TO 2328-EXIT.                                                                                         
      4911  R053                                                                                                                    
      4912  R054       ADD  15  TO CIS014-DV-CLOCKS.                                                                                
      4913  R053                                                                                                                    
      4914  R053       IF  CIS014-DV-CLOCKS > HOLD-GA-DAYS                                                                          
      4915  R053           DISPLAY 'EXCEEDED MAX DAYS = ' CIS014-DV-CLOCKS                                                          
      4916  R053                                          UPON PRINTER                                                              
      4917  R053           MOVE HOLD-GA-DAYS TO CIS014-DV-CLOCKS.                                                                   
      4918  R054                                                                                                                    
      4919  R053       SUBTRACT CIS014-DV-CLOCKS FROM HOLD-GA-DAYS                                                                  
      4920  R053         GIVING HOLD-GA-DAYS-LEFT.                                                                                  
      4921  R053                                                                                                                    
      4922  R053       MOVE WSH-RECUR-DEADLINE     TO HOLD-RECUR-DEADLINE.                                                          
      4923  R053       ADD HOLD-GA-DAYS-LEFT       TO HOLD-RECUR-DEADLINE.                                                          
      4924  R053       MOVE HOLD-RECUR-DEADLINE    TO HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE.                                                             
      4925  R053                                                                                                                    
      4926  R053       MOVE HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE       TO HOLD-CALC-JUL-R.                                                              
      4927  R053       PERFORM 2329-CHECK-JUL-DATE THRU 2329-EXIT.                                                                  
      4928  R053       MOVE HOLD-CALC-JUL-R        TO HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE.                                                             
      4929  R053                                                                                                                    
      4930  R053       IF (HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE < WSH-2-DEADLINE)                                                                       
      4931  R053           MOVE WSH-CPF-CYCLE-JUL      TO WSH-CLCK-CLS-JUL                                                          
      4932  R053           ADD HOLD-GA-DAYS-LEFT       TO WSH-CLCK-CLS-JUL                                                          
      4933  R053           MOVE WSH-CLCK-CLS-JUL       TO HOLD-CALC-JUL-R                                                           
      4934  R053           PERFORM 2329-CHECK-JUL-DATE THRU 2329-EXIT                                                               
      4935  R053           MOVE HOLD-CALC-JUL-R        TO WSH-CLCK-CLS-JUL                                                          
      4936  R054           MOVE WSH-CLCK-CLS-JUL       TO M2K-CONV-JUL-DT                                                           
      4937  R054           MOVE 1                      TO M2K-IN-DAYS                                                               
      4938  R054           MOVE 0                      TO M2K-IN-YR                                                                 
      4939  R054           PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K                                                                         
      4940  R054           MOVE M2K-CONV-JUL-DT        TO R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT                                                      
      4941  R054                                          WSH-CLCK-CLS-JUL                                                          
      4942  R077  *        MOVE  'N'                   TO WSS-ALERT-NOTICE-SW                                                       
      4943  R077           MOVE  'N'                   TO WSS-ALERT-NOTICE-SW-PD                                                    
      4944  R053           MOVE  'N'                   TO WSS-CLOCK-INDIV-SW                                                        
      4945  R053           MOVE  'Y'                   TO WSS-CLOSE-CLOCK-SW                                                        
      4946  R077                                          WSS-CLOSE-CLOCK-SW-PD                                                     
      4947  R053           MOVE 'N' TO WSS-DA-DV-SW                                                                                 
      4948  R053           GO TO 2328-EXIT.                                                                                         
      4949  R053                                                                                                                    
      4950  R053       IF (HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE > WSH-3-DEADLINE)                                                                       
      4951  R053           MOVE 'N' TO WSS-DA-DV-SW                                                                                 
      4952  R053           GO TO 2328-EXIT.                                                                                         
      4953  R053                                                                                                                    
      4954  R053       MOVE 'Y' TO WSS-DA-DV-SW.                                                                                    
      4955  R062       MOVE  HOLD-GA-EXP-DATE  TO  WSH-GA-EXP-DATE.                                                                 
      4956  R053   2328-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4957  R053       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4958  R053                                                                                                                    
      4959  R053   2329-CHECK-JUL-DATE.                                                                                             
      4960  R053       IF (CALC-JUL-DD > 365)                                                                                       
      4961  R053           ADD    1            TO CALC-JUL-YY                                                                       
      4962  R053           SUBTRACT 365        FROM CALC-JUL-DD                                                                     
      4963  R053             GIVING HOLD-OVER-DAYS                                                                                  
      4964  R053           MOVE CALC-JUL-YY    TO NEXT-JUL-YY                                                                       
      4965  R053           MOVE HOLD-OVER-DAYS TO NEXT-JUL-DD                                                                       
      4966  R053           MOVE HOLD-NEXT-JUL-R TO HOLD-CALC-JUL-R.                                                                 
      4967  R053   2329-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      4968  R053       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      4969                                                                                                                          
      4970  R056   2332-PROCESS-CISMOE.                                                                                             
      4971  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4972  TEST1 *    DISPLAY  '2332-PROCESS-CISMOE '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                         
      4973  TEST1 *      R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                              
      4974  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4975  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  'WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON = '                                                              
      4976  TEST1 *            WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD UPON PRINTER.                                                             
      4977  R056       IF (WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON)                                                                           
      4978  R056           GO TO 2332-EXIT.                                                                                         
      4979  R056                                                                                                                    
      4980  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4981  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  'WSS-R654-FOUND '  WSS-R654-FOUND                                                               
      4982  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      4983  R066       IF  WSS-R654-FOUND  =  'Y'                                                                                   
      4984  R066           IF  ((R654-CDE-EDBC-OVRD-NF    = 'Z')   AND                                                              
      4985  R066               (R654-CDE-RSN-OVRD-NF  =  900  OR  903  OR  906))                                                    
      4986  R066               GO  TO  2332-EXIT.                                                                                   
      4987  R066       IF  WSS-R654-FOUND  =  'Y'                                                                                   
      4988  R066           IF  ((R654-CDE-EDBC-OVRD-RESRC = 'Z')   AND                                                              
      4989  R066               (R654-CDE-RSN-OVRD-RESRC  =  900  OR  903  OR  906))                                                 
      4990  R066               GO  TO  2332-EXIT.                                                                                   
      4991  R066       IF  WSS-R654-FOUND  =  'Y'                                                                                   
      4992  R066           IF  ((R654-CDE-EDBC-OVRD-INC   = 'Z')  AND                                                               
      4993  R066               (R654-CDE-RSN-OVRD-INC  =  900  OR  903  OR  906))                                                   
      4994  R066               GO TO 2332-EXIT.                                                                                     
      4995  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      4996  TEST1 *        DISPLAY 'CISMOE-PROG-STAT = '  CISMOE-PROG-STAT                                                          
      4997  TEST1 *            UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      4998  R064       IF  CISMOE-PROG-STAT  =  71  OR  72                                                                          
      4999  R064           GO  TO  2332-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5000  R056                                                                                                                    
      5001  R062  *    IF  WSS-FIX-PROG-STAT  =  'Y'                                                                                
      5002  R062  *        NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      5003  R062  *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      5004  R062           IF (CISMOE-PROG-STAT = 00 OR 07 OR 08 OR                                                                 
      5005  R062                                  53 OR 57 OR 58 OR 59)                                                             
      5006  R062               NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                        
      5007  R062            ELSE                                                                                                    
      5008  R062               GO TO 2332-EXIT.                                                                                     
      5009  R056                                                                                                                    
      5010  R056       MOVE 'N'                    TO WS-TANIF-WS-REC.                                                              
      5011  R056       MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO CISMOE-CASE.                                                                  
      5012  R061       MOVE  WSH-PAYMENT-DATE  TO  CISMOE-PAY-DATE.                                                                 
      5013  R056       ADD  1                      TO WSA-CISMOE-CALL-CNT.                                                          
      5014  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5015  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  'BEFORE CALL CISMOE '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                      
      5016  TEST1 *            R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                        
      5017  R056       CALL 'CISMOE' USING CISMOE-BUFFER.                                                                           
      5018  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5019  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  'AFTER CALL CISMOE '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                       
      5020  TEST1 *            R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                        
      5021  R062  *    IF  WSS-FIX-PROG-STAT  =  'Y'                                                                                
      5022  R062  *        MOVE  CISMOE-PROG-STAT  TO  D15-CISMOE-PREV-STAT                                                         
      5023  R062  *        MOVE  00                TO  TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG                                                          
      5024  R062  *        MOVE  'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'  TO  WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                         
      5025  R062  *        PERFORM  7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC  THRU  7100-EXIT                                                           
      5026  R062  *        MOVE  TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG  TO  R634-CDE-STUS-PROG                                                        
      5027  R062  *        MOVE  R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV  TO  TANIF-BGN-R634                                                              
      5028  R062  *        PERFORM  7328-MODIFY-R634  THRU  7328-EXIT                                                               
      5029  R062  *        PERFORM  2339-STORE-MODIFY-R634  THRU  2339-EXIT                                                         
      5030  R062  *        PERFORM  2334-CISMOE-DATA  THRU  2334-EXIT                                                               
      5031  R062  *        GO  TO  2332-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5032  R056                                                                                                                    
      5033  R057       IF (CISMOE-PROG-STAT  = 59)                                                                                  
      5034  R057           MOVE CISMOE-PROG-STAT        TO D15-CISMOE-PREV-STAT                                                     
      5035  R057           MOVE  09                     TO TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG                                                      
      5036  R057           MOVE 'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'   TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                          
      5037  R057           PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC THRU 7100-EXIT                                                              
      5038  R057           MOVE TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG     TO R634-CDE-STUS-PROG                                                       
      5039  R057           MOVE R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO TANIF-BGN-R634                                                           
      5040  R067           MOVE  2333    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                        
      5041  R057           PERFORM 7328-MODIFY-R634     THRU 7328-EXIT                                                              
      5042  R057           PERFORM 2339-STORE-MODIFY-R634 THRU 2339-EXIT                                                            
      5043  R057           PERFORM 2334-CISMOE-DATA THRU 2334-EXIT                                                                  
      5044  R057           GO TO 2332-EXIT.                                                                                         
      5045  R057                                                                                                                    
      5046  R056       IF (CISMOE-ERR > ZEROS)                                                                                      
      5047  R061           MOVE  1  TO  TANIF-WS-SUB                                                                                
      5048  R057           PERFORM 2335-MOVE-ATE01D13  THRU 2335-EXIT                                                               
      5049  R057                                 CISMOE-CNT TIMES                                                                   
      5050  R056           ADD  1                  TO WSA-CISMOE-ERROR-CNT                                                          
      5051  R056           GO TO 2332-EXIT.                                                                                         
      5052  R056                                                                                                                    
      5053  R056       IF (CISMOE-WPR-STATUS = 'X')                                                                                 
      5054  R056           ADD  1                  TO WSA-CISMOE-X-CNT.                                                             
      5055  R056

      5058  R056

      5062  R056              MOVE  00                       TO TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG

      5066  R056              MOVE R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO TANIF-BGN-R634                                                        
      5067  R067              MOVE  2334    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                     
      5068  R056              PERFORM 7328-MODIFY-R634     THRU 7328-EXIT                                                           
      5069  R056              PERFORM 2339-STORE-MODIFY-R634 THRU 2339-EXIT                                                         
      5070  R056          ELSE                                                                                                      
      5071  R056          IF (CISMOE-PROG-STAT  = 57)                                                                               
      5072  R056              MOVE CISMOE-PROG-STAT          TO D15-CISMOE-PREV-STAT                                                
      5073  R056              MOVE  07                       TO TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG                                                 
      5074  R056              MOVE 'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                   
      5075  R056              PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC THRU 7100-EXIT                                                           
      5076  R056              MOVE TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG     TO R634-CDE-STUS-PROG                                                    
      5077  R056              MOVE R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO TANIF-BGN-R634                                                        
      5078  R067              MOVE  2335    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                     
      5079  R056              PERFORM 7328-MODIFY-R634     THRU 7328-EXIT                                                           
      5080  R056              PERFORM 2339-STORE-MODIFY-R634 THRU 2339-EXIT                                                         
      5081  R056          ELSE                                                                                                      
      5082  R056          IF (CISMOE-PROG-STAT  = 58)                                                                               
      5083  R056              MOVE CISMOE-PROG-STAT          TO D15-CISMOE-PREV-STAT                                                
      5084  R056              MOVE  08                       TO TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG                                                 
      5085  R056              MOVE 'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                   
      5086  R056              PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC THRU 7100-EXIT                                                           
      5087  R056              MOVE TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG     TO R634-CDE-STUS-PROG                                                    
      5088  R056              MOVE R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO TANIF-BGN-R634                                                        
      5089  R067              MOVE  2336    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                     
      5090  R056              PERFORM 7328-MODIFY-R634     THRU 7328-EXIT                                                           
      5091  R056              PERFORM 2339-STORE-MODIFY-R634 THRU 2339-EXIT                                                         
      5092  R056          ELSE                                                                                                      
      5093  R056          IF (CISMOE-PROG-STAT  = 59)                                                                               
      5094  R056              MOVE CISMOE-PROG-STAT          TO D15-CISMOE-PREV-STAT                                                
      5095  R056              MOVE  09                       TO TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG

      5099  R056              MOVE R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO TANIF-BGN-R634                                                        
      5100  R067              MOVE  2337    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO

      5103  R056          ELSE

      5107  R056                                    CISMOE-CNT TIMES

      5156  R056              MOVE CISMOE-PROG-STAT          TO TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG                                                 
      5157  R056              MOVE  1  TO TANIF-WS-SUB                                                                              
      5158  R056              PERFORM 2335-MOVE-ATE01D13  THRU 2335-EXIT                                                            
      5159  R056                                    CISMOE-CNT TIMES                                                                
      5160  R056              GO TO  2332-EXIT.                                                                                     
      5161  R056                                                                                                                    
      5162  R056       PERFORM 2334-CISMOE-DATA THRU 2334-EXIT.                                                                     
      5163  R056   2332-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      5164  R056       EXIT.

      5346  R056   2339-STORE-MODIFY-R634.                                                                                          
      5347  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5348  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2339-STORE-MODIFY-R634 '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                  
      5349  TEST1 *            R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                        
      5350  R067       MOVE  2342    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5351  R056       PERFORM 2339D-FIND-CURRENT-R249  THRU 2339D-EXIT.                                                            
      5352  R056       PERFORM 2339E-FETCH-R634    THRU 2339E-EXIT.                                                                 
      5353  R056       IF (WSS-R634-EOS-ON)                                                                                         
      5354  R056           GO TO 2339-EXIT.                                                                                         
      5355  R056                                                                                                                    
      5356  R056       PERFORM 2339C-PROCESS-R634  THRU 2339C-EXIT.                                                                 
      5357  R056       PERFORM 2339B-NEXT-R634     THRU 2339B-EXIT                                                                  
      5358  R056                                   UNTIL WSS-R634-EOS-ON.                                                           
      5359  R056                                                                                                                    
      5360  R056       MOVE 'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'  TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      5361  R056       PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                                 
      5362  R056       MOVE CISMOE-CASE            TO ATE01D09-NBR-CASE.                                                            
      5363  R056       MOVE CISMOE-CAT             TO ATE01D09-CDE-CATEGORY.                                                        
      5364  R056       MOVE CISMOE-GG              TO ATE01D09-NBR-GROUP-GRANT.                                                     
      5365  R056       MOVE 'R634'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      5366  R056       MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      5367  R056       MOVE ZEROS                  TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1                                                        
      5368  R056                                      ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2                                                        
      5369  R056                                      ATE01D09-DD-BANK-ORIG

      5374  R056                                                                                                                    
      5375  R056   2339B-NEXT-R634.                                                                                                 
      5376  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5377  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2339B-NEXT-R634 '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                         
      5378  TEST1 *            R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.

      5380  R056       PERFORM 2339E-FETCH-R634    THRU 2339E-EXIT.                                                                 
      5381  R056       IF (WSS-R634-EOS-ON)                                                                                         
      5382  R056           GO TO 2339B-EXIT.                                                                                        
      5383  R056                                                                                                                    
      5384  R056       PERFORM 2339C-PROCESS-R634  THRU 2339C-EXIT.                                                                 
      5385  R056   2339B-EXIT.                                                                                                      
      5386  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5387  R056                                                                                                                    
      5388  R056   2339C-PROCESS-R634.                                                                                              
      5389  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5390  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2339C-PROCESS-R634 '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                      
      5391  TEST1 *            R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                        
      5392  R056       IF (R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV > TANIF-BGN-R634)                                                                      
      5393  R056           MOVE 'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                      
      5394  R056           PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC THRU 7100-EXIT                                                              
      5395  R056           MOVE TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG  TO R634-CDE-STUS-PROG                                                          
      5396  R067           MOVE  2344    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                        
      5397  R056           PERFORM 7328-MODIFY-R634  THRU 7328-EXIT                                                                 
      5398  R056           GO TO 2339C-EXIT.                                                                                        
      5399  R056                                                                                                                    
      5400  R056       IF (R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV = TANIF-BGN-R634)                                                                      
      5401  R056          IF (R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV < WSH-PAYMENT-DATE)                                                                 
      5402  R056               NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                        
      5403  R056          ELSE                                                                                                      
      5404  R056              MOVE 1 TO WSS-R634-EOS                                                                                
      5405  R056              GO TO 2339C-EXIT                                                                                      
      5406  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      5407  R056           MOVE 1 TO WSS-R634-EOS                                                                                   
      5408  R056           GO TO 2339C-EXIT.                                                                                        
      5409  R056                                                                                                                    
      5410  R056       MOVE 'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                         
      5411  R056       PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                                 
      5412  R056       MOVE  WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE     TO R634-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                            
      5413  R056       MOVE CISMOE-PROG-STAT       TO R634-CDE-STUS-PROG.                                                           
      5414  R067       MOVE  2345    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5415  R070       PERFORM 7330-STORE-R634     THRU 7330-EXIT.                                                                  
      5416  R056                                                                                                                    
      5417  R056       PERFORM 2339F-FETCH-PRIOR-R634 THRU 2339F-EXIT.                                                              
      5418  R056       MOVE 'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                         
      5419  R056       PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                                 
      5420  R056       MOVE ZEROS                  TO R634-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                            
      5421  R056       MOVE WSH-PAYMENT-DATE       TO R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV.                                                            
      5422  R056       MOVE WS-SYSTEM-HHMMSS       TO R634-TME-ACTN.                                                                
      5423  R056       MOVE WSH-CPF-CYCLE-JUL      TO R634-DTE-CHNG.                                                                
      5424  R056       MOVE TANIF-NEW-STUS-PROG    TO R634-CDE-STUS-PROG.                                                           
      5425  R056       MOVE 471                    TO R634-CDE-REASON-STUS.                                                         
      5426  R056       MOVE 99999                  TO R634-CDE-AUTH-CHG-BDGT.                                                       
      5427  R056       MOVE SPACES                 TO R634-CDE-TYPE-NOTICE                                                          
      5428  R056                                      R634-CDE-OPTION-NOTICE                                                        
      5429  R056                                      R634-CDE-STUS-NOTICE.                                                         
      5430  R056       MOVE 471                    TO R634-CDE-RSN-NOTICE.                                                          
      5431  R056       MOVE WSH-CPF-CYCLE-JUL      TO R634-DTE-CHANGE-HIPAA.                                                        
      5432  R056       MOVE 'F'                    TO R634-CDE-ACTN-BDGT.                                                           
      5433  R067       MOVE  2346    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5434  R056       PERFORM 7328-MODIFY-R634    THRU 7328-EXIT.                                                                  
      5435  R056       MOVE 1 TO WSS-R634-EOS.                                                                                      
      5436  R056   2339C-EXIT.                                                                                                      
      5437  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5438  R056                                                                                                                    
      5439  R056   2339D-FIND-CURRENT-R249.                                                                                         
      5440  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5441  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2339D-FIND-CURRENT-R249 '  R666-NBR-CASE                                                       
      5442  TEST1 *            '  '  R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                  
      5443  R067       MOVE  2347    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5444  R056       FIND CURRENT RECORD                                                                                          
      5445  R056           WITHIN R249-CASH-MEDICAL-BUDGET RECORD.                                                                  
      5446  R056       IF ERROR-STATUS = '000000'                                                                                   
      5447  R056          MOVE 0 TO WSS-R249-EOS                                                                                    
      5448  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      5449  R056          IF ERROR-NUM = '0006' OR '0007' OR '0013'                                                                 
      5450  R056             MOVE 1 TO WSS-R249-EOS                                                                                 
      5451  R056          ELSE                                                                                                      
      5452  R056             PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                                  
      5453  R056   2339D-EXIT.                                                                                                      
      5454  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5455  R056                                                                                                                    
      5456  R056   2339E-FETCH-R634.                                                                                                
      5457  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5458  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2339E-FETCH-R634 '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                        
      5459  TEST1 *            R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                        
      5460  R067       MOVE  2348    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5461  R056        FETCH NEXT R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO                                                                              
      5462  R056             WITHIN S396-CM-BDGT-INFO SET.                                                                          
      5463  R056        IF ERROR-STATUS = '000000'                                                                                  
      5464  R056           MOVE 0 TO WSS-R634-EOS                                                                                   
      5465  R056        ELSE                                                                                                        
      5466  R056           IF ERROR-NUM = '0006' OR '0007' OR '0013'                                                                
      5467  R056              MOVE 1 TO WSS-R634-EOS                                                                                
      5468  R056           ELSE                                                                                                     
      5469  R056              PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                                 
      5470  R056   2339E-EXIT.                                                                                                      
      5471  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5472  R056                                                                                                                    
      5473  R056   2339F-FETCH-PRIOR-R634.                                                                                          
      5474  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5475  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2339F-FETCH-PRIOR-R634 '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                  
      5476  TEST1 *            R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                        
      5477  R067       MOVE  2349    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5478  R056        FETCH PRIOR R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO                                                                             
      5479  R056             WITHIN S396-CM-BDGT-INFO SET.                                                                          
      5480  R056        IF ERROR-STATUS = '000000'                                                                                  
      5481  R056           MOVE 0 TO WSS-R634-EOS                                                                                   
      5482  R056        ELSE                                                                                                        
      5483  R056           IF ERROR-NUM = '0006' OR '0007' OR '0013'                                                                
      5484  R056              MOVE 1 TO WSS-R634-EOS                                                                                
      5485  R056           ELSE                                                                                                     
      5486  R056              PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                                 
      5487  R056   2339F-EXIT.                                                                                                      
      5488  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5489  R056                                                                                                                    
      5490        *******************************************************                                                           
      5491        *** DETAIL CALCULATION OF PRORATED PAY MODULE.      ***                                                           
      5492        *** PRO-AMT AND PRO-CONSTANT ARE BUILT BY PROC &    ***                                                           
      5493        *******************************************************                                                           
      5494        *** DETAIL CALCULATION OF PRORATED PAY MODULE.      ***                                                           
      5495        *** PRO-AMT AND PRO-CONSTANT ARE BUILT BY PROC &    ***                                                           
      5496        *** THEN COPY PROC APR813 IS USED FOR DETAIL CALC.  ***                                                           
      5497        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      5498        *** IF NO OF PRORATED DAYS TURN OUT > 14, THEN      ***                                                           
      5499        *** ROUND OFF TO NEAREST 5 CENTS, & ISSUE MESSAGES. ***                                                           
      5500        *** HOWEVER, KEEP GOING & MAKE ISSUANCE.            ***                                                           
      5501        *******************************************************                                                           
      5502         2340-CALC-PRO-RATE-PAY.                                                                                          
      5503             IF WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                           
      5504                COMPUTE WS-PRORATION-AMT ROUNDED = R654-AMT-GR-CASH / 2.0                                                 
      5505             ELSE                                                                                                         
      5506                COMPUTE WS-PRORATION-AMT ROUNDED =                                                                        
      5507                                                R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH / 2.0.                                                
      5508                                                                                                                          
      5509             IF WS-PRO-DAYS > 14                                                                                          
      5510                ADD .05                  TO WS-PRORATION-AMT                                                              
      5511                MOVE ZERO                TO WS-PRO-C-2                                                                    
      5512                GO TO 2340-EXIT.                                                                                          
      5513                                                                                                                          
      5514  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5515  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2340-AMT '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '  R246-NBR-CASE                                                 
      5516  TEST1 *            '  '  WS-PRORATION-AMT  UPON  PRINTER.                                                               
      5517         2340-CALC-DETAIL.                                                                                                
      5518             COPY APR813P.                                                                                                
COPY  9131        *                                                                                                                 
COPY  9132        * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *                                                                 
COPY  9133        *                                                                                                                 
COPY  9134        *                                                                                                                 
COPY  9135        *                                                                                                                 
COPY  9136        *                                                                                                                 
COPY  9137        *     THIS PROCEDURE WILL PRORATE A MONTHLY RECURRING                                                             
COPY  9138        *   CASH GRANT AMOUNT.   IT REQUIRES THE USER TO PROVIDE                                                          
COPY  9139        *   THE NUMBER OF DAYS (WS-PRO-DAYS) AND THE AMOUNT                                                               
COPY  9140        *   TO BE PRORATED (WS-PRORATION-AMT).   THIS PROC                                                                
COPY  9141        *   IS USED IN CONJUNCTION WITH WORKING STORAGE PROC (APR308P).                                                   
COPY  9142        *                                                                                                                 
COPY  9143        * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *                                                                 
COPY  9144        *                                                                                                                 
COPY  9145        *                                                                                                                 
COPY  9146             IF WS-PRO-DAYS =  1 OR 3 OR 5 OR 9 OR 11 OR 13                                                               
COPY  9147                MOVE 15.21740 TO WS-PRO-CONST                                                                             
COPY  9148                GO TO PRO-CALC.                                                                                           
COPY  9149             IF PRO-C < 49                                                                                                
COPY  9150                OR PRO-C > 60                                                                                             
COPY  9151                MOVE 15.21740 TO WS-PRO-CONST                                                                             
COPY  9152                GO TO PRO-CALC.                                                                                           
COPY  9153             MOVE 15.21739 TO WS-PRO-CONST.                                                                               
COPY  9154         PRO-CALC.                                                                                                        
COPY  9155             COMPUTE WS-PRO-QUOT = PRO-TEN / WS-PRO-CONST.                                                                
COPY  9156             COMPUTE WS-PRO-PROD ROUNDED = WS-PRO-QUOT * WS-PRO-DAYS.                                                     
COPY  9157             COMPUTE WS-PRO-PROD-1 ROUNDED =                                                                              
COPY  9158                                 PRO-HUND * WS-PRO-PCT (WS-PRO-DAYS).                                                     
COPY  9159             COMPUTE WS-PRORATION-AMT = WS-PRO-PROD + WS-PRO-PROD-1.                                                      
COPY  9160             COMPUTE WS-PRORATION-AMT = WS-PRORATION-AMT + .05.                                                           
COPY  9161             MOVE ZERO     TO     WS-PRO-C-2.                                                                             
      5519                                                                                                                          
      5520         2340-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      5521             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5522                                                                                                                          
      5523        *******************************************************                                                           
      5524        *** CHEQUE ISSUANCE MODULE.                         ***                                                           
      5525        ***     . CHECK IF BANK NOS HV CHANGED, IF YES :    ***                                                           
      5526        ***           . MODIFY R255 FOR DATES.              ***                                                           
      5527        ***           . STORE A NEW R255.                   ***                                                           
      5528        ***     . WRITE ATE01D05 RECORDS                    ***                                                           
      5529        ***     . FETCH R270/R271 RECOUPMENT RECORDS        ***                                                           
      5530        ***     . WRITE ATE01D01 RECORDS.                   ***                                                           
      5531        *******************************************************                                                           
      5532         2350-CHECK-ISSUANCE-DETAIL.                                                                                      
      5533  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5534  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2350-CHECK-ISSUANCE-DETAILS '  R666-NBR-CASE                                                   
      5535  TEST1 *            '  '  R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                  
      5536             IF WSH-SECOND-HALF AND                                                                                       
      5537                ( WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = 2 OR 3 )                                                                   
      5538                    GO TO 2350-EXIT.                                                                                      
      5539                                                                                                                          
      5540  R069       IF NOT WSS-R255-REC-ON                                                                                       
      5541  R069          GO TO 2350-EXIT.                                                                                          
      5542                                                                                                                          
      5543             IF WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON      AND                                                                    
      5544                NOT WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON                                                                            
      5545                    GO TO 2350-EXIT.                                                                                      
      5546                                                                                                                          
      5547             IF WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON         AND                                                                    
      5548                WS-PRORATION-AMT = 0                                                                                      
      5549                    GO TO 2350-EXIT.                                                                                      
      5550                                                                                                                          
      5551         2350-FETCH-R270-R271.                                                                                            
      5552  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      5553  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '2350-FETCH-R270-R271 '  R666-NBR-CASE  '  '                                                    
      5554  TEST1 *            R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                        
      5555             IF NOT WSS-R258-REC-ON                                                                                       
      5556                GO TO 2350-FETCH-R270-R271-EXIT.                                                                          
      5557                                                                                                                          
      5558  R067       MOVE  2350    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5559             PERFORM 7700-FETCH-R270               THRU 7700-EXIT.                                                        
      5560             IF NOT WSS-R270-REC-ON                                                                                       
      5561                MOVE 'R270'              TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      5562                PERFORM 7900-MISSING-RECORD        THRU 7900-EXIT                                                         
      5563                GO TO 2350-FETCH-R270-R271-EXIT.                                                                          
      5564                                                                                                                          
      5565  R067       MOVE  2351    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5566             PERFORM 7720-FETCH-R271               THRU 7720-EXIT.                                                        
      5567             IF NOT WSS-R271-REC-ON                                                                                       
      5568                MOVE 'R271'              TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      5569                PERFORM 7900-MISSING-RECORD        THRU 7900-EXIT.                                                        
      5570                                                                                                                          
      5571         2350-FETCH-R270-R271-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5572             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5573                                                                                                                          
      5574         2350-WRITE-ATE01D01-ATE01D07.                                                                                    
      5575  TEST1 *        IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                   
      5576  TEST1 *        DISPLAY '2350-WRITE-ATE01D01-D07 '  R666-NBR-CASE                                                        
      5577  TEST1 *            '  '  R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER.                                                                  
      5578             IF R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT = 'O'                                                                                  
      5579                   MOVE 1                TO WSS-BDGT-CASH-ISSNC                                                           
      5580                   PERFORM 8510-WRITE-ATE01D01     THRU 8510-EXIT                                                         
      5581             ELSE                                                                                                         
      5582  R069           IF  (WSH-FIRST-HALF AND WSH-QUARTERLY)                                                                   
      5583  R069              IF  R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT   =  'S'                                                                       
      5584  R069                   PERFORM  8510-WRITE-ATE01D01  THRU  8510-EXIT.                                                   
      5585  R069       IF  WSS-R258-REC-ON  AND                                                                                     
      5586  R069           R258-CDE-STATUS-RCOUPMT  NOT  =  01                                                                      
      5587  R069           MOVE  0  TO  WSS-R258-REC                                                                                
      5588  R069                        WSS-R270-REC                                                                                
      5589  R069                        WSS-R271-REC.                                                                               
      5590  R069       IF  WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON                                                                               
      5591  R069           IF  WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                      
      5592  R069               MOVE  WS-PRORATION-AMT  TO  R654-AMT-GR-CASH                                                         
      5593  R069           ELSE                                                                                                     
      5594  R069               MOVE  WS-PRORATION-AMT  TO  R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH.                                                     
      5595  R069       IF  WSS-BDGT-MAND-REC-MISSING-ON                                                                             
      5596  R069           GO  TO  2350-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5597  R069       IF  R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT  =  'O'                                                                               
      5598  R069           IF  WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                      
      5599  R069               IF  R654-AMT-GR-CASH  <  10.0                                                                        
      5600  R069                   PERFORM  2355-ADD-AGRZER  THRU  2355-EXIT                                                        
      5601  R069               ELSE                                                                                                 
      5602  R069                   NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                   
      5603  R069           ELSE                                                                                                     
      5604  R069               IF  R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH  <  10.0                                                                     
      5605  R069                   PERFORM  2355-ADD-AGRZER  THRU  2355-EXIT.                                                       
      5606  R069       IF  R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT  =  'S'  AND                                                                          
      5607  R069           WSS-R258-REC-ON                                                                                          
      5608  R069           PERFORM  2355-ADD-AGRZER  THRU  2355-EXIT.                                                               
      5609  R069A *    IF R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT = 'S'           AND                                                                    
      5610  R069A *        WSS-R258-REC-ON                                                                                          
      5611  R069A *        PERFORM 8570-WRITE-ATE01D07     THRU 8570-EXIT.                                                          
      5612  R069A *                                                                                                                 
      5613  R069A *2350-WRITE-LT-10-TO-D07.                                                                                         
      5614  R069A *    IF R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT  = 'O'                                                                                 
      5615  R069A *       IF WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                        
      5616  R069A *          IF R654-AMT-GR-CASH < 10.0                                                                             
      5617  R069A *             PERFORM 8570-WRITE-ATE01D07  THRU 8570-EXIT                                                         
      5618  R069A *          ELSE                                                                                                   
      5619  R069A *             NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                       
      5620  R069A *       ELSE                                                                                                      
      5621  R069A *       IF R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH < 10.00                                                                            
      5622  R069A *          PERFORM 8570-WRITE-ATE01D07     THRU 8570-EXIT.                                                        
      5623                                                                                                                          
      5624  R064  *    IF  WSH-R255-OTI  =  'Y'                                                                                     
      5625  R064  *        PERFORM  8610-WRITE-ATE01D17  THRU  8610-EXIT.                                                           
      5626         2350-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      5627             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5628  R069   2355-ADD-AGRZER.                                                                                                 
      5629  R069       IF  WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                          
      5630  R069           IF  R654-AMT-GR-CASH  <  10.0                                                                            
      5631  R069               ADD  1  TO  WSA-R-MGA-LT-10-CNT                                                                      
      5632  R069           ELSE                                                                                                     
      5633  R069               ADD  1  TO  WSA-R-AGRZER-CNT                                                                         
      5634  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      5635  R069           IF  R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH  <  10.0                                                                         
      5636  R069               ADD  1  TO  WSA-R-MGA-LT-10-CNT                                                                      
      5637  R069           ELSE                                                                                                     
      5638  R069               ADD  1  TO  WSA-R-AGRZER-CNT.                                                                        
      5639  R069   2355-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      5640                                                                                                                          
      5641        *******************************************************                                                           
      5642        *** MAID ISSUANCE MODULE.                           ***                                                           
      5643        ***     . CHECK PAYMENT MONTH AND PAYDAY NUMBERS    ***                                                           
      5644        ***     . FETCH R260/R262 BULK MAILING/ HMO RECORDS.***                                                           
      5645        ***     . WRITE ATE01D02 RECORDS.                   ***                                                           
      5646        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      5647        ***     . ALSO BUILD D03 FILE FROM R268 RECORDS.    ***                                                           
      5648        ***       AND THE WST TABLE THAT IS USED TO BUILD   ***                                                           
      5649        ***       R396 IN HISTORY AREA.                     ***                                                           
      5650        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      5651        ***     . COUNT HOW MANY 'OPEN', MEDICAL-ONLY       ***                                                           
      5652        ***       BUDGETS CAME IN FOR PROCESSING.           ***                                                           
      5653        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      5654        ***     . GENERALLY ALL CASH CATEGORIES ALSO RECV   ***                                                           
      5655        ***       MEDICAL & MEDICAL-ONLY DO NOT RECV CASH.  ***                                                           
      5656        ***       HOWEVER, IF MAID CARD IS NOT BEING ISSUED,***                                                           
      5657        ***       MAID-BYPASSED SW WILL BE SET, THIS SW WILL***                                                           
      5658        ***       BE TESTED SUBSEQUENTLY AND TABLE BUILT.   ***                                                           
      5659        *******************************************************                                                           
      5660         2360-MAID-ISSUANCE-DETAIL.                                                                                       
      5661  R030       MOVE WSH-R249-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      5662  R067       MOVE  2360    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5663  R030       PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      5664  R069A *    PERFORM 7400-FETCH-R260               THRU 7400-EXIT.                                                        
      5665  R030                                                                                                                    
      5666  R030       MOVE WSH-R249-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      5667  R030       PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      5668                                                                                                                          
      5669             IF WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = 1                                                                            
      5670                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R-MAID-ONLY-CNT.                                                          
      5671                                                                                                                          
      5672             IF WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON      AND                                                                    
      5673                NOT WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON                                                                            
      5674                    MOVE 1               TO WSS-BDGT-MAID-BYPASSED                                                        
      5675                    GO TO 2360-EXIT.                                                                                      
      5676                                                                                                                          
      5677             IF WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON         AND                                                                    
      5678                WS-PRORATION-AMT = 0                                                                                      
      5679                    MOVE 1               TO WSS-BDGT-MAID-BYPASSED                                                        
      5680                    GO TO 2360-EXIT.                                                                                      
      5681                                                                                                                          
      5682             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-BDGT-MAID-ISSNC.                                                          
      5683  R069       IF  WSS-BDGT-MAND-REC-MISSING-ON                                                                             
      5684  R069           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      5685  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      5686  R069           ADD  1  TO  WSA-ATE01D02-BLK-CNT.                                                                        
      5687                                                                                                                          
      5688  R069A *2360-WRITE-ATE01D02.
