      5689  R069A *    PERFORM 8520-WRITE-ATE01D02           THRU 8520-EXIT.                                                        
      5690                                                                                                                          
      5691         2360-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      5692             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5693                                                                                                                          
      5694        *******************************************************                                                           
      5695        *** THIS PARA BUILDS THE NBR-LINE-INDIV TABLE FROM  ***                                                           
      5696        *** R268 RECORDS. OVERFLOW CONDITION WILL BE        ***                                                           
      5697        *** DETECTED AND SWITCH 23 WILL BE SET, WITH A      ***                                                           
      5698        *** WARNING MSG DISPLAYED.                          ***                                                           
      5699        *** IF NO OVERFLOW, THEN :                          ***                                                           
      5700        ***    . BUILD TABLE AND FETCH NEXT R268.           ***                                                           
      5701        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      5702        *** IT CAN BE CALLED FROM EITHER MAID-ISSNC PARA,   ***                                                           
      5703        *** WHEN TABLE WILL BE BULIT AND D03 FILE WILL BE   ***                                                           
      5704        *** WRITTEN    OR,                                  ***                                                           
      5705        *** IF ITS A SUSPENDED OR 2500-CLOSED BDGT, THEN    ***                                                           
      5706        *** TABLE WILL BE BUILT, BUT DO3 WILL NOT BE        ***                                                           
      5707  R069  *** WRITTEN.                                  -                                                                   
      5708        *******************************************************                                                           
      5709         2370-BUILD-WST-NBR-LINE-TAB.                                                                                     
      5710             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5711                                                                                                                          
      5712         2370-CHECK-OVERFLOW.                                                                                             
      5713             IF WSI-NBR-IDX > WSH-NBR-TAB-MAX-SIZE                                                                        
      5714                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      5715  R043          DISPLAY 'LINE NUMBER TABLE SIZE EXCEEDED '                                                                
      5716  R043                              UPON PRINTER                                                                          
      5717                MOVE 049                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      5718                MOVE 'TAB-NBR-LIN'       TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      5719                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      5720                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      5721                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R268-EOS                                                                  
      5722                GO TO 2370-EXIT.                                                                                          
      5723                                                                                                                          
      5724         2370-DETAIL-MOVE.                                                                                                
      5725             MOVE R268-NBR-INDIV         TO WST-NBR-INDIV                                                                 
      5726                                            (WSI-NBR-IDX).                                                                
      5727             MOVE R268-NBR-LINE-INDIV    TO WST-NBR-LINE-INDIV                                                            
      5728                                            (WSI-NBR-IDX).                                                                
      5729  R053       IF (R249-CDE-CATEGORY = 'D' OR 'PD')                                                                         
      5730  R053           PERFORM 2321-PROCESS-CIS014 THRU 2321-EXIT.                                                              
      5731  R053                                                                                                                    
      5732         2370-WRITE-ATE01D02.                                                                                             
      5733  R069A *    IF WSS-BDGT-MAID-ISSNC-ON                                                                                    
      5734  R069A *       PERFORM 8530-WRITE-ATE01D02        THRU 8530-EXIT.                                                        
      5735  R038       IF WSS-BDGT-CASH-ISSNC-ON                                                                                    
      5736  R035          PERFORM 8535-WRITE-ATE01D01        THRU 8535-EXIT.                                                        
      5737                                                                                                                          
      5738         2370-FETCH-NEXT-R268.                                                                                            
      5739             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-REC.                                                                 
      5740             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-EOS.                                                                 
      5741             PERFORM 7450-FETCH-R268               THRU 7450-EXIT                                                         
      5742                     UNTIL WSS-R268-REC-ON OR                                                                             
      5743                           WSS-R268-EOS-ON.                                                                               
      5744             SET WSI-NBR-IDX             UP BY 1.                                                                         
      5745                                                                                                                          
      5746         2370-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      5747             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5748                                                                                                                          
      5749        ******************************************************                                                            
      5750        *** FUTURE CLOSE INDIVIDUALS CLOSE MODULE.         ***                                                            
      5751        ***    . CRITERION FOR FETCH :                     ***                                                            
      5752        ***        . END-DATE = PAYMENT DATE - 1           ***                                                            
      5753        ***          (SET IN HOUSEKEEPING)                 ***                                                            
      5754        ***    . FOR EACH SUCH R268 REC FETCHED , WRITE IT ***                                                            
      5755        ***      TO ATE01D05 FILE AS TRANS TYPE 'I'.       ***                                                            
      5756        ******************************************************                                                            
      5757         2390-FUTURE-CLOSE-INDIVS.                                                                                        
      5758             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5759                                                                                                                          
      5760         2390-FETCH-FIRST-R268.                                                                                           
      5761             MOVE WSH-R249-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      5762             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      5763             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-REC.                                                                 
      5764             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-EOS.                                                                 
      5765             PERFORM 7460-FETCH-FUTURE-CLOSE-R268  THRU 7460-EXIT                                                         
      5766                     UNTIL WSS-R268-REC-ON OR                                                                             
      5767                           WSS-R268-EOS-ON.                                                                               
      5768                                                                                                                          
      5769         2390-PRO-ALL-FUTURE-CLOSE-IND.                                                                                   
      5770             PERFORM 2395-PRO-ALL-FUTURE-CLOSE-IND THRU 2395-EXIT                                                         
      5771                     UNTIL WSS-R268-EOS-ON.                                                                               
      5772                                                                                                                          
      5773         2390-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      5774             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5775                                                                                                                          
      5776        ******************************************************                                                            
      5777        *** THIS PARA IS A SUBROUTINE OF 2390-FUTURE-CLOSE ***                                                            
      5778        *** AND IS A LOOP PROCESS.                         ***                                                            
      5779        ***    . ONCE ENTERED, IT PERFORMS                 ***                                                            
      5780        ***         . WRITE TO ATE01D05                    ***                                                            
      5781        ***         . READS NEXT R268                      ***                                                            
      5782        ***         . EXITS                                ***                                                            
      5783        ******************************************************                                                            
      5784         2395-PRO-ALL-FUTURE-CLOSE-IND.                                                                                   
      5785             PERFORM 8550-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-I    THRU 8550-EXIT.                                                        
      5786                                                                                                                          
      5787         2395-FETCH-NEXT-R268.                                                                                            
      5788             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-REC.                                                                 
      5789             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R268-EOS.                                                                 
      5790             PERFORM 7460-FETCH-FUTURE-CLOSE-R268  THRU 7460-EXIT                                                         
      5791                     UNTIL WSS-R268-REC-ON OR                                                                             
      5792                           WSS-R268-EOS-ON.                                                                               
      5793                                                                                                                          
      5794         2395-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      5795             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5796                                                                                                                          
      5797  R069   2400-SEARCH-TCAT  SECTION.                                                                                       
      5798  R069   2400-FIND-MC-CATEGORY.                                                                                           
      5799  R069       IF  TCAT-CDE-CATEGORY (MC-IDX)  =  WS-CATE                                                                   
      5800  R069           MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-TCAT-FOUND-SW                                                                         
      5801  R069           MOVE  TCAT-TCAT-PGM (MC-IDX)  TO  WS-TCAT-PGM.                                                           
      5802        *******************************************************                                                           
      5803        *** THIS SECTION DEFINES THE BUDGET CLOSING OP.     ***                                                           
      5804        *** IF THE BUDGET IS TO BE CLOSED SOMEWHERE         ***                                                           
      5805        *** IN THE FUTURE, NOT WITHIN SPECIFIED TIME LIMIT, ***                                                           
      5806        *** LEAVE IT ALONE.                                 ***                                                           
      5807        *** ELSE, WRITE A ATE01D05-BUDGET-TYPE RECORD,      ***                                                           
      5808        *** INDICATING ( TO ATE042D  ) THAT THIS            ***                                                           
      5809        *** BUDGET NEEDS TO BE CLOSED/UPDATED.              ***                                                           
      5810        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      5811        *** IF BUDGET IS GETTING CLOSED, A NEW R289 SHUD    ***                                                           
      5812        *** BE WRITTEN IN HISTORY AREA.                     ***                                                           
      5813        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      5814        *** IF IT IS GETTING PRORATED IN THIS TERM, ALSO    ***                                                           
      5815        *** PERFORM CLOSING OF THIS BUDGET.                 ***                                                           
      5816        *** PRO-RATION IS DONE ONLY IF THE BUDGET IS        ***                                                           
      5817        *** GETTING CLOSED BEFORE NEXT PAYMENT DATE - 1.    ***                                                           
      5818        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      5819  R027  *** CLOSE SUSPENDED BUDGETS BACK TO SUSPEND-DATE.   ***                                                           
      5820  R027  *** CLOSE DATE IS ALWAYS POSTED AS THE DAY BEFORE   ***                                                           
      5821  R027  *** PAYMENT DAY AND THEREFORE CLOSE IT ON PYMT DAY. ***                                                           
      5822        *******************************************************                                                           
      5823         2500-CLOSING-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                    
      5824         2500-CHECK-IF-CLOSED.                                                                                            
      5825  R064       MOVE  SPACES  TO  WS-CATE                                                                                    
      5826  R064                         WSS-TCAT-FOUND-SW                                                                          
      5827  R064                         WS-TCAT-PGM.                                                                               
      5828  R064       MOVE  R249-CDE-CATEGORY  TO  WS-CATE.                                                                        
      5829  R064       PERFORM  2400-FIND-MC-CATEGORY  VARYING  MC-IDX                                                              
      5830  R064           FROM  1  BY  1  UNTIL  MC-IDX  >  TCAT-OCCURS-COUNT  OR                                                  
      5831  R064               TCAT-FOUND.                                                                                          
      5832  R074       IF  R634-CDE-REASON-STUS  =  440                                                                             
      5833  R074           IF  R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT  <  WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE                                                           
      5834  R074               MOVE  1  TO  WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD                                                              
      5835  R074               ADD  1  TO  WSA-R-LIN-CLOSES                                                                         
      5836  R074               MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-CLOSE-SW                                                                          
      5837  R074               PERFORM  8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B  THRU  8554-EXIT                                                 
      5838  R074               GO  TO  2500-EXIT-SECTION.                                                                           
      5839  R050       IF (R249-CDE-CATEGORY = 'TA' OR 'TJ') AND                                                                    
      5840  R050          R634-CDE-STUS-PROG = 68 AND                                                                               
      5841  R050          R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT < WSH-3-PAYDATE                                                                      
      5842  R050            MOVE 1                 TO WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD                                                    
      5843  R050            PERFORM 8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B    THRU 8554-EXIT                                                    
      5844  R050       ELSE                                                                                                         
      5845  M307       IF R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT = WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE                                                                  
      5846                  MOVE 1                 TO WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD                                                    
      5847  R025            IF WSS-BDGT-SUSPEND-ON                                                                                  
      5848  M307               MOVE WSH-SUSPEND-DATE         TO R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT                                                
      5849  R025               PERFORM 8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B    THRU 8554-EXIT                                                 
      5850                  ELSE                                                                                                    
      5851                     PERFORM 8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B    THRU 8554-EXIT                                                 
      5852             ELSE                                                                                                         
      5853  M307       IF R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT < WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE                                                                  
      5854  R064           IF  (TCAT-TCAT-PGM (MC-IDX) NOT =  'M')                                                                  
      5855  R063                MOVE 'R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO'   TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                     
      5856  R063                PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC     THRU 7100-EXIT                                                     
      5857  R063                MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE   TO R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT                                                    
      5858  R063                PERFORM 7328-MODIFY-R634         THRU 7328-EXIT                                                     
      5859  R063                MOVE 1           TO WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD                                                      
      5860  R063                PERFORM 8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B THRU 8554-EXIT                                                   
      5861  R063           ELSE                                                                                                     
      5862  R063               MOVE  1  TO  WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD                                                              
      5863  R063               PERFORM  8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B  THRU  8554-EXIT                                                 
      5864  R063       ELSE                                                                                                         
      5865             IF (WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = 2 OR 3) AND                                                                 
      5866  M307          R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT < WSH-3-PAYDATE                                                                      
      5867                  MOVE 1                 TO WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD                                                    
      5868                  PERFORM 8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B    THRU 8554-EXIT                                                    
      5869             ELSE                                                                                                         
      5870  M307       IF R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT   > WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE AND                                                            
      5871  M307                                 < WSH-2-PAYDATE                                                                    
      5872                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD                                                    
      5873  R025          IF WSS-BDGT-SUSPEND-ON                                                                                    
      5874  M307             MOVE WSH-SUSPEND-DATE           TO R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT                                                
      5875  R025             PERFORM 8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B   THRU 8554-EXIT                                                    
      5876  R025          ELSE                                                                                                      
      5877                  MOVE 1                 TO WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE                                                       
      5878  R069               MOVE  R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT  TO  WSH-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT                                                  
      5879                  PERFORM 8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B    THRU 8554-EXIT                                                    
      5880  R045            MOVE WSH-RECUR-YY      TO M2K-IN-YR                                                                     
      5881  R045            MOVE WSH-RECUR-DAYS    TO M2K-IN-DAYS                                                                   
      5882  R045            MOVE R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT TO M2K-CONV-JUL-DT                                                            
      5883  R045            PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                       
      5884  R045            MOVE M2K-CONV-JUL-DT   TO WS-PRO-DAYS.                                                                  
      5885         2500-EXIT-SECTION.                                                                                               
      5886             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      5887                                                                                                                          
      5888  R027  *COMMENTED OUT 2600 SECTION AND PARAGRAPH FROM R025*                                                              
      5889  R067   2600-CATCH-ALL  SECTION.                                                                                         
      5890  R067   2610-GET-R637.                                                                                                   
      5891  R067       MOVE  0  TO  WSS-R637-REC                                                                                    
      5892  R067                    WSS-R653-REC                                                                                    
      5893  R067                    WSS-R654-REC.                                                                                   
      5894  R067       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-R654-FOUND.                                                                               
      5895  R067       MOVE  2600    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                           
      5896  R067       PERFORM  7600-FETCH-R637  THRU  7600-EXIT.                                                                   
      5897  R067       IF  WSS-R637-REC  =  1                                                                                       
      5898  R067           MOVE  2601    TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO                                                                        
      5899  R067           PERFORM  7620-FETCH-R653  THRU  7620-EXIT.                                                               
      5900  R067       MOVE  2602      TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                         
      5901  R067       PERFORM  7311-FIND-CURR-R249  THRU  7311-EXIT.                                                               
      5902  R067   2610-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      5903  R070   2620-PROCESS-AUTO-DISC.                                                                                          
      5904  R070       MOVE  2620  TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                             
      5905  R070       IF  R634-DTE-DUE-REDET  =  ZEROES                                                                            
      5906  R070           GO  TO  2620-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5907  R070       IF  R634-DTE-DUE-REDET  <  WSH-PRIOR-JUL                                                                     
      5908  R070           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      5909  R070       ELSE                                                                                                         
      5910  R070           GO  TO  2620-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5911  R070       MOVE  'N'    TO  WSS-AUTO-FOUND.                                                                             
      5912  R070       MOVE  0      TO  WSS-AUTO-SS.                                                                                
      5913  R070       PERFORM  2690-SETUP-SS  THRU  2690-EXIT  UNTIL                                                               
      5914  R070           WSS-AUTO-FOUND  =  'Y'.                                                                                  
      5915  R070       MOVE  0  TO  WSS-TARB.                                                                                       
      5916  R070       ADD  1  TO  WSA-NBR-REDET.                                                                                   
      5917  R070       ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-REDET (WSS-AUTO-SS).                                                                    
      5918  R070       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-EXEMPT.                                                                                   
      5919  R070       IF  R672-CDE-DIST  =  ' '                                                                                    
      5920  R070           MOVE  0  TO  R672-CDE-DIST.                                                                              
      5921  R070       PERFORM  2630-CHECK-TARB  THRU  2630-EXIT  UNTIL                                                             
      5922  R070           WSS-TARB  >  WSS-TARB-LOAD.                                                                              
      5923  R070       IF  WSS-EXEMPT  =  'B'  OR  'R'                                                                              
      5924  R070           ADD  1  TO  WSA-EXEMPT                                                                                   
      5925  R070           ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-EXEMPT (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                                
      5926  R070           GO  TO  2620-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5927  R070       IF  (R249-CDE-CATEGORY  =  'B  '  OR  'E  ')  OR                                                             
      5928  R070           ((R249-CDE-CATEGORY  =  'PH ')  AND                                                                      
      5929  R070            (R634-CDE-STUS-PROG  =  20  OR  97))                                                                    
      5930  R070           ADD  1  TO  WSA-BYPASS-PH                                                                                
      5931  R070           ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-BYPASS (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                                
      5932  R070           GO  TO  2620-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5933  R070       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-EXCEPT.                                                                                   
      5934  R070       PERFORM  2640-CALL-ASBRCE  THRU  2640-EXIT.                                                                  
      5935  R070       IF  WSS-EXCEPT  =  'E'  OR  'X'                                                                              
      5936  R070           ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-EXCEPT (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                                
      5937  R070           ADD  1  TO  WSA-TOT-EXCEPT.                                                                              
      5938  R070       IF  WSS-EXCEPT  =  'X'                                                                                       
      5939  R070           PERFORM  2850-CREATE-MSG  THRU  2850-EXIT.                                                               
      5940  R070       IF  CPF-PAYDAY-NBR  >  00  AND                                                                               
      5941  R070           CPF-PAYDAY-NBR  <  11                                                                                    
      5942  R070           PERFORM  2650-PROCESS-1-10  THRU  2650-EXIT.                                                             
      5943  R070       IF  CPF-PAYDAY-NBR  >  10  AND                                                                               
      5944  R070           CPF-PAYDAY-NBR  <  21                                                                                    
      5945  R070           PERFORM  2660-PROCESS-11-20  THRU  2660-EXIT.                                                            
      5946  R070   2620-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      5947  R070   2630-CHECK-TARB.                                                                                                 
      5948  R070       ADD  1  TO  WSS-TARB.                                                                                        
      5949  R070       IF  WSS-TARB  >  WSS-TARB-LOAD                                                                               
      5950  R070           GO  TO  2630-EXIT.                                                                                       
      5951  R070       IF  WST-TARB-CO (WSS-TARB)  =  WSH-CNTY-NBR  AND                                                             
      5952  R070           WST-TARB-DIST (WSS-TARB)  =  R672-CDE-DIST                                                               
      5953  R070           IF  ((WST-TARB-BEG-DTE (WSS-TARB)  =                                                                     
      5954  R070                  M2K-CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM  OR                                                                        
      5955  R070                  WST-TARB-BEG-DTE (WSS-TARB)  <                                                                    
      5956  R070                  M2K-CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM)  AND                                                                      
      5957  R070                ((WST-TARB-END-DTE (WSS-TARB)  =  ZEROES)  OR                                                       
      5958  R070                 (WST-TARB-END-DTE (WSS-TARB)  =                                                                    
      5959  R070                  M2K-CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM  OR                                                                        
      5960  R070                  WST-TARB-END-DTE (WSS-TARB)  >                                                                    
      5961  R070                  M2K-CPF-CYCLE-DATE-NUM)))                                                                         
      5962  R070               MOVE  WST-TARB-IND (WSS-TARB)  TO  WSS-EXEMPT                                                        
      5963  R070               MOVE  WSS-TARB-LOAD  TO  WSS-TARB.                                                                   
      5964  R070   2630-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      5965  R070   2640-CALL-ASBRCE.                                                                                                
      5966  R070       MOVE  2640  TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                             
      5967  R070       MOVE  WSH-CASE-NUMBER  TO  ASBRCE-CASE.                                                                      
      5968  R070       MOVE  WSH-CDE-CATEGORY TO  ASBRCE-CAT.                                                                       
      5969  R070       MOVE  WSH-NBR-GROUP-GRANT  TO  ASBRCE-GG.                                                                    
      5970  R070       MOVE  WSH-PAYMENT-DATE     TO  ASBRCE-CYCLE-DATE.                                                            
      5971  R070       MOVE  'REN'                TO  ASBRCE-TYPE.                                                                  
      5972  R070       MOVE  SPACE                TO  ASBRCE-EXCEPTION.                                                             
      5973  R070       CALL  'ASBRCE'  USING  ASBRCE-PARAM.                                                                         
      5974  R070       MOVE  ASBRCE-EXCEPTION     TO  WSS-EXCEPT.                                                                   
      5975  R070       MOVE  ASBRCE-PARAM  TO  ATE01D20-RECORD.                                                                     
      5976  R070       WRITE  ATE01D20-RECORD.                                                                                      
      5977  R070       ADD  1  TO  WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT.                                                                            
      5978  R070       ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-CASES (WSS-AUTO-SS).                                                                    
      5979  R070       PERFORM  7311-FIND-CURR-R249  THRU  7311-EXIT.                                                               
      5980  R070   2640-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      5981  R070   2650-PROCESS-1-10.                                                                                               
      5982  R070       MOVE  2650  TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                             
      5983  R070       MOVE  WSH-CDE-CATEGORY    TO  WSH-PART-CAT.                                                                  
      5984  R070       IF  (WSH-CDE-CATEGORY  =  'A  '  OR  'B  '  OR  'C  '                                                        
      5985  R070           OR  'D  '  OR  'E  '  OR  'J  '  OR  'M  '  OR  'U  ')                                                   
      5986  R070           IF  ((R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT  =  'S')  AND                                                                   
      5987  R070                (WSS-EXCEPT  =  'E'  OR  'X'))                                                                      
      5988  R070               ADD  1  TO  WSA-CASH-EXCEPTION                                                                       
      5989  R070               ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-CASH-EX (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                           
      5990  R070               GO  TO  2650-EXIT.                                                                                   
      5991  R070       IF  (WSH-CDE-CATEGORY  =  'A  '  OR  'B  '  OR  'C  '  OR                                                    
      5992  R070           'D  '  OR  'E  '  OR  'J  '  OR  'M  '  OR  'U  ')                                                       
      5993  R070           IF  WSS-EXCEPT  =  'E'  OR  'X'                                                                          
      5994  R070               ADD  1  TO  WSA-CASH-EXCEPTION                                                                       
      5995  R070               ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-CASH-EX (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                           
      5996  R070               PERFORM  2700-CREATE-NOTICE-4471  THRU  2700-EXIT                                                    
      5997  R070               PERFORM  2710-CREATE-ALERT-074    THRU  2710-EXIT                                                    
      5998  R070               GO  TO  2650-EXIT                                                                                    
      5999  R070           ELSE                                                                                                     
      6000  R070               ADD  1  TO  WSA-CASH-NO-EXCEPTION                                                                    
      6001  R070               ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-CASH-NO (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                           
      6002  R070               PERFORM  2700-CREATE-NOTICE-4471  THRU  2700-EXIT                                                    
      6003  R070               GO  TO  2650-EXIT.                                                                                   
      6004  R070       IF  WSS-EXCEPT  =  'E'  OR  'X'                                                                              
      6005  R070           ADD  1  TO  WSA-MA-EXCEPTION                                                                             
      6006  R070           ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-MA-EX (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                                 
      6007  R070  *        PERFORM  2720-CREATE-ALERT-071  THRU  2720-EXIT                                                          
      6008  R070           GO  TO  2650-EXIT.                                                                                       
      6009  R070       IF  WSH-PART-CAT-3  =  'W'                                                                                   
      6010  R070           ADD  1  TO  WSA-MA-NO-EXCEPTION                                                                          
      6011  R070           ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-MA-NO (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                                 
      6012  R070           PERFORM  2730-CREATE-NOTICE-442C  THRU  2730-EXIT                                                        
      6013  R070       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6014  R070           IF  WSH-PART-CAT-3  =  'N'                                                                               
      6015  R070               ADD  1  TO  WSA-MA-NO-EXCEPTION                                                                      
      6016  R070               ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-MA-NO (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                             
      6017  R070               PERFORM  2740-CREATE-NOTICE-442B  THRU  2740-EXIT                                                    
      6018  R070           ELSE                                                                                                     
      6019  R070               ADD  1  TO  WSA-MA-NO-EXCEPTION                                                                      
      6020  R070               ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-MA-NO (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                             
      6021  R070               PERFORM  2750-CREATE-NOTICE-442A  THRU  2750-EXIT.                                                   
      6022  R070   2650-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      6023  R070   2660-PROCESS-11-20.                                                                                              
      6024  R070       MOVE  2660  TO  WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                                             
      6025  R070       IF  (WSH-CDE-CATEGORY  =  'A  '  OR  'B  '  OR  'C  '                                                        
      6026  R070           OR  'D  '  OR  'E  '  OR  'J  '  OR  'M  '  OR  'U  ')                                                   
      6027  R070           IF  ((R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT  =  'S')  AND                                                                   
      6028  R070                (WSS-EXCEPT  =  'E'  OR  'X'))                                                                      
      6029  R070               ADD  1  TO  WSA-CASH-EXCEPTION                                                                       
      6030  R070               ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-CASH-EX (WSS-AUTO-SS)                                                           
      6031  R070               GO  TO  2660-EXIT.                                                                                   
      6032  R070       IF  (WSH-CDE-CATEGORY  =  'A  '  OR  'B  '  OR  'C  '  OR                                                    
      6033  R070            'D  '  OR  'E  '  OR  'J  '  OR  'M  '  OR  'U  ')                                                      
      6034  R070           IF  WSS-EXCEPT  =  'E'  OR  'X'                                                                          
      6035  R070               PERFORM  2760-SUSPEND-450  THRU  2760-EXIT                                                           
      6036  R070               GO  TO  2660-EXIT                                                                                    
      6037  R070           ELSE                                                                                                     
      6038  R070               PERFORM  2770-CLOSE-447  THRU  2770-EXIT                                                             
      6039  R070               GO  TO  2660-EXIT.                                                                                   
      6040  R070       IF  WSS-EXCEPT  =  'E'  OR  'X'                                                                              
      6041  R070           ADD  1  TO  WSA-NO-ACTION                                                                                
      6042  R070           ADD  1  TO  WST-AUTO-NO-ACTN (WSS-AUTO-SS)

      6311  R070       MOVE  R634-DTE-OPENED-BDGT  TO  M2K-JULIAN-DATE.                                                             
      6312  R070       PERFORM  6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                    
      6313  R070       MOVE  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE  TO  D11-FROM-DATE.                                                                 
      6314  R070       MOVE  WSH-2ND-MINUS-1-GREG  TO  D11-TO-DATE.                                                                 
      6315  R081       MOVE  ZEROES  TO  SDX-AMOUNT                                                                                 
      6316  R081                         FROM-AMOUNT                                                                                
      6317  R081                         TO-AMOUNT                                                                                  
      6318  R081                         660-3-RCPT.                                                                                
      6319  R081       MOVE  SPACES  TO  POP-BUCKET                                                                                 
      6320  R081                         MNGD-CARE-PLAN-CDE.                                                                        
      6321  R070       PERFORM  8594-WRITE-ATE01D11  THRU  8594-EXIT.                                                               
      6322  R070   2840-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      6323  R081   2845-CREATE-976-NOTICE.                                                                                          
      6324  R081       MOVE  976    TO  D11-CDE-RSN-NOTICE.                                                                         
      6325  R081       MOVE    3    TO  D11-CDE-OPTION-NOTICE.                                                                      
      6326  R081       MOVE  'D'    TO  D11-CDE-TYPE-NOTICE.                                                                        
      6327  R081       MOVE  WSH-CNTY-NBR  TO  D11-CDE-COUNTY.                                                                      
      6328  R081       MOVE  WSH-CASE-NBR  TO  D11-NBR-RECORD.                                                                      
      6329  R081       MOVE  WSH-CDE-CATEGORY  TO  D11-CDE-CATEGORY.                                                                
      6330  R081       MOVE  WSH-NBR-GROUP-GRANT  TO  D11-NBR-GG.                                                                   
      6331  R081       MOVE  R634-DTE-OPENED-BDGT  TO  M2K-JULIAN-DATE.                                                             
      6332  R081       PERFORM  6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                    
      6333  R081       MOVE  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE  TO  D11-FROM-DATE.                                                                 
      6334  R081       MOVE  R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT  TO  M2K-JULIAN-DATE.                                                             
      6335  R081       PERFORM  6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                    
      6336  R081       MOVE  M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE  TO  D11-TO-DATE.                                                                   
      6337  R081       MOVE  ZEROES  TO  SDX-AMOUNT                                                                                 
      6338  R081                         FROM-AMOUNT                                                                                
      6339  R081                         TO-AMOUNT                                                                                  
      6340  R081                         660-3-RCPT.                                                                                
      6341  R081       MOVE  SPACES  TO  POP-BUCKET                                                                                 
      6342  R081                         MNGD-CARE-PLAN-CDE.                                                                        
      6343  R081       PERFORM  8594-WRITE-ATE01D11  THRU  8594-EXIT.                                                               
      6344  R081   2845-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      6345  R070   2850-CREATE-MSG.                                                                                                 
      6346  R070       MOVE  'W'   TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT.                                                                          
      6347  R070       MOVE  005   TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                                         
      6348  R070       MOVE  WSH-CASE-NUMBER  TO  WS-SML-PARAM-1.                                                                   
      6349  R070       MOVE  WSS-EXEMPT       TO  WS-SML-PARAM-2.                                                                   
      6350  R070       PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                   
      6351  R070   2850-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      6352  R070   2860-CREATE-D16.                                                                                                 
      6353  R070       PERFORM  7450-FETCH-R268  THRU  7450-EXIT.                                                                   
      6354  R070       IF  WSS-R268-EOS  =  1                                                                                       
      6355  R070           MOVE  011    TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                     
      6356  R070           MOVE  'W'    TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                      
      6357  R070           MOVE  WSH-CASE-NUMBER    TO  WS-SML-PARM-2-X-1                                                           
      6358  R070           MOVE  'R268'             TO  WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                              
      6359  R070           PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                
      6360  R070           GO  TO  2860-EXIT.                                                                                       
      6361  R070       MOVE  R268-NBR-INDIV            TO ATE01D16-RECIPIENT.                                                       
      6362  R070       MOVE  WSH-CASE-NUMBER       TO ATE01D16-NBR-CASE.                                                            
      6363  R070       MOVE  WSH-CDE-CATEGORY      TO ATE01D16-CDE-CAT.                                                             
      6364  R070       MOVE  WSH-NBR-GROUP-GRANT   TO ATE01D16-NBR-GG.                                                              
      6365  R070       MOVE R249-CTL-DIGIT         TO ATE01D16-CTL-DIGIT.                                                           
      6366  R070       MOVE 'ARDSPD'               TO ATE01D16-NBR-TRANS.                                                           
      6367  R070       MOVE WSH-CPF-CYCLE-JUL      TO ATE01D16-DTE-BGN-EFFV.                                                        
      6368  R070       MOVE ZEROS                  TO ATE01D16-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                        
      6369  R070       MOVE WSH-CPF-CYCLE-JUL      TO ATE01D16-DTE-CHNG.                                                            
      6370  R070       ACCEPT WS-SYSTEM-TIME       FROM TIME.                                                                       
      6371  R070       MOVE WS-SYSTEM-TIME         TO ATE01D16-TIME-ACTN.                                                           
      6372  R070                                                                                                                    
      6373  R070       PERFORM 8606-WRITE-ATE01D16 THRU 8606-EXIT.                                                                  
      6374  R070   2860-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      6375  R070   2870-CREATE-R251.                                                                                                
      6376  R070       MOVE  SPACES  TO  R251-SUSPENSION.                                                                           
      6377  R070       MOVE  00      TO  R251-NBR-ORDER.                                                                            
      6378  R070       MOVE  WSH-PAYMENT-DATE  TO  R251-DTE-BGN-EFFV                                                                
      6379  R070                                   R251-DTE-INACT-SPNSN.                                                            
      6380  R070       MOVE  ZEROES  TO  R251-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                                         
      6381  R070       MOVE  WSH-CPF-CYCLE-JUL  TO  R251-DTE-CHNG.                                                                  
      6382  R070       MOVE  WSH-SYS-TIME-SEC   TO  R251-TME-ACTN.                                                                  
      6383  R070       MOVE  SPACE              TO  R251-CDE-PRCS.                                                                  
      6384  R070       MOVE  450                TO  R251-CDE-REASON-SPNSN.                                                          
      6385  R070       PERFORM  7572-STORE-R251  THRU  7572-EXIT.                                                                   
      6386  R070   2870-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      6387                                                                                                                          
      6388                                                                                                                          
      6389        ****************************************************                                                              
      6390        *** CLOSING SECTION.                             ***                                                              
      6391        *** THIS SECTION WUD PERFORM ALL WINDUP OPS.     ***                                                              
      6392        *** MAJOR FUNCTIONS PERFORMED ARE :              ***                                                              
      6393        ***      . UPDATE BCF WITH ALL GROSS/BLOCK REC   ***                                                              
      6394        ***          COUNTS OF ALL OUTPUT FILES.         ***                                                              
      6395        ***      . WRITE ISSUANNCE CONTROL FILE D06.     ***                                                              
      6396        ***      . PRINT SUMMARY REPORT.                 ***                                                              
      6397        ****************************************************                                                              
      6398         3000-CLOSING  SECTION.                                                                                           
      6399         3000-CLOSING-DETAIL.                                                                                             
      6400             MOVE 3000                   TO WSH-ERR-PARA-NO.                                                              
      6401             DISPLAY '*****************************'   UPON PRINTER.                                                      
      6402  R048       DISPLAY '* R653 END DATE ' WSA-R653-END-DTE-CNT UPON PRINTER.                                                
      6403             DISPLAY '*****************************'   UPON PRINTER.                                                      
      6404  R067       DISPLAY 'CAT/PROG STAT DROP = '  WSA-CAT-PSC-DROP                                                            
      6405  R067                                      UPON PRINTER.                                                                 
      6406  R070       DISPLAY '***************************'  UPON  PRINTER.                                                        
      6407  R070       DISPLAY '* AUTOMATED DISCONTINUANCE *' UPON PRINTER.                                                         
      6408  R070       DISPLAY '***************************'  UPON  PRINTER.                                                        
      6409  R070       DISPLAY '*  CASH EXCEPTION    = '  WSA-CASH-EXCEPTION ' *'                                                   
      6410  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6411  R070       DISPLAY '*  CASH NO EXCEPTION = ' WSA-CASH-NO-EXCEPTION ' *'                                                 
      6412  R070               UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      6413  R070       DISPLAY '*  MA EXCEPTION      = ' WSA-MA-EXCEPTION ' *'                                                      
      6414  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6415  R070       DISPLAY '*  MA NO EXCEPTION   = ' WSA-MA-NO-EXCEPTION ' *'                                                   
      6416  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6417  R070       DISPLAY '*  EXEMPT            = '  WSA-EXEMPT ' *'                                                           
      6418  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6419  R070       DISPLAY '*  SUSPENDS          = ' WSA-SUSPEND ' *'                                                           
      6420  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6421  R070       DISPLAY '*  CLOSED            = '   WSA-CLOSED  ' *'                                                         
      6422  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6423  R070       DISPLAY '*  NO ACTION         = '  WSA-NO-ACTION ' *'                                                        
      6424  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6425  R070       DISPLAY '*  BYPASS PH         = '  WSA-BYPASS-PH ' *'                                                        
      6426  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6427  R070       DISPLAY '*  TOTAL REDET       = '  WSA-NBR-REDET ' *'                                                        
      6428  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6429  R070       DISPLAY '*  TOTAL CASES       = '  WSA-R666-REC-CNT ' *'                                                     
      6430  R070           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                            
      6431  R075A      DISPLAY '******* MA Recidivism *************' UPON PRINTER.                                                  
      6432  R075A      DISPLAY 'TOTAL NO OF MG99 CLOSURE :'  WS-MG99-CLOSURE                                                        
      6433  R075A         UPON PRINTER.                                                                                             
      6434  R075A      DISPLAY 'TOTAL NO OF MG99 RENEWAL :'  WS-MG99-AUTO-RENEW                                                     
      6435  R075A         UPON PRINTER.                                                                                             
      6436  R075A      DISPLAY '***********************************' UPON PRINTER.                                                  
      6437  R070       MOVE  ZEROES   TO  WSA-PCT-EXCEPT                                                                            
      6438  R070                          WSA-PCT-CLOSE                                                                             
      6439  R070                          WSA-PCT-SUSPEND.                                                                          
      6440  R070       IF  WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT  >  0  AND                                                                          
      6441  R070           WSA-TOT-EXCEPT        >  0  AND                                                                          
      6442  R070           WSH-TOT-PCT           >  0                                                                               
      6443  R070           COMPUTE  WSA-PCT-EXCEPT  =  WSA-TOT-EXCEPT  /                                                            
      6444  R070               WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT  *  100.                                                                        
      6445  R070       IF  WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT  >  0  AND                                                                          
      6446  R070           WSA-CLOSED            >  0  AND                                                                          
      6447  R070           WSH-CLS-PCT           >  0                                                                               
      6448  R070           COMPUTE  WSA-PCT-CLOSE   =  WSA-CLOSED      /                                                            
      6449  R070               WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT  *  100.                                                                        
      6450  R070       IF  WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT  >  0  AND                                                                          
      6451  R070           WSA-SUSPEND           >  0  AND                                                                          
      6452  R070           WSH-SUS-PCT           >  0                                                                               
      6453  R070           COMPUTE  WSA-PCT-SUSPEND  =  WSA-SUSPEND     /                                                           
      6454  R070               WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT  *  100.                                                                        
      6455  R070       IF  WSH-TOT-PCT  >  ZERO                                                                                     
      6456  R070           IF  WSA-PCT-EXCEPT  >  WSH-TOT-PCT                                                                       
      6457  R070               SET  SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART  ON                                                                  
      6458  R070               MOVE  'W'     TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                 
      6459  R070               MOVE  250     TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                
      6460  R070               MOVE  WSA-PCT-EXCEPT  TO  WS-SML-PARM-2-X-1                                                          
      6461  R070               PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                           
      6462  R070       IF  WSH-CLS-PCT    >  ZERO                                                                                   
      6463  R070           IF  WSA-PCT-CLOSE   >  WSH-CLS-PCT                                                                       
      6464  R070               SET  SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART  ON                                                                  
      6465  R070               MOVE  'W'     TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                 
      6466  R070               MOVE  251     TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                
      6467  R070               MOVE  WSA-PCT-CLOSE   TO  WS-SML-PARM-2-X-1                                                          
      6468  R070               PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                           
      6469  R070       IF  WSH-SUS-PCT      >  ZERO                                                                                 
      6470  R070           IF  WSA-PCT-SUSPEND  >  WSH-SUS-PCT                                                                      
      6471  R070               SET  SW-ERROR-AFTER-GOOD-DEPART  ON                                                                  
      6472  R070               MOVE  'W'     TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                 
      6473  R070               MOVE  252     TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                
      6474  R070               MOVE  WSA-PCT-SUSPEND  TO  WS-SML-PARM-2-X-1                                                         
      6475  R070               PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                           
      6476  R056       DISPLAY '*****************************'   UPON PRINTER.                                                      
      6477  R056       DISPLAY '* INFORMATIVE CISMOE COUNTS .'   UPON PRINTER.                                                      
      6478  R056       DISPLAY '* CISMOE CALL ' WSA-CISMOE-CALL-CNT UPON PRINTER.                                                   
      6479  R056       DISPLAY '* CISMOE X    ' WSA-CISMOE-X-CNT    UPON PRINTER.                                                   
      6480  R056       DISPLAY '* CISMOE YES  ' WSA-CISMOE-Y-CNT    UPON PRINTER.                                                   
      6481  R056       DISPLAY '* CISMOE NO   ' WSA-CISMOE-N-CNT    UPON PRINTER.                                                   
      6482  R056       DISPLAY '*****************************'   UPON PRINTER.                                                      
      6483  R056       DISPLAY '*CISMOE ERROR ' WSA-CISMOE-ERROR-CNT UPON PRINTER.                                                  
      6484  R056       DISPLAY '*****************************'   UPON PRINTER.                                                      
      6485  R067       IF  WSA-CAT-PSC-DROP  >  0                                                                                   
      6486  R067           MOVE  'W'  TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                                        
      6487  R067           MOVE  242  TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                                       
      6488  R067           MOVE  WSA-CAT-PSC-DROP  TO  WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                               
      6489  R067           PERFORM  1810-DISPLAY-MSG  THRU  1810-EXIT.                                                              
      6490                                                                                                                          
      6491         3000-CLOSING-CONTROL.                                                                                            
      6492             PERFORM 7050-DB-DEPART                THRU 7050-EXIT.                                                        
      6493             PERFORM 3040-CHECK-IF-REWRITE-20D01   THRU 3040-EXIT.                                                        
      6494  R069A *    PERFORM 8560-WRITE-ATE01D06           THRU 8560-EXIT.                                                        
      6495             PERFORM 3050-WRITE-OUTPUT-CNTS        THRU 3050-EXIT.                                                        
      6496             PERFORM 4000-SUMMARY-REPORT-SECTION.                                                                         
      6497             PERFORM 1850-CLOSE-FILES              THRU 1850-EXIT.                                                        
      6498             PERFORM 1840-FINAL-MSG                THRU 1840-EXIT.                                                        
      6499                                                                                                                          
      6500         3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                                   
      6501             STOP RUN.                                                                                                    
      6502                                                                                                                          
      6503         3999-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6504             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6505                                                                                                                          
      6506                                                                                                                          
      6507        *******************************************************                                                           
      6508        *** SUBROUTINES OF 3000-CLOSING SECTION.            ***                                                           
      6509        *** INDIVIDUAL PARA MODULES ARE INVOKED.            ***                                                           
      6510        *******************************************************                                                           
      6511         3040-SUBS-OF-3000-SECTION SECTION.                                                                               
      6512                                                                                                                          
      6513        ********************************************************                                                          
      6514        *** CHECK IF ATE20D01 IS TO BE REWRITTEN.            ***                                                          
      6515        *** THIS FILE WILL BE UPDATED ONLY IF IT WAS A       ***                                                          
      6516        *** DOUBLE PAYDAY UNDER FOLLOWING LOGIC :            ***                                                          
      6517        *** START OF 1ST PASS. PROGRAM-IND HAS BEEN SET TO 0.***                                                          
      6518        *** END   OF 1ST PASS. PROGRAM IND WILL BE SET  TO 2.***                                                          
      6519        *** START OF 2ND PASS. PROGRAM-IND IS NOW 2.         ***                                                          
      6520        *** END   OF 2ND PASS. PROGRAM IND WILL BE SET  TO 1.***                                                          
      6521        ********************************************************                                                          
      6522         3040-CHECK-IF-REWRITE-20D01.                                                                                     
      6523             IF SW-FATAL-ERROR-ON                                                                                         
      6524                NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      6525             ELSE                                                                                                         
      6526             IF NOT WSS-ATE20D01-OPEN-ON                                                                                  
      6527                NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      6528             ELSE                                                                                                         
      6529             IF DBL-PAYDAY-IND  = '1'                                                                                     
      6530                IF PROGRAM-IND  = '0'                                                                                     
      6531                   MOVE '2'              TO PROGRAM-IND                                                                   
      6532                   PERFORM 8890-DET-WRITE-ATE20D01 THRU 8890-EXIT                                                         
      6533                ELSE                                                                                                      
      6534                IF PROGRAM-IND  = '2'                                                                                     
      6535                   MOVE '1'              TO PROGRAM-IND                                                                   
      6536                   PERFORM 8890-DET-WRITE-ATE20D01 THRU 8890-EXIT                                                         
      6537                ELSE                                                                                                      
      6538                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      6539             ELSE                                                                                                         
      6540                NEXT SENTENCE.                                                                                            
      6541                                                                                                                          
      6542         3040-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6543             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6544                                                                                                                          
      6545        *******************************************************                                                           
      6546        *** WRITE BLOCK/GROSS RECORD COUNTS FOR ALL         ***                                                           
      6547        *** OUTPUT FILES. ATE01D01 THRU ATE01D07.           ***                                                           
      6548        *******************************************************                                                           
      6549         3050-WRITE-OUTPUT-CNTS.                                                                                          
      6550             PERFORM 3053-FORMAT-BCF-PARAM         THRU 3053-EXIT.                                                        
      6551                                                                                                                          
      6552         3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D01.                                                                                        
      6553  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6554  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0101'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6555  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6556  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0102'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6557             MOVE WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .
