      6558             MOVE WSA-ATE01D01-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6559             MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6560             PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6561                                                                                                                          
      6562  R069A *3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D02.                                                                                        
      6563  R069A *    IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6564  R069A *        MOVE 'ATE01D0201'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6565  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      6566  R069A *        MOVE 'ATE01D0202'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6567  R069A *    MOVE WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6568  R069A *    MOVE WSA-ATE01D02-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6569  R069A *    MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6570  R069A *    PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6571                                                                                                                          
      6572         3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D04.                                                                                        
      6573  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6574  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0401'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6575  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6576  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0402'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6577             MOVE WSA-ATE01D04-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6578             MOVE WSA-ATE01D04-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6579             MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6580             PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6581                                                                                                                          
      6582         3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D05.                                                                                        
      6583  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6584  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0501'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6585  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6586  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0502'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6587             MOVE WSA-ATE01D05-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6588             MOVE WSA-ATE01D05-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6589             MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6590             PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6591                                                                                                                          
      6592  R069A *3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D06.                                                                                        
      6593  R069A *    IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6594  R069A *        MOVE 'ATE01D0601'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6595  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      6596  R069A *        MOVE 'ATE01D0602'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6597  R069A *    MOVE WSA-ATE01D06-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6598  R069A *    MOVE WSA-ATE01D06-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6599  R069A *    MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6600  R069A *    PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6601  R069A *                                                                                                                 
      6602  R069A *3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D07.                                                                                        
      6603  R069A *    IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6604  R069A *        MOVE 'ATE01D0701'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6605  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      6606  R069A *        MOVE 'ATE01D0702'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6607  R069A *    MOVE WSA-ATE01D07-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6608  R069A *    MOVE WSA-ATE01D07-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6609  R069A *    MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6610  R069A *    PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6611  R069A *                                                                                                                 
      6612         3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D08.                                                                                        
      6613  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6614  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0801'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6615  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6616  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0802'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6617             MOVE WSA-ATE01D08-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6618             MOVE WSA-ATE01D08-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6619             MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6620             PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6621                                                                                                                          
      6622         3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D09.                                                                                        
      6623  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6624  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0901'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6625  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6626  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D0902'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6627             MOVE WSA-ATE01D09-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6628             MOVE WSA-ATE01D09-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6629             MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6630             PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6631                                                                                                                          
      6632  R053   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D10.                                                                                        
      6633  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6634  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1001'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6635  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6636  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1002'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6637  R053       MOVE WSA-ATE01D10-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6638  R053       MOVE WSA-ATE01D10-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6639  R053       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6640  R053       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6641  R053                                                                                                                    
      6642  R053   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D11.                                                                                        
      6643  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6644  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1101'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6645  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6646  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1102'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6647  R053       MOVE WSA-ATE01D11-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6648  R053       MOVE WSA-ATE01D11-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6649  R053       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6650  R053       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6651  R053                                                                                                                    
      6652  R053   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D12.                                                                                        
      6653  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6654  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1201'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6655  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6656  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1202'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6657  R053       MOVE WSA-ATE01D12-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6658  R053       MOVE WSA-ATE01D12-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6659  R053       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6660  R053       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6661  R053                                                                                                                    
      6662  R056   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D13.                                                                                        
      6663  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6664  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1301'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6665  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6666  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1302'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6667  R056       MOVE WSA-ATE01D13-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6668  R056       MOVE WSA-ATE01D13-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6669  R056       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6670  R056       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6671  R056                                                                                                                    
      6672  R056   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D14.                                                                                        
      6673  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6674  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1401'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6675  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6676  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1402'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6677  R056       MOVE WSA-ATE01D14-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6678  R056       MOVE WSA-ATE01D14-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6679  R056       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6680  R056       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6681  R056                                                                                                                    
      6682  R056   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D15.                                                                                        
      6683  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6684  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1501'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6685  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6686  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1502'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6687  R056       MOVE WSA-ATE01D15-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6688  R056       MOVE WSA-ATE01D15-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6689  R056       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6690  R056       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6691  R056                                                                                                                    
      6692  R056   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D16.                                                                                        
      6693  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6694  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1601'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6695  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6696  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1602'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6697  R056       MOVE WSA-ATE01D16-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6698  R056       MOVE WSA-ATE01D16-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6699  R056       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6700  R056       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6701  R056                                                                                                                    
      6702  R064   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D17.                                                                                        
      6703  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6704  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1701'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6705  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6706  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1702'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6707  R064       MOVE WSA-ATE01D17-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6708  R064       MOVE WSA-ATE01D17-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6709  R064       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6710  R064       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6711  R064                                                                                                                    
      6712  R069   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D18.                                                                                        
      6713  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6714  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1801'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6715  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6716  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D1802'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6717  R069       MOVE WSA-ATE01D18-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6718  R069       MOVE WSA-ATE01D18-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6719  R068       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6720  R070       DISPLAY  'ATE01D18 COUNT = '  WSA-ATE01D18-REC-CNT                                                           
      6721  R070               UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      6722  R069       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6723  R070   3050-WRITE-CNTS-ATE01D20.                                                                                        
      6724  R070       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6725  R070           MOVE 'ATE01D2001'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                        
      6726  R070       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6727  R070           MOVE 'ATE01D2002'             TO BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                       
      6728  R070       MOVE WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT   TO BCF-GROSS-CT    .                                                             
      6729  R070       MOVE WSA-ATE01D20-BLK-CNT   TO BCF-BLOCK-CT    .                                                             
      6730  R070       MOVE ZEROS                  TO BCF-ACCUM-CT    .                                                             
      6731  R070       DISPLAY  'ATE01D20 COUNT = '  WSA-ATE01D20-REC-CNT                                                           
      6732  R070               UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
      6733  R070       PERFORM 3055-WRITE-BCF                THRU 3055-EXIT.                                                        
      6734  R069                                                                                                                    
      6735  R069                                                                                                                    
      6736         3050-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6737             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6738                                                                                                                          
      6739        *******************************************************                                                           
      6740        *** BCF PARAMETER FORMATTING PARA.                  ***                                                           
      6741        *** THIS PARA WOULD FORMAT THE BCF-PARAM-LIST FOR   ***                                                           
      6742        *** THE FIXED PARAMS.                               ***                                                           
      6743        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      6744        *** FILE IDENTIFIER AND COUNTS COME PREFORMATTED    ***                                                           
      6745        *** FROM CALLING PARA, 3050.                        ***                                                           
      6746        *******************************************************                                                           
      6747         3053-FORMAT-BCF-PARAM.                                                                                           
      6748             MOVE SPACES                 TO WS-BCF-PARAM-LIST.                                                            
      6749                                                                                                                          
      6750         3053-FORMAT-PRIM-KEY.                                                                                            
      6751             MOVE CPF-CYCLE-DATE         TO BCF-CYCLE-DATE.                                                               
      6752  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6753  R069           MOVE 'ATE01D'               TO BCF-RUN-ID                                                                
      6754  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6755  R069           MOVE 'ATF01D'               TO BCF-RUN-ID.                                                               
      6756             ACCEPT BCF-PROCESSING-DATE  FROM DATE        .                                                               
      6757             ACCEPT BCF-PROCESSING-TIME  FROM TIME        .                                                               
      6758             MOVE 'C'                    TO BCF-RECORD-TYPE.                                                              
      6759                                                                                                                          
      6760         3053-FORMAT-SECD-KEY.                                                                                            
      6761             MOVE CPF-CYCLE-DATE         TO BCF-FILE-CYCLE-DATE.                                                          
      6762             MOVE 'W'                    TO BCF-READ-WRITE-FLAG.                                                          
      6763                                                                                                                          
      6764         3053-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6765             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6766                                                                                                                          
      6767        *******************************************************                                                           
      6768        *** BCF WRITE PARA.                                 ***                                                           
      6769        *** THIS PARA WOULD ACCEPT BCF-PARAM AND CALL       ***                                                           
      6770        *** ASB002 FOR BCF WRITE.                           ***                                                           
      6771        *******************************************************                                                           
      6772         3055-WRITE-BCF.                                                                                                  
      6773             CALL 'ASB002' USING WS-BCF-PARAM-LIST.                                                                       
      6774             IF BCF-STATUS-INDCTR2 > 0                                                                                    
      6775                PERFORM 1820-ASB002-ERROR                                                                                 
      6776                SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG  TO ON                                                                            
      6777                PERFORM 3999-STOP-RUN.                                                                                    
      6778                                                                                                                          
      6779         3055-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6780             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6781                                                                                                                          
      6782                                                                                                                          
      6783        *******************************************************                                                           
      6784        *** SUMMARY REPORT SECTION.                         ***                                                           
      6785        *** 4000.                                           ***                                                           
      6786        *******************************************************                                                           
      6787         4000-SUMMARY-REPORT-SECTION SECTION.                                                                             
      6788         4000-SUMMARY-REPORT-BEGIN.                                                                                       
      6789             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6790                                                                                                                          
      6791         4000-BEGIN-PROCESSING.                                                                                           
      6792  R069       OPEN  OUTPUT  ATE01D19.                                                                                      
      6793  R069       MOVE  1  TO  WSS-ATE01D19-OPEN.                                                                              
      6794  R069       PERFORM 4200-WRITE-DATA-COUNTS        THRU 4200-EXIT.                                                        
      6795  R069       CLOSE  ATE01D19.                                                                                             
      6796  R069       MOVE  0    TO  WSS-ATE01D19-OPEN.                                                                            
      6797  R069       PERFORM  3053-FORMAT-BCF-PARAM  THRU  3053-EXIT.                                                             
      6798  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      6799  R069           MOVE  'ATE01D1901'  TO  BCF-FILE-IDENTIF                                                                 
      6800  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      6801  R069           MOVE  'ATE01D1902'  TO  BCF-FILE-IDENTIF.                                                                
      6802  R069       MOVE  WSA-ATE01D19-REC-CNT  TO  BCF-GROSS-CT.                                                                
      6803  R069       MOVE  WSA-ATE01D19-BLK-CNT  TO  BCF-BLOCK-CT.                                                                
      6804  R069       MOVE  ZEROES                TO  BCF-ACCUM-CT.                                                                
      6805  R060       PERFORM  3055-WRITE-BCF  THRU  3055-EXIT.                                                                    
      6806         4000-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6807             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6808                                                                                                                          
      6809                                                                                                                          
      6810        *******************************************************                                                           
      6811        *** THIS SECTIONS CONTAINS SUBROUTINES OF 4000      ***                                                           
      6812        *** PROCESS  (PRINT REPORT) SECTION.                ***                                                           
      6813        *** INDIVIDUAL PARA MODULES ARE EXECUTED.           ***                                                           
      6814        *******************************************************                                                           
      6815         4100-SUBS-OF-4000-SECTION SECTION.                                                                               
      6816                                                                                                                          
      6817         4200-WRITE-DATA-COUNTS.                                                                                          
      6818  R069       MOVE  '1'  TO  ATE01D19-REC-TYPE-1.                                                                          
      6819  R069       MOVE WSA-R666-REC-CNT           TO  ATE01D19-CASE-CNT.                                                       
      6820  R069       MOVE WSA-R-ACT-BDGT-CNT     TO  ATE01D19-OPEN-CM-BDGT.                                                       
      6821  R069       MOVE WSA-R-SUS-BDGT-CNT     TO  ATE01D19-SUSP-CM-BDGT.                                                       
      6822  R069       MOVE WSA-R-VEND-BDGT-CNT    TO  ATE01D19-VEND-BDGT.                                                          
      6823  R069       MOVE WSA-R-VEND-BDGT-AMT    TO  ATE01D19-VEND-AMT.                                                           
      6824  R069       MOVE WSA-R-RCOU-BDGT-CNT    TO  ATE01D19-RECOUP-CM-BDGT.                                                     
      6825  R069       MOVE WSA-R-RCOU-BDGT-AMT    TO  ATE01D19-RECOUP-AMT.                                                         
      6826  R069       MOVE WSA-R-MAID-ONLY-CNT    TO  ATE01D19-MED-BDGT.                                                           
      6827  R069       MOVE WSA-JAM-CASH-CNT       TO  ATE01D19-JAM-BDGT.                                                           
      6828  R069       MOVE WSA-JAM-MEDI-CNT       TO  ATE01D19-JAM-MED-BDGT.                                                       
      6829  R069       MOVE WSA-R-CHK-ISS-BDGT-CNT TO  ATE01D19-CHECK-ISSUE.                                                        
      6830  R069       MOVE WSA-R-CHK-ISS-BDGT-AMT TO  ATE01D19-CHECK-TOTAL.                                                        
      6831  R069       MOVE WSA-ATE01D02-BLK-CNT   TO  ATE01D19-MAID-WORK.                                                          
      6832  R069       MOVE WSA-R-R255-NOT-FOUND   TO  ATE01D19-R255-N-F.                                                           
      6833  R069       MOVE WSA-R654-REC-CNT       TO  ATE01D19-OVRD-RECS.                                                          
      6834  R069       MOVE WSA-R-DD-BANK-CHG-CNT  TO  ATE01D19-DD-BANK-CHGS.                                                       
      6835  R069       MOVE WSA-R-ACT-BDGT-MEM-CNT TO  ATE01D19-ACTV-BDGT-MEMB.                                                     
      6836  R069       MOVE WSA-R-AGRZER-CNT       TO  ATE01D19-AGRZER-CNT.                                                         
      6837  R069       MOVE  ZEROES    TO  ATE01D19-AGRZER-TO-TSA.                                                                  
      6838  R069       MOVE WSA-R-PRO-CLOSE-BDGT-CNT TO ATE01D19-PRO-RATE-CLOSE.                                                    
      6839  R069       MOVE WSA-R-PRO-CLOSE-BDGT-AMT TO ATE01D19-PRO-RATE-AMT.                                                      
      6840  R069       MOVE WSA-R-MGA-LT-10-CNT    TO  ATE01D19-MGA-10-DOL.                                                         
      6841  R074       MOVE  WSA-R-LIN-CLOSES  TO  ATE01D19-LIN-CLOSES.                                                             
      6842  R069       WRITE  ATE01D19-REC.                                                                                         
      6843  R069       ADD  1  TO  WSA-ATE01D19-REC-CNT.                                                                            
      6844                                                                                                                          
      6845  R069       PERFORM 4450-DETAIL-WRITE-CAT-LINES   THRU 4450-EXIT                                                         
      6846                     VARYING WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX FROM 1 BY 1                                                                 
      6847                             UNTIL WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX > WSH-CNTY-TAB-SIZE.                                                  
      6848                                                                                                                          
      6849  R070       PERFORM  4460-WRITE-AUTO  THRU  4460-EXIT  VARYING                                                           
      6850  R070           WSS-AUTO-SS  FROM  1  BY  1  UNTIL                                                                       
      6851  R070               WSS-AUTO-SS  >  WSS-AUTO-MAX.                                                                        
      6852         4200-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6853             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6854                                                                                                                          
      6855        *******************************************************                                                           
      6856        *** THIS PARA IS LOOPED FOR COUNTY INDEX.           ***                                                           
      6857        *** AND IN TURN WILL LOOP ANOTHER PARA FOR CAT IDX. ***                                                           
      6858        *** COUNTY NAME IS MOVED TO REPORT VARIABLE, BECAUSE***                                                           
      6859        *** WE WUD LIKE IT TO BE PRINTED ONLY ONCE.         ***                                                           
      6860        *** IF THE COUNTY REPORT WAS PRINTYED, ITS TOTALS   ***                                                           
      6861        *** ARE ALSO PRINTED.                               ***                                                           
      6862        *******************************************************                                                           
      6863         4450-DETAIL-WRITE-CAT-LINES.                                                                                     
      6864  R069       MOVE  ZEROES  TO  ATE01D19-REC-2.                                                                            
      6865             SET WSI-CNTY-IDX            TO WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX.                                                             
      6866  R069       SET  WSI-CO    TO  WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX.                                                                         
      6867  R069       MOVE  '2'   TO  ATE01D19-REC-TYPE-2.                                                                         
      6868             MOVE WST-CNTY-NAME (WSI-CNTY-IDX)                                                                            
      6869  R069               TO  ATE01D19-CO-NAME.                                                                                
      6870  R069       MOVE  WSI-CO    TO  ATE01D19-COUNTY.                                                                         
      6871             PERFORM 4455-DETAIL-WRITE-CAT-LINE    THRU 4455-EXIT                                                         
      6872                     VARYING WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL                                                            
      6873                             WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX > WSH-CAT-ONLY-TAB-SIZE.                                                     
      6874                                                                                                                          
      6875  R069       WRITE  ATE01D19-REC-2.                                                                                       
      6876  R069       ADD  1  TO  WSA-ATE01D19-REC-CNT.                                                                            
      6877         4450-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6878             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6879                                                                                                                          
      6880        *******************************************************                                                           
      6881        *** THIS PARA PERFORMS DETAILED WRITING FOR COUNTY  ***                                                           
      6882        *** AND CAT CODE.                                   ***                                                           
      6883        *** THE WRITING IS PERFORMED ONLY IF BDGT COUNT     ***                                                           
      6884        *** IS NON ZEROS. AND AT THAT TIME ONLY THE HEADERS ***                                                           
      6885        *** ARE PRINTED.                                    ***                                                           
      6886        *** COUNTY TOTALS ARE ALSO ACCUMULATED.             ***                                                           
      6887        *******************************************************                                                           
      6888         4455-DETAIL-WRITE-CAT-LINE.                                                                                      
      6889             IF WST-CNTY-CAT-ACT-BDGT-CNT                                                                                 
      6890                (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX  WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                                       
      6891                      NOT > 0                                                                                             
      6892                          GO TO 4455-EXIT.                                                                                
      6893                                                                                                                          
      6894             SET WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX        TO WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX.                                                              
      6895  R069       SET  WSI-CAT    TO  WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX.                                                                         
      6896             MOVE WST-CAT-ONLY (WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX)                                                                         
      6897  R069               TO  ATE01D19-CATEGORY (WSI-CAT).                                                                     
      6898             MOVE WST-CNTY-CAT-ACT-BDGT-CNT                                                                               
      6899                  (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX  WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                                     
      6900  R069               TO  ATE01D19-CO-ACT-BDGT (WSI-CAT).                                                                  
      6901             MOVE WST-CNTY-CAT-MGA-DOLL                                                                                   
      6902                  (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX  WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                                     
      6903  R069               TO  ATE01D19-CO-GR-AMT (WSI-CAT).                                                                    
      6904                                                                                                                          
      6905         4455-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      6906             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      6907  R070   4460-WRITE-AUTO.                                                                                                 
      6908  R070       IF  WST-AUTO-CNTY (WSS-AUTO-SS)  =  00                                                                       
      6909  R070           GO  TO  4460-EXIT.                                                                                       
      6910  R070       MOVE  '3'    TO  ATE01D19-REC-TYPE-3.                                                                        
      6911  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-CNTY (WSS-AUTO-SS)    TO  ATE01D19-REC3-CNTY.                                                 
      6912  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-DIST (WSS-AUTO-SS)    TO  ATE01D19-REC3-DIST.                                                 
      6913  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-CASES (WSS-AUTO-SS)   TO  ATE01D19-REC3-CASES.                                                
      6914  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-REDET (WSS-AUTO-SS)   TO  ATE01D19-REC3-REDET.                                                
      6915  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-EXCEPT (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO ATE01D19-REC3-EXCEPT.                                                 
      6916  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-BYPASS (WSS-AUTO-SS)  TO ATE01D19-REC3-BYPASS.                                                
      6917  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-NO-ACTN (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO                                                                      
      6918  R070                    ATE01D19-REC3-NO-ACTN.                                                                          
      6919  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-CASH-NO (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO                                                                      
      6920  R070                    ATE01D19-REC3-CASH-NO.                                                                          
      6921  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-CASH-EX (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO                                                                      
      6922  R070                    ATE01D19-REC3-CASH-EX.                                                                          
      6923  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-MA-NO   (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO                                                                      
      6924  R070                    ATE01D19-REC3-MA-NO.                                                                            
      6925  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-MA-EX   (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO                                                                      
      6926  R070                    ATE01D19-REC3-MA-EX.                                                                            
      6927  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-EXEMPT  (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO                                                                      
      6928  R070                    ATE01D19-REC3-EXEMPT.                                                                           
      6929  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-CLOSED  (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO                                                                      
      6930  R070                    ATE01D19-REC3-CLOSED.                                                                           
      6931  R070       MOVE  WST-AUTO-SUSPEND (WSS-AUTO-SS) TO                                                                      
      6932  R070                    ATE01D19-REC3-SUSPEND.                                                                          
      6933  R070       WRITE  ATE01D19-REC-3.                                                                                       
      6934  R070       ADD  1  TO  WSA-ATE01D19-REC-CNT.                                                                            
      6935  R070   4460-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      6936        *******************************************************                                                           
      6937        *** DATE MANIPULATION SECTION.                      ***                                                           
      6938        *** THE FOLLOWING CODE IS DEFINED :                 ***                                                           
      6939        ***    . JUL TO GRG                                 ***                                                           
      6940        ***    . GRG TO JUL                                 ***                                                           
      6941        ***    . CONVERSION ERROR HANDLING PROC             ***                                                           
      6942        ***    . DATE ADDITION/SUBTRACTION                  ***                                                           
      6943        ***    . DATE DIFF                                  ***                                                           
      6944        *******************************************************                                                           
      6945         6500-DATE-MANIPULATION-SECTION SECTION.                                                                          
      6946                                                                                                                          
      6947        ***********************************                                                                               
      6948        *** JULIAN TO GREGORIAN         ***                                                                               
      6949        ***********************************                                                                               
      6950         6510-JUL-TO-GRG.                                                                                                 
      6951                                                                                                                          
      6952  M307***COPY APR800P.                                                                                                    
      6953  M307   COPY MIL002P.                                                                                                    
COPY  9162        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY  9163        * THE FOLLOWING SUBROUTINE CALL IS USED IN CONJUNCTION   *                                                        
COPY  9164        * WITH WORKING STORAGE PROC MIL001P.  IT CONVERTS A      *                                                        
COPY  9165        * JULIAN DATE (YYYYDDD) TO A GREGORIAN DATE (YYYYMMDD).  *                                                        
COPY  9166        * THE DATE-CONV-ERROR-INDICATOR MUST BE CHECKED AFTER    *                                                        
COPY  9167        * RETURNING FROM THE SUBROUTINE.  A '0' IN THIS          *                                                        
COPY  9168        * INDICATOR MEANS A SUCCESSFUL CONVERSION.  ANYTHING     *                                                        
COPY  9169        * OTHER THAN A '0' MEANS UNSUCCESSFUL.                   *                                                        
COPY  9170        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY  9171        **   SOURCE CODE LOCATION ESS-SYM.MIL010S               **                                                        
COPY  9172        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY  9173             CALL '0500-GREG' USING M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE,                                                                   
COPY  9174                                    M2K-JULIAN-DATE,                                                                      
COPY  9175                                    M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND.                                                              
      6954                                                                                                                          
      6955        ***********************************                                                                               
      6956        *** GREGORIAN TO JULIAN         ***                                                                               
      6957        ***********************************                                                                               
      6958         6520-GRG-TO-JUL.                                                                                                 
      6959                                                                                                                          
      6960  M307***COPY APR801P.                                                                                                    
      6961  M307   COPY MIL003P.                                                                                                    
COPY  9176        *********************************************************                                                         
COPY  9177        * THE FOLLOWING SUBROUTINE CALL IS USED IN CONJUNCTION  *                                                         
COPY  9178        * WITH WORKING STORAGE PROC MIL001P.  IT CONVERTS A     *                                                         
COPY  9179        * GREGORIAN DATE (YYYYMMDD) TO A JULIAN DATE (YYYYDDD). *                                                         
COPY  9180        * THE DATE-CONV-ERROR-INDICATOR MUST BE CHECKED AFTER   *                                                         
COPY  9181        * RETURNING FROM THE SUBROUTINE.  A '0' IN THIS         *                                                         
COPY  9182        * INDICATOR MEANS A SUCCESSFUL CONVERSION.  ANYTHING    *                                                         
COPY  9183        * OTHER THAN A '0' MEANS UNSUCCESSFUL                   *                                                         
COPY  9184        *********************************************************                                                         
COPY  9185        **   SOURCE CODE IN ESS-SYM.MIL010S                    **                                                         
COPY  9186        *********************************************************                                                         
COPY  9187             CALL '0400-JULIAN' USING M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE,                                                                 
COPY  9188                                      M2K-JULIAN-DATE,                                                                    
COPY  9189                                      M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND.                                                            
      6962                                                                                                                          
      6963        ***********************************                                                                               
      6964        *** DATE CONV ERROR HANDLING    ***                                                                               
      6965        ***********************************                                                                               
      6966         6530-DTE-CONV-ERROR.                                                                                             
      6967  M307   COPY MIL005P.                                                                                                    
COPY  9190        **************************************************************                                                    
COPY  9191        * THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS ARE EXECUTED WHEN AN ERROR        *                                                    
COPY  9192        * CONDITION IS ENCOUNTERED IN THE DATE CONVERSION            *                                                    
COPY  9193        * SUBROUTINE.                                                *                                                    
COPY  9194        *                                                            *                                                    
COPY  9195        *        M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND VALUES ARE AS FOLLOWS :     *                                                    
COPY  9196        *        FOLLOWS :                                           *                                                    
COPY  9197        *                                                            *                                                    
COPY  9198        *       --  DURING GREGORIAN TO JULIAN CONVERSION --         *                                                    
COPY  9199        *             1     GREGORIAN DATE NOT NUMERIC               *                                                    
COPY  9200        *             2     YEAR, MONTH, OR DAY = 0 OR MONTH > 12    *                                                    
COPY  9201        *             3     DAY > DAYS IN MONTH                      *                                                    
COPY  9202        *             6     THE GREGORIAN CENTURY IS EQUAL TO 0      *                                                    
COPY  9203        *                                                            *                                                    
COPY  9204        *       --  JULIAN TO GREGORIAN CONVERSION  --               *                                                    
COPY  9205        *             4  JULIAN DATE NOT NUMERIC                     *                                                    
COPY  9206        *             5  JULIAN DAY > 365 OR > 366 FOR LEAP YEAR     *                                                    
COPY  9207        *                OR = ZEROES                                 *                                                    
COPY  9208        *             7  THE JULIAN CENTURY IS EQUAL TO 0            *                                                    
COPY  9209        **************************************************************                                                    
COPY  9210             DISPLAY ' '     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9211             DISPLAY '**************************************'                                                             
COPY  9212                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9213             DISPLAY '*   '  UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9214             DISPLAY '     THIS PROGRAM HAS ENCOUNTERED AN ERROR'                                                         
COPY  9215                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9216             DISPLAY '     DURING THE DATE CONVERSION SUBROUTINE.'                                                        
COPY  9217                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9218             DISPLAY '*   '  UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9219             DISPLAY '* M2K-JULIAN-DATE = ' M2K-JULIAN-DATE                                                               
COPY  9220                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9221             DISPLAY '* M2K-GREGORIAN DATE   = ' M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE                                                       
COPY  9222                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9223             DISPLAY '* M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND = '                                                                       
COPY  9224                        M2K-DATE-CONV-ERROR-IND                                                                           
COPY  9225                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9226             DISPLAY '*   '  UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9227             DISPLAY '**************************************'                                                             
COPY  9228                             UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
COPY  9229             DISPLAY ' '     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                
      6968                                                                                                                          
      6969        ***********************************                                                                               
      6970        *** DATE ADD/SUB                ***                                                                               
      6971        ***********************************                                                                               
      6972  M307   COPY MIL012P.                                                                                                    
COPY  9230        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY  9231        * THIS PROC IS USED TO ADD AND SUBTRACT DATES IN A       *                                                        
COPY  9232        * DATE FORMAT.  PROC MIL011P IS NEEDED IN THE WORKING    *                                                        
COPY  9233        * STORAGE SECTION.                                       *                                                        
COPY  9234        * NOTE : THIS PROC IS THE MILLENNIUM VERSION OF AE0022P. *                                                        
COPY  9235        *                                                        *                                                        
COPY  9236        * PERFORM THE FOLLOWING :                                *                                                        
COPY  9237        * 1.  MOVE THE JULIAN-DATE TO BE ADDED/SUB FROM TO       *                                                        
COPY  9238        *     M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                   *                                                        
COPY  9239        * 2.  MOVE THE NUMBER OF DAYS TO ADD/SUB TO M2K-IN-DAYS. *                                                        
COPY  9240        * 3.  MOVE THE NUMBER OF YEARS TO ADD/SUB TO M2K-IN-YR.  *                                                        
COPY  9241        * 4.  IF ADD,,  PERFORM C001-ADD-JULIAN-M2K.             *                                                        
COPY  9242        * 5.  IF SUBTRACT,,  PERFORM C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.   *                                                        
COPY  9243        * 6.  THE NEW JULIAN-DATE WILL BE RETURNED IN            *                                                        
COPY  9244        *     M2K-CONV-JUL-DT.                                   *                                                        
COPY  9245        *                                                        *                                                        
COPY  9246        * NOTE - IF ONLY DAYS TO ADD OR SUB, MOVE ZEROS TO       *                                                        
COPY  9247        *        M2K-IN-YR.                                      *                                                        
COPY  9248        *      - IF ONLY YEARS TO ADD OR SUB, DO NOT USE THIS    *                                                        
COPY  9249        *        ROUTINE.                                        *                                                        
COPY  9250        **********************************************************                                                        
COPY  9251         C001-ADD-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                                             
COPY  9252              DIVIDE 4 INTO M2K-CNV-YR GIVING M2K-DIV-DTE ROUNDED                                                         
COPY  9253                     REMAINDER M2K-REMAINDER.                                                                             
      9254                                                                                                                          
COPY  9255              IF M2K-REMAINDER = ZEROS                                                                                    
COPY  9256                 MOVE 366             TO M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9257                 MULTIPLY M2K-IN-YR BY M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                       
COPY  9258                          GIVING M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                             
COPY  9259                 ADD M2K-IN-DAYS      TO M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9260                 ADD M2K-CNV-DAYS     TO M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9261                 MOVE ZEROS           TO M2K-CAL-YR                                                                       
COPY  9262                 PERFORM C002-FIND-DAY-366-M2K                                                                            
COPY  9263                         UNTIL M2K-CAL-DAYS < 367                                                                         
COPY  9264                 ADD M2K-CAL-YR       TO M2K-CNV-YR                                                                       
COPY  9265                 IF M2K-CAL-DAYS = ZEROS                                                                                  
COPY  9266                    MOVE 001          TO M2K-CNV-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9267                 ELSE                                                                                                     
COPY  9268                    MOVE M2K-CAL-DAYS TO M2K-CNV-DAYS.                                                                    
COPY  9269                                                                                                                          
COPY  9270              IF M2K-REMAINDER > ZEROS                                                                                    
COPY  9271                 MOVE 365             TO M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9272                 MULTIPLY M2K-IN-YR BY M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                       
COPY  9273                          GIVING M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                             
COPY  9274                 ADD M2K-IN-DAYS      TO M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9275                 ADD M2K-CNV-DAYS     TO M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9276                 MOVE ZEROS           TO M2K-CAL-YR                                                                       
COPY  9277                 PERFORM C003-FIND-DAY-365-M2K                                                                            
COPY  9278                         UNTIL M2K-CAL-DAYS < 366                                                                         
COPY  9279                 ADD M2K-CAL-YR       TO M2K-CNV-YR                                                                       
COPY  9280                 IF M2K-CAL-DAYS = ZEROS                                                                                  
COPY  9281                    MOVE 001          TO M2K-CNV-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9282                 ELSE                                                                                                     
COPY  9283                    MOVE M2K-CAL-DAYS TO M2K-CNV-DAYS.                                                                    
COPY  9284        **                                                                                                                
COPY  9285         C002-FIND-DAY-366-M2K.                                                                                           
COPY  9286              SUBTRACT M2K-366-DAYS FROM M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9287                       GIVING M2K-CAL-DAYS.                                                                               
COPY  9288              ADD 1 TO M2K-CAL-YR.                                                                                        
COPY  9289        **                                                                                                                
COPY  9290         C003-FIND-DAY-365-M2K.                                                                                           
COPY  9291              SUBTRACT M2K-365-DAYS FROM M2K-CAL-DAYS                                                                     
COPY  9292                       GIVING M2K-CAL-DAYS.                                                                               
COPY  9293              ADD 1 TO M2K-CAL-YR.                                                                                        
COPY  9294        **                                                                                                                
COPY  9295         C010-SUBTRACT-JULIAN-M2K.                                                                                        
COPY  9296              DIVIDE 4 INTO M2K-CNV-YR GIVING M2K-DIV-DTE ROUNDED                                                         
COPY  9297                     REMAINDER M2K-REMAINDER.                                                                             
      9298                                                                                                                          
COPY  9299              IF M2K-IN-YR > ZEROS                                                                                        
COPY  9300                 SUBTRACT M2K-IN-YR FROM M2K-CNV-YR                                                                       
COPY  9301                          GIVING M2K-CNV-YR.                                                                              
      9302                                                                                                                          
COPY  9303              IF M2K-IN-DAYS > M2K-CNV-DAYS                                                                               
COPY  9304                 SUBTRACT 1 FROM M2K-CNV-YR GIVING M2K-CNV-YR                                                             
COPY  9305                 DIVIDE 4 INTO M2K-CNV-YR GIVING M2K-DIV-DTE                                                              
COPY  9306                          ROUNDED REMAINDER M2K-REMAINDER                                                                 
COPY  9307                 SUBTRACT M2K-CNV-DAYS FROM M2K-IN-DAYS                                                                   
COPY  9308                          GIVING M2K-CNV-DAYS                                                                             
COPY  9309                 IF M2K-REMAINDER = ZEROS                                                                                 
COPY  9310                    SUBTRACT M2K-CNV-DAYS FROM M2K-366-DAYS                                                               
COPY  9311                          GIVING M2K-CNV-DAYS                                                                             
COPY  9312                 ELSE                                                                                                     
COPY  9313                    SUBTRACT M2K-CNV-DAYS FROM M2K-365-DAYS                                                               
COPY  9314                          GIVING M2K-CNV-DAYS                                                                             
COPY  9315              ELSE                                                                                                        
COPY  9316                 SUBTRACT M2K-IN-DAYS FROM M2K-CNV-DAYS                                                                   
COPY  9317                          GIVING M2K-CNV-DAYS.                                                                            
      9318                                                                                                                          
COPY  9319             IF  M2K-CNV-DAYS = ZEROS                                                                                     
COPY  9320                 COMPUTE M2K-CNV-YR = M2K-CNV-YR - 1                                                                      
COPY  9321                 DIVIDE 4 INTO M2K-CNV-YR GIVING M2K-DIV-DTE                                                              
COPY  9322                        ROUNDED REMAINDER M2K-REMAINDER                                                                   
COPY  9323                 IF  M2K-REMAINDER > ZEROS                                                                                
COPY  9324                     MOVE 365     TO M2K-CNV-DAYS                                                                         
COPY  9325                 ELSE                                                                                                     
COPY  9326                     MOVE 366     TO M2K-CNV-DAYS.                                                                        
      6973                                                                                                                          
      6974        ***************************************************                                                               
      6975        *** CALCULATE DIFF IN 2 JUL DAYS.               ***                                                               
      6976        *** INPUT IS IN WSH-JUL-DATE1-R & WSH-JUL-DATE2 ***                                                               
      6977        *** -R.  DATE2 > DATE1                          ***                                                               
      6978        *** AND OUTPUT IS IN WSH-JUL-DATE3.             ***                                                               
      6979        *** LEAP YR CALCULATION IS DONE.                ***                                                               
      6980        ***************************************************

      6990         7000-OPEN-DB-AREAS-SECTION SECTION.

      6993             MOVE 'UPDAT#CIS$$$'         TO DB-UPDAT-KEY.

      6996         7000-DISSECT-PAYADY-NBR.                                                                                         
      6997  R004       MOVE WSH-PAYDAY-NBR         TO WSH-PAYDAY-DIGIT-1-2.                                                         
      6998                                                                                                                          
      6999         7000-OPEN-A84X.                                                                                                  
      7000             MOVE WSH-PAYDAY-DIGIT-2     TO WSH-AREA-A84X-X.                                                              
      7001             MOVE WSH-BUILD-AREA-A84X    TO WSH-AREA-A84X  .                                                              
      7002             MOVE WSH-BUILD-AREA-A84X    TO CALCR666-AN    .                                                              
      7003             OPEN WSH-AREA-A84X USAGE-MODE IS RETRIEVAL                                                                   
      7004                  ON ERROR GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                         
      7005  CC43       MOVE  WSH-PAYDAY-DIGIT-2    TO  WSH-AREA-A94X-X.                                                             
      7006  CC43       MOVE  WSH-BUILD-AREA-A94X   TO  WSH-AREA-A94X
