      7007  CC43                                       CALCR666-AN.                                                                 
      7008  CC43       OPEN  WSH-AREA-A94X  USAGE-MODE  IS  RETRIEVAL                                                               
      7009  CC43           ON  ERROR  GO  TO  7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                      
      7010                                                                                                                          
      7011         7000-OPEN-A80X.                                                                                                  
      7012  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A80'                                                                                   
      7013  R069           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      7014  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7015  R069           GO  TO  7000-OPEN-A86X.                                                                                  
      7016             MOVE WSH-PAYDAY-DIGIT-2     TO WSH-AREA-A80X-X.                                                              
      7017             MOVE WSH-BUILD-AREA-A80X    TO WSH-AREA-A80X  .                                                              
      7018             MOVE WSH-BUILD-AREA-A80X    TO CALCR246-AN    .                                                              
      7019             OPEN WSH-AREA-A80X USAGE-MODE IS UPDATE                                                                      
      7020                  ON ERROR GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                         
      7021                                                                                                                          
      7022  MD01   7000-OPEN-A86X.                                                                                                  
      7023  R069       IF  WSH-RUN-FLAG  =  'A86'                                                                                   
      7024  R069           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      7025  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7026  R069           GO  TO  7000-OPEN-A81X.                                                                                  
      7027  MD01       MOVE WSH-PAYDAY-DIGIT-2     TO WSH-AREA-A86X-X.                                                              
      7028  MD01       MOVE WSH-BUILD-AREA-A86X    TO WSH-AREA-A86X  .                                                              
      7029  MD01       MOVE WSH-BUILD-AREA-A86X    TO CALCR246-AN    .                                                              
      7030  MD01       OPEN WSH-AREA-A86X USAGE-MODE IS UPDATE                                                                      
      7031  MD01            ON ERROR GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                         
      7032  MD01                                                                                                                    
      7033         7000-OPEN-A81X.                                                                                                  
      7034             MOVE WSH-PAYDAY-DIGIT-2     TO WSH-AREA-A81X-X.                                                              
      7035             MOVE WSH-BUILD-AREA-A81X    TO WSH-AREA-A81X  .                                                              
      7036             MOVE WSH-BUILD-AREA-A81X    TO CALCR637-AN    .                                                              
      7037  R069       OPEN WSH-AREA-A81X USAGE-MODE IS RETRIEVAL                                                                   
      7038                  ON ERROR GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                         
      7039                                                                                                                          
      7040         7000-OPEN-A681.                                                                                                  
      7041             MOVE 'A681-RECOUP'          TO RCOUPMT-AN.                                                                   
      7042             OPEN A681-RECOUP USAGE-MODE IS RETRIEVAL                                                                     
      7043                  ON ERROR GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                         
      7044  R056       MOVE 80           TO WS-R15-AREA-DIGIT.                                                                      
      7045  R056       PERFORM 7002-OPEN-A580-A599-AREAS                                                                            
      7046  R056                                    THRU 7002-EXIT 20 TIMES.                                                        
      7047  CC47       MOVE 00           TO WS-R15-AREA-DIGIT-2.                                                                    
      7048  CC47       PERFORM 7002A-OPEN-A400-A419-AREAS                                                                           
      7049  CC47                                    THRU 7002A-EXIT 20 TIMES.                                                       
      7050  CC43       MOVE  80  TO  WS-R25-AREA-DIGIT.                                                                             
      7051  CC43       PERFORM  7003-OPEN-A980-A999-AREAS  THRU  7003-EXIT                                                          
      7052  CC43               20  TIMES.                                                                                           
      7053  R056       MOVE 30           TO WS-R17-AREA-DIGIT.                                                                      
      7054  R056       PERFORM 7004-OPEN-A630-A649-AREAS                                                                            
      7055  R056                                    THRU 7004-EXIT 20 TIMES.                                                        
      7056  R056       MOVE 40           TO WS-R19-AREA-DIGIT.                                                                      
      7057  R056       PERFORM 7006-OPEN-A740-A759-AREAS                                                                            
      7058  R056                                    THRU 7006-EXIT 20 TIMES.                                                        
      7059  R056                                                                                                                    
      7060  R056       MOVE 'A670-RCPT-20'   TO CALCR20-AN.                                                                         
      7061  R069       OPEN CALCR20-AN  USAGE-MODE IS RETRIEVAL.                                                                    
      7062  R056       IF ERROR-STATUS = '000000' OR '000928'                                                                       
      7063  R056          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      7064  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7065  R056          GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                                    
      7066         7000-EXIT-SECTION.                                                                                               
      7067             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7068                                                                                                                          
      7069  R056   7002-OPEN-INDIV-AREA SECTION.                                                                                    
      7070  R056   7002-OPEN-A580-A599-AREAS.                                                                                       
      7071  R056       MOVE WS-CALCR15-AN    TO CALCR15-AN.                                                                         
      7072  R056       OPEN CALCR15-AN  USAGE-MODE IS RETRIEVAL.                                                                    
      7073  R056       IF ERROR-STATUS = '000000' OR '000928'                                                                       
      7074  R056          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      7075  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7076  R056          GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                                    
      7077  R056                                                                                                                    
      7078  R056       ADD 1 TO WS-R15-AREA-DIGIT.                                                                                  
      7079  R056   7002-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7080  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7081  R056                                                                                                                    
      7082  CC47   7002A-OPEN-A400-A419-AREAS.                                                                                      
      7083  CC47       MOVE  WS-CALCR15-AN-2  TO  CALCR15-AN.                                                                       
      7084  CC47       OPEN  CALCR15-AN  USAGE-MODE  IS  RETRIEVAL.                                                                 
      7085  CC47       IF  ERROR-STATUS  =  '000000'  OR  '000928'                                                                  
      7086  CC47           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      7087  CC47       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7088  CC47           GO  TO  7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                                 
      7089  CC47       ADD  1  TO  WS-R15-AREA-DIGIT-2.                                                                             
      7090  CC47   7002A-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                             
      7091  CC43   7003-OPEN-A980-A999-AREAS.                                                                                       
      7092  CC43       MOVE  WS-CALCR25-AN    TO  CALCR25-AN.                                                                       
      7093  CC43       OPEN  CALCR25-AN  USAGE-MODE  IS  RETRIEVAL.                                                                 
      7094  CC43       IF  ERROR-STATUS  =  '000000'  OR  '000928'                                                                  
      7095  CC43           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      7096  CC43       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7097  CC43           GO  TO  7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                                 
      7098  CC43       ADD  1  TO  WS-R25-AREA-DIGIT.                                                                               
      7099  CC43   7003-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      7100  R056   7004-OPEN-A630-A649-AREAS.                                                                                       
      7101  R056       MOVE WS-CALCR17-AN    TO CALCR17-AN.                                                                         
      7102  R069       OPEN CALCR17-AN  USAGE-MODE IS RETRIEVAL.                                                                    
      7103  R056       IF ERROR-STATUS = '000000' OR '000928'                                                                       
      7104  R056          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      7105  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7106  R056          GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                                    
      7107  R056                                                                                                                    
      7108  R056       ADD 1 TO WS-R17-AREA-DIGIT.                                                                                  
      7109  R056   7004-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7110  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7111  R056                                                                                                                    
      7112  R056   7006-OPEN-A740-A759-AREAS.                                                                                       
      7113  R056       MOVE WS-CALCR19-AN    TO CALCR19-AN.                                                                         
      7114  R069       OPEN CALCR19-AN  USAGE-MODE IS RETRIEVAL.                                                                    
      7115  R056       IF ERROR-STATUS = '000000' OR '000928'                                                                       
      7116  R056          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      7117  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7118  R056          GO TO 7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                                    
      7119  R056                                                                                                                    
      7120  R056       ADD 1 TO WS-R19-AREA-DIGIT.                                                                                  
      7121  R056   7006-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7122  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7123  R056                                                                                                                    
      7124        *******************************************************                                                           
      7125        *** OPEN ERROR PROCESS ROUTINE.                     ***                                                           
      7126        *******************************************************                                                           
      7127         7010-OPEN-ERROR-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                 
      7128         7010-OPEN-ERROR.                                                                                                 
      7129             SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG     TO ON.                                                                           
      7130             PERFORM GENERAL-ERROR-RTN.                                                                                   
      7131                                                                                                                          
      7132         7010-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7133             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7134                                                                                                                          
      7135                                                                                                                          
      7136        *******************************************************                                                           
      7137        *** DATABASE DEPART SECTION.                        ***                                                           
      7138        *******************************************************                                                           
      7139         7050-DB-DEPART-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                  
      7140         7050-DB-DEPART.                                                                                                  
      7141             IF IMPART-DEPART = 1                                                                                         
      7142  TEST            DEPART.                                                                                                 
      7143  TEST  *         DEPART WITH ROLLBACK.                                                                                   
      7144  TEST  *    DISPLAY 'DEPART WITH ROLLBACK'  UPON  PRINTER.                                                               
      7145                                                                                                                          
      7146         7050-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7147             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7148                                                                                                                          
      7149                                                                                                                          
      7150        *******************************************************                                                           
      7151        *** GENERAL DATA BASE ACCESS PARAS, NOT SPECIFIC    ***                                                           
      7152        *** TO ANY PARTICULAR RECORD TYPE.                  ***                                                           
      7153        *** ENTRY POINTS ARE :                              ***                                                           
      7154        ***    . 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC                       ***                                                           
      7155        ***    . 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY                      ***                                                           
      7156        *******************************************************                                                           
      7157         7100-GENERAL-DB-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                 
      7158                                                                                                                          
      7159        *******************************************************                                                           
      7160        *** FIND CURRNET RECORD IN SPECIFIED RECORD-TYPE.   ***                                                           
      7161        *** WSH-RECORD-NAME COMES FORMATTED FROM CALLING    ***                                                           
      7162        *** PARA.                                           ***                                                           
      7163        *******************************************************                                                           
      7164         7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC.                                                                                            
      7165             FIND CURRENT RECORD WITHIN WSH-RECORD-NAME RECORD                                                            
      7166                  ON ERROR GO TO 7100-ERROR.                                                                              
      7167             GO TO 7100-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7168                                                                                                                          
      7169         7100-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7170             PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR                 THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7171                                                                                                                          
      7172         7100-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7173             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7174                                                                                                                          
      7175        *******************************************************                                                           
      7176        *** FETCH THE SPECIFIED RECORD TYPE ON A GIVEN      ***                                                           
      7177        *** DATABASE KEY.                                   ***                                                           
      7178        *** WSH-RECORD-NAME & WSH-FET-DBK COME PRE-FORMATTED***                                                           
      7179        *** FROM THE CALLING PARA.                          ***                                                           
      7180        *******************************************************                                                           
      7181         7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY.                                                                                           
      7182             FETCH WSH-RECORD-NAME RECORD WSH-FET-DBK                                                                     
      7183                  ON ERROR GO TO 7110-ERROR.                                                                              
      7184             GO TO 7110-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7185                                                                                                                          
      7186         7110-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7187             PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR                 THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7188                                                                                                                          
      7189         7110-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7190             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7191                                                                                                                          
      7192        *******************************************************                                                           
      7193        *** MODIFY DB RECORDS.                              ***                                                           
      7194        *** THIS ROUTINE IS MOSTLY USED FROM THOSE PARAS    ***                                                           
      7195        *** THAT END-DATE THE DB RECORDS.                   ***                                                           
      7196        *******************************************************                                                           
      7197         7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC.                                                                                          
      7198             MODIFY WSH-RECORD-NAME RECORD                                                                                
      7199                    ON ERROR GO TO 7120-ERROR.                                                                            
      7200  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
      7201  R065       MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-UPDATE-FLAG.                                                                              
      7202                                                                                                                          
      7203         7120-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      7204             GO TO 7120-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7205                                                                                                                          
      7206         7120-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7207             PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR                 THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7208                                                                                                                          
      7209         7120-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7210             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7211  R025  *******************************************************                                                           
      7212  R025  *** FROM THE CALLING PARA.                          ***                                                           
      7213  R025  *** WSH-RECORD-NAME & WSH-SET-NAM COME PRE-FORMATTED***                                                           
      7214  R025  *** FROM THE CALLING PARA.                          ***                                                           
      7215  R025  *******************************************************                                                           
      7216  R025   7140-FETCH-NEXT-GEN-REC-SET.                                                                                     
      7217  R025       FETCH NEXT WSH-RECORD-NAME WITHIN WSH-SET-NAME SET                                                           
      7218  R025            ON ERROR GO TO 7140-ERROR.                                                                              
      7219  R025       GO TO 7140-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7220  R025                                                                                                                    
      7221  R025   7140-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7222  R025       IF ERROR-NUM = '0007' OR '0013'                                                                              
      7223  R025          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      7224  R025       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7225  R025          PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7226  R025                                                                                                                    
      7227  R025   7140-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7228  R025       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7229                                                                                                                          
      7230                                                                                                                          
      7231        *******************************************************                                                           
      7232        *** DATA BASE ACCESS SECTIONS.                      ***                                                           
      7233        *** FOLLOWING SECTIONS HAVE BEEN DEFINED :          ***                                                           
      7234        ***    . SECTION 7200 . ENTRY POINT R666            ***                                                           
      7235        ***    . SECTION 7300 . ENTRY POINT R246            ***                                                           
      7236        ***    . SECTION 7700 . ENTRY POINT R270            ***                                                           
      7237        ***    . SECTION 7800 . ENTRY POINT R287            ***                                                           
      7238        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7239        *** TO QUICLY LOCATE A RECORD :                     ***                                                           
      7240        ***    . GO IN THAT SECTION, USE THE DB DIAGRAM     ***                                                           
      7241        ***    . CODE IS ORGANISED AS PER SETS,             ***                                                           
      7242        ***        LEFT TO RIGHT                            ***                                                           
      7243        ***    . WITHIN A SET, RECORDS ARE AVAILABLE IN AN  ***                                                           
      7244        ***        ASCENDING SEQUENCE.                      ***                                                           
      7245        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7246        *** ALL FETCH/STORE/MODIFY PARA ARE STORED          ***                                                           
      7247        *** CONSECUTIVELY, IN THAT SEQ.                     ***                                                           
      7248        *** FOLLOWING PARA NUMBERING CONVENTION IS FOLLOWED:***                                                           
      7249        ***     . FETCH  :  XXX0, EG 7320-FETCH-R634 .      ***                                                           
      7250        ***     . STORE  :  XXX2, EG 7378-STORE-R255 .      ***                                                           
      7251        ***     . MODIFY :  XXX4, EG 7328-MODIFY-R634.      ***                                                           
      7252        *** (UNFORTUNATELY, COULD NOT BE MAINTAINED !)      ***                                                           
      7253        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7254        *** ALMOST ALL DB FETCHES OF RECORDS-IN-SETS WUD    ***                                                           
      7255        *** FETCH RECORDS WITH END-DTE = ZEROS AND          ***                                                           
      7256        *** BEGIN-DTE <= PAYMENT DATES.                     ***                                                           
      7257        *** FORMAT-4 IS USED WITH A 'BACKWARD GO TO', IF    ***                                                           
      7258        *** END-DTE IS NOT = 0.                             ***                                                           
      7259        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7260        *** HAPPY HUNTING !                                 ***                                                           
      7261        *******************************************************                                                           
      7262                                                                                                                          
      7263        *******************************************************                                                           
      7264        *** R666 CASE SECTION                               ***                                                           
      7265        *** 2 SETS DESCRIBED, S369 AND S101.                ***                                                           
      7266        *** THIS AREA IS OPEN FOR RETRIEVAL ONLY AND WUD    ***                                                           
      7267        *** NOT SEE ANY UPDATES.                            ***                                                           
      7268        *******************************************************                                                           
      7269                                                                                                                          
      7270        *******************************************************                                                           
      7271        *** COMMON PROCESING LOGIC FOR VIA SET RECORDS.     ***                                                           
      7272        ***   . MAIN LINE WILL PERFORM THE DB FETCH         ***                                                           
      7273        ***     AND SUCCESS/FAILURE MUST BE INDICATED IN    ***                                                           
      7274        ***     WSS-R001-REC SWITCH.                        ***                                                           
      7275        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7276        ***   . FIRST VALID REC WITH 0 END-DTE AND          ***                                                           
      7277        ***     BEGIN DATE WITHIN CURRENT PAYMENT DATE WILL ***                                                           
      7278        ***     INDICATE A SUCCESSFUL FIRST REC READ.       ***                                                           
      7279        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7280        ***   . ATEMPT WILL BE MADE TO READ ONE MORE REC    ***                                                           
      7281        ***     WITH ABOVE CONDITIONS.                      ***                                                           
      7282        ***     IF FOUND, THE LATEST REC WILL BE KEPT       ***                                                           
      7283        ***     FOR PROCESSING AND OLDER REC WILL BE        ***                                                           
      7284        ***     END DATED, IN A SUBSEQUENT PROCESS.         ***                                                           
      7285        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7286        ***     THIS RECORD SHOULD BE TAGGED IN ATE01D08    ***                                                           
      7287        ***     ALONG WITH ITS CASE NUMBER AND RECORD TYPE. ***                                                           
      7288        *******************************************************                                                           
      7289                                                                                                                          
      7290        ****************************************************                                                              
      7291        *** 1. IF AT LEAST 1 VALID REC WAS FOUND,        ***                                                              
      7292        ***    CORRESPONDING REC-FOUND-SW IS TURNED ON.  ***                                                              
      7293        *** 2. IF NO MORE VALID OCCURENCES ARE THERE,    ***                                                              
      7294        ***    CHECK IF AT LEAST A CLOSED/FUTURE REC     ***                                                              
      7295        ***    WAS FOUND. IF IT WAS FOUND, MAKE THE      ***                                                              
      7296        ***    VALID REC CURRENT.                        ***                                                              
      7297        *** 3. IF 2 VALID RECS ARE FOUND, END DATE ONE   ***                                                              
      7298        ***    OF THEM.                                  ***                                                              
      7299        ****************************************************                                                              
      7300         7200-R666-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                       
      7301                                                                                                                          
      7302        *******************************************************                                                           
      7303        *** R666 ENTRY POINT REC.                          ****                                                           
      7304        *** BEFORE DOING A 'FETCH NEXT', REPOSITION R666.  ****                                                           
      7305        *******************************************************                                                           
      7306  R058   7205-FETCH-R666.                                                                                                 
      7307  TEST1 *    IF  WS-TEST-SW  =  'Y'                                                                                       
      7308  TEST1 *        DISPLAY  '7205-FETCH-R666 '  R666-NBR-CASE UPON PRINTER.                                                 
      7309  R069       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-R666-FOUND.                                                                               
      7310  R058       FETCH  R666-AE-CASE  RECORD  ON  ERROR                                                                       
      7311  R058           GO  TO  7205-ERROR.                                                                                      
      7312  R058   7205-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7313  R058       IF  ERROR-CODE  =  '00'                                                                                      
      7314  R069           MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-R666-FOUND                                                                            
      7315  R058       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7316  R069           IF  ERROR-NUM  =  '0006'  OR  '0007'  OR  '0013'                                                         
      7317  R069               MOVE  'N'    TO  WSS-R666-FOUND                                                                      
      7318  R069           ELSE                                                                                                     
      7319  R069               PERFORM  7995-DB-ERROR  THRU  7995-EXIT.                                                             
      7320  R058   7205-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      7321                                                                                                                          
      7322                                                                                                                          
      7323        *******************************************************                                                           
      7324        *** R672 . ONLY RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      7325        *** SET S369.                                       ***                                                           
      7326        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7327        *** THE FOLLOWING EXCEPTIONS OCCUR :                ***                                                           
      7328        ***     1. THIS IS A FUTURE CASE. ONLY 1 OPEN       ***                                                           
      7329        ***        672 BUT IT HAS A FUTURE BEGIN DATE.      ***                                                           
      7330        ***     2. THE CASE IS CLOSED. NO ZERO END-DTE      ***                                                           
      7331        ***        672 BUT THE ONE THAT DID EXIST, HAD      ***                                                           
      7332        ***        A 'CLOSED' STATUS.                       ***                                                           
      7333        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7334        ***  NORMAL CASE.                                   ***                                                           
      7335        ***     1. VALID OPEN 672.                          ***                                                           
      7336        ***     2. 'FUTURE-672' JUST GOING ACTIVE.          ***                                                           
      7337        *******************************************************                                                           
      7338         7220-FETCH-R672.                                                                                                 
      7339             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R672-REC.                                                                 
      7340             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-CASE-CLOSED.                                                              
      7341             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R672-FUTURE-REC.                                                          
      7342                                                                                                                          
      7343         7220-FETCH-FIRST-R672.                                                                                           
      7344             PERFORM 7222-FET-DET-R672             THRU 7222-EXIT.                                                        
      7345             IF WSS-R672-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7346                GO TO 7220-EXIT                                                                                           
      7347             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7348                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R672-1ST-DBK                                                     
      7349                     ON ERROR GO TO 7220-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7350                MOVE R672-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R672-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7351  R053          MOVE R672-CDE-DIST       TO CDE-DIST                                                                      
      7352  R053          MOVE R672-NBR-CSLD       TO NBR-CSLD                                                                      
      7353                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R672-REC                                                                  
      7354                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R672-REC-CNT.                                                             
      7355                                                                                                                          
      7356         7220-FETCH-SECOND-R672.                                                                                          
      7357             PERFORM 7222-FET-DET-R672             THRU 7222-EXIT.                                                        
      7358             IF WSS-R672-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7359                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      7360                     ON ERROR GO TO 7220-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7361                IF WSH-R672-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      7362                   MOVE WSH-R672-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7363                   MOVE WSH-R672-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7364                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7365                ELSE                                                                                                      
      7366                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      7367             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7368                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R672-2ND-DBK                                                    
      7369                     ON ERROR GO TO 7220-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7370                MOVE R672-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R672-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7371                PERFORM 7226-END-DTE-R672          THRU 7226-EXIT                                                         
      7372                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R672-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      7373                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      7374             GO TO 7220-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7375                                                                                                                          
      7376         7220-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      7377             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      7378                                                                                                                          
      7379         7220-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7380             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7381                                                                                                                          
      7382        *******************************************************                                                           
      7383        *** R672 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      7384        *******************************************************                                                           
      7385         7222-FET-DET-R672.                                                                                               
      7386             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R672-EOS.                                                                 
      7387             FETCH NEXT WSH-R672-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      7388                   S369-CASE-ATTRIB SET                                                                                   
      7389                        ON ERROR GO TO 7222-ERROR.                                                                        
      7390                                                                                                                          
      7391         7222-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      7392  M313       IF R672-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000                                                                               
      7393                   GO TO 7222-EXIT                                                                                        
      7394             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7395  R029             MOVE    1   TO   WSS-R672-EOS                                                                          
      7396  R029             GO TO 7222-EXIT.                                                                                       
      7397                                                                                                                          
      7398         7222-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7399  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      7400                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R672-EOS                                                                  
      7401             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7402                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7403                                                                                                                          
      7404         7222-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7405             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7406                                                                                                                          
      7407        *******************************************************                                                           
      7408        *** R672 . IDENTIFY THE RECORD THAT IS OLD          ***                                                           
      7409        *** AND PUT IT TO ATE01D08 TO BE UPDATED LATER.     ***                                                           
      7410        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      7411        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      7412        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      7413        *******************************************************                                                           
      7414         7226-END-DTE-R672.                                                                                               
      7415             IF WSH-R672-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R672-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      7416                MOVE R666-NBR-CASE       TO WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR                                                             
      7417                MOVE 'R672'              TO WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                               
      7418                PERFORM 8580-WRITE-ATE01D08        THRU 8580-EXIT                                                         
      7419             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7420             IF WSH-R672-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R672-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      7421                MOVE R666-NBR-CASE       TO WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR                                                             
      7422                MOVE 'R672'              TO WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                               
      7423                PERFORM 8580-WRITE-ATE01D08        THRU 8580-EXIT                                                         
      7424                                                                                                                          
      7425                MOVE WSH-R672-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7426                MOVE WSH-R672-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7427                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7428                                                                                                                          
      7429             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7430                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      7431                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      7432                MOVE 'R672-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      7433                MOVE R666-NBR-CASE       TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      7434                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      7435  R007          MOVE WSH-R672-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7436  R007          MOVE WSH-R672-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7437  R007          PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT.                                                        
      7438                                                                                                                          
      7439         7226-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7440             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7441                                                                                                                          
      7442        *******************************************************                                                           
      7443        *** R247 . 1ST  RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      7444        *** SET 101.                                        ***                                                           
      7445        *******************************************************                                                           
      7446         7240-FETCH-R247.                                                                                                 
      7447             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R247-REC.                                                                 
      7448                                                                                                                          
      7449         7240-FETCH-FIRST-R247.                                                                                           
      7450             PERFORM 7242-FET-DET-R247             THRU 7242-EXIT.                                                        
      7451             IF WSS-R247-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7452                GO TO 7240-EXIT                                                                                           
      7453             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7454                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R247-1ST-DBK                                                     
      7455                     ON ERROR GO TO 7240-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7456                MOVE R247-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R247-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7457                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R247-REC                                                                  
      7458                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R247-REC-CNT.                                                             
      7459                                                                                                                          
      7460         7240-FETCH-SECOND-R247.                                                                                          
      7461             PERFORM 7242-FET-DET-R247             THRU 7242-EXIT.                                                        
      7462             IF WSS-R247-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7463                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      7464                     ON ERROR GO TO 7240-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7465                IF WSH-R247-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      7466                   MOVE WSH-R247-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7467                   MOVE WSH-R247-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7468                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7469                ELSE                                                                                                      
      7470                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      7471             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7472                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R247-2ND-DBK                                                    
      7473                     ON ERROR GO TO 7240-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7474                MOVE R247-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R247-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7475                PERFORM 7246-END-DTE-R247          THRU 7246-EXIT                                                         
      7476                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R247-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      7477                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      7478             GO TO 7240-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7479                                                                                                                          
      7480         7240-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      7481             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      7482                                                                                                                          
      7483         7240-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7484             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7485                                                                                                                          
      7486        *******************************************************                                                           
      7487        *** R247 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      7488        *******************************************************                                                           
      7489         7242-FET-DET-R247.                                                                                               
      7490             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R247-EOS.                                                                 
      7491             FETCH NEXT WSH-R247-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      7492                   S101-CASE-NAME-ADR SET                                                                                 
      7493                        ON ERROR GO TO 7242-ERROR.                                                                        
      7494                                                                                                                          
      7495         7242-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      7496  M313       IF R247-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000                                                                               
      7497                   GO TO 7242-EXIT                                                                                        
      7498             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7499  R029          MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R247-EOS                                                                  
      7500  R029          GO TO 7242-EXIT.                                                                                          
      7501                                                                                                                          
      7502         7242-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7503  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      7504                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R247-EOS                                                                  
      7505             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7506                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7507                                                                                                                          
      7508         7242-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7509             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7510                                                                                                                          
      7511        *******************************************************                                                           
      7512        *** R247 . IDENTIFY THE RECORD THAT IS OLD          ***                                                           
      7513        *** AND PUT IT TO ATE01D08 TO BE UPDATED LATER.     ***                                                           
      7514        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      7515        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      7516        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      7517        *******************************************************                                                           
      7518         7246-END-DTE-R247.                                                                                               
      7519             IF WSH-R247-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R247-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      7520                MOVE R666-NBR-CASE       TO WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR                                                             
      7521                MOVE 'R247'              TO WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                               
      7522                PERFORM 8580-WRITE-ATE01D08        THRU 8580-EXIT                                                         
      7523             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7524             IF WSH-R247-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R247-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      7525                MOVE R666-NBR-CASE       TO WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR                                                             
      7526                MOVE 'R247'              TO WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                               
      7527                PERFORM 8580-WRITE-ATE01D08        THRU 8580-EXIT                                                         
      7528                                                                                                                          
      7529                MOVE WSH-R247-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7530                MOVE WSH-R247-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7531                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7532                                                                                                                          
      7533             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7534                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      7535                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      7536                MOVE 'R247-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      7537                MOVE R666-NBR-CASE       TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      7538                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      7539                                                                                                                          
      7540         7246-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7541             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7542                                                                                                                          
      7543        *******************************************************                                                           
      7544        *** R248 . 2ND  RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      7545        *** SET 101.                                        ***                                                           
      7546        *******************************************************                                                           
      7547         7260-FETCH-R248.                                                                                                 
      7548             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R248-REC.                                                                 
      7549                                                                                                                          
      7550         7260-FETCH-FIRST-R248.                                                                                           
      7551             PERFORM 7262-FET-DET-R248             THRU 7262-EXIT.                                                        
      7552             IF WSS-R248-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7553                GO TO 7260-EXIT                                                                                           
      7554             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7555                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R248-1ST-DBK                                                     
      7556                     ON ERROR GO TO 7260-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7557  R053***       MOVE R248-NAM-PMT        TO NAM-CASE                                                                      
      7558                MOVE R248-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R248-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7559                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R248-REC                                                                  
      7560                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R248-REC-CNT.                                                             
      7561                                                                                                                          
      7562         7260-FETCH-SECOND-R248.                                                                                          
      7563             PERFORM 7262-FET-DET-R248             THRU 7262-EXIT.                                                        
      7564             IF WSS-R248-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7565                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      7566                     ON ERROR GO TO 7260-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7567                IF WSH-R248-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      7568                   MOVE WSH-R248-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7569                   MOVE WSH-R248-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7570                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7571                ELSE                                                                                                      
      7572                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      7573             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7574                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R248-2ND-DBK                                                    
      7575                     ON ERROR GO TO 7260-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7576                MOVE R248-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R248-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7577                PERFORM 7266-END-DTE-R248          THRU 7266-EXIT                                                         
      7578                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R248-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      7579                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      7580             GO TO 7260-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7581                                                                                                                          
      7582         7260-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      7583             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      7584                                                                                                                          
      7585         7260-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7586             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7587                                                                                                                          
      7588        *******************************************************                                                           
      7589        *** R248 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      7590        *******************************************************                                                           
      7591         7262-FET-DET-R248.                                                                                               
      7592             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R248-EOS.                                                                 
      7593             FETCH NEXT WSH-R248-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      7594                   S101-CASE-NAME-ADR SET                                                                                 
      7595                        ON ERROR GO TO 7262-ERROR.                                                                        
      7596                                                                                                                          
      7597         7262-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      7598  M313       IF R248-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000                                                                               
      7599                   GO TO 7262-EXIT                                                                                        
      7600             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7601  R029          MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R248-EOS                                                                  
      7602  R029          GO TO 7262-EXIT.                                                                                          
      7603                                                                                                                          
      7604         7262-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7605  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      7606                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R248-EOS                                                                  
      7607             ELSE
