      7608                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7609                                                                                                                          
      7610         7262-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7611             EXIT.

      7615        *** AND PUT IT TO ATE01D08 TO BE UPDATED LATER.     ***                                                           
      7616        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      7617        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      7618        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***

      7623                MOVE 'R248'              TO WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                               
      7624                PERFORM 8580-WRITE-ATE01D08        THRU 8580-EXIT                                                         
      7625             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7626             IF WSH-R248-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R248-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      7627                MOVE R666-NBR-CASE       TO WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR                                                             
      7628                MOVE 'R248'              TO WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                               
      7629                PERFORM 8580-WRITE-ATE01D08        THRU 8580-EXIT                                                         
      7630

      7632                MOVE WSH-R248-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK

      7634                                                                                                                          
      7635             ELSE

      7637                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      7638                MOVE 'R248-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1

      7649         7280-FETCH-R254.                                                                                                 
      7650             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R254-REC.                                                                 
      7651                                                                                                                          
      7652         7280-FETCH-FIRST-R254.

      7661                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R254-REC-CNT.                                                             
      7662

      7664             PERFORM 7282-FET-DET-R254             THRU 7282-EXIT.                                                        
      7665             IF WSS-R254-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7666                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      7667                     ON ERROR GO TO 7280-BAD-CURRENCY

      7669                   MOVE WSH-R254-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7670                   MOVE WSH-R254-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7671                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7672                ELSE                                                                                                      
      7673                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      7674             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7675                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R254-2ND-DBK                                                    
      7676                     ON ERROR GO TO 7280-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7677                MOVE R254-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R254-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7678                PERFORM 7286-END-DTE-R254          THRU 7286-EXIT                                                         
      7679                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R254-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      7680                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      7681             GO TO 7280-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7682                                                                                                                          
      7683         7280-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      7684             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.

      7687             EXIT.

      7717        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***

      7746        *******************************************************                                                           
      7747        *** R246 CASE SECTION                               ***                                                           
      7748        *** 6 SETS DESCRIBED, IN THE SEQUENCE :             ***                                                           
      7749        ***   . S535-CM-CASE-BDGT                           ***                                                           
      7750        ***   . S396-CM-BDGT-INFO                           ***                                                           
      7751        ***   . S535-CM-ALT-GG                              ***                                                           
      7752        ***   . S535-CM-HMO-BULK-MAIL                       ***                                                           
      7753        ***   . S535-CM-BDGT-MBR-RLTN                       ***                                                           
      7754        ***   . S535-CM-BDGT-INFO                           ***                                                           
      7755        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7756        *** THIS AREA IS OPEN FOR UPDATE AND WUD SEE QUITE  ***                                                           
      7757        *** A FEW UPDATES. THE FOLLOWING RECORDS ARE BEING  ***                                                           
      7758        *** STORED :                                        ***                                                           
      7759        ***   . R255                                        ***                                                           
      7760        *******************************************************                                                           
      7761                                                                                                                          
      7762        *******************************************************                                                           
      7763        *** COMMON PROCESING LOGIC FOR VIA SET RECORDS.     ***                                                           
      7764        ***   . MAIN LINE WILL PERFORM THE DB FETCH         ***                                                           
      7765        ***     AND SUCCESS/FAILURE MUST BE INDICATED IN    ***                                                           
      7766        ***     WSS-R001-REDC SWITCH.                       ***                                                           
      7767        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7768        ***   . FIRST VALID REC WITH 0 END-DTE AND          ***                                                           
      7769        ***     BEGIN DATE WITHIN CURRENT PAYMENT DATE WILL ***                                                           
      7770        ***     INDICATE A SUCCESSFUL FIRST REC READ.       ***                                                           
      7771        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7772        ***   . ATEMPT WILL BE MADE TO READ ONE MORE REC    ***                                                           
      7773        ***     WITH ABOVE CONDITIONS.                      ***                                                           
      7774        ***     IF FOUND, THE LATEST REC WILL BE KEPT       ***                                                           
      7775        ***     FOR PROCESSING AND OLDER REC WILL BE        ***                                                           
      7776        ***     END DATED.( I.E.    M O D I F I E D !!)     ***                                                           
      7777        *******************************************************                                                           
      7778         7300-R246-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                       
      7779                                                                                                                          
      7780        *******************************************************                                                           
      7781        *** R246 CASE ENTRY PT RECORD.                      ***                                                           
      7782        *******************************************************                                                           
      7783         7300-FETCH-R246.                                                                                                 
      7784  R069       IF  WSA-R246-REC-CNT  =  0                                                                                   
      7785  R069           FETCH  FIRST  R246-CM-CASE  WITHIN  CALCR246-AN AREA                                                     
      7786  R069               ON ERROR  GO  TO  7300-ERROR                                                                         
      7787  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7788  R069           FIND  CURRENT  R246-CM-CASE  RECORD                                                                      
      7789  R069           FETCH  NEXT  R246-CM-CASE WITHIN CALCR246-AN AREA                                                        
      7790  R069               ON ERROR  GO  TO  7300-ERROR.                                                                        
      7791  R069       ADD  1  TO  WSA-R246-REC-CNT                                                                                 
      7792  R069                   WSA-R666-CHKPT-REC-CNT.                                                                          
      7793  R069   7300-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7794  R069       IF  ERROR-STATUS  =  '000000'                                                                                
      7795  R069           MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-R246-FOUND                                                                            
      7796  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7797  R069           IF  ERROR-CODE  =  '06'  OR  '07'  OR  '13'                                                              
      7798  R069               MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-R246-EOA                                                                          
      7799  R069           ELSE                                                                                                     
      7800  R069               PERFORM  7995-DB-ERROR  THRU  7995-EXIT.                                                             
      7801  R069   7300-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      7802  R069   7305-FETCH-R246.                                                                                                 
      7803  R069       FETCH  R246-CM-CASE  RECORD  ON ERROR  GO  TO  7305-ERROR.                                                   
      7804  R069   7305-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7805  R069       IF  ERROR-STATUS  =  ZEROES                                                                                  
      7806  R069           NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                           
      7807  R069       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7808  R069           PERFORM  7995-DB-ERROR  THRU  7995-EXIT.                                                                 
      7809  R069   7305-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      7810                                                                                                                          
      7811        *******************************************************                                                           
      7812        *** R249-CM-BDGT RECORD                             ***                                                           
      7813        *** S535. ONLY RECORD IN SET.                       ***                                                           
      7814        *******************************************************                                                           
      7815         7310-FETCH-R249.                                                                                                 
      7816             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R249-EOS.                                                                 
      7817             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R249-REC.                                                                 
      7818  R056       IF WSS-R249-FIRST-ON                                                                                         
      7819  R056          MOVE 0                   TO WSS-R249-FIRST                                                                
      7820  R056          FETCH FIRST WSH-R249-NAME WITHIN                                                                          
      7821  R056             S535-CM-CASE-BDGT SET                                                                                  
      7822  R056                  ON ERROR GO TO 7310-ERROR                                                                         
      7823  R056       ELSE                                                                                                         
      7824  R056          PERFORM 2339D-FIND-CURRENT-R249  THRU 2339D-EXIT                                                          
      7825  R056          FETCH NEXT WSH-R249-NAME WITHIN                                                                           
      7826  R056             S535-CM-CASE-BDGT SET                                                                                  
      7827  R056                  ON ERROR GO TO 7310-ERROR.                                                                        
      7828  TEST****                                                                                                                
      7829  TEST****   DISPLAY 'R249-NBR-CASE = ' R246-NBR-CASE                                                                     
      7830  TEST****           R249-CDE-CATEGORY  R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT                                                              
      7831  TEST****                                     UPON PRINTER.                                                              
      7832  R056****   DISPLAY 'NBR# '   WSH-ERR-PARA-NO UPON PRINTER.                                                              
      7833                                                                                                                          
      7834                                                                                                                          
      7835         7310-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      7836             ADD 1                       TO WSA-R249-REC-CNT.                                                             
      7837             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-R249-REC.                                                                 
      7838             GO TO 7310-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7839                                                                                                                          
      7840         7310-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7841  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      7842                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R249-EOS                                                                  
      7843                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-R249-REC                                                                  
      7844             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7845                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7846                                                                                                                          
      7847         7310-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7848             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7849                                                                                                                          
      7850  R067   7311-FIND-CURR-R249.                                                                                             
      7851  R067       FIND  CURRENT  R249-CASH-MEDICAL-BUDGET  RECORD  ON ERROR                                                    
      7852  R067           GO TO  7311-ERROR.                                                                                       
      7853  R067       GO  TO  7311-EXIT.                                                                                           
      7854  R067   7311-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7855  R067       PERFORM  7995-DB-ERROR  THRU  7995-EXIT.                                                                     
      7856  R067   7311-EXIT.    EXIT.                                                                                              
      7857        *******************************************************                                                           
      7858        *** R634 . ONLY RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      7859        *** SET S396.                                       ***                                                           
      7860        ***      . POSSIBILITY OF A FUTURE BUDGET EXISTS.   ***                                                           
      7861        ***      . ATTEMPTS WUD BE MADE TO FETCH A LIVE     ***                                                           
      7862        ***        634 REC, SO THAT PROCESSING MAY CONTINUE.***                                                           
      7863        ***      . NO LIVE 634, BUT A FUTURE 634, WILL NOT  ***                                                           
      7864        ***        BE AN ERROR, BUT WILL BE BYPASSED.       ***                                                           
      7865        ***      . NO 0 END DATED 634 REC WILL BE AN ERROR. ***                                                           
      7866        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      7867        ***      . FUTURE-REC-SW WILL BE SET IF A VALID     ***                                                           
      7868        ***        FUTURE REC EXISTS.                       ***                                                           
      7869        *******************************************************                                                           
      7870         7320-FETCH-R634.                                                                                                 
      7871             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R634-REC.                                                                 
      7872             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R634-FUTURE-REC.                                                          
      7873  R070       MOVE  'N'  TO  WSS-FUT-CLOS.                                                                                 
      7874                                                                                                                          
      7875         7320-FETCH-FIRST-R634.                                                                                           
      7876             PERFORM 7322-FET-DET-R634             THRU 7322-EXIT.                                                        
      7877             IF WSS-R634-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7878                GO TO 7320-EXIT                                                                                           
      7879             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7880                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R634-1ST-DBK                                                     
      7881                     ON ERROR GO TO 7320-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7882                MOVE R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R634-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7883                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R634-REC                                                                  
      7884                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R634-REC-CNT.                                                             
      7885                                                                                                                          
      7886         7320-FETCH-SECOND-R634.                                                                                          
      7887             PERFORM 7322-FET-DET-R634             THRU 7322-EXIT.                                                        
      7888             IF WSS-R634-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      7889                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      7890                     ON ERROR GO TO 7320-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7891                IF WSH-R634-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      7892                   MOVE WSH-R634-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7893                   MOVE WSH-R634-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7894                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7895                ELSE                                                                                                      
      7896                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      7897             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7898                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R634-2ND-DBK                                                    
      7899                     ON ERROR GO TO 7320-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      7900                MOVE R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R634-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      7901                PERFORM 7326-END-DTE-R634          THRU 7326-EXIT                                                         
      7902                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R634-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      7903                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      7904             GO TO 7320-EXIT.                                                                                             
      7905                                                                                                                          
      7906         7320-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      7907             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      7908                                                                                                                          
      7909         7320-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7910             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7911                                                                                                                          
      7912        *******************************************************                                                           
      7913        *** R634 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      7914        *** SPECIAL LOGIC. LOOK CAREFULLY.                  ***                                                           
      7915        *** R634 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      7916        *******************************************************                                                           
      7917         7322-FET-DET-R634.                                                                                               
      7918             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R634-EOS.                                                                 
      7919             FETCH NEXT WSH-R634-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      7920                   S396-CM-BDGT-INFO SET                                                                                  
      7921                        ON ERROR GO TO 7322-ERROR.                                                                        
      7922                                                                                                                          
      7923         7322-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      7924  M313       IF R634-DTE-END-EFFV > 0000000                                                                               
      7925  R029          MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R634-EOS                                                                  
      7926  R029          GO TO 7322-EXIT.                                                                                          
      7927  R070       IF  R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT  >  0  AND                                                                          
      7928  R070           R634-DTE-END-EFFV     =  0                                                                               
      7929  TEST  *            DISPLAY  'FUTURE CLOSE DATE SWITCH SET FOR '                                                         
      7930  TEST  *                R246-NBR-CASE  UPON  PRINTER                                                                     
      7931  R070           MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-FUT-CLOS.                                                                             
      7932  M313       IF R634-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000                                                                               
      7933                IF R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                               
      7934                    GO TO 7322-EXIT                                                                                       
      7935                ELSE                                                                                                      
      7936                    MOVE 1               TO WSS-R634-FUTURE-REC.                                                          
      7937                                                                                                                          
      7938             GO TO 7322-FET-DET-R634.                                                                                     
      7939         7322-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      7940  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      7941                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R634-EOS                                                                  
      7942             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7943                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      7944                                                                                                                          
      7945         7322-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7946             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7947                                                                                                                          
      7948        *******************************************************                                                           
      7949        *** R634 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      7950        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      7951        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      7952        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      7953        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      7954        *******************************************************                                                           
      7955         7326-END-DTE-R634.                                                                                               
      7956             MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      7957             MOVE 'R634'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      7958             MOVE WSH-R634-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      7959             MOVE WSH-R634-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      7960             PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      7961                                                                                                                          
      7962             IF WSH-R634-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R634-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      7963                MOVE WSH-R634-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7964                MOVE WSH-R634-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7965                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7966                                                                                                                          
      7967  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R634-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      7968                MOVE WSH-R634-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7969  R078          MOVE 'R634' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      7970                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      7971                                                                                                                          
      7972                MOVE WSH-R634-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7973                MOVE WSH-R634-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7974                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7975                                                                                                                          
      7976             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7977             IF WSH-R634-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R634-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      7978  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R634-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      7979                MOVE WSH-R634-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7980  R078          MOVE 'R634' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      7981                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      7982                                                                                                                          
      7983                MOVE WSH-R634-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      7984                MOVE WSH-R634-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      7985                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      7986                                                                                                                          
      7987             ELSE                                                                                                         
      7988                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      7989                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      7990                MOVE 'R634-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      7991                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      7992                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      7993                                                                                                                          
      7994         7326-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      7995             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      7996                                                                                                                          
      7997        *******************************************************                                                           
      7998        *** R634 . MODIFY.                                  ***                                                           
      7999        *******************************************************                                                           
      8000         7328-MODIFY-R634.                                                                                                
      8001             MODIFY R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO RECORD                                                                            
      8002                    ON ERROR GO TO 7328-ERROR.                                                                            
      8003  R078       MOVE 'R634' TO D18-REC-CDE.                                                                                  
      8004  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
      8005  R065       MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-UPDATE-FLAG.                                                                              
      8006                                                                                                                          
      8007         7328-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      8008             GO TO 7328-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8009                                                                                                                          
      8010         7328-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8011             PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR                 THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8012                                                                                                                          
      8013         7328-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8014             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8015                                                                                                                          
      8016  R056   7330-STORE-R634.                                                                                                 
      8017  R056       STORE R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO                                                                                    
      8018  R070             ON ERROR GO TO 7330-ERROR.                                                                             
      8019  R078       MOVE 'R634' TO D18-REC-CDE.                                                                                  
      8020  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
      8021  R065       MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-UPDATE-FLAG.                                                                              
      8022  R056                                                                                                                    
      8023  R056   7330-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      8024  R056       GO TO 7330-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8025  R056                                                                                                                    
      8026  R056   7330-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8027  R056       PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR                 THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8028  R056                                                                                                                    
      8029  R056   7330-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8030  R056       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8031  R056                                                                                                                    
      8032        *******************************************************                                                           
      8033        *** R252 . 1ST  RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      8034        *** SET S536.                                       ***                                                           
      8035        *******************************************************                                                           
      8036         7350-FETCH-R252.                                                                                                 
      8037             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R252-REC.                                                                 
      8038                                                                                                                          
      8039         7350-FETCH-FIRST-R252.                                                                                           
      8040             PERFORM 7352-FET-DET-R252             THRU 7352-EXIT.                                                        
      8041             IF WSS-R252-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      8042                GO TO 7350-EXIT                                                                                           
      8043             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8044                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R252-1ST-DBK                                                     
      8045                     ON ERROR GO TO 7350-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8046                MOVE R252-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R252-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                          
      8047                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R252-REC                                                                  
      8048                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R252-REC-CNT.                                                             
      8049                                                                                                                          
      8050         7350-FETCH-SECOND-R252.                                                                                          
      8051             PERFORM 7352-FET-DET-R252             THRU 7352-EXIT.                                                        
      8052             IF WSS-R252-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      8053                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      8054                     ON ERROR GO TO 7350-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8055                IF WSH-R252-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      8056                   MOVE WSH-R252-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8057                   MOVE WSH-R252-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8058                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8059                ELSE                                                                                                      
      8060                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      8061             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8062                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R252-2ND-DBK                                                    
      8063                     ON ERROR GO TO 7350-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8064                MOVE R252-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R252-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      8065                PERFORM 7356-END-DTE-R252          THRU 7356-EXIT                                                         
      8066                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R252-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      8067                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      8068             GO TO 7350-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8069                                                                                                                          
      8070         7350-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      8071             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      8072                                                                                                                          
      8073         7350-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8074             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8075                                                                                                                          
      8076        *******************************************************                                                           
      8077        *** R252 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      8078        *******************************************************                                                           
      8079         7352-FET-DET-R252.                                                                                               
      8080             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R252-EOS.                                                                 
      8081             FETCH NEXT WSH-R252-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      8082                   S536-CM-ALT-CG SET                                                                                     
      8083                        ON ERROR GO TO 7352-ERROR.                                                                        
      8084                                                                                                                          
      8085         7352-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      8086  M313       IF R252-DTE-END-EFFV > 0000000                                                                               
      8087  R029          MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R252-EOS                                                                  
      8088  R029          GO TO 7352-EXIT.                                                                                          
      8089  M313       IF R252-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000 AND                                                                           
      8090                R252-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                  
      8091                    GO TO 7352-EXIT                                                                                       
      8092             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8093                    GO TO 7352-FET-DET-R252.                                                                              
      8094         7352-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8095  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      8096                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R252-EOS                                                                  
      8097             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8098                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8099                                                                                                                          
      8100         7352-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8101             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8102                                                                                                                          
      8103        *******************************************************                                                           
      8104        *** R252 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      8105        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      8106        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      8107        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      8108        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      8109        *******************************************************

      8112             MOVE 'R252'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      8113             MOVE WSH-R252-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      8114             MOVE WSH-R252-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      8115             PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      8116                                                                                                                          
      8117             IF WSH-R252-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R252-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8118                MOVE WSH-R252-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8119                MOVE WSH-R252-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8120                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8121                                                                                                                          
      8122  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R252-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8123                MOVE WSH-R252-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8124  R078          MOVE 'R252' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      8125                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8126                                                                                                                          
      8127                MOVE WSH-R252-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8128                MOVE WSH-R252-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8129                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8130                                                                                                                          
      8131             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8132             IF WSH-R252-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R252-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8133  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R252-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8134                MOVE WSH-R252-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8135  R078          MOVE 'R252' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      8136                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8137                                                                                                                          
      8138                MOVE WSH-R252-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8139                MOVE WSH-R252-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8140                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8141                                                                                                                          
      8142             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8143                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      8144                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      8145                MOVE 'R252-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      8146                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      8147                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.

      8149         7356-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8150             EXIT.
