      8248                MOVE WSH-R253-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8249                MOVE WSH-R253-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8250                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8251                                                                                                                          
      8252             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8253             IF WSH-R253-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R253-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8254  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R253-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8255                MOVE WSH-R253-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8256  R078          MOVE 'R253' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      8257                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8258                                                                                                                          
      8259                MOVE WSH-R253-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8260                MOVE WSH-R253-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8261                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8262                                                                                                                          
      8263             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8264                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      8265                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      8266                MOVE 'R253-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      8267                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      8268                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      8269                                                                                                                          
      8270         7366-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8271             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8272                                                                                                                          
      8273        *******************************************************                                                           
      8274        *** R255 . 3RD  RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      8275        *** SET S536.                                       ***                                                           
      8276        *******************************************************                                                           
      8277         7370-FETCH-R255.                                                                                                 
      8278             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R255-REC.                                                                 
      8279                                                                                                                          
      8280         7370-FETCH-FIRST-R255.                                                                                           
      8281             PERFORM 7372-FET-DET-R255             THRU 7372-EXIT.                                                        
      8282             IF WSS-R255-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      8283                GO TO 7370-EXIT                                                                                           
      8284             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8285                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R255-1ST-DBK                                                     
      8286                     ON ERROR GO TO 7370-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8287                MOVE R255-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R255-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                          
      8288                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R255-REC                                                                  
      8289                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R255-REC-CNT.                                                             
      8290                                                                                                                          
      8291         7370-FETCH-SECOND-R255.                                                                                          
      8292             PERFORM 7372-FET-DET-R255             THRU 7372-EXIT.                                                        
      8293             IF WSS-R255-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      8294                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      8295                     ON ERROR GO TO 7370-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8296                IF WSH-R255-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      8297                   MOVE WSH-R255-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8298                   MOVE WSH-R255-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8299                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8300                ELSE                                                                                                      
      8301                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      8302             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8303                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R255-2ND-DBK                                                    
      8304                     ON ERROR GO TO 7370-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8305                MOVE R255-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R255-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      8306                PERFORM 7376-END-DTE-R255          THRU 7376-EXIT                                                         
      8307                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R255-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      8308                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      8309             GO TO 7370-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8310                                                                                                                          
      8311         7370-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      8312             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      8313                                                                                                                          
      8314         7370-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8315             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8316                                                                                                                          
      8317        *******************************************************                                                           
      8318        *** R255 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      8319        *******************************************************                                                           
      8320         7372-FET-DET-R255.                                                                                               
      8321             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R255-EOS.                                                                 
      8322             FETCH NEXT WSH-R255-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      8323                   S536-CM-ALT-CG SET                                                                                     
      8324                        ON ERROR GO TO 7372-ERROR.                                                                        
      8325                                                                                                                          
      8326         7372-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      8327  M313       IF R255-DTE-END-EFFV > 0000000                                                                               
      8328  R029          MOVE 1      TO WSS-R255-EOS                                                                               
      8329  R029          GO TO 7372-EXIT.                                                                                          
      8330  M313       IF R255-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000 AND                                                                           
      8331                R255-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                  
      8332                    GO TO 7372-EXIT                                                                                       
      8333             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8334                    GO TO 7372-FET-DET-R255.                                                                              
      8335                                                                                                                          
      8336         7372-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8337  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      8338                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R255-EOS                                                                  
      8339             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8340                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8341                                                                                                                          
      8342         7372-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8343             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8344                                                                                                                          
      8345        *******************************************************                                                           
      8346        *** R255 . SPECIAL FETCH VERSION.                   ***                                                           
      8347        *** IT IS USED IN DD BANK CHANGES ROUTINES AND      ***                                                           
      8348        *** WOULD RETURN ALL RECORDS WITHOUT DOING ANY DATE ***                                                           
      8349        *** CHECKS. CHECKS WUD BE PERFORMED IN CALLING PARA.***                                                           
      8350        *******************************************************                                                           
      8351         7374-FETCH-R255.                                                                                                 
      8352             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R255-EOS.                                                                 
      8353             FETCH NEXT WSH-R255-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      8354                   S536-CM-ALT-CG SET                                                                                     
      8355                        ON ERROR GO TO 7374-ERROR.                                                                        
      8356             GO TO 7374-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8357                                                                                                                          
      8358         7374-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8359  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      8360                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R255-EOS                                                                  
      8361             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8362                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8363                                                                                                                          
      8364         7374-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8365             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8366                                                                                                                          
      8367        *******************************************************                                                           
      8368        *** R255 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      8369        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      8370        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      8371        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      8372        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      8373        *******************************************************                                                           
      8374         7376-END-DTE-R255.                                                                                               
      8375             MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      8376             MOVE 'R255'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      8377             MOVE WSH-R255-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      8378             MOVE WSH-R255-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      8379             PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      8380                                                                                                                          
      8381             IF WSH-R255-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R255-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8382                MOVE WSH-R255-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8383                MOVE WSH-R255-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8384                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8385                                                                                                                          
      8386  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R255-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8387                MOVE WSH-R255-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8388  R078          MOVE 'R255' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      8389                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8390                                                                                                                          
      8391                MOVE WSH-R255-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8392                MOVE WSH-R255-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8393                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8394                                                                                                                          
      8395             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8396             IF WSH-R255-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R255-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8397  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R255-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8398                MOVE WSH-R255-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8399  R078          MOVE 'R255' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      8400                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8401                                                                                                                          
      8402                MOVE WSH-R255-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8403                MOVE WSH-R255-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8404                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8405                                                                                                                          
      8406             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8407                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      8408                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      8409                MOVE 'R255-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      8410                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      8411                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      8412                                                                                                                          
      8413         7376-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8414             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8415                                                                                                                          
      8416        *******************************************************                                                           
      8417        *** R255 . STORE                                    ***                                                           
      8418        *******************************************************                                                           
      8419         7378-STORE-R255.                                                                                                 
      8420             STORE R255-CASH-GRANT                                                                                        
      8421                   ON ERROR GO TO 7378-ERROR.                                                                             
      8422  R078       MOVE 'R255' TO D18-REC-CDE.                                                                                  
      8423  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
      8424  R065       MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-UPDATE-FLAG.                                                                              
      8425                                                                                                                          
      8426         7378-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      8427             ADD 1                       TO WSA-R255-STO-CNT.                                                             
      8428             GO TO 7378-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8429                                                                                                                          
      8430         7378-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8431             PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR                 THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8432                                                                                                                          
      8433         7378-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8434             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8435                                                                                                                          
      8436        *******************************************************                                                           
      8437        *** R255 . MODIFY                                   ***                                                           
      8438        *******************************************************                                                           
      8439         7379-MODIFY-R255.                                                                                                
      8440             MODIFY R255-CASH-GRANT RECORD                                                                                
      8441                   ON ERROR GO TO 7379-ERROR.                                                                             
      8442  R078       MOVE 'R255' TO D18-REC-CDE.                                                                                  
      8443  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
      8444  R065       MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-UPDATE-FLAG.                                                                              
      8445                                                                                                                          
      8446         7379-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      8447             GO TO 7379-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8448                                                                                                                          
      8449         7379-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8450             PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR                 THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8451                                                                                                                          
      8452         7379-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8453             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8454                                                                                                                          
      8455        *******************************************************                                                           
      8456        *** R269 . 4TH  RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      8457        *** SET S536.                                       ***                                                           
      8458        *******************************************************                                                           
      8459         7380-FETCH-R269.                                                                                                 
      8460             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R269-REC.                                                                 
      8461                                                                                                                          
      8462         7380-FETCH-FIRST-R269.                                                                                           
      8463             PERFORM 7382-FET-DET-R269             THRU 7382-EXIT.                                                        
      8464             IF WSS-R269-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      8465                GO TO 7380-EXIT                                                                                           
      8466             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8467                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R269-1ST-DBK                                                     
      8468                     ON ERROR GO TO 7380-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8469                MOVE R269-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R269-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                          
      8470                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R269-REC                                                                  
      8471                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R269-REC-CNT.                                                             
      8472                                                                                                                          
      8473         7380-FETCH-SECOND-R269.                                                                                          
      8474             PERFORM 7382-FET-DET-R269             THRU 7382-EXIT.                                                        
      8475             IF WSS-R269-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      8476                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      8477                     ON ERROR GO TO 7380-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8478                IF WSH-R269-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      8479                   MOVE WSH-R269-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8480                   MOVE WSH-R269-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8481                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8482                ELSE                                                                                                      
      8483                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      8484             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8485                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R269-2ND-DBK                                                    
      8486                     ON ERROR GO TO 7380-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8487                MOVE R269-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R269-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      8488                PERFORM 7386-END-DTE-R269          THRU 7386-EXIT                                                         
      8489                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R269-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      8490                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      8491             GO TO 7380-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8492                                                                                                                          
      8493         7380-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      8494             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      8495                                                                                                                          
      8496         7380-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8497             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8498                                                                                                                          
      8499        *******************************************************                                                           
      8500        *** R269 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      8501        *******************************************************                                                           
      8502         7382-FET-DET-R269.                                                                                               
      8503             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R269-EOS.                                                                 
      8504             FETCH NEXT WSH-R269-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      8505                   S536-CM-ALT-CG SET                                                                                     
      8506                        ON ERROR GO TO 7382-ERROR.                                                                        
      8507                                                                                                                          
      8508         7382-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      8509  M313          IF R269-DTE-END-EFFV > 0000000                                                                            
      8510  R029             MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R269-EOS                                                               
      8511  R029             GO TO     7382-EXIT.                                                                                   
      8512  M313       IF R269-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000  AND                                                                          
      8513                R269-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                  
      8514                    GO TO 7382-EXIT                                                                                       
      8515             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8516                    GO TO 7382-FET-DET-R269.                                                                              
      8517         7382-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8518  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      8519                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R269-EOS                                                                  
      8520             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8521                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8522                                                                                                                          
      8523         7382-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8524             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8525                                                                                                                          
      8526        *******************************************************                                                           
      8527        *** R269 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      8528        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      8529        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      8530        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      8531        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      8532        *******************************************************                                                           
      8533         7386-END-DTE-R269.                                                                                               
      8534             MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      8535             MOVE 'R269'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      8536             MOVE WSH-R269-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      8537             MOVE WSH-R269-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.

      8539                                                                                                                          
      8540             IF WSH-R269-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R269-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8541                MOVE WSH-R269-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8542                MOVE WSH-R269-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8543                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8544                                                                                                                          
      8545  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R269-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8546                MOVE WSH-R269-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8547  R078          MOVE 'R269' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      8548                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8549                                                                                                                          
      8550                MOVE WSH-R269-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8551                MOVE WSH-R269-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8552                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8553                                                                                                                          
      8554             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8555             IF WSH-R269-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R269-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8556  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R269-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8557                MOVE WSH-R269-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8558  R078          MOVE 'R269' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      8559                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8560                                                                                                                          
      8561                MOVE WSH-R269-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8562                MOVE WSH-R269-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8563                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8564                                                                                                                          
      8565             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8566                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      8567                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      8568                MOVE 'R269-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      8569                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      8570                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      8571                                                                                                                          
      8572         7386-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8573             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8574                                                                                                                          
      8575        *******************************************************                                                           
      8576        *** R260 . 1ST  RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      8577        *** SET S538.                                       ***                                                           
      8578        *******************************************************                                                           
      8579  R069A *7400-FETCH-R260.                                                                                                 
      8580  R069A *    MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R260-REC.                                                                 
      8581                                                                                                                          
      8582  R069A *7400-FETCH-FIRST-R260.                                                                                           
      8583  R069A *    PERFORM 7402-FET-DET-R260             THRU 7402-EXIT.                                                        
      8584  R069A *    IF WSS-R260-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      8585  R069A *       GO TO 7400-EXIT                                                                                           
      8586  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      8587  R069A *       MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R260-1ST-DBK                                                     
      8588  R069A *            ON ERROR GO TO 7400-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8589  R069A *       MOVE R260-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R260-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                          
      8590  R069A *       MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R260-REC                                                                  
      8591  R069A *       ADD 1                    TO WSA-R260-REC-CNT.                                                             
      8592                                                                                                                          
      8593  R069A *7400-FETCH-SECOND-R260.                                                                                          
      8594  R069A *    PERFORM 7402-FET-DET-R260             THRU 7402-EXIT.                                                        
      8595  R069A *    IF WSS-R260-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      8596  R069A *       MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      8597  R069A *            ON ERROR GO TO 7400-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8598  R069A *       IF WSH-R260-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      8599  R069A *          MOVE WSH-R260-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8600  R069A *          MOVE WSH-R260-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8601  R069A *          PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8602  R069A *       ELSE                                                                                                      
      8603  R069A *          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      8604  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      8605  R069A *       MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R260-2ND-DBK                                                    
      8606  R069A *            ON ERROR GO TO 7400-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      8607  R069A *       MOVE R260-DTE-BGN-EFFV   TO WSH-R260-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                          
      8608  R069A *       PERFORM 7406-END-DTE-R260          THRU 7406-EXIT                                                         
      8609  R069A *       ADD 1                    TO WSA-R260-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      8610  R069A *       ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      8611  R069A *    GO TO 7400-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8612                                                                                                                          
      8613  R069A *7400-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      8614  R069A *    PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      8615  R069A *                                                                                                                 
      8616  R069A *7400-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8617  R069A *    EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8618                                                                                                                          
      8619        *******************************************************                                                           
      8620        *** R260 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      8621        *******************************************************                                                           
      8622  R069A *7402-FET-DET-R260.                                                                                               
      8623  R069A *    MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R260-EOS.                                                                 
      8624  R069A *    FETCH NEXT WSH-R260-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      8625  R069A *          S538-CM-HMO-BULK-MAIL SET                                                                              
      8626  R069A *               ON ERROR GO TO 7402-ERROR.                                                                        
      8627                                                                                                                          
      8628  R069A *7402-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      8629  R069A *    IF R260-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000  AND                                                                          
      8630  R069A *       R260-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                  
      8631  R069A *           GO TO 7402-EXIT                                                                                       
      8632  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      8633  R069A *           GO TO 7402-FET-DET-R260.                                                                              
      8634                                                                                                                          
      8635  R069A *7402-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8636  R069A *    IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      8637  R069A *       MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R260-EOS                                                                  
      8638  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      8639  R069A *       PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8640                                                                                                                          
      8641  R069A *7402-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8642  R069A *    EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8643                                                                                                                          
      8644        *******************************************************                                                           
      8645        *** R260 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      8646        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      8647        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      8648        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      8649        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      8650        *******************************************************                                                           
      8651  R069A *7406-END-DTE-R260.                                                                                               
      8652  R069A *    MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      8653  R069A *    MOVE 'R260'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      8654  R069A *    MOVE WSH-R260-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      8655  R069A *    MOVE WSH-R260-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      8656  R069A *    PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      8657  R069A *                                                                                                                 
      8658  R069A *    IF WSH-R260-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R260-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8659  R069A *       MOVE WSH-R260-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8660  R069A *       MOVE WSH-R260-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8661  R069A *       PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8662                                                                                                                          
      8663  R069A *       MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R260-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8664  R069A *       MOVE WSH-R260-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8665  R069A *       PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8666                                                                                                                          
      8667  R069A *       MOVE WSH-R260-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8668  R069A *       MOVE WSH-R260-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8669  R069A *       PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8670                                                                                                                          
      8671  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      8672  R069A *    IF WSH-R260-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R260-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      8673  R069A *       MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R260-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      8674  R069A *       MOVE WSH-R260-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8675  R069A *       PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      8676                                                                                                                          
      8677  R069A *       MOVE WSH-R260-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      8678  R069A *       MOVE WSH-R260-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      8679  R069A *       PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      8680                                                                                                                          
      8681  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
      8682  R069A *       MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      8683  R069A *       MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      8684  R069A *       MOVE 'R260-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      8685  R069A *       MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      8686  R069A *       PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      8687                                                                                                                          
      8688  R069A *7406-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8689  R069A *    EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8690                                                                                                                          
      8691                                                                                                                          
      8692        *******************************************************                                                           
      8693        *** R268 . ONLY RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      8694        *** SET S104.                                       ***                                                           
      8695        *******************************************************                                                           
      8696         7450-FETCH-R268.                                                                                                 
      8697             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R268-REC.                                                                 
      8698             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R268-EOS.                                                                 
      8699             MOVE ZEROS                  TO R268-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                            
      8700             FETCH NEXT R268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION WITHIN                                                                
      8701                   S104-CM-BDGT-MBR-RLTN SET                                                                              
      8702                        ON ERROR GO TO 7450-ERROR.                                                                        
      8703                                                                                                                          
      8704         7450-CHECK-DTE-END.                                                                                              
      8705  M313       IF R268-DTE-END-EFFV NOT = 0000000                                                                           
      8706  R029          MOVE  1      TO  WSS-R268-EOS                                                                             
      8707  R029          GO TO 7450-EXIT.                                                                                          
      8708  R064       IF  WSH-R268-FIRST-RCPT  =  ZEROES                                                                           
      8709  R064           MOVE  R268-NBR-INDIV  TO  WSH-R268-FIRST-RCPT.                                                           
      8710         7450-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      8711             IF R268-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                  
      8712                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R268-REC-CNT                                                              
      8713                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R268-REC.                                                                 
      8714  R053       GO TO 7450-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8715                                                                                                                          
      8716         7450-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8717  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      8718                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R268-EOS                                                                  
      8719             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8720                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8721                                                                                                                          
      8722         7450-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8723             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8724                                                                                                                          
      8725        *******************************************************                                                           
      8726        *** R268 . SECOND TYPE OF FETCH.                    ***                                                           
      8727        *** THIS PARA IS USED EXCLUSIVELY FOR DETERMINING   ***                                                           
      8728        *** FUTURE CLOSE INDIVIDUALS WHOSE DTE-END-FUTURE   ***                                                           
      8729        *** HAS BECOME <=    TO PAYMENT DATE - 1.           ***                                                           
      8730        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      8731        *** PARA DOES A BASIC DMS FETCH AND STATUS CHECKS   ***                                                           
      8732        *** BUT DOES NOT PERFORM ANY BEGIN DATE CHECK NOR   ***                                                           
      8733        *** DOES KEEPS ANY COUNT OF SUCH CASES.             ***                                                           
      8734        *** END-DTE COMES PRE-FORMATTED TO THIS PARA.       ***                                                           
      8735        *******************************************************                                                           
      8736         7460-FETCH-FUTURE-CLOSE-R268.                                                                                    
      8737             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R268-REC.                                                                 
      8738             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R268-EOS.                                                                 
      8739             FETCH NEXT R268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION WITHIN                                                                
      8740                   S104-CM-BDGT-MBR-RLTN SET                                                                              
      8741                        ON ERROR GO TO 7460-ERROR.                                                                        
      8742                                                                                                                          
      8743         7460-CHECK-DTE-END.                                                                                              
      8744  M313       IF R268-DTE-END-EFFV > 0000000                                                                               
      8745  R029            MOVE  1  TO WSS-R268-EOS                                                                                
      8746  R029            GO TO 7460-EXIT.                                                                                        
      8747  M313       IF R268-DTE-END-EFFV        = 0000000                    AND                                                 
      8748  M313          R268-DTE-END-FUTURE NOT  = 0000000                    AND                                                 
      8749  M307         (R268-DTE-END-FUTURE      < WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE  OR                                                          
      8750  M307                                   = WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE)                                                             
      8751                  MOVE 1                 TO WSS-R268-REC                                                                  
      8752                  GO TO 7460-EXIT                                                                                         
      8753             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8754                  GO TO 7460-FETCH-FUTURE-CLOSE-R268.                                                                     
      8755         7460-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8756  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      8757                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R268-EOS                                                                  
      8758             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8759                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8760                                                                                                                          
      8761         7460-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8762             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8763                                                                                                                          
      8764        *******************************************************                                                           
      8765        *** SET S105. 6 RECORDS WITHIN SET.                 ***                                                           
      8766        *** THE SET IS TRAVERSED ONLY ONCE AND ON EACH      ***                                                           
      8767        *** FETCH IT UPDATES THE WST-S105-REC-DETAILS-TAB   ***                                                           
      8768        *** NOTING DOWN WHAT IT ACTUALLY FOUND .            ***                                                           
      8769        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      8770        *** AT THE END OF SET, THIS TABLE IS LOOKED UP      ***                                                           
      8771        *** TO DETERMINE WHICH RECORDS WERE FOUND, AND      ***                                                           
      8772        *** WHICH RECORDS NEED TO BE END-DATED.             ***                                                           
      8773        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      8774        *** DISPLAY OF TABLE IS FOR TESTING ONLY, & SHUD    ***                                                           
      8775        *** BE COMMENTED OUT BEFORE PROD.                   ***                                                           
      8776        *******************************************************                                                           
      8777         7470-FETCH-S105-RECS.                                                                                            
      8778             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8779                                                                                                                          
      8780         7470-MAKE-OWNER-OF-SET-CUR.                                                                                      
      8781             MOVE WSH-R249-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
      8782             PERFORM 7100-FIND-CUR-IN-REC          THRU 7100-EXIT.                                                        
      8783                                                                                                                          
      8784         7470-PROCESS-S105.                                                                                               
      8785             PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105             THRU 7475-EXIT.                                                        
      8786             PERFORM 7480-BUILD-S105-TABLE         THRU 7480-EXIT                                                         
      8787                     UNTIL WSS-S105-EOS-ON.                                                                               
      8788  TEST  *    PERFORM 7485-DISPLAY-S105-TABLE       THRU 7485-EXIT                                                         
      8789  TEST  *            VARYING WSI-S105-REC-IDX FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL                                                           
      8790  TEST  *                    WSI-S105-REC-IDX > 6.                                                                        
      8791             PERFORM 7490-EXAMINE-S105-TABLE       THRU 7490-EXIT.                                                        
      8792                                                                                                                          
      8793         7470-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8794             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8795                                                                                                                          
      8796        ****************************************************                                                              
      8797        *** DETAIL FETCH OF S105 SET.                    ***                                                              
      8798        *** FETCH FORMAT-3 IS USED.                      ***                                                              
      8799        *** VALIDITY OF RECORD IE. END-DTE = 0, AND      ***                                                              
      8800        *** BGN-DTE <= 0 WILL BE CHECKED IN BUILD-TABLE. ***                                                              
      8801        ****************************************************                                                              
      8802         7475-FET-DET-S105.                                                                                               
      8803             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-S105-EOS.                                                                 
      8804             FETCH NEXT RECORD WITHIN S105-CM-BDGT-INFO SET                                                               
      8805                   ON ERROR GO TO 7475-ERROR.                                                                             
      8806             MOVE RECORD-NAME            TO WSH-RECORD-TYPE.                                                              
      8807             GO TO 7475-EXIT.                                                                                             
      8808                                                                                                                          
      8809         7475-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      8810  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      8811                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-S105-EOS                                                                  
      8812             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8813                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      8814                                                                                                                          
      8815         7475-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8816             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8817                                                                                                                          
      8818        ****************************************************                                                              
      8819        *** BUILD WST-S105-REC-DETAILS-TAB.              ***                                                              
      8820        *** REC-TYPE STATIC TABLE IS SEARCHED TO         ***                                                              
      8821        *** SEARCH ON RECORD-TYPE FOUND IN THE SET.      ***                                                              
      8822        *** THIS INDEX IS USED TO POINT TO FIRST         ***                                                              
      8823        *** DIMENSION IN S105-DETAILS TABLE.             ***                                                              
      8824        ***                                              ***                                                              
      8825        *** CHECK VALIDITY OF RECORD FETCHED.            ***                                                              
      8826        ***    RECORD MUST HAVE 0 END END-DTE AND        ***                                                              
      8827        ***    BEGIN-DATE MUST BE <= PAYMENT DTE.        ***                                                              
      8828        *** DO NOT BUILD THE TABLE FOR CLOSED/FUTURE     ***                                                              
      8829        *** RECORDS.                                     ***                                                              
      8830        ***                                              ***                                                              
      8831        *** MAXIMUM 2 OCCURENCES OF A REC-TYPE CAN BE    ***                                                              
      8832        *** STORED. > 2 OCCURENCES WILL BE WARNINGS.     ***                                                              
      8833        *** FOR EACH OCCURENCE STORE DBK & BEGIN-DATE.   ***                                                              
      8834        ***                                              ***                                                              
      8835        *** R256 IS NO LONGER BEING PROCESSED HERE.      ***                                                              
      8836        *** R679, 6TH OCCURENCE IS DELETED, TAB IS       ***                                                              
      8837        *** BLANKED OUT & SHUD NOT BE THERE. IF THERE    ***                                                              
      8838        *** DISPLAY ERROR MSG & EXIT.                    ***                                                              
      8839        ****************************************************                                                              
      8840         7480-BUILD-S105-TABLE.                                                                                           
      8841             SET WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX       TO 1.                                                                            
      8842             SEARCH WST-S105-REC-TYPE-TAB VARYING WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX                                                       
      8843               AT END                                                                                                     
      8844                  MOVE 'W'               TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      8845                  MOVE 025               TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      8846                  MOVE WSH-RECORD-TYPE   TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      8847                  MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID  TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      8848                  PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                
      8849                  PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105        THRU 7475-EXIT
