      8850                  GO TO 7480-EXIT                                                                                         
      8851               WHEN WST-S105-REC-TYPE (WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX)                                                                 
      8852                                         = WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                                
      8853                  SET WSI-S105-REC-IDX   TO WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX.                                                            
      8854                                                                                                                          
      8855         7480-VAL-REC-N-SAVE-DATE.                                                                                        
      8856             IF WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX = 1                                                                                     
      8857  M313          IF R251-DTE-END-EFFV     = 0000000 AND                                                                    
      8858                   R251-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                               
      8859                      MOVE R251-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO WSH-DTE-BGN                                                         
      8860                ELSE                                                                                                      
      8861                      PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105    THRU 7475-EXIT                                                         
      8862                      GO TO 7480-EXIT                                                                                     
      8863             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8864             IF WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX = 2                                                                                     
      8865                      PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105    THRU 7475-EXIT                                                         
      8866                      GO TO 7480-EXIT                                                                                     
      8867             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8868             IF WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX = 3                                                                                     
      8869  M313          IF R257-DTE-END-EFFV     = 0000000 AND                                                                    
      8870                   R257-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                               
      8871                      MOVE R257-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO WSH-DTE-BGN                                                         
      8872                ELSE                                                                                                      
      8873                      PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105    THRU 7475-EXIT                                                         
      8874                      GO TO 7480-EXIT                                                                                     
      8875             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8876             IF WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX = 4                                                                                     
      8877  M313          IF R258-DTE-END-EFFV     = 0000000 AND                                                                    
      8878                   R258-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                               
      8879                      MOVE R258-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO WSH-DTE-BGN                                                         
      8880                ELSE                                                                                                      
      8881                      PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105    THRU 7475-EXIT                                                         
      8882                      GO TO 7480-EXIT                                                                                     
      8883             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8884             IF WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX = 5                                                                                     
      8885  M313          IF R259-DTE-END-EFFV     = 0000000 AND                                                                    
      8886                   R259-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                               
      8887                      MOVE R259-DTE-BGN-EFFV       TO WSH-DTE-BGN                                                         
      8888                ELSE                                                                                                      
      8889                      PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105    THRU 7475-EXIT                                                         
      8890                      GO TO 7480-EXIT                                                                                     
      8891             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8892             IF WSI-S105-TYPE-IDX = 6                                                                                     
      8893                NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      8894             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8895                NEXT SENTENCE.                                                                                            
      8896                                                                                                                          
      8897         7480-SAVE-DBK.                                                                                                   
      8898             MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                             
      8899                  ON ERROR GO TO 7990-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                       
      8900                                                                                                                          
      8901         7480-WHICH-REC-OCCURENCE.                                                                                        
      8902             IF WST-REC-SW (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   1)  = 0                                                                    
      8903                MOVE 1                   TO WST-REC-SW                                                                    
      8904                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX 1)                                                          
      8905                MOVE WSH-FET-DBK         TO WST-REC-DBK                                                                   
      8906                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX 1)                                                          
      8907                MOVE WSH-DTE-BGN         TO WST-REC-DTE-BGN                                                               
      8908                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX 1)                                                          
      8909             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8910             IF WST-REC-SW (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   2)  = 0                                                                    
      8911                MOVE 1                   TO WST-REC-SW                                                                    
      8912                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX 2)                                                          
      8913                MOVE WSH-FET-DBK         TO WST-REC-DBK                                                                   
      8914                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX 2)                                                          
      8915                MOVE WSH-DTE-BGN         TO WST-REC-DTE-BGN                                                               
      8916                                            (WSI-S105-REC-IDX 2)                                                          
      8917             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8918                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      8919                MOVE 025                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      8920                MOVE WSH-RECORD-TYPE     TO WSH-OCC-GT-2-REC-TYPE                                                         
      8921                MOVE WSH-OCC-GT-2-MSG    TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      8922                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      8923                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      8924                PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105          THRU 7475-EXIT                                                         
      8925                GO TO 7480-EXIT.                                                                                          
      8926                                                                                                                          
      8927         7480-FETCH-NEXT-S105-REC.                                                                                        
      8928             PERFORM 7475-FET-DET-S105             THRU 7475-EXIT.                                                        
      8929                                                                                                                          
      8930         7480-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8931             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8932                                                                                                                          
      8933        ****************************************************                                                              
      8934        *** DISPLAY WST-S105-REC-DETAILS-TAB.            ***                                                              
      8935        *** THIS CODE IS FOR TEST-PURPOSES.              ***                                                              
      8936        ****************************************************                                                              
      8937         7485-DISPLAY-S105-TABLE.                                                                                         
      8938             DISPLAY WST-REC-SW         (WSI-S105-REC-IDX       1)                                                        
      8939                     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                        
      8940             DISPLAY WST-REC-DBK        (WSI-S105-REC-IDX       1)                                                        
      8941                     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                        
      8942             DISPLAY WST-REC-DTE-BGN    (WSI-S105-REC-IDX       1)                                                        
      8943                     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                        
      8944                                                                                                                          
      8945             DISPLAY WST-REC-SW         (WSI-S105-REC-IDX       2)                                                        
      8946                     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                        
      8947             DISPLAY WST-REC-DBK        (WSI-S105-REC-IDX       2)                                                        
      8948                     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                        
      8949             DISPLAY WST-REC-DTE-BGN    (WSI-S105-REC-IDX       2)                                                        
      8950                     UPON PRINTER.                                                                                        
      8951                                                                                                                          
      8952         7485-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8953             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8954                                                                                                                          
      8955        ****************************************************                                                              
      8956        *** EXAMINE WST-S105-REC-DETAILS-TAB.            ***                                                              
      8957        *** IF THE FIRST SW IS ON, CORRESPONDING REC-SW  ***                                                              
      8958        *** IS SET ON.                                   ***                                                              
      8959        *** IF THE SECOND SW IS ALSO ON, END DATING      ***                                                              
      8960        *** WILL BE SCHEDULED FOR THAT REC-TYPE.         ***                                                              
      8961        ****************************************************                                                              
      8962         7490-EXAMINE-S105-TABLE.                                                                                         
      8963             PERFORM 7495-EXAMINE-S105-TABLE-DET   THRU 7495-EXIT                                                         
      8964                     VARYING WSI-S105-REC-IDX FROM 1 BY 1 UNTIL                                                           
      8965                             WSI-S105-REC-IDX > 6.                                                                        
      8966                                                                                                                          
      8967         7490-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      8968             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      8969                                                                                                                          
      8970        ****************************************************                                                              
      8971        *** DETAIL EXAMINE WST-S105-REC-DETAILS-TAB.     ***                                                              
      8972        ****************************************************                                                              
      8973         7495-EXAMINE-S105-TABLE-DET.                                                                                     
      8974             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 2                                                                                      
      8975                GO TO 7495-EXIT.                                                                                          
      8976                                                                                                                          
      8977         7495-CHECK-1ST-SW.                                                                                               
      8978             IF WST-REC-SW (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   1) = 0                                                                     
      8979                GO TO 7495-EXIT.                                                                                          
      8980                                                                                                                          
      8981         7495-SET-REC-FOUND-SW.                                                                                           
      8982             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 1                                                                                      
      8983                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R251-REC                                                                  
      8984             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8985             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 3                                                                                      
      8986                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R257-REC                                                                  
      8987             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8988             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 4                                                                                      
      8989                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R258-REC                                                                  
      8990             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8991             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 5                                                                                      
      8992                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R259-REC                                                                  
      8993             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8994             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 6                                                                                      
      8995                NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      8996             ELSE                                                                                                         
      8997                NEXT SENTENCE.                                                                                            
      8998                                                                                                                          
      8999         7495-CHECK-2ND-SW.                                                                                               
      9000             IF WST-REC-SW (WSI-S105-REC-IDX   2) = 0                                                                     
      9001                IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 1                                                                                   
      9002                   MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR WSH-R251-NAME RECORD                                                          
      9003                                         TO WSH-FET-DBK ON ERROR                                                          
      9004                                            GO TO 7990-BAD-CURRENCY                                                       
      9005                   IF WST-REC-DBK (1 1)        NOT =  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9006                      MOVE WST-REC-DBK (1 1)       TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9007                      MOVE WSH-R251-NAME TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9008                      PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY THRU 7110-EXIT                                                        
      9009                      GO TO 7495-EXIT                                                                                     
      9010                   ELSE                                                                                                   
      9011                      GO TO 7495-EXIT                                                                                     
      9012                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9013                IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 3                                                                                   
      9014                   MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR WSH-R257-NAME RECORD                                                          
      9015                                         TO WSH-FET-DBK ON ERROR                                                          
      9016                                            GO TO 7990-BAD-CURRENCY                                                       
      9017                   IF WST-REC-DBK (3 1)        NOT =  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9018                      MOVE WST-REC-DBK (3 1)       TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9019                      MOVE WSH-R257-NAME TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9020                      PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY THRU 7110-EXIT                                                        
      9021                      GO TO 7495-EXIT                                                                                     
      9022                   ELSE                                                                                                   
      9023                      GO TO 7495-EXIT                                                                                     
      9024                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9025                IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 4                                                                                   
      9026                   MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR WSH-R258-NAME RECORD                                                          
      9027                                         TO WSH-FET-DBK ON ERROR                                                          
      9028                                            GO TO 7990-BAD-CURRENCY                                                       
      9029                   IF WST-REC-DBK (4 1)        NOT =  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9030                      MOVE WST-REC-DBK (4 1)       TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9031                      MOVE WSH-R258-NAME TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9032                      PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY THRU 7110-EXIT                                                        
      9033                      GO TO 7495-EXIT                                                                                     
      9034                   ELSE                                                                                                   
      9035                      GO TO 7495-EXIT                                                                                     
      9036                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9037                IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 5                                                                                   
      9038                   MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR WSH-R259-NAME RECORD                                                          
      9039                                         TO WSH-FET-DBK ON ERROR                                                          
      9040                                            GO TO 7990-BAD-CURRENCY                                                       
      9041                   IF WST-REC-DBK (5 1)        NOT =  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9042                      MOVE WST-REC-DBK (5 1)       TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9043                      MOVE WSH-R259-NAME TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9044                      PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY THRU 7110-EXIT                                                        
      9045                      GO TO 7495-EXIT                                                                                     
      9046                   ELSE                                                                                                   
      9047                      GO TO 7495-EXIT                                                                                     
      9048                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9049                IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 6                                                                                   
      9050                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      9051                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9052                   NEXT SENTENCE.                                                                                         
      9053                                                                                                                          
      9054         7495-END-DTE-RECORDS.                                                                                            
      9055             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 1                                                                                      
      9056                MOVE WST-REC-DBK     (1 1)         TO WSH-R251-1ST-DBK                                                    
      9057                MOVE WST-REC-DBK     (1 2)         TO WSH-R251-2ND-DBK                                                    
      9058                MOVE WST-REC-DTE-BGN (1 1)         TO WSH-R251-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                
      9059                MOVE WST-REC-DTE-BGN (1 2)         TO WSH-R251-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                
      9060                PERFORM 7506-END-DTE-R251          THRU 7506-EXIT                                                         
      9061             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9062             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 3                                                                                      
      9063                MOVE WST-REC-DBK     (3 1)         TO WSH-R257-1ST-DBK                                                    
      9064                MOVE WST-REC-DBK     (3 2)         TO WSH-R257-2ND-DBK                                                    
      9065                MOVE WST-REC-DTE-BGN (3 1)         TO WSH-R257-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                
      9066                MOVE WST-REC-DTE-BGN (3 2)         TO WSH-R257-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                
      9067                PERFORM 7526-END-DTE-R257          THRU 7526-EXIT                                                         
      9068             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9069             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 4                                                                                      
      9070                MOVE WST-REC-DBK     (4 1)         TO WSH-R258-1ST-DBK                                                    
      9071                MOVE WST-REC-DBK     (4 2)         TO WSH-R258-2ND-DBK                                                    
      9072                MOVE WST-REC-DTE-BGN (4 1)         TO WSH-R258-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                
      9073                MOVE WST-REC-DTE-BGN (4 2)         TO WSH-R258-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                
      9074                PERFORM 7536-END-DTE-R258          THRU 7536-EXIT                                                         
      9075             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9076             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 5                                                                                      
      9077                MOVE WST-REC-DBK     (5 1)         TO WSH-R259-1ST-DBK                                                    
      9078                MOVE WST-REC-DBK     (5 2)         TO WSH-R259-2ND-DBK                                                    
      9079                MOVE WST-REC-DTE-BGN (5 1)         TO WSH-R259-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                
      9080                MOVE WST-REC-DTE-BGN (5 2)         TO WSH-R259-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                
      9081                PERFORM 7546-END-DTE-R259          THRU 7546-EXIT                                                         
      9082             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9083             IF WSI-S105-REC-IDX = 6                                                                                      
      9084                NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
      9085             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9086                NEXT SENTENCE.                                                                                            
      9087                                                                                                                          
      9088         7495-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9089             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9090                                                                                                                          
      9091        *******************************************************                                                           
      9092        *** 7506 - 7556 ARE CALLED FROM TABLE-EXAMINE       ***                                                           
      9093        *** PROCESS.                                        ***                                                           
      9094        *** PLS NOTE THE DIFF IN END-DATING PROCESS :       ***                                                           
      9095        *** WHEN 1ST > 2ND , MAKE 2ND CURRENT BEFORE        ***                                                           
      9096        *** MODIFYING IT , BECAUSE IT MIGHT HAVE FOUND      ***                                                           
      9097        *** OTHER CLOSED/FUTURE OCCURENCES OF THAT REC TYPE.***                                                           
      9098        *** PROCESS.                                        ***                                                           
      9099        *** IN OTHER SECTIONS, IT IS NOT NECCESSARY,        ***                                                           
      9100        *** BECAUSE FURTHER FETCHING WUD STOP IF 2ND REC    ***                                                           
      9101        *** IS HIT, SO IT IS CURRENT.                       ***                                                           
      9102        *******************************************************                                                           
      9103                                                                                                                          
      9104        *******************************************************                                                           
      9105        *** R251 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      9106        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      9107        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      9108        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      9109        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      9110        *******************************************************                                                           
      9111         7506-END-DTE-R251.                                                                                               
      9112             MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      9113             MOVE 'R251'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      9114             MOVE WSH-R251-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      9115             MOVE WSH-R251-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      9116             PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      9117                                                                                                                          
      9118             IF WSH-R251-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R251-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9119                MOVE WSH-R251-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9120                MOVE WSH-R251-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9121                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9122                                                                                                                          
      9123  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R251-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9124                MOVE WSH-R251-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9125  R078          MOVE 'R251' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      9126                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9127                                                                                                                          
      9128                MOVE WSH-R251-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9129                MOVE WSH-R251-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9130                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9131                                                                                                                          
      9132             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9133             IF WSH-R251-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R251-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9134                MOVE WSH-R251-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9135                MOVE WSH-R251-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9136                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9137                                                                                                                          
      9138  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R251-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9139                MOVE WSH-R251-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9140  R078          MOVE 'R251' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      9141                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9142                                                                                                                          
      9143                MOVE WSH-R251-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9144                MOVE WSH-R251-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9145                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9146                                                                                                                          
      9147             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9148                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9149                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      9150                MOVE 'R251-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      9151                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      9152                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      9153                                                                                                                          
      9154         7506-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9155             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9156                                                                                                                          
      9157        *******************************************************                                                           
      9158        *** R257 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      9159        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      9160        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      9161        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      9162        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      9163        *******************************************************                                                           
      9164         7526-END-DTE-R257.                                                                                               
      9165             MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      9166             MOVE 'R257'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      9167             MOVE WSH-R257-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      9168             MOVE WSH-R257-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      9169             PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      9170                                                                                                                          
      9171             IF WSH-R257-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R257-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9172                MOVE WSH-R257-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9173                MOVE WSH-R257-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9174                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9175                                                                                                                          
      9176  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R257-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9177                MOVE WSH-R257-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9178  R078          MOVE 'R257' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      9179                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9180                                                                                                                          
      9181                MOVE WSH-R257-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9182                MOVE WSH-R257-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9183                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9184                                                                                                                          
      9185             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9186             IF WSH-R257-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R257-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9187                MOVE WSH-R257-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9188                MOVE WSH-R257-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9189                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9190                                                                                                                          
      9191  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R257-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9192                MOVE WSH-R257-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9193  R078          MOVE 'R257' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      9194                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9195                                                                                                                          
      9196                MOVE WSH-R257-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9197                MOVE WSH-R257-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9198                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9199                                                                                                                          
      9200             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9201                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9202                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      9203                MOVE 'R257-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      9204                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      9205                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      9206                                                                                                                          
      9207         7526-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9208             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9209                                                                                                                          
      9210        *******************************************************                                                           
      9211        *** R258 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      9212        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      9213        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      9214        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      9215        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      9216        *******************************************************                                                           
      9217         7536-END-DTE-R258.                                                                                               
      9218             MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      9219             MOVE 'R258'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      9220             MOVE WSH-R258-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      9221             MOVE WSH-R258-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      9222             PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      9223                                                                                                                          
      9224             IF WSH-R258-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R258-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9225                MOVE WSH-R258-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9226                MOVE WSH-R258-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9227                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9228                                                                                                                          
      9229  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R258-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9230                MOVE WSH-R258-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9231  R078          MOVE 'R258' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      9232                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9233                                                                                                                          
      9234                MOVE WSH-R258-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9235                MOVE WSH-R258-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9236                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9237                                                                                                                          
      9238             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9239             IF WSH-R258-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R258-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9240                MOVE WSH-R258-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9241                MOVE WSH-R258-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9242                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9243                                                                                                                          
      9244  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R258-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9245                MOVE WSH-R258-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9246  R078          MOVE 'R258' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      9247                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9248                                                                                                                          
      9249                MOVE WSH-R258-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9250                MOVE WSH-R258-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9251                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9252                                                                                                                          
      9253             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9254                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9255                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      9256                MOVE 'R258-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      9257                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      9258                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      9259                                                                                                                          
      9260         7536-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9261             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9262                                                                                                                          
      9263        *******************************************************                                                           
      9264        *** R259 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      9265        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      9266        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      9267        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      9268        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      9269        *******************************************************                                                           
      9270         7546-END-DTE-R259.                                                                                               
      9271             MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      9272             MOVE 'R259'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      9273             MOVE WSH-R259-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      9274             MOVE WSH-R259-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      9275             PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      9276                                                                                                                          
      9277             IF WSH-R259-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R259-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9278                MOVE WSH-R259-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9279                MOVE WSH-R259-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9280                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9281                                                                                                                          
      9282  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R259-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9283                MOVE WSH-R259-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9284  R078          MOVE 'R259' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      9285                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9286                                                                                                                          
      9287                MOVE WSH-R259-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9288                MOVE WSH-R259-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9289                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9290                                                                                                                          
      9291             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9292             IF WSH-R259-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R259-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9293                MOVE WSH-R259-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9294                MOVE WSH-R259-2ND-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9295                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9296                                                                                                                          
      9297  M307          MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE             TO R259-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9298                MOVE WSH-R259-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9299  R078          MOVE 'R259' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                                
      9300                PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC     THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9301                                                                                                                          
      9302                MOVE WSH-R259-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9303                MOVE WSH-R259-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9304                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9305                                                                                                                          
      9306             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9307                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9308                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      9309                MOVE 'R259-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      9310                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      9311                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      9312                                                                                                                          
      9313         7546-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9314             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9315                                                                                                                          
      9316        *******************************************************                                                           
      9317        *** R256 . PROCESS.                                 ***                                                           
      9318        *** DIFF LOGIC EXISTS FOR R256. CHECK CAREFULLY.    ***                                                           
      9319        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9320        *** 1. END DATING OF RECORDS IS DONE ONLY IF        ***                                                           
      9321        ***    A REC IS GOING CURRENT TODAY.                ***                                                           
      9322        ***    IT IS ASSUMED THAT FIRST REC HIT, WILL BE    ***                                                           
      9323        ***    A FUTURE-GOING-CURRENT, & HENCE ALL OTHER    ***                                                           
      9324        ***    PAST RECS WILL BE END-DATED & IGNORED.       ***                                                           
      9325        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9326        *** 2. FOR BUILDING HISTORY, ALLOW-CODE WILL BE     ***                                                           
      9327        ***    USED ONLY FROM 1ST R256. ALL OTHERS WILL BE  ***                                                           
      9328        ***    DISPLAYED AS 'REMARKS'.                      ***                                                           
      9329        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9330        *** 3. ALL ACTIVE RECORDS DBK WILL BE STORED IN     ***                                                           
      9331        ***    A TABLE, WHICH WILL BE USED TO BUILD OUTPUT  ***                                                           
      9332        ***    RECORDS.                                     ***                                                           
      9333        *******************************************************                                                           
      9334         7570-PRO-R256.                                                                                                   
      9335             IF R256-DTE-BGN-EFFV = WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                      
      9336                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R256-END-DTE.                                                             
      9337                                                                                                                          
      9338         7570-END-DTE-PAST-RECS.                                                                                          
      9339             IF WSS-R256-END-DTE-ON                                                                                       
      9340                IF R256-DTE-BGN-EFFV < WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                   
      9341                   MOVE 1                TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE                                                          
      9342                   MOVE 'R256'           TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE                                                      
      9343                   MOVE WSH-PAYMENT-DATE TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1                                                        
      9344                   MOVE R256-DTE-BGN-EFFV TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2                                                       
      9345                   PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09     THRU 8590-EXIT                                                         
      9346                                                                                                                          
      9347  M307             MOVE WSH-RECUR-PAYDATE          TO R256-DTE-END-EFFV                                                   
      9348                   MOVE WSH-R256-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9349  R078             MOVE 'R256' TO D18-REC-CDE                                                                             
      9350                   PERFORM 7120-MODIFY-GEN-DB-REC  THRU 7120-EXIT                                                         
      9351                                                                                                                          
      9352                   PERFORM 7580-FET-DET-R256       THRU 7580-EXIT                                                         
      9353                   GO TO 7570-EXIT.                                                                                       
      9354                                                                                                                          
      9355         7570-STORE-CDE-AMT-ALLOW.                                                                                        
      9356             IF WSS-R256-FIRST = 0                                                                                        
      9357                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R256-FIRST                                                                
      9358                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R256-REC                                                                  
      9359                PERFORM 7574-SETUP-WST-R256 VARYING WSH-I FROM 1 BY 1                                                     
      9360                        UNTIL WSH-I > R256-CNT-SPECIAL                                                                    
      9361             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9362                MOVE 'R'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9363  R043          DISPLAY 'SPECIAL ALLOWANCE TABLE SIZE EXCEEDED '                                                          
      9364  R043                              UPON PRINTER                                                                          
      9365                MOVE 049                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      9366                MOVE 'R256-GRP-TAB'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      9367                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      9368                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      9369                                                                                                                          
      9370         7570-STORE-REC-DBK-IN-TAB.                                                                                       
      9371             IF WSH-R256-DBK-TAB-SIZE < WSH-R256-DBK-TAB-MAX-SIZE                                                         
      9372                ADD 1                    TO WSH-R256-DBK-TAB-SIZE                                                         
      9373                SET WSI-R256-DBK-IDX     TO WSH-R256-DBK-TAB-SIZE                                                         
      9374                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR WSH-R256-NAME RECORD                                                             
      9375                     TO WSH-FET-DBK ON ERROR GO TO 7990-BAD-CURRENCY                                                      
      9376                MOVE WSH-FET-DBK         TO WST-R256-DBK                                                                  
      9377                                           (WSI-R256-DBK-IDX)                                                             
      9378             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9379                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9380  R043          DISPLAY 'SPECIAL ALLOWANCE TABLE SIZE EXCEEDED '                                                          
      9381  R043                              UPON PRINTER                                                                          
      9382                MOVE 049                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      9383                MOVE 'R256-DBK-TAB'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      9384                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      9385                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      9386                                                                                                                          
      9387         7570-FET-NEXT-R256.                                                                                              
      9388             PERFORM 7580-FET-DET-R256             THRU 7580-EXIT.                                                        
      9389                                                                                                                          
      9390         7570-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9391             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9392  R070   7572-STORE-R251.                                                                                                 
      9393  R070       STORE  R251-SUSPENSION  ON  ERROR                                                                            
      9394  R070           GO  TO  7572-ERROR.                                                                                      
      9395  R078       MOVE 'R251' TO D18-REC-CDE.                                                                                  
      9396  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
      9397  R070       ADD  1  TO  WSA-R251-STO-CNT.                                                                                
      9398  R070       GO  TO  7572-EXIT.                                                                                           
      9399  R070   7572-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9400  R070       PERFORM  7995-DB-ERROR  THRU  7995-EXIT.                                                                     
      9401  R070   7572-EXIT.   EXIT.                                                                                               
      9402                                                                                                                          
      9403        *******************************************************                                                           
      9404        *** SETUP R256 WST TABLE.                           ***                                                           
      9405        *******************************************************                                                           
      9406         7574-SETUP-WST-R256.                                                                                             
      9407             MOVE R256-CDE-ALLOW-SPECIAL (WSH-I)                                                                          
      9408                                   TO WST-R256-CDE-ALLOW-SPECIAL (WSH-I).                                                 
      9409             MOVE R256-AMT-ALLOW-SPECIAL (WSH-I)                                                                          
      9410                                   TO WST-R256-AMT-ALLOW-SPECIAL (WSH-I).                                                 
      9411             MOVE R256-TXT-DESC-SPECIAL  (WSH-I)                                                                          
      9412                                   TO WST-R256-TXT-DESC-SPECIAL  (WSH-I).                                                 
      9413                                                                                                                          
      9414        *******************************************************                                                           
      9415        *** R256 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      9416        *******************************************************                                                           
      9417         7580-FET-DET-R256.                                                                                               
      9418             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R256-EOS.                                                                 
      9419             FETCH NEXT WSH-R256-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      9420                   S105-CM-BDGT-INFO SET                                                                                  
      9421                        ON ERROR GO TO 7580-ERROR.                                                                        
      9422                                                                                                                          
      9423         7580-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      9424  M313       IF R256-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000  AND                                                                          
      9425                R256-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                  
      9426                    GO TO 7580-EXIT                                                                                       
      9427             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9428                    GO TO 7580-FET-DET-R256.                                                                              
      9429                                                                                                                          
      9430         7580-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9431  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      9432                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R256-EOS                                                                  
      9433             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9434                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      9435                                                                                                                          
      9436         7580-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9437             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9438                                                                                                                          
      9439                                                                                                                          
      9440        *******************************************************                                                           
      9441        *** R637 CM BUDGET RESULTS SECTION.                 ***                                                           
      9442        *** 2 SETS DESCRIBED :                              ***                                                           
      9443        ***   . S371-CM-RESULT                              ***                                                           
      9444        ***        . R653-CM-RESULT                         ***                                                           
      9445        ***   . S540-CM-RESULT-OVRD                         ***                                                           
      9446        ***        . R653-CM-OVRD                           ***                                                           
      9447        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9448        *** THIS AREA IS OPEN FOR UPDATE AND WUD GET        ***                                                           
      9449        *** UPDATES FOR END DATED RECORDS.                  ***                                                           
      9450        *******************************************************
