      9451         7600-R637-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                       
      9452                                                                                                                          
      9453        *******************************************************                                                           
      9454        *** R637-CMBDGT-EP RECORD.                          ***                                                           
      9455        *******************************************************                                                           
      9456         7600-FETCH-R637.                                                                                                 
      9457             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R637-REC.                                                                 
      9458             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO WSH-CASE-NUMBER      .                                                        
      9459             MOVE R249-CDE-CATEGORY      TO WSH-CDE-CATEGORY     .                                                        
      9460             MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT   TO WSH-NBR-GROUP-GRANT  .                                                        
      9461             MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID       TO R637-CMBDGT-ID       .                                                        
      9462             FETCH WSH-R637-NAME RECORD                                                                                   
      9463                   ON ERROR GO TO 7600-ERROR.                                                                             
      9464                                                                                                                          
      9465         7600-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      9466             ADD 1                       TO WSA-R637-REC-CNT.                                                             
      9467             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-R637-REC    .                                                             
      9468             GO TO 7600-EXIT.                                                                                             
      9469                                                                                                                          
      9470         7600-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9471  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      9472                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-R637-REC                                                                  
      9473             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9474                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      9475                                                                                                                          
      9476         7600-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9477             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9478                                                                                                                          
      9479        *******************************************************                                                           
      9480        *** R653 . 1ST  RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      9481        *** SET S371.                                       ***                                                           
      9482        *******************************************************                                                           
      9483         7620-FETCH-R653.                                                                                                 
      9484             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R653-REC.                                                                 
      9485                                                                                                                          
      9486         7620-FETCH-FIRST-R653.                                                                                           
      9487             PERFORM 7624-FET-DET-R653             THRU 7624-EXIT.                                                        
      9488             IF WSS-R653-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      9489                GO TO 7620-EXIT                                                                                           
      9490             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9491                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R653-1ST-DBK                                                     
      9492                     ON ERROR GO TO 7620-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      9493                MOVE R653-DTE-BGN-EFFV             TO WSH-R653-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                
      9494                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R653-REC                                                                  
      9495                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R653-REC-CNT.                                                             
      9496                                                                                                                          
      9497         7620-FETCH-SECOND-R653.                                                                                          
      9498             PERFORM 7624-FET-DET-R653             THRU 7624-EXIT.                                                        
      9499             IF WSS-R653-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      9500                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9501                     ON ERROR GO TO 7620-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      9502                IF WSH-R653-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      9503                   MOVE WSH-R653-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9504                   MOVE WSH-R653-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9505                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9506                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9507                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      9508             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9509                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R653-2ND-DBK                                                    
      9510                     ON ERROR GO TO 7620-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      9511                MOVE R653-DTE-BGN-EFFV             TO WSH-R653-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                
      9512                PERFORM 7628-END-DTE-R653          THRU 7628-EXIT                                                         
      9513                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R653-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      9514                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      9515             GO TO 7620-EXIT.                                                                                             
      9516                                                                                                                          
      9517         7620-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      9518             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      9519                                                                                                                          
      9520         7620-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9521             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9522                                                                                                                          
      9523        *******************************************************                                                           
      9524        *** R653 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      9525        *******************************************************                                                           
      9526         7624-FET-DET-R653.                                                                                               
      9527             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R653-EOS.                                                                 
      9528             FETCH NEXT WSH-R653-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      9529                   S371-CM-RESULT SET                                                                                     
      9530                        ON ERROR GO TO 7624-ERROR.                                                                        
      9531                                                                                                                          
      9532         7624-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      9533  R068       IF  R653-DTE-END-EFFV  >  ZEROES                                                                             
      9534  R068           MOVE  1  TO  WSS-R653-EOS                                                                                
      9535  R068           GO  TO  7624-EXIT.                                                                                       
      9536  M313       IF R653-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000 AND                                                                           
      9537                R653-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                  
      9538                    GO TO 7624-EXIT                                                                                       
      9539             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9540                    GO TO 7624-FET-DET-R653.                                                                              
      9541                                                                                                                          
      9542         7624-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9543  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      9544                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R653-EOS                                                                  
      9545             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9546                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      9547                                                                                                                          
      9548         7624-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9549             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9550                                                                                                                          
      9551  R067   7625-FET-DET-R653.                                                                                               
      9552  R067       MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R653-EOS.                                                                 
      9553  R067       FETCH NEXT WSH-R653-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      9554  R067             S371-CM-RESULT SET                                                                                     
      9555  R067                  ON ERROR GO TO 7625-ERROR.                                                                        
      9556  R067   7625-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      9557  R068       IF  R653-DTE-END-EFFV  >  ZEROES                                                                             
      9558  R068           MOVE  1  TO  WSS-R653-EOS                                                                                
      9559  R068           GO  TO  7625-EXIT.                                                                                       
      9560  R067       IF R653-DTE-END-EFFV = 0000000 AND                                                                           
      9561  R067          R653-DTE-BGN-EFFV NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                  
      9562  R067           MOVE  1  TO  WSS-R653-REC                                                                                
      9563  R067              GO TO 7625-EXIT                                                                                       
      9564  R067       ELSE                                                                                                         
      9565  R067              GO TO 7625-FET-DET-R653.                                                                              
      9566  R067   7625-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9567  R067       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      9568  R067          MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R653-EOS                                                                  
      9569  R067       ELSE                                                                                                         
      9570  R067          PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      9571                                                                                                                          
      9572  R067   7625-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9573  R067       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9574        *******************************************************                                                           
      9575        *** R653 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      9576        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      9577        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      9578        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      9579        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      9580        *******************************************************                                                           
      9581         7628-END-DTE-R653.                                                                                               
      9582             IF WSH-R653-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R653-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9583  R069           MOVE  R637-NBR-CASE    TO  WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR                                                             
      9584  R069           MOVE  'R653'           TO  WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                               
      9585  R069           PERFORM  8580-WRITE-ATE01D08  THRU  8580-EXIT                                                            
      9586             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9587             IF WSH-R653-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R653-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9588  R069           MOVE  R637-NBR-CASE    TO  WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR                                                             
      9589  R069           MOVE  'R653'           TO  WSH-RECORD-TYPE                                                               
      9590  R069           PERFORM  8580-WRITE-ATE01D08  THRU  8580-EXIT                                                            
      9591                MOVE WSH-R653-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9592                MOVE WSH-R653-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9593                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9594                                                                                                                          
      9595             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9596                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9597                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      9598                MOVE 'R653-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      9599                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      9600  R069          PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG                                                                                  
      9601  R069           MOVE  WSH-R653-NAME    TO  WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9602  R069           MOVE  WSH-R653-1ST-DBK  TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                                  
      9603  R069           PERFORM  7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY  THRU  7110-EXIT.                                                         
      9604                                                                                                                          
      9605         7628-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9606             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9607                                                                                                                          
      9608                                                                                                                          
      9609        *******************************************************                                                           
      9610        *** R654 . 1ST  RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      9611        *** SET S371.                                       ***                                                           
      9612        *******************************************************                                                           
      9613         7640-FETCH-R654.                                                                                                 
      9614             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R654-REC.                                                                 
      9615                                                                                                                          
      9616         7640-FETCH-FIRST-R654.                                                                                           
      9617             PERFORM 7644-FET-DET-R654             THRU 7644-EXIT.                                                        
      9618             IF WSS-R654-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      9619                GO TO 7640-EXIT                                                                                           
      9620             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9621                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO WSH-R654-1ST-DBK                                                     
      9622                     ON ERROR GO TO 7640-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      9623                MOVE R654-DTE-BGN-PER-BNFT         TO WSH-R654-1ST-DTE-BGN                                                
      9624                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R654-REC                                                                  
      9625                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R654-REC-CNT.                                                             
      9626                                                                                                                          
      9627         7640-FETCH-SECOND-R654.                                                                                          
      9628             PERFORM 7644-FET-DET-R654             THRU 7644-EXIT.                                                        
      9629             IF WSS-R654-EOS-ON                                                                                           
      9630                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-FET-DBK                                                         
      9631                     ON ERROR GO TO 7640-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      9632                IF WSH-R654-1ST-DBK      NOT = WSH-FET-DBK                                                                
      9633                   MOVE WSH-R654-1ST-DBK TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9634                   MOVE WSH-R654-NAME    TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9635                   PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY   THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9636                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9637                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      9638             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9639                MOVE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT TO  WSH-R654-2ND-DBK                                                    
      9640                     ON ERROR GO TO 7640-BAD-CURRENCY                                                                     
      9641                MOVE R654-DTE-BGN-PER-BNFT         TO WSH-R654-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                
      9642                PERFORM 7648-END-DTE-R654          THRU 7648-EXIT                                                         
      9643                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R654-END-DTE-CNT                                                          
      9644                ADD 1                    TO WSA-TOT-END-DTE-CNT.                                                          
      9645             GO TO 7640-EXIT.                                                                                             
      9646                                                                                                                          
      9647         7640-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      9648             PERFORM 7990-BAD-CURRENCY             THRU 7990-EXIT.                                                        
      9649                                                                                                                          
      9650         7640-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9651             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9652                                                                                                                          
      9653        *******************************************************                                                           
      9654        *** R654 . DETAIL DB FETCH.                         ***                                                           
      9655        *******************************************************                                                           
      9656         7644-FET-DET-R654.                                                                                               
      9657             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R654-EOS.                                                                 
      9658             FETCH NEXT WSH-R654-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      9659                   S540-CM-RESULT-OVRD SET                                                                                
      9660                        ON ERROR GO TO 7644-ERROR.                                                                        
      9661                                                                                                                          
      9662         7644-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      9663  M313       IF R654-DTE-END-PER-BNFT  = 0000000 AND                                                                      
      9664                R654-DTE-BGN-PER-BNFT NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                              
      9665                    GO TO 7644-EXIT                                                                                       
      9666             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9667                    GO TO 7644-FET-DET-R654.                                                                              
      9668                                                                                                                          
      9669         7644-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9670  M313       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      9671                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R654-EOS                                                                  
      9672             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9673                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      9674                                                                                                                          
      9675         7644-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9676             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9677                                                                                                                          
      9678  R067   7645-FET-DET-R654.                                                                                               
      9679  R067       MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R654-EOS.                                                                 
      9680  R067       FETCH NEXT WSH-R654-NAME WITHIN                                                                              
      9681  R067             S540-CM-RESULT-OVRD SET                                                                                
      9682  R067                  ON ERROR GO TO 7645-ERROR.                                                                        
      9683  R067   7645-CHECK-VALID-REC.                                                                                            
      9684  R067       IF R654-DTE-END-PER-BNFT  = 0000000 AND                                                                      
      9685  R067          R654-DTE-BGN-PER-BNFT NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                              
      9686  R067           MOVE  'Y'  TO  WSS-R654-FOUND                                                                            
      9687  R067              GO TO 7645-EXIT                                                                                       
      9688  R067       ELSE                                                                                                         
      9689  R067              GO TO 7645-FET-DET-R654.                                                                              
      9690  R067   7645-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9691  R067       IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13' OR '06'                                                                         
      9692  R067          MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R654-EOS                                                                  
      9693  R067       ELSE                                                                                                         
      9694  R067          PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      9695  R067   7645-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9696  R067       EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9697        *******************************************************                                                           
      9698        *** R654 . END DATE THE RECORD THAT IS OLD WITH     ***                                                           
      9699        *** PAYMENT-DATE-MINUS-1, & MODIFY IT.              ***                                                           
      9700        *** MAKE THE LATEST RECORD CURRENT.                 ***                                                           
      9701        *** IF THEY HAPPEN TO BE BEGINNING ON SAME DATE,    ***                                                           
      9702        *** DISPLAY IT AS ERROR.                            ***                                                           
      9703        *******************************************************                                                           
      9704         7648-END-DTE-R654.                                                                                               
      9705             MOVE 1                      TO ATE01D09-RECORD-TYPE.                                                         
      9706             MOVE 'R654'                 TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-REC-TYPE.                                                     
      9707             MOVE WSH-R654-1ST-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-1.                                                       
      9708             MOVE WSH-R654-2ND-DTE-BGN   TO ATE01D09-FUTURE-DATE-2.                                                       
      9709             PERFORM 8590-WRITE-ATE01D09           THRU 8590-EXIT.                                                        
      9710                                                                                                                          
      9711             IF WSH-R654-1ST-DTE-BGN  <  WSH-R654-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9712                MOVE WSH-R654-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9713                MOVE WSH-R654-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9714                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9715             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9716             IF WSH-R654-1ST-DTE-BGN  >  WSH-R654-2ND-DTE-BGN                                                             
      9717                MOVE WSH-R654-NAME       TO WSH-RECORD-NAME                                                               
      9718                MOVE WSH-R654-1ST-DBK    TO WSH-FET-DBK                                                                   
      9719                PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY      THRU 7110-EXIT                                                         
      9720                                                                                                                          
      9721             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9722                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9723                MOVE 079                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                           
      9724                MOVE 'R654-DTE-BGN'      TO WS-SML-PARAM-1                                                                
      9725                MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID    TO WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                
      9726                PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                 
      9727                                                                                                                          
      9728         7648-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9729             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9730                                                                                                                          
      9731                                                                                                                          
      9732        *******************************************************                                                           
      9733        *** R270 RCOUPMT-CASE-BDGT SECTION.                 ***                                                           
      9734        *** 1 SET  DESCRIBED :                              ***                                                           
      9735        ***   . S178-RECOUPMENT                             ***                                                           
      9736        ***        . R271-RECOUPMENT                        ***                                                           
      9737        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9738        *** THIS AREA IS OPEN FOR RETRIEVAL AND WUD NOT     ***                                                           
      9739        *** HAVE ANY UPDATES.                               ***                                                           
      9740        *******************************************************                                                           
      9741         7700-R270-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                       
      9742                                                                                                                          
      9743        *******************************************************                                                           
      9744        *** R270-RCOUPMT-CASE-BUDGET RECORD.                ***                                                           
      9745        *******************************************************                                                           
      9746         7700-FETCH-R270.                                                                                                 
      9747             MOVE 0                      TO WSS-R270-REC.                                                                 
      9748             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO R270-NBR-CASE        .                                                        
      9749             MOVE R249-CDE-CATEGORY      TO R270-CDE-CATEGORY    .                                                        
      9750             MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT   TO R270-NBR-GROUP-GRANT .                                                        
      9751             FETCH R270-RCOUPMT-CASE-BUDGET RECORD                                                                        
      9752                   ON ERROR GO TO 7700-ERROR.                                                                             
      9753                                                                                                                          
      9754         7700-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      9755             ADD 1                       TO WSA-R270-REC-CNT.                                                             
      9756             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-R270-REC    .                                                             
      9757             GO TO 7700-EXIT.                                                                                             
      9758                                                                                                                          
      9759         7700-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9760             IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13'                                                                                 
      9761                MOVE 0                   TO WSS-R270-REC                                                                  
      9762             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9763                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      9764                                                                                                                          
      9765         7700-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9766             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9767                                                                                                                          
      9768        *******************************************************                                                           
      9769        *** R271 . ONLY RECORD WITHIN THE SET.              ***                                                           
      9770        *** SET S178.                                       ***                                                           
      9771        *******************************************************                                                           
      9772         7720-FETCH-R271.                                                                                                 
      9773             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R271-REC  .                                                               
      9774             MOVE ZEROS                  TO WSS-R271-EOS  .                                                               
      9775             MOVE R258-NBR-REFL          TO R271-NBR-REFL .                                                               
      9776             FETCH R271-RECOUPMENT VIA S178-RECOUPMENT                                                                    
      9777                   USING R271-NBR-REFL                                                                                    
      9778                        ON ERROR GO TO 7720-ERROR.                                                                        
      9779                                                                                                                          
      9780         7720-PROCESS.                                                                                                    
      9781             ADD 1                       TO WSA-R271-REC-CNT .                                                            
      9782             MOVE 1                      TO WSS-R271-REC     .                                                            
      9783             GO TO 7720-EXIT.                                                                                             
      9784                                                                                                                          
      9785         7720-ERROR.                                                                                                      
      9786             IF ERROR-CODE = '07' OR '13'                                                                                 
      9787                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-R271-EOS                                                                  
      9788             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9789                PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR              THRU 7995-EXIT.                                                        
      9790                                                                                                                          
      9791         7720-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9792             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9793                                                                                                                          
      9794        *******************************************************                                                           
      9795                                                                                                                          
      9796                                                                                                                          
      9797        *******************************************************                                                           
      9798        *** THIS SECTION PROCESSES DATA BASE ERRORS.        ***                                                           
      9799        *******************************************************                                                           
      9800         7900-DB-ERROR-SECTION SECTION.                                                                                   
      9801                                                                                                                          
      9802        *******************************************************                                                           
      9803        *** THIS PARA IS INVOKED WHEN ONE OF THE MANDATORY  ***                                                           
      9804        *** RECORD IS MISSING. IT JUST DISPLAYS A MESSAGE   ***                                                           
      9805        *** BUT WUDNOT CAUSE PROG TO TERMINATE.             ***                                                           
      9806        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9807        *** PARAM-1. SETUP AS CASE NO FOR CASE LEVEL ERRORS ***                                                           
      9808        ***          AND CASE/BDGT FOR BUDGET LEVEL ERRORS. ***                                                           
      9809        *** PARAM-2. COMES FILLED IN FROM CALLING PARA.     ***                                                           
      9810        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9811        *** R270/271 ABSENT IS NOT FATAL AND WUD LET        ***                                                           
      9812        *** PROCESSING CONTINUE. BUT DO DISPLAY A MSG.      ***                                                           
      9813        *******************************************************                                                           
      9814         7900-MISSING-RECORD.                                                                                             
      9815             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9816                                                                                                                          
      9817         7900-SET-MESSAGE-CAT.                                                                                            
      9818             IF WS-SML-PARAM-2 = 'R270' OR 'R271'                                                                         
      9819                MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT                                                            
      9820             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9821                MOVE 1                   TO WSS-BDGT-MAND-REC-MISSING                                                     
      9822  R073          MOVE 'W'                 TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT.                                                           
      9823                                                                                                                          
      9824         7900-SET-OTHER-FIELDS.                                                                                           
      9825             MOVE 025                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                          
      9826             MOVE WSH-CASE-BDGT-ID       TO WS-SML-PARAM-1.                                                               
      9827             PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                    
      9828             IF WS-SML-BAD                                                                                                
      9829                DISPLAY 'MANDATORY RECORD MISSING. ',                                                                     
      9830                        WS-SML-PARAM-1, ' ',                                                                              
      9831                        WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                                    
      9832                           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                  
      9833                                                                                                                          
      9834         7900-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9835             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9836                                                                                                                          
      9837        *******************************************************                                                           
      9838        *** THIS PARA IS INVOKED WHEN THERE WAS A PROBLEM   ***                                                           
      9839        *** IN STORING THE CURRENCY STATUS FOR RUN-UNIT.    ***                                                           
      9840        *** IT WOULD DISPLAY 'BAD CURRENCY' AND DB ERRORS   ***                                                           
      9841        *** STATUS AND TERMINATE.                           ***                                                           
      9842        *******************************************************                                                           
      9843         7990-BAD-CURRENCY.                                                                                               
      9844             DISPLAY 'BAD CURRENCY FOR RUN-UNIT'   UPON PRINTER.                                                          
      9845             PERFORM GENERAL-ERROR-RTN.                                                                                   
      9846             SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG     TO ON.                                                                           
      9847             MOVE 'F'                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT.                                                           
      9848             MOVE 006                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                          
      9849             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO WS-SML-PARAM-1.                                                               
      9850             MOVE 'BAD DB CUR'           TO WS-SML-PARAM-2.                                                               
      9851             PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                    
      9852             IF WS-SML-BAD                                                                                                
      9853                DISPLAY 'MANDATORY RECORD MISSING. ',                                                                     
      9854                        WS-SML-PARAM-1, ' ',                                                                              
      9855                        WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                                    
      9856                           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                  
      9857                                                                                                                          
      9858         7990-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9859             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9860                                                                                                                          
      9861        *******************************************************                                                           
      9862        *** THIS PARA IS INVOKED WHEN THERE WAS A PROBLEM   ***                                                           
      9863        *** IN A GENERAL DB ACCESS.                         ***                                                           
      9864        *** IT WOULD DISPLAY 'DATA-BASE ERROR' AND DB       ***                                                           
      9865        *** STATUS AND TERMINATE.                           ***                                                           
      9866        *******************************************************                                                           
      9867         7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                                   
      9868             DISPLAY 'GENERAL DATA-BASE ERROR  '   UPON PRINTER.                                                          
      9869             PERFORM GENERAL-ERROR-RTN.                                                                                   
      9870             SET SW-FATAL-ERROR-FLAG     TO ON.                                                                           
      9871             MOVE 'F'                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT.                                                           
      9872             MOVE 006                    TO WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                          
      9873             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO WS-SML-PARAM-1.                                                               
      9874             MOVE 'GEN DB ERR'           TO WS-SML-PARAM-2.                                                               
      9875             PERFORM 1810-DISPLAY-MSG.                                                                                    
      9876             IF WS-SML-BAD                                                                                                
      9877                DISPLAY 'MANDATORY RECORD MISSING. ',                                                                     
      9878                        WS-SML-PARAM-1, ' ',                                                                              
      9879                        WS-SML-PARAM-2                                                                                    
      9880                           UPON PRINTER.                                                                                  
      9881         7995-EXIT.                                                                                                       
      9882             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9883                                                                                                                          
      9884                                                                                                                          
      9885        *******************************************************                                                           
      9886        *** SEQUENTIAL FILE WRITE SECTION.                  ***                                                           
      9887        *** SECTION 8500.                                   ***                                                           
      9888        *** FOLLOWING ENTRY POINTS ARE DEFINED :            ***                                                           
      9889        ***    . 8510     ATE01D01.                         ***                                                           
      9890        ***    . 8520     ATE01D02.                         ***                                                           
      9891        ***    . 8540     ATE01D04.                         ***                                                           
      9892        ***    . 8550     ATE01D05.                         ***                                                           
      9893        ***    . 8560     ATE01D06.                         ***                                                           
      9894        ***    . 8570     ATE01D06.                         ***                                                           
      9895        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9896        *** EACH WRITE MODULE MAY PERFORM A DB RECORD MOVE  ***                                                           
      9897        *** TO AN EQUIVALENT WS RECORD. THE MOVES ARE DONE  ***                                                           
      9898        *** ON A FIELD LEVEL TO TAKE CARE OF VARIOUS DATA   ***                                                           
      9899        *** TYPES EXISTING IN THE DB RECORD AND A DESIRE    ***                                                           
      9900        *** TO HAVE UNIFORM DATA TYPES IN THE SEQ FILES.    ***                                                           
      9901        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9902        *** THESE MOVES ARE CODED INDEPENDENTLY  IN         ***                                                           
      9903        *** SECTION 8700.                                   ***                                                           
      9904        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9905        *** DETAILED PHYSICAL WRITES ARE CODED IN SECTION   ***                                                           
      9906        *** 8800.                                           ***                                                           
      9907        *******************************************************                                                           
      9908                                                                                                                          
      9909         8500-WRITE-SEQ-OUT-FILE-SECT SECTION.                                                                            
      9910                                                                                                                          
      9911        *******************************************************                                                           
      9912        *** WRITE ATE01D01 FILE.                            ***                                                           
      9913        *** ATE01D01 SHARES THE SAME RECORDS AND WRITE      ***                                                           
      9914        *** LOGIC WITH ATE01D07 FILE. (EXCEPTING THAT 07    ***                                                           
      9915        *** ALSO GETS AN EXTRA R954 REC).                   ***                                                           
      9916        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9917        *** HOWEVER, ALL SUMMARY REPORT COUNTS ARE INCR-    ***                                                           
      9918        *** EMENTED ONLY IN ATE01D01 WRITE.                 ***                                                           
      9919        *** THIS IS OK, BECAUSE A WRITE TO 01D07 FILE IS    ***                                                           
      9920        *** ALWAYS FOLLOWED BY A WRITE TO 01D01 FILE IN     ***                                                           
      9921        *** THE MAIN CALLING LOGIC.                         ***                                                           
      9922        ***                                                 ***                                                           
      9923        *** FILE 01 RECORDS HAVE A PREFIX OF 'C'.           ***                                                           
      9924        *******************************************************                                                           
      9925         8510-WRITE-ATE01D01.                                                                                             
      9926             EXIT.                                                                                                        
      9927                                                                                                                          
      9928         8510-CHECK-MAND-REC-SW.                                                                                          
      9929             IF WSS-BDGT-MAND-REC-MISSING-ON                                                                              
      9930                GO TO 8510-EXIT.                                                                                          
      9931                                                                                                                          
      9932         8510-ALL-OK-GO-AHEAD.                                                                                            
      9933             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D01-BLK-CNT.                                                         
      9934                                                                                                                          
      9935         8510-CHECK-RCOUP-STUS-SW.                                                                                        
      9936             IF WSS-R258-REC-ON AND                                                                                       
      9937                R258-CDE-STATUS-RCOUPMT NOT = 01                                                                          
      9938                    MOVE 0               TO WSS-R258-REC                                                                  
      9939                    MOVE 0               TO WSS-R270-REC                                                                  
      9940                    MOVE 0               TO WSS-R271-REC.                                                                 
      9941                                                                                                                          
      9942         8510-WRITE-R672.                                                                                                 
      9943             PERFORM 8712-MOVE-R672                THRU 8712-EXIT.                                                        
      9944             MOVE B672-CASE-ATTRIBS      TO C672-CASE-ATTRIBS.                                                            
      9945             WRITE C672-CASE-ATTRIBS.                                                                                     
      9946             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT.                                                         
      9947                                                                                                                          
      9948  R006  *** R253 IF FOUND, WILL BE FORMATTED AS R248.                                                                     
      9949         8510-WRITE-R248-R253.                                                                                            
      9950             IF WSS-R253-REC-ON                                                                                           
      9951                PERFORM 8738-MOVE-R253             THRU 8738-EXIT                                                         
      9952  R006          MOVE B248-CASE-NAME      TO C248-CASE-NAME                                                                
      9953  R006          WRITE C248-CASE-NAME                                                                                      
      9954                ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT                                                          
      9955             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9956             IF WSS-R248-REC-ON                                                                                           
      9957                PERFORM 8716-MOVE-R248             THRU 8716-EXIT                                                         
      9958                MOVE B248-CASE-NAME      TO C248-CASE-NAME                                                                
      9959                WRITE C248-CASE-NAME                                                                                      
      9960                ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT.                                                         
      9961                                                                                                                          
      9962         8510-WRITE-R254-R269.                                                                                            
      9963             IF NOT WSS-R253-REC-ON                                                                                       
      9964                IF WSS-R254-REC-ON                                                                                        
      9965                   PERFORM 8718-MOVE-R254          THRU 8718-EXIT                                                         
      9966                   MOVE B254-SECOND-CASE-NAME                                                                             
      9967                                         TO C254-SECOND-CASE-NAME                                                         
      9968                   WRITE C254-SECOND-CASE-NAME                                                                            
      9969                   ADD 1                 TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT                                                          
      9970                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9971                   NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
      9972             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9973                IF WSS-R269-REC-ON                                                                                        
      9974                   PERFORM 8742-MOVE-R269          THRU 8742-EXIT                                                         
      9975                   MOVE B269-ALT-PAYEE-NAME2       TO C269-ALT-PAYEE-NAME2                                                
      9976                   WRITE C269-ALT-PAYEE-NAME2                                                                             
      9977                   ADD 1                 TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT                                                          
      9978                ELSE                                                                                                      
      9979                   NEXT SENTENCE.                                                                                         
      9980                                                                                                                          
      9981         8510-WRITE-R247-R252.                                                                                            
      9982             IF WSS-R252-REC-ON                                                                                           
      9983                PERFORM 8736-MOVE-R252             THRU 8736-EXIT                                                         
      9984                MOVE B252-ALTERNATE-ADDRESS                                                                               
      9985                                         TO C252-ALTERNATE-ADDRESS                                                        
      9986                WRITE C252-ALTERNATE-ADDRESS                                                                              
      9987                ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT                                                          
      9988             ELSE                                                                                                         
      9989             IF WSS-R247-REC-ON                                                                                           
      9990                PERFORM 8714-MOVE-R247             THRU 8714-EXIT                                                         
      9991                MOVE B247-CASE-ADDRESS   TO C247-CASE-ADDRESS                                                             
      9992                WRITE C247-CASE-ADDRESS                                                                                   
      9993                ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT.                                                         
      9994                                                                                                                          
      9995         8510-WRITE-R634.                                                                                                 
      9996             PERFORM 8734-MOVE-R634                THRU 8734-EXIT.                                                        
      9997             MOVE B634-CM-BUDGET-INFO    TO C634-CM-BUDGET-INFO  .                                                        
      9998             WRITE C634-CM-BUDGET-INFO.                                                                                   
      9999             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT .                                                        
     10000                                                                                                                          
     10001         8510-GEN-CLOSED-BDGT-CNTS.                                                                                       
     10002             IF WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON                                                                                
     10003                ADD 1                    TO WSA-R-PRO-CLOSE-BDGT-CNT                                                      
     10004                ADD WS-PRORATION-AMT     TO WSA-R-PRO-CLOSE-BDGT-AMT .                                                    
     10005                                                                                                                          
     10006         8510-WRITE-R255.                                                                                                 
     10007             PERFORM 8740-MOVE-R255                THRU 8740-EXIT.                                                        
     10008             IF WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON         AND                                                                    
     10009                NOT WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                       
     10010                   MOVE WS-PRORATION-AMT TO B255-AMT-GRANT-CASH  .                                                        
     10011                                                                                                                          
     10012             MOVE B255-CASH-GRANT        TO C255-CASH-GRANT      .                                                        
     10013             WRITE C255-CASH-GRANT.                                                                                       
     10014             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT .                                                        
     10015                                                                                                                          
     10016         8510-WRITE-R654.                                                                                                 
     10017             IF WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10018                PERFORM 8774-MOVE-R654             THRU 8774-EXIT                                                         
     10019                IF WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON                                                                             
     10020                   MOVE WS-PRORATION-AMT TO B654-AMT-GR-CASH                                                              
     10021                   MOVE B654-CM-OVRD     TO C654-CM-OVRD                                                                  
     10022                   WRITE C654-CM-OVRD                                                                                     
     10023                   ADD 1                 TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT                                                          
     10024                ELSE                                                                                                      
     10025                   MOVE B654-CM-OVRD     TO C654-CM-OVRD                                                                  
     10026                   WRITE C654-CM-OVRD                                                                                     
     10027                   ADD 1                 TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10028                                                                                                                          
     10029         8510-INC-CHECK-ISS-CNTS.                                                                                         
     10030  R069       IF  WSS-BDGT-CASH-ISSNC      =  0  OR                                                                        
     10031  R069           R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT       =  'S'                                                                          
     10032  R069           GO  TO  8510-WRITE-R256.                                                                                 
     10033             ADD 1                       TO WSA-R-CHK-ISS-BDGT-CNT.                                                       
     10034                                                                                                                          
     10035             IF WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON                                                                                
     10036                ADD WS-PRORATION-AMT     TO WSA-R-CHK-ISS-BDGT-AMT                                                        
     10037             ELSE                                                                                                         
     10038             IF WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10039                ADD R654-AMT-GR-CASH     TO WSA-R-CHK-ISS-BDGT-AMT                                                        
     10040             ELSE                                                                                                         
     10041                ADD R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH  TO WSA-R-CHK-ISS-BDGT-AMT.                                                       
     10042                                                                                                                          
     10043         8510-WRITE-R256.                                                                                                 
     10044             IF WSS-R256-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10045                PERFORM 8514-WRITE-ATE01D01-R256   THRU 8514-EXIT                                                         
     10046                   VARYING WSI-R256-DBK-IDX FROM 1 BY 1                                                                   
     10047                     UNTIL WSI-R256-DBK-IDX > WSH-R256-DBK-TAB-SIZE.                                                      
     10048                                                                                                                          
     10049         8510-WRITE-R257.                                                                                                 
     10050             IF WSS-R257-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10051                PERFORM 8748-MOVE-R257             THRU 8748-EXIT
