     10052                MOVE B257-NET-INCOME     TO C257-NET-INCOME                                                               
     10053                WRITE C257-NET-INCOME                                                                                     
     10054                ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT .                                                        
     10055                                                                                                                          
     10056         8510-WRITE-R258-R271.                                                                                            
     10057             IF WSS-R258-REC-ON  AND                                                                                      
     10058                WSS-R271-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10059                   PERFORM 8750-MOVE-R258          THRU 8750-EXIT                                                         
     10060                   MOVE B258-RECOUPMENT-REFERRAL                                                                          
     10061                                         TO C258-RECOUPMENT-REFERRAL                                                      
     10062                   WRITE C258-RECOUPMENT-REFERRAL                                                                         
     10063                   ADD 1                 TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT                                                          
     10064                   PERFORM 8780-MOVE-R271          THRU 8780-EXIT                                                         
     10065                   MOVE B271-RECOUPMENT  TO C271-RECOUPMENT                                                               
     10066                   WRITE C271-RECOUPMENT                                                                                  
     10067                   ADD 1                 TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT                                                          
     10068  R069             IF  WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON  OR                                                                  
     10069  R069                 WSS-BDGT-CASH-ISSNC      =  0  OR                                                                  
     10070  R069                 R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT       =  'S'                                                                    
     10071  R069                 NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                     
     10072  R069             ELSE                                                                                                   
     10073                       ADD 1                 TO WSA-R-RCOU-BDGT-CNT                                                       
     10074                       ADD R271-AMT-INSTMT   TO WSA-R-RCOU-BDGT-AMT.                                                      
     10075                                                                                                                          
     10076         8510-WRITE-R259.                                                                                                 
     10077             IF WSS-R259-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10078                PERFORM 8752-MOVE-R259             THRU 8752-EXIT                                                         
     10079                MOVE B259-VENDOR-PAYMENT TO C259-VENDOR-PAYMENT                                                           
     10080                WRITE C259-VENDOR-PAYMENT                                                                                 
     10081                ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT                                                          
     10082  R069           IF  WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON  OR                                                                    
     10083  R069               WSS-BDGT-CASH-ISSNC      =  0  OR                                                                    
     10084  R069               R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT       =  'S'                                                                      
     10085  R069               NEXT  SENTENCE                                                                                       
     10086  R069           ELSE                                                                                                     
     10087  R069              ADD 1                    TO WSA-R-VEND-BDGT-CNT                                                       
     10088  R069              ADD R259-AMT-PAYMENT-VENDOR                                                                           
     10089                                         TO WSA-R-VEND-BDGT-AMT.                                                          
     10090         8510-WRITE-R251.                                                                                                 
     10091             IF WSS-R251-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10092                PERFORM 8744-MOVE-R251             THRU 8744-EXIT                                                         
     10093                MOVE B251-SUSPENSION     TO C251-SUSPENSION                                                               
     10094                WRITE C251-SUSPENSION                                                                                     
     10095                ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10096                                                                                                                          
     10097         8510-INC-OPEN-BUDGET-COUNTS.                                                                                     
     10098             PERFORM 8518-OPEN-BUDGET-COUNTS       THRU 8518-EXIT.                                                        
     10099  R069       IF  (WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON  OR                                                                       
     10100  R069             WSS-BDGT-CASH-ISSNC-ON)   AND                                                                          
     10101  R070           (R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH  >  9.99   AND                                                                      
     10102  R070            R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH  <  1500.01)                                                                        
     10103  R069           PERFORM  8512-WRITE-ATE01D01-R291  THRU  8512-EXIT.                                                      
     10104                                                                                                                          
     10105         8510-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10106             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10107                                                                                                                          
     10108        *******************************************************                                                           
     10109        *** WRITE ATE01D01 FILE.                            ***                                                           
     10110        *** WRITE REC R291.                                 ***                                                           
     10111        *** FILE 01 RECORDS HAVE A PREFIX OF 'C'.           ***                                                           
     10112        *******************************************************                                                           
     10113         8512-WRITE-ATE01D01-R291.                                                                                        
     10114  R069       IF  WSS-BDGT-CASH-ISSNC  =  0      OR                                                                        
     10115  R069           R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT   =  'S'                                                                              
     10116  R069           GO  TO  8512-EXIT.                                                                                       
     10117             PERFORM 8790-MOVE-R291                THRU 8790-EXIT.                                                        
     10118             MOVE B291-BENEFIT           TO C291-BENEFIT.                                                                 
     10119             WRITE C291-BENEFIT.                                                                                          
     10120             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10121                                                                                                                          
     10122         8512-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10123             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10124                                                                                                                          
     10125        *******************************************************                                                           
     10126        *** WRITE R256 TO ATE01D01 FILE.                    ***                                                           
     10127        *** ALL R256 RECORDS WILL BE WRITTEN.               ***                                                           
     10128        *** FILE 01 HAS A PREFIX OF 'C'.                    ***                                                           
     10129        *******************************************************                                                           
     10130         8514-WRITE-ATE01D01-R256.                                                                                        
     10131             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10132                                                                                                                          
     10133         8514-FETCH-R256-ON-KEY.                                                                                          
     10134             MOVE WSH-R256-NAME          TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
     10135             MOVE WST-R256-DBK (WSI-R256-DBK-IDX)  TO WSH-FET-DBK.                                                        
     10136             PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY         THRU 7110-EXIT.                                                        
     10137                                                                                                                          
     10138         8514-WRITE-REC-NOW.                                                                                              
     10139             PERFORM 8746-MOVE-R256                THRU 8746-EXIT.                                                        
     10140             MOVE B256-SPECIAL-ALLOWANCE TO C256-SPECIAL-ALLOWANCE.                                                       
     10141             WRITE C256-SPECIAL-ALLOWANCE.                                                                                
     10142             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT .                                                        
     10143                                                                                                                          
     10144         8514-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10145             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10146                                                                                                                          
     10147        *******************************************************                                                           
     10148        *** THIS PARA WUD BUILD CNTY-CAT TABLE              ***                                                           
     10149        *** FOR OPEN CASH BUDGETS.                          ***                                                           
     10150        *** CNTY INDEX IS SET FROM PARA 2000 (CASE LEVEL).  ***                                                           
     10151        *** CAT  INDEX IS SET FROM PARA 2260 (CAT  LEVEL).  ***                                                           
     10152        ***                                                 ***                                                           
     10153        *** IT IS INVOKED BOTH FROM 8510 (CASH) AND 8520    ***                                                           
     10154        *** (ONLY FOR MEDICAL-ONLY BUDGETS).                ***                                                           
     10155        ***                                                 ***                                                           
     10156        *** UPDATE $AMT ONLY FOR CASH BUDGETS.              ***                                                           
     10157        *******************************************************                                                           
     10158         8518-OPEN-BUDGET-COUNTS.                                                                                         
     10159             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10160                                                                                                                          
     10161         8518-SET-WST-CNTY-CAT-INDICES.                                                                                   
     10162             SET WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX        TO WSI-CNTY-IDX.                                                                 
     10163             SET WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX         TO WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX.                                                             
     10164                                                                                                                          
     10165         8518-INC-ACT-MEM-CNT.                                                                                            
     10166  R069           ADD R634-CNT-MEM-ACT        TO WST-CNTY-CAT-MEM-ACT-CNT                                                  
     10167  R069                                 (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                 
     10168  R069           ADD R634-CNT-MEM-ACT        TO WSA-R-ACT-BDGT-MEM-CNT.                                                   
     10169                                                                                                                          
     10170         8518-CHECK-ACTIVE.                                                                                               
     10171             IF WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = 0 OR 1 OR 2 OR 3                                                             
     10172                ADD 1                    TO WST-CNTY-CAT-ACT-BDGT-CNT                                                     
     10173                                       (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX).                                                
     10174                                                                                                                          
     10175         8518-CHECK-TYPE-0.                                                                                               
     10176  R069       IF  R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT  =  'S'                                                                               
     10177  R069           GO  TO  8518-EXIT.                                                                                       
     10178             IF WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = 0 OR 2 OR 3                                                                  
     10179                IF WSS-BDGT-PRORATED-CLOSE-ON                                                                             
     10180                   ADD WS-PRORATION-AMT  TO WST-CNTY-CAT-MGA-DOLL                                                         
     10181                                       (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                 
     10182                ELSE                                                                                                      
     10183                IF WSS-R654-REC-ON                                                                                        
     10184                   ADD R654-AMT-GR-CASH  TO WST-CNTY-CAT-MGA-DOLL                                                         
     10185                                       (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                 
     10186                ELSE                                                                                                      
     10187                IF WSS-R255-REC-ON                                                                                        
     10188                   ADD R255-AMT-GRANT-CASH TO WST-CNTY-CAT-MGA-DOLL                                                       
     10189                                       (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX).                                                
     10190                                                                                                                          
     10191         8518-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10192             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10193                                                                                                                          
     10194        *******************************************************                                                           
     10195        *** WRITE ATE01D02 FILE.                            ***                                                           
     10196        *** FILE 02 RECORDS HAVE A PREFIX OF 'E'.           ***                                                           
     10197        ***                                                 ***                                                           
     10198        *** IF ITS A MEDICAL-ONLY BUDGET, SUMMARY-TABLE HAS ***                                                           
     10199        *** NOT BEEN BUILT, SO BUILD IT NOW.                ***                                                           
     10200        *******************************************************                                                           
     10201  R069A *8520-WRITE-ATE01D02.                                                                                             
     10202  R069A *    EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10203  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10204  R069A *8520-CHECK-MAND-REC-SW.                                                                                          
     10205  R069A *    IF WSS-BDGT-MAND-REC-MISSING-ON                                                                              
     10206  R069A *       GO TO 8520-EXIT.                                                                                          
     10207  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10208  R069A *8520-INC-BLOCK-CNT.                                                                                              
     10209  R069A *    ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D02-BLK-CNT.                                                         
     10210  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10211  R069A *8520-INC-REPORT-CNT.                                                                                             
     10212  R069A *    IF WST-CAT-TYPE (WSI-CAT-IDX) = 1                                                                            
     10213  R069A *       PERFORM 8518-OPEN-BUDGET-COUNTS    THRU 8518-EXIT.                                                        
     10214  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10215  R069A *8520-WRITE-R672.                                                                                                 
     10216  R069A *    PERFORM 8712-MOVE-R672                THRU 8712-EXIT.                                                        
     10217  R069A *    MOVE B672-CASE-ATTRIBS      TO E672-CASE-ATTRIBS.                                                            
     10218  R069A *    WRITE E672-CASE-ATTRIBS.                                                                                     
     10219  R069A *    ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10220  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10221  R069A *** FOR FUTURE CLOSES, PASS STATUS AS CLOSED TO FACILITATE      *                                                 
     10222  R069A *** LINKING BUDGETS WITH INDIVIDUALS IN MAID PATH.      *                                                         
     10223  R069A *8520-WRITE-R634.                                                                                                 
     10224  R069A *    PERFORM 8734-MOVE-R634                THRU 8734-EXIT.                                                        
     10225  R069A *    IF WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON                                                                             
     10226  R069A *       MOVE 'C'                 TO B634-CDE-STUS-BDGT.                                                           
     10227  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10228  R069A *    MOVE B634-CM-BUDGET-INFO    TO E634-CM-BUDGET-INFO  .                                                        
     10229  R069A *    WRITE E634-CM-BUDGET-INFO.                                                                                   
     10230  R069A *    ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT .                                                        
     10231  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10232  R069A *** R253 IF FOUND, WILL BE FORMATTED AS R248.      *                                                              
     10233  R069A *8520-WRITE-R248-R253.                                                                                            
     10234  R069A *    IF WSS-R253-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10235  R069A *       PERFORM 8738-MOVE-R253             THRU 8738-EXIT                                                         
     10236  R069A *       MOVE B248-CASE-NAME      TO E248-CASE-NAME                                                                
     10237  R069A *       WRITE E248-CASE-NAME                                                                                      
     10238  R069A *       ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT                                                          
     10239  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
     10240  R069A *    IF WSS-R248-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10241  R069A *       PERFORM 8716-MOVE-R248             THRU 8716-EXIT                                                         
     10242  R069A *       MOVE B248-CASE-NAME      TO E248-CASE-NAME                                                                
     10243  R069A *       WRITE E248-CASE-NAME                                                                                      
     10244  R069A *       ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10245  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10246  R069A *8520-WRITE-R254-R269.                                                                                            
     10247  R069A *    IF NOT WSS-R253-REC-ON                                                                                       
     10248  R069A *       IF WSS-R254-REC-ON                                                                                        
     10249  R069A *          PERFORM 8718-MOVE-R254          THRU 8718-EXIT                                                         
     10250  R069A *          MOVE B254-SECOND-CASE-NAME                                                                             
     10251  R069A *                                TO E254-SECOND-CASE-NAME                                                         
     10252  R069A *          WRITE E254-SECOND-CASE-NAME                                                                            
     10253  R069A *          ADD 1                 TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT                                                          
     10254  R069A *       ELSE                                                                                                      
     10255  R069A *          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                          
     10256  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
     10257  R069A *       IF WSS-R269-REC-ON                                                                                        
     10258  R069A *          PERFORM 8742-MOVE-R269          THRU 8742-EXIT                                                         
     10259  R069A *          MOVE B269-ALT-PAYEE-NAME2       TO E269-ALT-PAYEE-NAME2                                                
     10260  R069A *          WRITE E269-ALT-PAYEE-NAME2                                                                             
     10261  R069A *          ADD 1                 TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT                                                          
     10262  R069A *       ELSE                                                                                                      
     10263  R069A *          NEXT SENTENCE.                                                                                         
     10264  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10265  R069A *8520-WRITE-R247-R252.                                                                                            
     10266  R069A *    IF WSS-R252-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10267  R069A *       PERFORM 8736-MOVE-R252             THRU 8736-EXIT                                                         
     10268  R069A *       MOVE B252-ALTERNATE-ADDRESS                                                                               
     10269  R069A *                                TO E252-ALTERNATE-ADDRESS                                                        
     10270  R069A *       WRITE E252-ALTERNATE-ADDRESS                                                                              
     10271  R069A *       ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT                                                          
     10272  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
     10273  R069A *    IF WSS-R247-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10274  R069A *       PERFORM 8714-MOVE-R247             THRU 8714-EXIT                                                         
     10275  R069A *       MOVE B247-CASE-ADDRESS   TO E247-CASE-ADDRESS                                                             
     10276  R069A *       WRITE E247-CASE-ADDRESS                                                                                   
     10277  R069A *       ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10278  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10279  R069A *8520-WRITE-R260.                                                                                                 
     10280  R069A *    IF WSS-R260-REC-ON                                                                                           
     10281  R069A *       PERFORM 8758-MOVE-R260             THRU 8758-EXIT                                                         
     10282  R069A *       MOVE B260-BULK-MAILING   TO E260-BULK-MAILING                                                             
     10283  R069A *       WRITE E260-BULK-MAILING                                                                                   
     10284  R069A *       ADD 1                    TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10285  R069A *  8520-EXIT.                                                                                                     
     10286  R069A *      EXIT.                                                                                                      
     10287  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10288        ******************************************************                                                            
     10289        *** IF THIS INDIV WAS A FUTURE-DELETE, NOW BEING   ***                                                            
     10290        *** DONE, OVERLAY 268-END-DTE BY FUTURE-DELETE     ***                                                            
     10291        *** DATE.                                          ***                                                            
     10292  R017  *** DO NOT WRITE IT TO OUTPUT FILE BECAUSE NO      ***                                                            
     10293  R017  *** MAID SHOULD BE ISSUED TO THIS INDIV.           ***                                                            
     10294        ***                                                ***                                                            
     10295        *** IF THE BUDGET HAS BEEN CLOSED (BECAUSE OF      ***                                                            
     10296        *** WHATEVER REASONS) OVERWRITE 268-END-DTE BY     ***                                                            
     10297        *** 634-BUDGET-CLOSED DATE.                        ***                                                            
     10298        ******************************************************                                                            
     10299  R069A *8530-WRITE-ATE01D02.                                                                                             
     10300  R069A *    PERFORM 8756-MOVE-R268                THRU 8756-EXIT.                                                        
     10301  R069A *    IF R268-DTE-END-FUTURE NOT = 0000000  AND                                                                    
     10302  R069A *       R268-DTE-END-FUTURE NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                
     10303  R069A *       GO TO 8530-EXIT                                                                                           
     10304  R069A *    ELSE                                                                                                         
     10305  R069A *    IF WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON                                                                             
     10306  R069A *       MOVE R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT          TO B268-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                  
     10307  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10308  R069A *    MOVE B268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION                                                                             
     10309  R069A *                                TO E268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION.                                                  
     10310  R069A *    WRITE E268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION.                                                                           
     10311  R069A *    ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D02-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10312  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10313  R069A *8530-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10314  R069A *    EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10315  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10316  R035   8535-WRITE-ATE01D01.                                                                                             
     10317  R035       PERFORM 8756-MOVE-R268                THRU 8756-EXIT.                                                        
     10318  M313       IF R268-DTE-END-FUTURE NOT = 0000000  AND                                                                    
     10319  R035          R268-DTE-END-FUTURE NOT > WSH-PAYMENT-DATE                                                                
     10320  R035          GO TO 8535-EXIT                                                                                           
     10321  R035       ELSE                                                                                                         
     10322  R035       IF WSS-BDGT-CLOSED-BEF-PERIOD-ON                                                                             
     10323  R035          MOVE R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT          TO B268-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                  
     10324  R035                                                                                                                    
     10325  R035       MOVE B268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION                                                                             
     10326  R035                                   TO C268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION.                                                  
     10327  R035       WRITE C268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION.                                                                           
     10328  R035       ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D01-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10329  R035                                                                                                                    
     10330  R035   8535-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10331  R035       EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10332                                                                                                                          
     10333        ******************************************************                                                            
     10334        *** WRITE ATE01D04 FILE                            ***                                                            
     10335        *** IT WRITES A 954 RECORD AND THEN                ***                                                            
     10336        ***     . WRITES THE ORIGINAL R255 RECORD          ***                                                            
     10337        ***     . WRITES THE MODIFIED R255 RECORD.         ***                                                            
     10338        *** FILE 04 RECORDS HAVE A PREFIX OF 'G'.           ***                                                           
     10339        ******************************************************                                                            
     10340         8540-WRITE-ATE01D04.                                                                                             
     10341             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10342                                                                                                                          
     10343         8540-WRITE-R954.                                                                                                 
     10344             PERFORM 8770-MOVE-R954                THRU 8770-EXIT.                                                        
     10345             MOVE WSH-TME-ACTN           TO B954-TME-ACTN.                                                                
     10346  R024       MOVE 'DDBCHG'               TO B954-NBR-TRANS.                                                               
     10347             MOVE B954-SECD-ACTN         TO G954-SECD-ACTN .                                                              
     10348             WRITE G954-SECD-ACTN.                                                                                        
     10349             ADD 1                       TO WSH-TME-ACTN.                                                                 
     10350             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D04-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10351                                                                                                                          
     10352         8540-WRITE-R634.                                                                                                 
     10353             PERFORM 8734-MOVE-R634                THRU 8734-EXIT.                                                        
     10354             MOVE B634-CM-BUDGET-INFO    TO G634-CM-BUDGET-INFO  .                                                        
     10355             WRITE G634-CM-BUDGET-INFO.                                                                                   
     10356             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D04-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10357                                                                                                                          
     10358         8540-WRITE-ORIGINAL-R255.                                                                                        
     10359             MOVE WSH-R255-1ST-DBK       TO WSH-FET-DBK.                                                                  
     10360             MOVE 'R255-CASH-GRANT'      TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
     10361             PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY         THRU 7110-EXIT.                                                        
     10362             PERFORM 8740-MOVE-R255                THRU 8740-EXIT.                                                        
     10363             MOVE B255-CASH-GRANT        TO G255-CASH-GRANT.                                                              
     10364             WRITE G255-CASH-GRANT.                                                                                       
     10365             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D04-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10366                                                                                                                          
     10367         8540-WRITE-MODIFIED-R255.                                                                                        
     10368             MOVE WSH-R255-NEW-DBK       TO WSH-FET-DBK.                                                                  
     10369             MOVE 'R255-CASH-GRANT'      TO WSH-RECORD-NAME.                                                              
     10370             PERFORM 7110-FETCH-REC-ON-KEY         THRU 7110-EXIT.                                                        
     10371             PERFORM 8740-MOVE-R255                THRU 8740-EXIT.                                                        
     10372             MOVE B255-CASH-GRANT        TO G255-CASH-GRANT.                                                              
     10373             WRITE G255-CASH-GRANT.                                                                                       
     10374             ADD 1                       TO WSA-ATE01D04-REC-CNT.                                                         
     10375                                                                                                                          
     10376         8540-INC-CTR.                                                                                                    
     10377             ADD 1                       TO WSA-R-DD-BANK-CHG-CNT.                                                        
     10378                                                                                                                          
     10379         8540-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10380             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10381                                                                                                                          
     10382        ******************************************************                                                            
     10383        *** WRITE ATE01D05 FILE ( I )                      ***                                                            
     10384        *** R268 RECORD.                                   ***                                                            
     10385        *** THIS PROCESS WILL BE INVOKED FOR EACH 268      ***                                                            
     10386        *** FUTURE CLOSE INDIV , AND WILL WRITE A 'I'      ***                                                            
     10387        *** TYPE TRANSACTION TO FILE ATE01D05.             ***                                                            
     10388        ******************************************************                                                            
     10389         8550-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-I.                                                                                      
     10390             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10391                                                                                                                          
     10392         8550-WRITE-TRAN-I.                                                                                               
     10393             PERFORM 8558-MOVE-DATA-TO-D05-REC     THRU 8558-EXIT.                                                        
     10394             MOVE 'I'                    TO ATE01D05-TYP-TRANS   .                                                        
     10395             MOVE R268-NBR-INDIV         TO ATE01D05-NBR-RCPT    .                                                        
     10396             MOVE R268-DTE-END-FUTURE    TO ATE01D05-CLOSE-DATE  .                                                        
     10397             PERFORM 8850-DET-WRITE-ATE01D05       THRU 8850-EXIT.                                                        
     10398                                                                                                                          
     10399         8550-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10400             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10401                                                                                                                          
     10402        ******************************************************                                                            
     10403        *** WRITE ATE01D05 FILE ( II )                     ***                                                            
     10404        *** THIS PROCESS WILL BE INVOKED IF THE BDGT       ***                                                            
     10405        *** HAS BEEN CLOSED BECAUSE OF WHATEVER REASONS.   ***                                                            
     10406        *** IT WRITES A TRANS TYPE 'B' TO FILE ATE01D05.   ***                                                            
     10407        ******************************************************                                                            
     10408         8554-WRITE-ATE01D05-TRAN-B.                                                                                      
     10409             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10410                                                                                                                          
     10411         8554-WRITE-TRAN-B.                                                                                               
     10412             PERFORM 8558-MOVE-DATA-TO-D05-REC     THRU 8558-EXIT.                                                        
     10413             MOVE 'B'                    TO ATE01D05-TYP-TRANS   .                                                        
     10414             MOVE ZEROS                  TO ATE01D05-NBR-RCPT    .                                                        
     10415             MOVE R634-DTE-CLOSED-BDGT   TO ATE01D05-CLOSE-DATE  .                                                        
     10416             PERFORM 8850-DET-WRITE-ATE01D05       THRU 8850-EXIT.                                                        
     10417                                                                                                                          
     10418         8554-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10419             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10420                                                                                                                          
     10421        ******************************************************                                                            
     10422        *** THIS PROCESS WILL ASSEMBLE DATA INTO ATE01D05  ***                                                            
     10423        *** RECORD COMMON FIELDS BETWEEN BUDGET AND        ***                                                            
     10424        *** INDIVIDUALS/RECIPIENTS.                        ***                                                            
     10425        ******************************************************                                                            
     10426         8558-MOVE-DATA-TO-D05-REC.                                                                                       
     10427             MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D05-REC             .                                                    
     10428             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO ATE01D05-NBR-CASE        .                                                    
     10429             MOVE R249-CDE-CATEGORY      TO ATE01D05-CDE-CATEGORY    .                                                    
     10430             MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT   TO ATE01D05-NBR-GROUP-GRANT .                                                    
     10431             MOVE R634-CDE-STUS-PROG     TO ATE01D05-STAT-CODE       .                                                    
     10432             MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D05-CDE-SUFFIX      .                                                    
     10433                                                                                                                          
     10434         8558-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10435             EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10436                                                                                                                          
     10437        ******************************************************                                                            
     10438        *** WRITE ATE01D06 FILE                            ***                                                            
     10439        ******************************************************                                                            
     10440  R069A *8560-WRITE-ATE01D06.                                                                                             
     10441  R069A *    MOVE SPACES                 TO ATE01D06-RECORD.                                                              
     10442  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10443  R069A *8560-LOOP-FOR-WST-CNTY-CAT.                                                                                      
     10444  R069A *    PERFORM 8565-MOVE-ATE01D06            THRU 8565-EXIT                                                         
     10445  R069A *            VARYING WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX FROM 1 BY 1                                                                 
     10446  R069A *              UNTIL WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX > WSH-CNTY-TAB-SIZE                                                         
     10447  R069A *                  AFTER WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX FROM 1 BY 1                                                              
     10448  R069A *                  UNTIL WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX > WSH-CAT-ONLY-TAB-SIZE.                                                 
     10449  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10450  R069A *8560-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10451  R069A *    EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10452  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10453        ******************************************************                                                            
     10454        *** MOVE EACH CNTY/CAT OCCURENCE DATA TO FILE RD   ***                                                            
     10455        *** AREA, AND WRITE THE DETAIL ATE01D06 RECORD.    ***                                                            
     10456        ***                                                ***                                                            
     10457        *** IGNORE THIS CONTROL RECORD IF ALL COUNTS ARE   ***                                                            
     10458        *** 0, BECAUSE COUNTIES ARE NOT PAID ON ALL PDYS.  ***                                                            
     10459        *** THIS WUD HELP AVOID WRITING UNNECCESSARY R265  ***                                                            
     10460        *** RECORDS SUBSEQUENTLY.                          ***                                                            
     10461        ******************************************************                                                            
     10462  R069A *8565-MOVE-ATE01D06.                                                                                              
     10463  R069A *    SET WSI-CNTY-IDX            TO WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX.                                                             
     10464  R069A *    SET WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX        TO WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX .                                                             
     10465  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10466  R069A *8565-CHECK-IF-ALL-CNTS-ZERO.                                                                                     
     10467  R069A *    IF WST-CNTY-CAT-ACT-BDGT-CNT                                                                                 
     10468  R069A *       (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX) = 0     AND                                                            
     10469  R069A *       WST-CNTY-CAT-SUS-BDGT-CNT                                                                                 
     10470  R069A *       (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX) = 0     AND                                                            
     10471  R069A *       WST-CNTY-CAT-MGA-DOLL                                                                                     
     10472  R069A *       (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX) = 0     AND                                                            
     10473  R069A *       WST-CNTY-CAT-MEM-ACT-CNT                                                                                  
     10474  R069A *       (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX) = 0                                                                    
     10475  R069A *           GO TO 8565-EXIT.                                                                                      
     10476  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10477  R069A *8565-MOVE-ID-DATA.                                                                                               
     10478  R069A *    MOVE WSH-PAYDAY-NBR         TO PAYDAY-NBR                                                                    
     10479  R069A *                                IN ATE01D06-RECORD.                                                              
     10480  R069A *    MOVE WST-CNTY-NBR (WSI-CNTY-IDX)                                                                             
     10481  R069A *                                TO COUNTY-NBR                                                                    
     10482  R069A *                                IN ATE01D06-RECORD.                                                              
     10483  R069A *    MOVE WST-CAT-ONLY (WSI-CAT-ONLY-IDX)                                                                         
     10484  R069A *                                TO CDE-CATEGORY                                                                  
     10485  R069A *                                IN ATE01D06-RECORD.                                                              
     10486  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10487  R069A *8565-MOVE-COUNTS.                                                                                                
     10488  R069A *    MOVE WST-CNTY-CAT-ACT-BDGT-CNT                                                                               
     10489  R069A *         (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                                      
     10490  R069A *                                TO CNT-BDGTS-ACTIVE                                                              
     10491  R069A *                                IN ATE01D06-RECORD.                                                              
     10492  R069A *    MOVE WST-CNTY-CAT-SUS-BDGT-CNT                                                                               
     10493  R069A *         (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                                      
     10494  R069A *                                TO CNT-BDGTS-SUSPD                                                               
     10495  R069A *                                IN ATE01D06-RECORD.                                                              
     10496  R069A *    MOVE WST-CNTY-CAT-MGA-DOLL                                                                                   
     10497  R069A *         (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                                      
     10498  R069A *                                TO AMT-GRANT-MONTHLY                                                             
     10499  R069A *                                IN ATE01D06-RECORD.                                                              
     10500  R069A *    MOVE WST-CNTY-CAT-MEM-ACT-CNT                                                                                
     10501  R069A *         (WSI-C-C-CNTY-IDX WSI-C-C-CAT-IDX)                                                                      
     10502  R069A *                                TO CNT-MEM-ACTIVE                                                                
     10503  R069A *                                IN ATE01D06-RECORD.                                                              
     10504  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10505  R069A *8565-NOW-WRITE-ATE01D06.                                                                                         
     10506  R069A *    PERFORM 8860-DET-WRITE-ATE01D06       THRU 8860-EXIT.                                                        
     10507  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10508  R069A *8565-EXIT.                                                                                                       
     10509  R069A *    EXIT.                                                                                                        
     10510  R069A *

     10515        *** ( PLS ALSO READ THE NARRATION ON 8510 WRITE-   ***

     10517        *** FILE 07 RECORDS HAVE A PREFIX OF 'D'.           ***                                                           
     10518        ******************************************************

     10550  R069A *                                                                                                                 
     10551  R006  *** R253 IF FOUND, WILL BE FORMATTED AS PER R248.

     10704        ******************************************************                                                            
     10705        *** WRITE ATE01D08 FILE                            ***                                                            
     10706        *** THIS PROCESS WILL BE INVOKED FOR EACH CASE     ***                                                            
     10707        *** MEMEBER RECORD THAT HAS A FUTURE-RECORD-GOING- ***                                                            
     10708        *** CURRENT.                                       ***                                                            
     10709        ******************************************************                                                            
     10710         8580-WRITE-ATE01D08.                                                                                             
     10711             MOVE WSH-CNTY-CASE-NBR      TO ATE01D08-CASE-NBR.

     10713  R069       MOVE  WSH-CDE-CATEGORY   TO  ATE01D08-CAT.

     10719                                                                                                                          
     10720        ******************************************************                                                            
     10721        *** WRITE ATE01D09 FILE                            ***                                                            
     10722        *** THIS PROCESS WILL BE INVOKED FOR EACH BUDGET   ***                                                            
     10723        *** ACTIVITY THAT MAY CAUSE TSA TO BE DELETED.     ***                                                            
     10724        *** THIS PROCESS WILL FILL IN KEY FIELDS ONLY,     ***                                                            
     10725        *** OTHER DETAIL FIELDS REQD FOR EACH REC TYPE     ***                                                            
     10726        *** WUD COME PREFORMATTED TO THIS PROCESS.         ***                                                            
     10727        ******************************************************                                                            
     10728         8590-WRITE-ATE01D09.                                                                                             
     10729             MOVE R666-NBR-CASE          TO ATE01D09-NBR-CASE.                                                            
     10730             MOVE R249-CDE-CATEGORY      TO ATE01D09-CDE-CATEGORY.

     10735             EXIT.

     10737

     10870  R080  *     MOVE  R247-ADR-LINE-2-CASE  TO  EOSSI-ADR-2.

     10873  R080  *     MOVE  R247-ADR-ZIP-CODE-MAIN  TO  EOSSI-ZIP-MAIN.                                                           
     10874  R080  *     MOVE  R247-ADR-ZIP-CODE-EXTN  TO  EOSSI-ZIP-EXTN.                                                           
     10875  R080  *     IF  WSH-R268-FIRST-RCPT  NOT  =  ZEROES                                                                     
     10876  R080  *         MOVE  WSH-R268-FIRST-RCPT  TO  EOSSI-NBR-RCPT                                                           
     10877  R080  *     ELSE                                                                                                        
     10878  R080  *         MOVE  R268-NBR-INDIV         TO  EOSSI-NBR-RCPT.                                                        
     10879  R080  *     MOVE  ZEROES                         TO EOSSI-NBR-VALDN.                                                    
     10880  R080  *     MOVE  ZEROES                 TO  EOSSI-NBR-SSN.

     10884        *******************************************************                                                           
     10885        *** DB RECORD MOVE TO WS RECORD SECTION.            ***                                                           
     10886        *** SECTION 8700.                                   ***                                                           
     10887        ***                                                 ***                                                           
     10888        *** INDIVIDUAL PARA MODULES ARE INVOKED AND ARE     ***                                                           
     10889        *** ORGANISED AS PER THEIR ENTRY PT RECORD.         ***                                                           
     10890        ***                                                 ***                                                           
     10891        *** THE FOLLOWING IS COMMON FOR ALL RECORDS :       ***                                                           
     10892        ***    . SORT KEY IS HARD CODED IN PROC.            ***                                                           
     10893        ***    . REC TYPE IS MOVED IN PROG AS PER SPECS.    ***                                                           
     10894        ***    . CASE NBR IS 666-NBR-CASE.                  ***                                                           
     10895        ***    . CDE-CATEGORY & NBR-GROUP-GRANT ARE FROM    ***                                                           
     10896        ***      249 CORRESPONDING REC.                     ***                                                           
     10897        *******************************************************                                                           
     10898         8700-DB-REC-MOVE-TO-WS-REC SECTION.                                                                              
     10899                                                                                                                          
     10900        *******************************************************
