     12020                                                                                                                          
     12021  R075A  2111F-GET-REAPP.                                                                                                 
     12022  R076       DISPLAY 'BEFORE W634-DTE-DUE-REDET :' W634-DTE-DUE-REDET                                                     
     12023  R076          UPON PRINTER.                                                                                             
     12024  R076       IF W634-REDET-GRG-MM > 24                                                                                    
     12025  R076          SUBTRACT 24 FROM W634-REDET-GRG-MM                                                                        
     12026  R076          ADD 2 TO W634-REDET-GRG-YY                                                                                
     12027  R076          GO TO 211FG-CALC.                                                                                         
     12028  R075A      IF W634-REDET-GRG-MM > 12                                                                                    
     12029  R075A         SUBTRACT 12 FROM W634-REDET-GRG-MM                                                                        
     12030  R076          ADD 1 TO W634-REDET-GRG-YY                                                                                
     12031  R076          GO TO 211FG-CALC.                                                                                         
     12032  R076   211FG-CALC.                                                                                                      
     12033  R075A      DIVIDE W634-REDET-GRG-YY BY 4 GIVING WS-LEAP-YEAR                                                            
     12034  R075A                                 REMAINDER WS-REMAINDER.                                                           
     12035  R075A      MOVE WS-EOM (W634-REDET-GRG-MM) TO  W634-REDET-GRG-DD.                                                       
     12036  R076       DISPLAY 'W634-DTE-DUE-REDET :' W634-DTE-DUE-REDET                                                            
     12037  R076          UPON PRINTER.                                                                                             
     12038  R075A      IF WS-REMAINDER = 0 AND W634-REDET-GRG-MM = 2                                                                
     12039  R075A         ADD 1 TO W634-REDET-GRG-DD.                                                                               
     12040  R075A  2111F-EXIT.                                                                                                      
     12041  R075A        EXIT.                                                                                                      
     12042  CC47A                                                                                                                   
     12043  CC47A  2111G-CALC-EXTN.                                                                                                 
     12044  CC47A      COMPUTE WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP                                                                                    
     12045  CC47A       = ((12 * W634-REDET-GRG-YY) + W634-REDET-GRG-MM) -                                                          
     12046  CC47A         ((12 * W634-DTE-OPENED-YY) + W634-DTE-OPENED-MM)                                                          
     12047  CC47A                                                                                                                   
     12048  CC47A      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 13                                                                                    
     12049  CC47A         MOVE 0 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                             
     12050  CC47A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12051  CC47A         IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 25                                                                                 
     12052  CC47A            MOVE 1 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                          
     12053  CC47A         ELSE                                                                                                      
     12054  CC47A            IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 37                                                                              
     12055  CC47A               MOVE 2 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                       
     12056  CC47A            ELSE                                                                                                   
     12057  CC47A               IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 49                                                                           
     12058  CC47A                  MOVE 3 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                    
     12059  CC47A               ELSE                                                                                                
     12060  CC47A                  IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 61                                                                        
     12061  CC47A                     MOVE 4 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                 
     12062  CC47A                  ELSE                                                                                             
     12063  CC47A                     IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 73                                                                     
     12064  CC47A                        MOVE 5 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                              
     12065  CC47A                     ELSE                                                                                          
     12066  CC47A                        IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 85                                                                  
     12067  CC47A *                          MOVE 6 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS.                                                         
     12068  R079                      MOVE 6 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                 
     12069  R079                 ELSE                                                                                               
     12070  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 97                                                                     
     12071  R079                      MOVE 7 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                 
     12072  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12073  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 109                                                                    
     12074  R079                      MOVE 8 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                 
     12075  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12076  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 121                                                                    
     12077  R079                      MOVE 9 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                 
     12078  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12079  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 133                                                                    
     12080  R079                      MOVE 10 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                
     12081  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12082  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 145                                                                    
     12083  R079                      MOVE 11 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                
     12084  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12085  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 157                                                                    
     12086  R079                      MOVE 12 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                
     12087  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12088  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 169                                                                    
     12089  R079                      MOVE 13 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                
     12090  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12091  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 181                                                                    
     12092  R079                      MOVE 14 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                
     12093  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12094  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 193                                                                    
     12095  R079                      MOVE 15 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                
     12096  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12097  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 205                                                                    
     12098  R079                      MOVE 16 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                
     12099  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12100  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 217                                                                    
     12101  R079                      MOVE 17 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS                                                                
     12102  R079                   ELSE                                                                                             
     12103  R079                      IF WS-OPEN-REAPP-GAP < 229                                                                    
     12104  R079                      MOVE 18 TO WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS.                                                               
     12105  CC47A  2111G-EXIT.                                                                                                      
     12106  CC47A        EXIT.                                                                                                      
     12107  CC47A                                                                                                                   
     12108  R075A  2111E-CLOSE-MG99.                                                                                                
     12109  R075A      IF WS-NO-OF-AUTO-EXTNS = 0                                                                                   
     12110  R075A         ADD 13  TO W634-REDET-GRG-MM                                                                              
     12111  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12112  R075A         ADD 12  TO W634-REDET-GRG-MM.                                                                             
     12113  R075A      PERFORM 2111F-GET-REAPP THRU 2111F-EXIT.                                                                     
     12114  R075A      FIND CURRENT R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO RECORD.                                                                     
     12115  R075A      IF ERROR-NUM = '0000'                                                                                        
     12116  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12117  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12118  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12119  R075A      MOVE WSH-TODAYS-DATE  TO   R634-DTE-END-EFFV                                                                 
     12120  R075A                                 R634-DTE-CHANGE-HIPAA.                                                            
     12121  R075A      MODIFY R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO RECORD.                                                                           
     12122  R075A      IF ERROR-NUM = '0000'                                                                                        
     12123  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12124  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12125  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12126  R078       MOVE 'R634' TO D18-REC-CDE.                                                                                  
     12127  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
     12128  R075A      MOVE 'Y'               TO   WSS-UPDATE-FLAG.                                                                 
     12129  R075A      FIND CURRENT R249-CASH-MEDICAL-BUDGET RECORD.                                                                
     12130  R075A      IF ERROR-CODE IS EQUAL TO '00'                                                                               
     12131  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12132  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12133  R075A         DISPLAY ' INVALID R249 FIND ==>  '                                                                        
     12134  R075A                R246-NBR-CASE UPON PRINTER                                                                         
     12135  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12136  R075A      MOVE WSH-TODAYS-DATE       TO   R634-DTE-BGN-EFFV                                                            
     12137  R075A                                      R634-DTE-CHANGE-HIPAA                                                        
     12138  R075A                                      R634-DTE-CHNG.                                                               
     12139  R079       ACCEPT WS-SYSTEM-TIME      FROM TIME.                                                                        
     12140  R076       MOVE WS-SYSTEM-HHMMSS      TO   R634-TME-ACTN.                                                               
     12141  R075A      MOVE ZEROES                TO   R634-DTE-END-EFFV.                                                           
     12142  R075A      MOVE 'N'                   TO   R634-IND-MA-AUTO.                                                            
     12143  R075A      MOVE 'F'                   TO   R634-CDE-ACTN-BDGT.                                                          
     12144  R075A      MOVE 'O'                   TO   R634-CDE-STUS-BDGT.                                                          
     12145  R075A      MOVE  W634-DTE-DUE-REDET   TO   M2K-GREGORIAN-DATE.                                                          
     12146  R075A      PERFORM  6520-GRG-TO-JUL.                                                                                    
     12147  R075A      MOVE  M2K-JULIAN-DATE      TO   R634-DTE-DUE-REDET.                                                          
     12148  R075A      MOVE 86986                 TO   R634-CDE-AUTH-CHG-BDGT.                                                      
     12149  R075A      MOVE SPACE                 TO   R634-CDE-STUS-NOTICE                                                         
     12150  R075A                                      R634-CDE-TYPE-NOTICE                                                         
     12151  R075A                                      R634-CDE-OPTION-NOTICE.                                                      
     12152  R075A      MOVE 446                   TO  R634-CDE-REASON-STUS.                                                         
     12153  R075A      MOVE ZEROS                 TO  R634-CDE-RSN-NOTICE.                                                          
     12154  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12155  R075A      STORE R634-CM-BUDGET-INFO.                                                                                   
     12156  R075A      IF ERROR-NUM = '0000'                                                                                        
     12157  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12158  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12159  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12160  R078       MOVE 'R634' TO D18-REC-CDE.                                                                                  
     12161  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
     12162  R075A      MOVE 'Y'                   TO   WSS-UPDATE-FLAG.                                                             
     12163  R075A      MOVE R246-NBR-CASE    TO   R355-MED-CASE                                                                     
     12164  R075A                                 LINK-NBR-CASE.                                                                    
     12165  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12166  R075A      CALL 'DBPA20' USING LINK-GET-CASE-AREAS.                                                                     
     12167  R075A      IF  LINK-CALL-STUS = 0                                                                                       
     12168  R075A          NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                            
     12169  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12170  R075A          DISPLAY  'DBPA20 CALL ERROR :' R355-MED-CASE                                                             
     12171  R075A             UPON PRINTER                                                                                          
     12172  R075A          PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                   
     12173  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12174  R075A      MOVE LINK-R355-AN             TO CALCR355-AN.                                                                
     12175  R075A      OPEN CALCR355-AN  USAGE-MODE  IS UPDATE                                                                      
     12176  R075A        ON ERROR GO TO 2112X-ERROR.                                                                                
     12177  R075A  2112X-ERROR.                                                                                                     
     12178  R075A      IF ERROR-CODE = '00' OR '28'                                                                                 
     12179  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12180  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12181  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12182  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12183  R075A      FIND R355-MED-CASE RECORD.                                                                                   
     12184  R075A      IF ERROR-CODE IS EQUAL TO '00'                                                                               
     12185  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12186  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12187  R075A          PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                   
     12188  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12189  R075A      MOVE R249-CDE-CATEGORY     TO R356-CDE-CAT.                                                                  
     12190  R075A      MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT  TO R356-NBR-GROUP-GRANT.                                                          
     12191  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12192  R075A      FETCH R356-MABDGT-EP                                                                                         
     12193  R075A        VIA S355-MED-CASE-BDGT                                                                                     
     12194  R075A          USING R356-CDE-CAT, R356-NBR-GROUP-GRANT.                                                                
     12195  R075A      IF ERROR-CODE IS EQUAL TO '00'                                                                               
     12196  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12197  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12198  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12199  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12200  R075A      FETCH FIRST R357-MEDICAL-BUDGET                                                                              
     12201  R075A      WITHIN S164-MA-RESULT SET.                                                                                   
     12202  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12203  R075A      IF ERROR-NUM = '0000'                                                                                        
     12204  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12205  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12206  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12207  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12208  R075A      MOVE R634-DTE-DUE-REDET          TO R357-DTE-DUE-REDET.                                                      
     12209  R075A      MOVE WSH-TODAYS-DATE             TO R357-DTE-CHNG.                                                           
     12210  R075A      MOVE WSH-SYS-TIME-SEC            TO R357-TME-ACTN.                                                           
     12211  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12212  R075A      MODIFY R357-MEDICAL-BUDGET RECORD.                                                                           
     12213  R075A      IF ERROR-NUM = '0000'                                                                                        
     12214  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12215  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12216  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12217  R078       MOVE 'R357' TO D18-REC-CDE.                                                                                  
     12218  R078       PERFORM 2065-PROCESS-ASB04B THRU 2065-EXIT.                                                                  
     12219  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12220  R075A      FIND CURRENT R249-CASH-MEDICAL-BUDGET RECORD.                                                                
     12221  R075A      IF ERROR-CODE IS EQUAL TO '00'                                                                               
     12222  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12223  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12224  R075A         DISPLAY ' INVALID R249 FIND ==>  '                                                                        
     12225  R075A                R246-NBR-CASE UPON PRINTER                                                                         
     12226  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12227  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12228  R075A      FETCH FIRST R268-BUDGET-MEMBER-RELATION                                                                      
     12229  R075A      WITHIN S104-CM-BDGT-MBR-RLTN SET.                                                                            
     12230  R075A      IF ERROR-NUM = '0000'                                                                                        
     12231  R075A         NEXT SENTENCE                                                                                             
     12232  R075A      ELSE                                                                                                         
     12233  R075A         PERFORM 7995-DB-ERROR.                                                                                    
     12234  R075A                                                                                                                   
     12235  R075A      MOVE R268-NBR-INDIV         TO ATE01D16-RECIPIENT.                                                           
     12236  R075A      MOVE R246-CM-CASE           TO ATE01D16-NBR-CASE.

     12238  R075A      MOVE R249-NBR-GROUP-GRANT   TO ATE01D16-NBR-GG.

     12260  R077   2321XX-DECIDE-NOTICE.                                                                                            
     12261  R077       IF (CIS014-DD-IND = 'Y')                                                                                     
     12262  R077          IF (R249-CDE-CATEGORY = 'D')                                                                              
     12263  R077            MOVE  3            TO D11-CDE-OPTION-NOTICE                                                             
     12264  R077          ELSE

     12269  R077          IF (R249-CDE-CATEGORY = 'D')

     12276  R077          IF (R249-CDE-CATEGORY = 'D')

     12278  R077          ELSE

     12369  R069       COPY APD809P                                                                                                 
     12370                  REPLACING 0300-CLOSING BY 3000-CLOSING.                                                                 
COPY  9327        /                                                                                                                 
COPY  9328        ****************************************************                                                              
COPY  9329        *                                                  *                                                              
COPY  9330        ************* DATA BASE ERROR ROUTINES *************                                                              
COPY  9331        *                                                  *                                                              
COPY  9332        ****************************************************                                                              
COPY  9333        *                                                  *                                                              
COPY  9334        *   PUT MESSAGE IN ASB003 FILE IF A DATA BASE ERROR*                                                              
COPY  9335        *   ALSO DISPLAY A MESSAGE ON OPERATOR CONSOLE IF  *                                                              
COPY  9336        *   A DEADLOCK OCCURS.                             *                                                              
COPY  9337        *   PROGRAMMER: JIM COLLINS   DATE: 04/28/2010     *                                                              
COPY  9338        *          PCR: 16643                              *                                                              
COPY  9339        ****************************************************                                                              
COPY  9340         GENERAL-ERROR-RTN.                                                                                               
COPY  9341             DISPLAY '**** GENERAL DATA BASE ERROR ****' UPON PRINTER.                                                    
COPY  9342             PERFORM DISPLAY-ERROR.                                                                                       
COPY  9343             IF IMPART-DEPART EQUAL TO '1'                                                                                
COPY  9344               CLOSE ALL                                                                                                  
COPY  9345                 DEPART WITH ROLLBACK.                                                                                    
COPY  9346             PERFORM 0300-CLOSING.                                                                                        
      9347                                                                                                                          
COPY  9348         ROLLBACK-ERROR-RTN.                                                                                              
COPY  9349             DISPLAY '******** ROLLBACK ERROR ********' UPON PRINTER.                                                     
COPY  9350             PERFORM DISPLAY-ERROR.                                                                                       
COPY  9351             PERFORM 0300-CLOSING.                                                                                        
      9352                                                                                                                          
COPY  9353         DISPLAY-ERROR.                                                                                                   
COPY  9354             MOVE  BCF-RUN-ID      TO  WS-SML-RUN-ID.                                                                     
COPY  9355             MOVE  CPF-CYCLE-DATE  TO  WS-SML-CYCLE-DATE.                                                                 
COPY  9356             MOVE  'F'             TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CAT.                                                                
COPY  9357             IF  RB-ERROR-CODE  =  02                                                                                     
COPY  9358                 MOVE  221            TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE                                                             
COPY  9359             ELSE                                                                                                         
COPY  9360                 MOVE  227           TO  WS-SML-MESSAGE-CODE.                                                             
COPY  9361             STRING  RB-ERROR-CODE  ' '  ERROR-FUNCTION  ' '                                                              
COPY  9362                 ERROR-NUM  DELIMITED  BY  SIZE  INTO  WS-SML-PARAM-1.                                                    
COPY  9363             MOVE  SPACES          TO  WS-SML-PARAM-2.                                                                    
COPY  9364             CALL  'ASB003'  USING  SYS-MSG-LIST.                                                                         
COPY  9365             IF  WS-SML-STATUS-INDCTR3  NOT  =  '0'                                                                       
COPY  9366                 DISPLAY  'ASB003 ERROR STATUS = '  WS-SML-STATUS-INDCTR3                                                 
COPY  9367                     UPON  PRINTER.                                                                                       
COPY  9368             DISPLAY 'ERROR STATUS = ' ERROR-STATUS UPON PRINTER.
